[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min bɛ danni kɛ ani min b'a sɔn, olu ka kan. Ala na u bɛɛ kelen-kelen sara ka kɛɲɛ ni u ka baara kɛlenw ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sabu an ni Ala ye baarakɛɲɔgɔnw ye. Aw ye Ala ka foro ye, ani a ka so jɔta.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye so ju sigi ka kɛɲɛ ni Ala ka nɛɛma dilen ye ne ma, i ko sojɔla hakiliman. Sisan, mɔgɔ wɛrɛ bɛ so jɔ o ju kan. Nka bɛɛ kelen-kelen ka u yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi u ka so jɔ cogo la o kan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ju min sigira, o ye Yesu Krisita de ye. Mɔgɔ si tɛ se ka dɔ wɛrɛ sigi o kɔ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ dɔ ye so jɔ o ju kan ni sanu ye, wala warijɛ, wala kabakurun sɔngɔ gɛlɛnw, wala jiri, wala bin jalen, wala ɲɔkalaw,
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] u bɛɛ kelen-kelen ye baara sifa min kɛ, o na jira. O na dɔn kiri don na, sabu a na jira tasuma de fɛ. Mɔgɔw bɛɛ kelen-kelen ka baara na kɔrɔbɔ tasuma fɛ k'a sifa jira.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ dɔ ka baara kɛlen ma jeni, o na baraji sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni mɔgɔ dɔ ka baara kɛlen jenina, o na bɔnɛ a ka baraji la. O bɛɛ n'a ta a yɛrɛ na kisi, i n'a fɔ a ye tasuma cɛtigɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw m'a dɔn ko aw ye Alabatosoba de ye, ko Ala Ni sigilen bɛ aw kɔnɔ wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ dɔ ye Alabatosoba tiɲɛ, Ala na o tigi tiɲɛ k'a masɔrɔ Alabatosoba ka senu, o ye aw de ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ si kana a yɛrɛ lafili. Ni dɔ bɛ miiri ko a ye hakilitigi ye aw cɛma ka kɛɲɛ ni nin diɲɛ ka kow ye, o k'a yɛrɛ kɛ i n'a fɔ nalonma, walisa a ka kɛ hakilitigi ye sɛbɛ la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ nin diɲɛ ka hakilitigiya ye nalonmaya ye Ala ɲɛ na. A sɛbɛnnen bɛ Kitabu la ko: «A bɛ hakilitigiw minɛ jan na ni u yɛrɛw ka keguya ye.»
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A sɛbɛnnen bɛ fana ko: «Matigi bɛ hakilitigiw ka miiriliw dɔn, ko olu ye fu ye.»
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn mɔgɔ si kana a yɛrɛ bonya mɔgɔw ko la, katuguni fɛn bɛɛ ye aw ta ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul wo, Apolosi wo, Pierɛ wo, diɲɛ wo, ɲɛnamaya wo, saya wo, sisan fɛnw wo, fɛn nataw wo, fɛn bɛɛ ye aw de ta ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ye Krisita ta ye. Krisita ye Ala ta ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la mɔgɔw ka an jate ko anw ye Krisita ka baarakɛlaw ani Ala ka gundo kow ɲɛjirabaaw ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Baara kalifalen bɛ minnu ma, a bɛ ɲini olu fɛ ko u ka kɛ dannamɔgɔw ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni ta fan fɛ, ni aw bɛ ne sɛgɛsɛgɛ, wala ni ne bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw fɛ kiri yɔrɔ la, o tɛ koba ye ne ɲɛ na. Ne tɛ ne yɛrɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛ fana,
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ ne dusukun ma ne jalaki foyi la, nka o tɛ ne josɔrɔ sababu ye. Min bɛ kiri tigɛ ne kan, o ye Matigi de ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn, aw kana kiri tigɛ mɔgɔ si kan sani a waati ka se, sani Matigi ka na. Ale de na dibila ko dogolenw bɛɛ bɔ kɛnɛ kan, ka mɔgɔw dusukunw ka miiriliw fana jira. O tuma la bɛɛ kelen-kelen ka kan ni tanuli min ye, u na o sɔrɔ Ala fɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw, ne ye kuma kɔrɔma minnu fɔ sisan, ne ye olu fɔ ne ni Apolosi ta fan fɛ aw kalanni kosɔn, walisa aw k'a faamu an ka ɲɛjirali fɛ, ko fɛn minnu sɛbɛnna Kitabu la, mɔgɔ kana tɛmɛn olu kan. O de kosɔn aw si kana aw yɛrɛw bonya ka mɔgɔ dɔ fisaya dɔ ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de la, jɔni ye i fisaya ka tɛmɛn dɔ wɛrɛ kan? Mun bɛ i bolo ni o ma di i ma? N'a dira i ma, mun na i b'i yɛrɛ bonya i n'a fɔ a ma di i ma?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ye aw sagona fɛnw bɛɛ sɔrɔ kelen! Aw fɛntigiyara kelen! Aw kɛra masakɛw ye k'a sɔrɔ an sen tɛ o la! Ne b'a fɛ aw ka kɛ masakɛw ye sɛbɛ la, walisa an ni aw ka kɛ masakɛw ye ɲɔgɔn fɛ!
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ miiri ko Ala ye an cidenw kɛ bɛɛ kɔmɔgɔw ye, an kɛra i ko mɔgɔ minnu jalaki ye saya ye, k'a masɔrɔ an kɛra filɛli fɛnw ye diɲɛ bɛɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ, mɛlɛkɛw fara Hadamadenw kan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ye nalonmaw ye Krisita kosɔn, nka aw ye hakilitigiw ye Krisita la! An ye barikantanw ye, nka aw barika ka bon. Aw bɛ bonyali sɔrɔ, anw bɛ dɔgɔyali sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fo ka na se sisan ma, an tɔɔrɔlen don kɔngɔ ni minnɔgɔ fɛ. Anw fɛɛrɛtɔ don, an bɛ bugɔ. Sigi yɔrɔ kelen tɛ an na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛ baara kɛ ni an yɛrɛ bolow ye fo ka an sɛgɛn. Mɔgɔw bɛ an neni, an bɛ duba ta u ye. U bɛ tugu an nɔfɛ ka an tɔɔrɔ, an bɛ o muɲu.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛ an tɔgɔ tiɲɛ, an bɛ kuma ɲuman fɔ u ye. An bɛ jate diɲɛ ɲamanɲaman fililenw ye, i ko fɛn korokaraw, fo ka na se sisan ma.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tɛ nin kow sɛbɛn ka aw lamalo, nka ne bɛ aw lasɔmi i ko ne den kanulenw.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali ni karamɔgɔ waa tan tun bɛ aw fɛ Krisita la, fa caman kɔni tɛ aw fɛ, katuguni ne kɛra aw fa ye Krisita Yesu la Kibaru Duman waajuli barika la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn ne bɛ aw deli ko aw ka kɛ ne ladegebaaw ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to ne bɛ ne denkɛ kanulen Timote ci aw ma, dannamɔgɔ don Matigi la. Ale na aw hakili jigin ne taama cogow la Krisita la, i ko ne bɛ mɔgɔw kalan cogo min na yɔrɔ bɛɛ egilisiw bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw dɔw ye kuncɛbaya kɛ ko ne tɛna taa aw yɔrɔ tun,

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni Ala ka masaya tɛ kuma ko ye, sebaaya ko don.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] aw ka o cɛ don Sitanɛ bolo, a farikolo ka halaki, walisa a ni ka kisi Matigi Yesu ka don na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka yɛrɛ bonyali tɛ bɛn! Aw m'a dɔn ko funun fɛn dɔɔnin bɛ mugu nɔɔninen bɛɛ funun wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye o funun fɛn kɔrɔ bɔ yen, walisa aw ka kɛ mugu nɔɔninen kura ye, funun fɛn tɛ min na, sabu aw saniyalen don i ko nbuuru fununbali, k'a masɔrɔ an ka Tɛmɛnkan saraka fagara, o ye Krisita de ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn an ka o seli kɛ, nka o kana kɛ ni funun fɛn kɔrɔ ye, wala ni kɔnɔna juguya ni sɔnkolonya funun fɛn ye, fɔ dusukun jɛlen ni tiɲɛ nbuuru fununbali ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne y'a fɔ aw ye ne ka sɛbɛn la ko aw ni jatɔw kana jɛ foyi la,

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sisan ne bɛ min fɔ, o filɛ nin ye ko: Mɔgɔ min bɛ wele balima, ni o ye jatɔ ye, wala wasabali, wala bolisɔnna, wala nenilikɛla, wala dɔlɔtɔ, wala binkannikɛla, aw ni o tigi kana jɛ foyi la. Aw ni o bɔɲɔgɔnko mɔgɔ kana dumuni kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ yɛrɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni kiri ko dɔ bɛ aw dɔ ni a balima cɛ, o bɛ sɔn ka taa o ɲɛnabɔ tilenbaliw ɲɛ kɔrɔ cogo di? Yala a tɛna a ɲɛnabɔ dannabaaw ɲɛ kɔrɔ wa?

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw m'a dɔn ko an na kiri tigɛ mɛlɛkɛw kan wa? Janko nin diɲɛ kow?

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ o fɔ ka aw lamalo. Mɔgɔ hakilitigi si tɛ aw cɛma min bɛ se ka kiri ko ɲɛnabɔ a balimaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka balima dɔ bɛ dɔ wele kiri la dannabaliw yɛrɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ!
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la, kiri ko ka sɔrɔ aw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, o ye aw jalaki de ye. Mun y'a to aw tɛ o tilenbaliya ko muɲu? Mun y'a to aw tɛ tɔɲɔli muɲu?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka minnu bɛ tilenbaliya kow kɛ ka aw tɔɲɔ, o ye aw yɛrɛw de ye. Aw bɛ o kɛ aw balimaɲɔgɔnw na!

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛn bɛɛ dagalen bɛ ne ye, nka nafa tɛ fɛn bɛɛ la. Fɛn bɛɛ dagalen bɛ ne ye, nka ne tɛna sɔn ka ne yɛrɛ kɛ fɛn si ka jɔn ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dumuni fɛnw ye kɔnɔbara ta ye. Kɔnɔbara ye dumuni fɛnw ta ye, o ye tiɲɛ ye. O bɛɛ n'a ta, Ala na u fila bɛɛ ban. Nka mɔgɔ farikolo ma kɛ jatɔya kama. Farikolo ye Matigi ta ye, Matigi ye farikolo ta ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ye an Matigi lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma. Ale na an fana lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma a ka sebaaya barika la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw m'a dɔn ko aw farikolow ye Krisita farikolo yɔrɔ dɔw ye wa? Ayiwa, ne na Krisita farikolo yɔrɔ dɔw ta ka olu kɛ jatɔmuso farikolo yɔrɔ dɔw ye wa? Ayi dɛrɛ!
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw m'a dɔn ko cɛ min ni jatɔmuso bɛ jɛ, a ni o bɛ kɛ farisogo kelen ye wa? Katuguni Kitabu ko: «U fila na kɛ farisogo kelen ye.»
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka min ni Matigi bɛ jɛ, o ni ale ye ni kelen de ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] 8 A' ye boli jatɔya ɲɛ. Mɔgɔ bɛ ko jugu sifa o sifa wɛrɛ kɛ, o ye farikolo kɛnɛkan ko ye, nka min bɛ jatɔya kɛ, o bɛ a yɛrɛ farikolo hakɛ ta.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw farikolow ye Ni Senu ka Alabatosoba de ye. O sigilen bɛ aw kɔnɔ, aw ye o sɔrɔ Ala fɛ. Aw tɛ aw yɛrɛw ta ye dɛ. Aw ma o dɔn wa?

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso ka kan ni min ye, cɛ ka o kɛ a ye. Cɛ fana ka kan ni min ye, muso ka o kɛ a ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso tɛ a yɛrɛ farikolo kuntigi ye, a cɛ de b'a kun na. O cogo la fana cɛ tɛ a yɛrɛ farikolo kuntigi ye, a muso de b'a kun na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana ban ɲɔgɔn na, fɔ ni aw fila bɛnna a la ka waati dɔɔnin bila Ala delili kama. O kɔ, a' ye segin ɲɔgɔn ma, walisa Sitanɛ kana aw kɔrɔbɔ aw ka yɛrɛminɛbaliya kosɔn.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye nin fɔ aw ye ka aw laadi, o tɛ ci fɔlen ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɛ cɛw bɛɛ ka kɛ i ko ne. O bɛɛ n'a ta, Ala bɛ mɔgɔw bɛɛ ka nilifɛn di u ma. Dɔ ta bɛ cogo dɔ la, dɔ wɛrɛ ta bɛ cogo wɛrɛ la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu ma furu kɛ ani muso cɛ salenw, ne b'a fɔ ko a ka ɲi olu ma ka to i ko ne.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni u tɛ se ka u yɛrɛ minɛ, u ka furu kɛ katuguni furu ka fisa ni nege tɔɔrɔ ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dannabaa minnu furulen don, ne b'a fɔ olu ye k'a gɛlɛya, ne kan tɛ, Matigi kan don, ko: Muso kana fara a cɛ la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni a farala a cɛ la, a furubali ka to, wala a ka kɔsegin a cɛ ma. Cɛ fana kana a muso bila.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ min fɔ dannabaa tɔw ye, o filɛ nin ye, ne kan don, Matigi kan tɛ, ko: Ni muso dannabali bɛ balima dɔ kun, ni o sɔnna ka to a fɛ, a kana o bila.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la, ni muso dannabaa dɔ bɛ cɛ dannabali kun, ni o cɛ sɔnna a ka to a fɛ, a kana fara o la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dannabali bɛ saniya a muso dannabaa kosɔn. Muso dannabali bɛ saniya a cɛ dannabaa kosɔn. N'o tɛ, aw denw tun na kɛ nɔgɔlenw ye, nka tiɲɛ la, u ka senu.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, ni dannabali b'a fɛ ka fara dannabaa la, a ka o kɛ. Ni o kɛra, balimacɛ wala balimamuso sirilen tɛ. Ala ye an wele ka sigi hɛrɛ la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso dannabaa, i b'a dɔn yala i na i cɛ kisi wa? Cɛ dannabaa, i b'a dɔn yala i na i muso kisi wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, Matigi ye niyɔrɔ min di mɔgɔw bɛɛ kelen-kelen ma, Ala y'u wele fana k'u to cogo min na, u ka taama ka kɛɲɛ ni o ye. Ne bɛ o ci fɔ egilisiw bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ dɔ welela k'a sɔrɔ a bolokolen don, a ka to o cogo la. Ni dɔ welela k'a sɔrɔ a bolokobali don, o fana kana boloko.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Bolokoli wo, bolokobaliya wo, u si tɛ foyi ye. Ala ka ci fɔlenw kɛli de bɛ jate.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ye mɔgɔw bɛɛ kelen-kelen wele k'u to cogo min na, u ka to ten.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni jɔn min welela Matigi la, o ye Matigi ka hɔrɔn ye. O cogo la fana, hɔrɔn min welela, o ye Krisita ka jɔn ye.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nin waati gɛlɛn kosɔn, min ka ɲi ne ɲɛ na, o filɛ nin ye, ko a ka ɲi mɔgɔ ma ka to a cogo la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso bɛ i kun wa? Ayiwa, i kana furu sa cogo ɲini. I ma furu kɛ wa? Ayiwa, i kana muso furu.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, ni i ye furu kɛ, i ma jurumu kɛ. Ni npogotigi tara furu la, a ma jurumu kɛ. Nka a kɛbaaw na tɔɔrɔ sɔrɔ farisogo la u ka ɲɛnamaya kɔnɔ. Ne b'a fɛ ka aw tanga o ma.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa balimaw, ne bɛ nin de fɔ ko: Waati surunyara. Kabini sisan muso bɛ minnu fɛ, olu ka kɛ i ko muso tɛ u fɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu bɛ kasi, olu ka kɛ i ko u tɛ kasi. Minnu ɲagalilen don, olu ka kɛ i ko u ɲagalilen tɛ. Minnu bɛ sanni kɛ, olu ka kɛ i ko fɛn tɛ u fɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu bɛ u mago ɲɛ ni nin diɲɛ fɛnw ye, olu ka kɛ i ko u tɛ u sɛbɛ don o la, k'a masɔrɔ nin diɲɛ cogo na tɛmɛn.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne t'a fɛ aw hakili ka ɲaami. Min ma furu kɛ, o b'i janto Matigi ka kow la, walisa a ko ka diya Matigi ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min ye furu kɛ, o b'i janto diɲɛ kow la, walisa a ko ka diya a muso ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bɛ sama o fan fila sago kɛli nɔfɛ. O cogo la fana muso min tɛ cɛ kun, wala min ma furu fɔlɔ, o b'i janto Matigi ka kow la, walisa a ka saniya a farikolo ni a ni la. Nka min furulen don, o b'i janto diɲɛ kow la, walisa a ko ka diya a cɛ ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ o fɔ aw yɛrɛw nafa kama. Ne tɛ o fɔ ka fɛn dɔ wajibiya aw ma. Ne b'a fɛ aw ka taama cogo bɛnnen na, walisa aw nɔrɔlen ka to Matigi ka baara la, foyi kana aw hakili ɲaami.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni cɛ dɔ y'a miiri ko a denmuso npogotigilama tɛmɛnna furu waati kan, ko o ma bɛn, ko wajibi don a ka furu, a ka a sago kɛ, o tɛ jurumu ye, a ka a di furu la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka mɔgɔ min hakili sigilen don, ni ko wɛrɛ t'a wajibiya o la, ni se b'a ye k'a yɛrɛ sago kɛ, ni a y'a latigɛ a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ ko a tɛna a denmuso npogotigilama di furu la, o tigi bɛ ko ɲuman kɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de la, min ye a denmuso npogotigilama di furu la, o bɛ ko ɲuman kɛ, nka min m'a di, o ta de ka fisa.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] o bɛɛ n'a ta an kɔni fɛ, Ala kelenpe bɛ yen, o ye an Fa ye. Ale ye fɛn bɛɛ da, an bɛ yan ale kosɔn. Matigi kelenpe fana bɛ yen, o ye Yesu Krisita ye. Fɛn bɛɛ bɛ ale barika la, an fana bɛ a barika la.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kɔrɔbɔli si ma aw sɔrɔ min ma deli ka mɔgɔ sɔrɔ. Ala ye kantigi ye. A tɛna sɔn aw kɔrɔbɔli ka tɛmɛn aw barika dan yɔrɔ kan. Nka kɔrɔbɔli mana se, a na bɔ yɔrɔ jira walisa aw ka se ka o kɔrɔbɔli muɲu.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn ne ka kanulenw, a' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi bolibatoli ma.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛ barika da Ala ye jifilen dubama min kosɔn, o tɛ an ka jɛɲɔgɔnya taamashyɛn ye Krisita joli la wa? An bɛ nbuuru min karikari ka o dun, o tɛ an ka jɛɲɔgɔnya taamashyɛn ye Krisita farikolo la wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nbuurukun kelenpe bɛ yen. O de kosɔn, an minnu ka ca, an ye farikolo kelen ye, katuguni an bɛɛ bɛ jɛ nbuurukun kelen de la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye Israɛl mɔgɔw cogo filɛ. Minnu bɛ saraka fɛnw dun, olu tɛ saraka bɔlan jɛɲɔgɔnw ye wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɛ ka mun fɔ sa? Ko saraka min bɔra boli ye, wala boli yɛrɛ, yala olu ye fɛn ye wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayi dɛrɛ! Nka Ala dɔnbaliw bɛ sɔnni min kɛ, u bɛ jinɛw de sɔn, u tɛ Ala sɔn. O de kosɔn ne t'a fɛ aw ni jinɛw ka jɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw tɛ se ka minni kɛ Matigi ka jifilen na, ka minni kɛ jinɛw ka jifilen fana la. Aw tɛ se ka dumuni kɛ Matigi ka tabali la, ka dumuni kɛ jinɛw ka tabali fana la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yala an b'a fɛ ka Matigi la ɲini ka keleya don a la wa? Aw bɛ miiri ko an barika ka bon ale ta ye wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛn bɛɛ dagalen bɛ an ye. Tiɲɛ don, nka nafa tɛ fɛn bɛɛ la. Fɛn bɛɛ dagalen bɛ an ye, nka fɛn bɛɛ tɛ dɔ fara mɔgɔ wɛrɛ barika kan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ si kana a yɛrɛ nafa ɲini, fɔ mɔgɔ wɛrɛ nafa.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛn minnu bɛ feere sogofeere yɔrɔw la, a' ye olu dun. Aw kana ɲininkali si kɛ o ko la dusukun kosɔn,

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni dannabali dɔ ye aw wele dumuni la, ni aw b'a fɛ ka taa, a mana fɛn o fɛn sigi aw kɔrɔ, aw ka o dun. Aw kana ɲininkali si kɛ o la dusukun kosɔn.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni mɔgɔ dɔ b'a fɔ aw ye ko: «Nin ye bolisɔn sogo ye,» aw kana o dun aw lasɔmibaa kosɔn ani dusukun fana kosɔn.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tɛ kuma i yɛrɛ dusukun ko la, fɔ mɔgɔ wɛrɛ dusukun. O de la, mɔgɔ wɛrɛ dusukun ka kiri tigɛ ne ka hɔrɔnya kan mun kosɔn?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni ne bɛ barika da Ala ye ne ka dumuni kosɔn, mun na mɔgɔ wɛrɛ ka ne tɔgɔ tiɲɛ o dumuni ko la, k'a sɔrɔ ne ye barika da Ala ye o kosɔn?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to aw bɛ dumuni kɛ wo, aw bɛ minni kɛ wo, ni aw bɛ fɛn o fɛn kɛ, a' ye o bɛɛ kɛ Ala bonyali kosɔn.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw wo, siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw wo, Ala ka egilisi wo, aw kana kɛ u si kunnatiɲɛ sababu ye,
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] i ko ne fana bɛ ne jija ka mɔgɔw bɛɛ diyaɲekow kɛ fɛn bɛɛ la cogo min na. Ne tɛ ne yɛrɛ nafa ɲini, fɔ mɔgɔ caman nafa, walisa u ka kisi.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka kɛ ne ladegebaaw ye, i ko ne fana ye Krisita ladegebaa ye cogo min na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ aw fo katuguni aw bɛ aw hakili to ne la fɛn bɛɛ la, ka ne ka laadili kumaw mara i ko ne y'a jira aw la cogo min na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, ne b'a fɛ aw ka a dɔn ko cɛw bɛɛ kuntigi ye Krisita ye, ko muso kuntigi y'a cɛ ye, ko Krisita kuntigi ye Ala de ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn cɛ o cɛ bɛ Ala deli wala ka kiraya kɛ ka a kun datugulen to, o bɛ a kuntigi dɔgɔya.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka muso o muso bɛ Ala deli wala ka kiraya kɛ k'a sɔrɔ a kun ma datugu, o bɛ a kuntigi dɔgɔya. A bɛ i ko a kun dilen don.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni muso kun ma datugu, a ka a kunsigi tigɛ. Nka ni kunsigi tigɛ wala kun di ye muso maloya ko ye, a ka kan ka a kun datugu.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ man kan ka a kun datugu, katuguni a ye Ala ja ni a nɔɔrɔ de ye. Muso kɔni ye cɛ nɔɔrɔ ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la, cɛ dara tuma min na, a ma bɔ muso la, nka muso bɔra cɛ de la.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta Matigi la, ni cɛ tɛ, muso fana tɛ. Ni muso tɛ, cɛ fana tɛ.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ko fɔlɔ filɛ nin ye: A fɔra ne ye ko aw mana aw lajɛ egilisi kow la tuma min na, farali kow bɛ aw cɛma. Fan dɔ fɛ, ne bɛ da o la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Wajibi don kan tilali ka kɛ, walisa minnu ye dannabaa sɛbɛw ye aw cɛma, olu ka dɔn.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la, dumuni kɛlen kɔ, a ye jifilen ta, k'a fɔ ko: «Nin jifilen ye Ala ka layidu kura ye, o layidu tara ne joli la. Ni aw ye minni kɛ nin jifilen na tuma o tuma, aw ka o kɛ ka aw hakili to ne la.»

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn, mɔgɔw bɛɛ kelen-kelen ka u yɛrɛw sɛgɛsɛgɛ, o kɔ, ka o nbuuru dun ka minni kɛ o jifilen na.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hakilitigiya kuma dira dɔ ma Ni Senu fɛ. O Ni kelen ye dɔnniya kuma di dɔ wɛrɛ ma.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An tɛ yɔrɔ minnu jate maloya yɔrɔw ye, olu mago tɛ o la. Bonya dɛsɛra yɔrɔ minnu na, Ala ye farikolo dila ka bonyaba di olu ma,

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni farikolo yɔrɔ kelen tɔɔrɔla, o ni farikolo yɔrɔ tɔw bɛɛ bɛ tɔɔrɔ ɲɔgɔn fɛ. Ni yɔrɔ kelen ye bonyali sɔrɔ, o ni farikolo yɔrɔ tɔw bɛɛ bɛ ɲagali ɲɔgɔn fɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ye Krisita farikolo ye, aw bɛɛ kelen-kelen ye a farikolo yɔrɔ dɔ de ye.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ tɛ ciden ye. Bɛɛ tɛ kira ye. Bɛɛ tɛ karamɔgɔ ye. Bɛɛ tɛ kabako kɛbaa ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Banabaatɔw kɛnɛyali se ma di bɛɛ ma. Bɛɛ tɛ se ka kan wɛrɛw fɔ. Bɛɛ tɛ se ka kan wɛrɛw kɔrɔ fɔ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye kɛ Ala ka nilifɛn fisamaw fɛ kosɛbɛ. O bɛɛ n'a ta, sira min ka fisa ni o bɛɛ ye, ne bɛna o jira aw la sisan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali ni ne bɛ mɔgɔw kanw ni mɛlɛkɛw kanw fɔ, k'a sɔrɔ kanuya tɛ ne kɔnɔ, ne kumakan na kɛ i ko ntanan mankan wala weleninw.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali ni ne bɛ se ka kiraya kɛ, ka gundow bɛɛ ni fɛn bɛɛ dɔn, hali ni dannaya bɛɛ bɛ ne fɛ fo ka kuluw labɔ u nɔ na, k'a sɔrɔ kanuya tɛ ne kɔnɔ, ne tɛ foyi ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali ni ne ye ne bolofɛnw bɛɛ tilatila ka kɛ faantanw ka dumuni ye, ka ne farikolo di ko a ka jeni, o tɛna foyi ɲɛ ne ye ni kanuya tɛ ne kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muɲuli bɛ kanuya la, a falen bɛ ɲumaya la, keleya t'a la. Kanuya tɛ waso, kuncɛbaya t'a la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kanuya tɛ ko bɛnbali kɛ, a t'a yɛrɛ nafa ɲini. A tɛ dimin joona, a tɛ ko jugu miiri.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tɛ ɲagali tilenbaliya ko la, a bɛ ɲagali tiɲɛ de la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bɛ sabali fɛn bɛɛ la, a bɛ da fɛn bɛɛ la, a jigi bɛ fɛn bɛɛ kan, a bɛ fɛn bɛɛ muɲu.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kanuya tɛ ban abada. Kiraya kɛli na ban. Kan wɛrɛw fɔli na dabila. Dɔnniya na ban.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛ dɔɔnin dɔrɔn de dɔn. An bɛ dɔɔnin dɔrɔn de kɛ kiraya ko fana la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ko dafalenw mana na, ko dafabaliw na ban.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka ne to denmisɛnya la, ne tun bɛ kuma i ko denmisɛn, ne tun bɛ miiri i ko denmisɛn, ne tun bɛ kow jate minɛ i ko denmisɛn. Kabini ne ɲɛnatigɛra ka kɛ cɛ ye, ne ye denmisɛnya kow dabila.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sisan a bɛ i ko an bɛ fɛnw filɛ dubalen na, a ma jɛya, nka o tuma la an na yeli kɛ ɲɛda ni ɲɛda. Sisan ne bɛ dɔɔnin dɔrɔn de dɔn, nka o tuma la ne na ko dɔn ka dafa, i ko Ala bɛ ne dɔn cogo min na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa sisan nin fɛn saba tora, dannaya ni jigi ani kanuya, nka u bɛɛ la belebeleba ye kanuya de ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye tugu kanuya nɔfɛ. A' ye Ala ka nilifɛnw fana ɲini kosɛbɛ. A' ye kɛ kiraya nilifɛn fɛ ka tɛmɛn tɔw kan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min bɛ kan wɛrɛ fɔ, o tɛ kuma mɔgɔw fɛ, o bɛ kuma Ala fɛ, k'a masɔrɔ mɔgɔ si tɛ o kɔrɔ dɔn. A bɛ gundow fɔ a dusukun na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka min bɛ kiraya kɛ, o bɛ kuma mɔgɔw fɛ ka u nafa, ka u waaju, ani ka u dusuw saalo.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min bɛ kan wɛrɛ fɔ, o nafa bɛ a yɛrɛ kan, k'a sɔrɔ min bɛ kiraya kɛ, o nafa bɛ egilisi kan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɛ aw bɛɛ ka kan wɛrɛw fɔ, nka ne b'a fɛ aw ka kiraya kɛ ka tɛmɛn o kan. Tiɲɛ la, min bɛ kiraya kɛ, o ka bon ni kan wɛrɛ fɔbaa ye, fɔ ni a yɛrɛ bɛ o kan wɛrɛ kɔrɔ fɔ, walisa egilisi ka nafa sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa balimaw, ni ne taara aw fɛ yen ka kan wɛrɛw fɔ, k'a sɔrɔ ne ma Ala ka ko jirata dɔ fɔ aw ye, wala dɔnniya ko, wala kiraya, wala ka aw kalan, ne na nafa jumɛn lase aw ma?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɔlifɛnw ta fan fɛ, i ko file wala nkɔni, ni u kan tɛ faranfasi, u bɛ min fɔ, o na faamu cogo di?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni buru fyɛta tɛ kan faranfasilen bɔ, jɔni na i labɛn kɛlɛ kama?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la aw fana, ni aw ka kuma ma jɛya, aw ka fɔta na faamu cogo di? K'a masɔrɔ a bɛ i ko aw bɛ kuma fiɲɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kan caman bɛ diɲɛ la, nka kan si tɛ ni kɔrɔ tɛ min na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la kan wɛrɛ fɔbaa bɛ min fɔ, ni ne tɛ o mɛn, o tigi na kɛ jamana wɛrɛ mɔgɔ ye ne ɲɛ na, ne fana na kɛ jamana wɛrɛ mɔgɔ ye ale ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to, ka aw to Ni Senu ka nilifɛnw ɲinili la, minnu bɛ egilisi nafa, aw ka olu caman ɲini.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn, min bɛ kan wɛrɛ fɔ, o ka Ala deli walisa a ka se ka o kan wɛrɛ kɔrɔ fɔ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni ne bɛ Ala deli kan wɛrɛ la, ne bɛ delili kɛ ni ne ni ye, nka ne hakili sen t'a la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne na mun kɛ sa? Ne na Ala deli ni ne ni ye, ne na a deli ni ne hakili fana ye. Ne na tanuli dɔnkili da ni ne ni ye, ne na o da ni ne hakili fana ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni i bɛ barika da Ala ye ni i ni dɔrɔn de ye, mɔgɔ wɛrɛ minnu sigilen bɛ jama cɛma, olu na amiina fɔ i ka barika dali kɛlen kɔ cogo di? K'a sɔrɔ i bɛ min fɔ, olu tɛ o dɔn.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ don, i ka barika dali ɲɛ na kosɛbɛ, nka olu ma nafa si sɔrɔ a la.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ barika da Ala ye k'a masɔrɔ ne bɛ kan wɛrɛw fɔ ka tɛmɛn aw bɛɛ kan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka egilisi kɔnɔ, a ka di ne ye ka kuma duuru fɔ ni ne hakili ye walisa ka mɔgɔ wɛrɛw kalan, ka tɛmɛn kan wɛrɛ kuma waa tan fɔli kan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw, aw kana kɛ denmisɛnw ye hakili ta fan fɛ. Juguya ta fan fɛ kɔni, aw ka kɛ denmisɛnw ye, nka hakili ta fan fɛ, aw ka kɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnatigɛlenw ye.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A sɛbɛnnen bɛ sariya kitabu la ko: «Ne na kuma nin mɔgɔw fɛ kan wɛrɛ fɔbaaw da la ani siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw da la. Hali o, u tɛna ne lamɛn, Matigi ko ten.»
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn, kan wɛrɛw fɔli tɛ taamashyɛn ye dannabaaw ɲɛ na, nka taamashyɛn don dannabaliw ɲɛ na. Fan wɛrɛ fɛ, kiraya tɛ taamashyɛn ye dannabaliw ɲɛ na, nka taamashyɛn don dannabaaw ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa ni egilisi jama bɛɛ y'u lajɛ batoli la tuma min na, k'a sɔrɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ bɛ kan wɛrɛw fɔ, ni dannabaa wɛrɛw wala dannabali dɔw donna aw cɛma, u tɛna a fɔ ko aw hakili wulilen don wa?
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni dannabaa wɛrɛ wala dannabali dɔ donna aw cɛma, k'a sɔrɔ bɛɛ bɛ kiraya kɛ, a bɛ min mɛn aw bɛɛ da la, o na a kɔrɔfɔ ka kiri tigɛ a kan.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka miirili dogolenw na bɔ kɛnɛ kan. O tuma la a na i bin k'a ɲɛda biri duguma ka Ala bato k'a fɔ ko: «Tiɲɛ la, Ala bɛ aw cɛma!»
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw, an ka mun de kɛ? Ni aw bɛ aw lajɛ batoli la tuma min na, dɔ ta ye tanuli dɔnkili dali ye, dɔ ta ye kalan ye, dɔ ta ye jirali ye, dɔ ta ye kan wɛrɛ fɔli ye, dɔ fana ta ye o kan wɛrɛ kɔrɔ fɔli ye. O kɛtaw bɛɛ ka kɛ walisa ka egilisi nafa.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni dɔw bɛ kan wɛrɛw fɔ, olu kana tɛmɛn mɔgɔ fila wala saba kan, u k'a bɔ ɲɔgɔn kɔrɔ. Mɔgɔ dɔ fana ka o kan wɛrɛw kɔrɔ fɔ.
[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ tɛ yen min bɛ kan wɛrɛ kɔrɔ fɔ, a ka i makun egilisi kɔnɔ. A ka kuma a yɛrɛ ni Ala cɛ.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] N'a y'a sɔrɔ ne ye waraw kɛlɛ Efese ka kɛɲɛ ni Hadamadenw cogo dɔrɔn ye, ne bɛna mun nafa sɔrɔ o la sa? Ni suw tɛ kunun, «an ka dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ, katuguni sini an na sa.»

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔ na ɲininkali kɛ ko: «Suw bɛ kunun cogo di? Farikolo sifa jumɛn na kɛ u la?»

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I bɛ si min dan, o ye kisɛ gansan dɔrɔn de ye, a dɔrɔ ɲɔkisɛ wala kisɛ sifa wɛrɛ, nka a na falen ka kɛ sun min ye, o sun ni o kisɛ tɛ cogo kelen na.

[BOOK] 1CO [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛn ɲɛnamaw farisogo bɛɛ tɛ sifa kelen ye. Mɔgɔ ta ye sifa dɔ ye, baganw ta ye sifa wɛrɛ ye, kɔnɔw ta ye sifa dɔ ye, jɛgɛw ta ye sifa wɛrɛ ye.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I ye ɲɛnamaya siraw jira ne la. I na ne fa ɲagali la i ɲɛ kɔrɔ.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «N'balimaw, ne b'a fɔ aw ye k'a jɛya an bɛnba Dawuda ko la, ko a sara, a su donna, a kaburu bɛ an cɛma halibi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dawuda tun ye kira ye, a y'a dɔn ko Ala y'i kali a ye ko a na ale bɔnsɔn dɔ sigi a ka masasigilan kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn Dawuda kumana Krisita kununli ko la, k'a masɔrɔ a ye o ye sani a ka kɛ, ko a ni tɛna to Hadɛsi kɔnɔ, ko a farisogo tɛna toli.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nin Yesu kɔni, Ala y'a lakunun, an bɛɛ ye o seerew ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to a kɔrɔtalen kɔ ka taa Ala kinin fɛ, a ye Ni Senu sɔrɔ ka kɛɲɛ ni a Fa ka layidu talen ye a ye. Aw bɛ min ye k'a mɛn, o don, a ye o jigin an kan k'a caya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dawuda yɛrɛ ma yɛlɛn ka taa sankolo kɔnɔ, nka a y'a fɔ ko: ‘Matigi y'a fɔ ne Matigi ye ko: I sigi ne kinin fɛ,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] fo ne ka i juguw kɛ i sen kɔrɔ dalan ye.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O de y'a to Israɛl bɛɛ k'a dɔn k'a jɛya ko aw ye nin Yesu min gengen jiri la, Ala ye o kɛ Matigi ni Krisita ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kuma mɛnnen kɔ u fɛ, u dusuw lamagara, u y'a fɔ Pierɛ ni ciden tɔw ye ko: «An balimaw, an ka kan ka mun kɛ?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye nimisa aw ka jurumuw la, aw bɛɛ kelen-kelen ka batise Yesu Krisita tɔgɔ la, walisa aw ka jurumuw yafa sɔrɔ. Ala na Ni Senu di aw ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Katuguni o layidu tara aw ni aw bɔnsɔn ye, ani minnu bɛɛ bɛ yɔrɔ jan, Matigi an ka Ala na minnu bɛɛ wele ka na a yɛrɛ ma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ye u waaju ni kuma caman wɛrɛw ye k'a jɛya ko: «A' ye aw tanga bi mɔgɔ juguw ka kɛtaw ma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu sɔnna a ka kuma ma, olu batisera. Mɔgɔ waa saba ɲɔgɔn farala u kan o don na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tora cidenw ka kalan ni u ka balimaya jɛɲɔgɔnya ni nbuuru karikarili ani Ala delili la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ tun bɛ siran. Kabakow ni taamashyɛn caman tun bɛ kɛ cidenw bolo.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu ye dannaya kɛ, olu bɛɛ tun bɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ ka u ka fɛnw bɛɛ kɛ u foroba ye.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ka to ka Ala tanu. U ko diyara mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye. Minnu tun bɛ kisi, Matigi ye olu fara u kan don o don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa Pierɛ ni Yuhana taara ɲɔgɔn fɛ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ wula da fɛ Ala deli tuma la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ yen. Nabara tun don, a bangera ten. Mɔgɔw tun b'a ta don o don k'a bila Alabatosoba da dɔ la, walisa a ka saraka deli o so kɔnɔ donbaaw fɛ. O da tɔgɔ ko Da Cɛɲi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale ye Pierɛ ni Yuhana dontɔ ye Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, a ye saraka deli u fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ni Yuhana ye u ɲɛw jɔ a la, Pierɛ ko: «An filɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye u lajɛ yala ni u nafɛn dɔ di a ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Pierɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Wari ni sanu tɛ ne fɛ, nka min bɛ ne fɛ, ne bɛ o de di i ma. Yesu Krisita Nazarɛtika tɔgɔ la, wuli ka taama.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ye o cɛ kininbolo minɛ k'a lawuli. O yɔrɔnin kelen a senw ni a senkuruw ye barika sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'i pan k'i jɔ ka taama, ka don u fɛ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ. A taamatɔ tun b'i panpan ka Ala tanu.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ y'a ye ko a bɛ taama ka Ala tanu.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ min tun bɛ sigi ka saraka deli Alabatosoba Da Cɛɲi da la, u y'a dɔn ko o don. Ko min kɛra a la, o ye u kabakoya ka u kɔnɔnafili.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ tolen ka Pierɛ ni Yuhana minɛ, mɔgɔw bɛɛ kabakoyalen bolila ka taa u yɔrɔ Solomani ka ga kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'o ye tuma min na, a y'a fɔ jama ye ko: «Israɛl mɔgɔw, mun y'a to aw kabakoyalen don nin cɛ ko la? Mun y'a to aw ɲɛw jɔlen bɛ an na, i n'a fɔ an yɛrɛw ka sebaaya wala an ka Ala ɲɛsiran de y'a to nin cɛ taamana?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ibrahima ni Isaka ni Yakuba ka Ala, an bɛnbaw ka Ala kɔni, o de ye a ka baaraden Yesu bonya. Aw kɔni y'a don bolo la ka aw dalacɛ a la Pilate ɲɛ kɔrɔ k'a sɔrɔ Pilate tun y'a latigɛ k'a bila ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ye aw dalacɛ o Senuma Tilennen na ka Pilate deli ko mɔgɔfagala ka di aw ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ye ɲɛnamaya kuntigi faga, nka Ala y'a lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma, an ye o seerew de ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ɲɛ bɛ nin cɛ min na ni aw b'a dɔn, o ɲɛnamaya kuntigi Yesu tɔgɔ de ye barika di nin cɛ ma a ka dannaya kosɔn o tɔgɔ la. O cɛ ka dannaya Yesu tɔgɔ la, o de ye kɛnɛyali dafalen di a ma aw bɛɛ ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Sisan, n'balimaw, ne y'a dɔn ko aw ni aw kuntigiw ye o kɛ dɔnbaliya kosɔn,

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ tɛ sɔn ka o kira lamɛn, o tigi na halaki ka bɔ a ka mɔgɔw cɛma.’

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ye a ka baaraden lawuli tuma min na, a y'a ci aw fɔlɔ de ma, ka duba ta aw ye. O duba ye min ye, a na aw bɛɛ kelen-kelen yɛlɛma ka bɔ aw ka kɛwale juguw la.»

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An kɔni, an ye ko minnu ye ka u mɛn, an tɛ se ka to olu fɔbali ye.»

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tilara Ala delili la tuma min na, u lajɛlen tun bɛ yɔrɔ min na, o yɛrɛyɛrɛla, u bɛɛ fara Ni Senu la ka Ala ka kuma fɔ ni ja gɛlɛya ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dannabaaw jama bɛɛ kɛra kelen ye kanuya ni miirili la. Mɔgɔ si tun t'a fɔ ko a bolofɛnw ye a yɛrɛ kelen ta ye, nka u ka fɛnw bɛɛ kɛra u foroba ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw tun bɛ seereya kɛ Matigi Yesu kununli ko la ni sebaayaba ye. Nɛɛmaba tun bɛ u bɛɛ kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Bolo lankolon si tun tɛ u cɛma, k'a masɔrɔ forow ni sow tun bɛ minnu bolo, olu ye u feere ka na ni u sɔngɔ ye
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a don cidenw bolo, walisa a ka tilatila ka kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔw bɛɛ kelen-kelen mago ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Siprɛka Levite dɔ tɔgɔ ko Yusufu. Cidenw y'a wele fana Barnabasi, o kɔrɔ laadiliden.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Foro dɔ tun bɛ o fɛ, a y'a feere ka na ni a sɔngɔ ye k'o bila cidenw sen kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka cɛ dɔ tun bɛ yen, o tɔgɔ ko Ananiyasi. O ni a muso Safira ye dugukolo dɔ feere.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye dɔ bɔ o sɔngɔ la, k'a sɔrɔ a muso ye o dɔn, o kɔ ka taa a tɔ bila cidenw sen kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ananiyasi, mun y'a to Sitanɛ ye i kɔnɔnasu ka nkalon tigɛ Ni Senu ye, ka dɔ bɔ o dugukolo sɔngɔ la k'a mara?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni i tun ma a feere, a tun tɛna to i taya la wa? A feerelen kɔ, a sɔngɔ tun tɛ i sago la wa? Nin miirili jugu donna i kɔnɔ cogo di? I ma nkalon tigɛ mɔgɔw ye mɛnɛ, i y'a tigɛ Ala ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ananiyasi ye o kuma mɛn minkɛ, a binna, a sara. O ko mɛnbaaw bɛɛ siranna haali.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kamalenw wulila k'a kasanke ka taa n'a ye k'a su don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lɛrɛ saba ɲɔgɔn tɛmɛnnen kɔ, Ananiyasi muso nana. Ko min kɛra, a tun ma o dɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'a ɲininka ko: «A fɔ, aw ye dugukolo feere nin sɔngɔ de la wa?» Muso y'a jaabi ko: «ɔwɔ, o don.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Pierɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Aw bɛnna a la ka Matigi Ni kɔrɔbɔ ten cogo di? A filɛ, minnu ye i cɛ su don, olu selen filɛ so da la, u na taa ni i yɛrɛ fana ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ o muso binna Pierɛ sen kɔrɔ, a sara. Kamalenw donnen y'a salen sɔrɔ yen. U taara n'a ye k'a su don a cɛ kɛrɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Egilisi mɔgɔw ani minnu ye o ko mɛn, olu siranna kosɛbɛ haali.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw ye taamashyɛn ni kabako caman kɛ mɔgɔw cɛma. U bɛɛ lajɛlen tun bɛ Solomani ka ga kɔrɔ ni miirili kelen ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ tɔw kɔni ma u ja gɛlɛya ka taa jɛ u fɛ, o bɛɛ n'a ta mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye u bonya haali.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka hali o, jama tun bɛ to ka da Matigi la, cɛw ni musow, ka fara dannabaa jama kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw tun bɛ taa ni u ka banabaatɔw ye kalakaw ni dalanw kan ka u bila nbɛdaw kan, walisa Pierɛ tɛmɛntɔ, a ja ka da u dɔw kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama fana tun bɛ bɔ Jerusalɛm dafɛ duguw la ka na ni u ka banabaatɔw ni u ka jinɛtɔw ye, u bɛɛ tun bɛ kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O la, sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ni a fɛ mɔgɔw wulila, olu tun ye Saduseɛnw ye. Cidenw keleya donnen u la,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] u ye cidenw minɛ ka u bila kasobonba kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka su fɛ, Matigi ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ ye kasobon daw yɛlɛ ka cidenw labɔ k'a fɔ u ye ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye taa aw jɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, ka nin ɲɛnamaya kura kumaw bɛɛ fɔ mɔgɔw ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kuma mɛnnen kɔ u fɛ, u taara don Alabatosoba kɔnɔ sɔgɔma da joona fɛ ka daminɛ ka mɔgɔw kalan. Sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ni a fɛ mɔgɔw ye kiritigɛ jamakulu ani Israɛl siya cɛkɔrɔbaw bɛɛ lajɛ yɔrɔ kelen na. U ye garadi dɔw ci ka taa kasobon kɔnɔ ko u ka na ni cidenw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Garadiw selen kasobon kɔnɔ, u ma cidenw sɔrɔ yen. U kɔseginna ka taa o kibaru fɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ko: «An ye kasobon da sɔgɔlen sɔrɔ a cogo la, dakɔlɔsibaaw jɔlen tun bɛ a da la, nka an ye da yɛlɛ minkɛ, an ma mɔgɔ si sɔrɔ a kɔnɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kuma mɛnnen kɔ Alabatosoba kuntigi ni sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw fɛ, u kɔnɔnafilila o ko la, u ye ɲɔgɔn ɲininka ko nin laban na kɛcogo di?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔ nana k'a fɔ u ye ko: «A filɛ, aw ye cɛ minnu bila kaso la, olu jɔlen bɛ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ ka mɔgɔw kalan.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Alabatosoba kuntigi ni garadiw taara ka na ni cidenw ye ko ɲuman, katuguni u siranna ko mɔgɔw kana na u yɛrɛw bon ni kabakurunw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U nana ni cidenw ye ka u jɔ kiritigɛ jamakulu ɲɛ kɔrɔ. Sarakalasebaaw kuntigi y'a fɔ u ye ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «An m'a fɔ aw ye k'a gɛlɛya ko aw kana mɔgɔw kalan o cɛ tɔgɔ la tun wa? Nka a filɛ, aw ye Jerusalɛm bɛɛ fa aw ka kalan na. Aw kɔni b'a fɛ o cɛ joli hakɛ ka bin an kan.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ni ciden tɔw y'a jaabi ko: «Wajibi don an ka Ala kan minɛ ka tɛmɛn mɔgɔw ta kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛnbaw ka Ala ye Yesu lakunun, aw tun ye o min faga gengenjiri kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala y'a kɔrɔta k'a sigi a kinin fɛ ka a kɛ Masakɛ ni Kisibaa ye, walisa Israɛl ka se ka nimisa ka jurumuw yafa sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An kɔni ye o kow seerew de ye, an ni Ni Senu fana, Ala ye o min di a kan minɛbaaw ma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye o kumaw mɛn minkɛ, u diminna kosɛbɛ fo u tun b'a fɛ ka cidenw faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Farisiɛn dɔ tun bɛ yen, o tɔgɔ ko Gamaliɛl. Sariya karamɔgɔ dɔ tun don, mɔgɔw bɛɛ tun b'a bonya. O wulila k'i jɔ jama cɛma k'a fɔ ko u ka o cɛw labɔ yen fɔlɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Israɛl mɔgɔw, a' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi aw ka kɛtaw la nin cɛw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ma mɛn fɔlɔ Tudas wulila ka a yɛrɛ kɛ mɔgɔba ye. Cɛ kɛmɛ naani ɲɔgɔn tugura a la. Nka ale fagara, mɔgɔ minnu tun tugura a la, olu bɛɛ jɛnsɛnna, o murutili banna.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale kɔ, Galile Juda wulila mɔgɔ tɔgɔ sɛbɛnni waati la. A ye mɔgɔ caman wele ka tugu a nɔfɛ. Ale fana halakira, a nɔfɛ mɔgɔw bɛɛ jɛnsɛnna.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sisan, ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko aw kana sama nin cɛw ka kow nɔfɛ tun, a' ye u bila u ka taa. Ni nin ko wala nin baara bɔra mɔgɔw la, a na tiɲɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni a bɔra Ala la, aw tɛ se k'a tiɲɛ. A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi, a kana na sɔrɔ ko aw bɛ Ala kɛlɛ!»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kiritigɛ jama sɔnna Gamaliɛl ka kuma ma. U ye cidenw wele k'a fɔ ko u ka gosi ni berew ye. U y'a gɛlɛya u ma ko u kana Yesu tɔgɔ fɔ tun. O kɔ, u ye u bila ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw bɔra kiritigɛ yɔrɔ la ka taa. U ɲagalila, katuguni ka maloya sɔrɔ Yesu tɔgɔ kosɔn, u y'o jate bonyali ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don o don, ka u to Alabatosoba kɔnɔ ani mɔgɔw ka duw kɔnɔ, u ma mɔgɔw kalanni ni Krisita Yesu Kibaru Duman fɔli dabila.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O donw na, dannabaaw tun bɛ caya. Helenisitew ye dajukɔrɔ kuma fɔ Hɛburuw kama, katuguni u ka muso cɛ salenw tun tɛ jate don bɛɛ dumuni tilali la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw tan ni fila ye dannabaaw jama bɛɛ lajɛ k'a fɔ u ye ko: «An man kan ka Ala ka kuma fɔli dabila ka kɛ dumuni ko ɲɛnabɔbaaw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn balimaw, aw ka cɛ wolonwula ɲɛnatɔmɔ aw la, minnu tɔgɔ ɲuman bɛ fɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ fɛ, ni u falen bɛ Ni Senu ani hakilitigiya la, an na olu don nin baara la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Anw kɔni na to Ala delili ni Ala ka kuma fɔli la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kuma diyara jama bɛɛ ye. U ye ninnu ɲɛnatɔmɔ: Etiɛni, ale falen tun bɛ dannaya ni Ni Senu la, ani Filipe ni Prokɔrɛ ni Nikanɔr, Timɔn ni Parmɛnasi ani Antioseka Nikolasi, ale tun donna Yahutuya la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye olu jira cidenw la. Cidenw ye Ala deli, o kɔ, ka u bolow da u kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ka kuma tun bɛ jiidi ka ta'a fɛ, dannabaaw tun bɛ caya kosɛbɛ Jerusalɛm. Sarakalasebaa caman fana sɔnna ka dannaya kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Etiɛni falen tun bɛ nɛɛma ni sebaaya la. A tun bɛ kabakobaw ni taamashyɛnw kɛ mɔgɔw cɛma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔw wulila ka Etiɛni sɔsɔ. U dɔw bɔra Alabatoso jɛ dɔ la, o tun bɛ wele Hɔrɔnyalenw, u dɔw tun ye Sirɛnɛkaw ni Alɛkisandrikaw ye, dɔw bɔra Silisi ni Asi jamanaw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u ma se ka Etiɛni ka kuma kɔkari, sabu a tun bɛ kuma ni hakilitigiya ye Ni Senu barika la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye mɔgɔ dɔw lasu, walisa olu k'a fɔ ko: «A bɛ kuma ka Musa ni Ala tɔgɔ tiɲɛ, an yɛrɛw y'o mɛn a da la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye mɔgɔw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw ani sariya karamɔgɔw lasu Etiɛni kama. Olu taara ka bin Etiɛni kan k'a sama ka taa n'a ye kiritigɛ jamakulu ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U nana ni seere nkalontigɛla dɔw ye, olu ko: «Nin cɛ tɛ kuma jugu fɔli dabila nin yɔrɔ senuma ni sariya kama,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ an y'a mɛn a da la ko Yesu Nazarɛtika na nin yɔrɔ ci, ko Musa ye laada minnu di an ma, a na olu yɛlɛma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kiritigɛ jamakulu min sigilen tun bɛ yen, olu bɛɛ ye u ɲɛw jɔ Etiɛni la, a ɲɛda kɛra u ɲɛ kɔrɔ i ko mɛlɛkɛ ɲɛda.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ko: «O kow kɛra ten wa?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Etiɛni ye jaabili kɛ ko: «Ne balimaw ni ne faw, a' ye ne lamɛn. Nɔɔrɔtigi Ala y'i jira an bɛnba Ibrahima la k'a to Mesopotami, sani a ka sigi Karan. Ala y'a fɔ a ye ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ‘I ka bɔ i ka jamana ni i faso la. Ne bɛna jamana min jira i la, i ka taa yen.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Ibrahima bɔra Kalde jamana la ka taa sigi Karan. A fa salen kɔ, Ala y'a ɲɛminɛ ka bɔ yen ka na nin jamana la, aw sigilen bɛ yɔrɔ min na sisan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ma dugukolo si di a ma nin jamana kɔnɔ, hali sen da yɔrɔ kelen. Ala tun ye layidu ta a ye ko a na nin jamana di a ni a bɔnsɔn ma a kɔ, hali k'a sɔrɔ den tun t'a fɛ fɔlɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala y'a fɔ ko Ibrahima bɔnsɔn na kɛ siginfɛw ye jamana wɛrɛ la, o mɔgɔw na u kɛ jɔnw ye ka u tɔɔrɔ san kɛmɛ naani kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka siya min na u kɛ jɔnw ye, Ala ko a na kiri tigɛ o kan, o kɔ, u na bɔ yen ka na ale bato nin yɔrɔ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Ala ye bolokoli layidu ta Ibrahima ye. O cogo la Ibrahima ye Isaka bange ka a boloko a bange tile seginnan la. Isaka ye Yakuba bange, Yakuba ye an bɛnba tan ni fila bange.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «An bɛnbaw ye Yusufu keleya k'a feere Misira taalaw ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Ala tora a fɛ ka a bɔ a ka tɔɔrɔ kow bɛɛ la. Ala ye hakilitigiya di a ma ka a ko diya Misira masakɛ Faraon ye. Faraon ye Yusufu sigi Misira jamana ani a yɛrɛ ka so bɛɛ kun na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa kɔngɔba donna Misira jamana ani Kanan jamana bɛɛ kɔnɔ. O tɔɔrɔ bonyara kosɛbɛ fo an bɛnbaw ma dumunifɛn sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kabini Yakuba y'a mɛn ko suman bɛ Misira, a ye an bɛnbaw ci ka taa yen a siɲɛ fɔlɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U taa ko filanan la, Yusufu ye a yɛrɛ jira a balimaw la. O kɛlen, Faraon sɔrɔla ka Yusufu siya dɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yusufu ye ci bila ka taa a fa Yakuba ni a ka denbaya bɛɛ wele ka na, olu tun ye mɔgɔ biwolonwula ni duuru ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yakuba taara Misira, ale ni an bɛnbaw sara yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw ye u suw ta ka taa Sisɛm. Ibrahima tun ye sudon yɔrɔ min san wari la Hamɔr denkɛw fɛ, u suw donna yen.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] fo masakɛ kura sigira Misira kun na, o tun ma Yusufu dɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O masakɛ ye an siya janfa ka u tɔɔrɔ fo ka u wajibiya ka u ka denyɛnin fili kɛnɛma walisa u ka sa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Musa bangera, a cɛ tun ka ɲi haali. Sin dira a ma k'a to a fa ka so kɔnɔ kalo saba kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bilara kɛnɛma tuma min na, Faraon denmuso y'a ta ka a lamɔ ka a kɛ a yɛrɛ den ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Musa kalanna Misirakaw ka hakilitigiya bɛɛ la. Fangaba tun bɛ a ka kumaw ni a ka kɛwalew la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Musa ye san binaani sɔrɔ tuma min na, a y'i miiri ko a ka taa bɔ a balima Israɛl bɔnsɔnw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a ye ko Misiraka dɔ tun bɛ a balima dɔ tɔɲɔ, a farala a balima kan ka o mɔnɛ bɔ ka o Misiraka faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Musa tun bɛ miiri ko a balimaw n'a faamu ko Ala na u tila ale bolo, nka u m'a faamu.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O dugusajɛ, a sera a balimaw cɛma k'a sɔrɔ u dɔw bɛ ɲɔgɔn kɛlɛ. A tun b'a fɛ ka u cɛ labɛn, a ko: ‘Cɛw, aw ye balimaw ye. Mun y'a to aw bɛ ɲɔgɔn kɛlɛ?’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min ye dɔ tɔɲɔ, o ye Musa ɲɔni, a ko: ‘Jɔn ye i kɛ an kuntigi ni an ka kiritigɛla ye?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I b'a fɛ ka ne faga i ko i ye Misiraka faga kunuŋ o cogo min na wa?’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kuma kosɔn Musa bolila ka taa i sigi Madiyan jamana la. A ye denkɛ fila sɔrɔ yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «San binaani tɛmɛnnen kɔ, mɛlɛkɛ dɔ y'i jira Musa la Sinayi kulu kɛrɛ fɛ kungokolon kɔnɔ jirinin jenitɔ tasuma cɛmancɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Musa ye o jirinin jenitɔ ye tuma min na, o ye a kabakoya. A tun b'i madon k'o lajɛ tuma min na, a ye Matigi kumakan mɛn ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ‘Ne ye i bɛnbaw ka Ala ye, Ibrahima ni Isaka ni Yakuba ka Ala.’ Musa yɛrɛyɛrɛtɔ m'a ja gɛlɛya ka a lajɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘I ka sabara bɔ i sen na, katuguni i jɔlen bɛ yɔrɔ min na, o ye dugukolo senuma de ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ka mɔgɔ minnu bɛ Misira, ne ye olu tɔɔrɔ ko ye ka u ɛunankan mɛn. Ne jiginna ka na u tila. Na sisan walisa ne ka i ci ka taa Misira.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O Musa, u tun banna min na k'a fɔ ko: ‘Jɔni ye i kɛ an kuntigi ni an ka kiritigɛla ye?’ Ala ye o yɛrɛ ci k'a kɛ kuntigi ni tilabaa ye mɛlɛkɛ bolo, o min tun y'i jira Musa la jirinin na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O Musa ye u labɔ yen ni kabakow ni taamashyɛnw kɛli ye Misira jamana kɔnɔ ani Kɔgɔji Bilen na ani kungokolon kɔnɔ san binaani kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O Musa y'a fɔ Israɛl bɔnsɔn ye ko: ‘Ala na ne bɔɲɔgɔnko kira dɔ lawuli aw balimaw cɛma.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O Musa tun bɛ jamakulu cɛma kungokolon kɔnɔ, ale ni o mɛlɛkɛ min kumana a fɛ Sinayi kulu kan, ani an bɛnbaw fana. A ye kuma ɲɛnamaw sɔrɔ ka u di an ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Nka an bɛnbaw ma sɔn ka a kan minɛ. U banna a la, u dusukunw jɛngɛna Misira fan fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a fɔ Aron ye ko: ‘I ka batofɛn dɔw dila an ye, walisa olu ka an ɲɛminɛ, k'a masɔrɔ nin Musa min ye an labɔ Misira jamana la, min kɛra o la, an t'o dɔn.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O donw la u ye misiden bisigi dila, ka na saraka bɔ o boli ye, ka ɲagali u bolo baara nɔ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Ala y'a kɔ sin u ma ka u to sankolo dolow batoli la, i ko a sɛbɛnnen bɛ kiraw ka kuma la cogo min na, ko: ‘Israɛl mɔgɔw, aw ye baganw faga ka sarakaw bɔ ne ye san binaani kɔnɔ kungokolon kɔnɔ wa?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayi, aw ye Molɔk ka finiso ta ka taa n'a ye, ani batofɛn Ranfan ka dolo, aw ye o bisigi minnu dila walisa aw ka olu bato! O de kosɔn ne na aw cɛ ka taa Babilonɛ kɔfɛ.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Seereya finiso tun bɛ an bɛnbaw bolo ka u to kungokolon kɔnɔ. Ala tun kumana Musa fɛ k'a fɔ ko o finiso ka dila ka kɛɲɛ ni a ka bisigi yelen ye, u tun y'a dila ten.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O finiso sɔrɔlen kɔ an bɛnbaw fɛ, Josue ye u ɲɛminɛ ka don n'o ye nin jamana la, k'a sɔrɔ Ala tun ye siyaw gɛn ka bɔ u ɲɛ. A tora yen fo Dawuda tile la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dawuda ko tun ka di Ala ye, a ye Ala deli ko a ka sigi yɔrɔ jɔ Yakuba ka Ala ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Solomani de ye o so jɔ a ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O bɛɛ n'a ta Ala Kɔrɔtalenba tɛ sigi mɔgɔ ka so dilalen kɔnɔ, i ko kira y'a fɔ cogo min na, ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 51 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ kunkolo gɛlɛnw, dusukun ni tulo bolokobaliw, aw bɛ Ni Senu sɔsɔ tuma bɛɛ. Aw ni aw bɛnbaw ka kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 52 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kiraw la jumɛn bɛ yen ni aw bɛnbaw ma o tɔɔrɔ? Kira minnu ye o Tilennen nali ko fɔ, aw bɛnbaw ye olu faga. Sisan kɔni, aw kɛra o Tilennen janfabaaw ni a fagabaaw ye,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 53 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] aw minnu ye sariya sɔrɔ mɛlɛkɛw bolo, nka aw ma a mara!»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 54 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kiritigɛ jamakulu ye o kuma mɛn tuma min na, o ye u sɔn jeni, u ye u ɲinw ɲimi Etiɛni kama.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 55 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Etiɛni falen Ni Senu la, a ye a ɲɛw jɔ san fɛ ka Ala nɔɔrɔ ye ka Yesu jɔlen ye a kinin fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 56 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko: «A filɛ, ne ɲɛ bɛ sankolo dayɛlɛlen na ka Mɔgɔ Denkɛ jɔlen ye Ala kinin fɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 57 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la u ye kulokanba ci ka u tulow datugu. U bɛɛ girinna ka bin a kan
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 58 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a sama ka taa n'a ye dugu kɔfɛ k'a bon ni kabakurunw ye. Seerew ye u ka dulɔkiw bila kamalen dɔ sen kɔrɔ, o tɔgɔ ko Saul.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 59 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye Etiɛni bon ni kabakurunw ye, a ye Ala deli ko: «Matigi Yesu, ne ni minɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 60 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a y'i ɲɔngiri ka pɛrɛnkanba bɔ ko: «Matigi, i kana nin jurumu jate u kun.» O kumaw fɔlen kɔ, a sara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saul kɔni sɔnna Etiɛni fagali ma. O don yɛrɛ la tɔɔrɔba wulila Jerusalɛm egilisi kama. Dannabaaw bɛɛ jɛnsɛnna ka taa Jude ni Samari jamanaw yɔrɔw bɛɛ la, fɔ cidenw dama.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ɲɛsiranbaa dɔw ye Etiɛni su don, ka a su kasi kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saul kɔni tun bɛ a se ko kɛ walisa a ka egilisi tiɲɛ. A donna duw bɛɛ kɔnɔ ka dannabaaw, cɛw ni musow, sama ka u bila kaso la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɔgɔ jɛnsɛnnenw taara yɔrɔ bɛɛ ka waajuli kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Filipe sera Samari dugu dɔ la ka Krisita ko waajuli kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama ye Filipe ka kabako kɛlenw ye ka u mɛn minkɛ, u bɛɛ ye a lamɛn ni dusukun kelen ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jinɛw tun bɛ pɛrɛn ka bɔ jinɛtɔ caman na. Mɔgɔ fan fila salenw ni senkelenw caman fana kɛnɛyara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ɲagaliba kɛra o dugu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ o dugu kɔnɔ kabini tuma jan, o tɔgɔ ko Simɔn. A tun bɛ dɔnbaaya kow kɛ ka Samarikaw kabakoya, ka a yɛrɛ kɛ mɔgɔba ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ, mɔgɔ dɔgɔmanninw ni mɔgɔbaw tun bɛ a lamɛn kosɛbɛ k'a fɔ ko: «Nin cɛ ye Ala ka sebaayaba ye dɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun bɛ a lamɛn, katuguni a ye u kabakoya kabini tuma jan ni a ka dɔnbaaya kow ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Filipe ye Ala ka masaya ni Yesu Krisita tɔgɔ Kibaru Duman fɔ. O mɔgɔw dara o la tuma min na, u batisera, cɛw ni musow.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Simɔn yɛrɛ ye dannaya kɛ ka batise. A tugulen tora Filipe la. A ye o taamashyɛnbaw ni kabakow kɛtɔ ye tuma min na, a kabakoyara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jerusalɛm cidenw y'a mɛn tuma min na ko Samarikaw sɔnna Ala ka kuma ma, u ye Pierɛ ni Yuhana ci olu ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ni Yuhana sera Samari tuma min na, u ye Ala deli dannabaaw ye, walisa olu ka Ni Senu sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni Senu tun ma jigin u si kan fɔlɔ, u tun batisera Matigi Yesu tɔgɔ la dɔrɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Pierɛ ni Yuhana ye u bolow da u kan, u ye Ni Senu sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Simɔn y'a ye ko dannabaaw ye Ni Senu sɔrɔ cidenw ka bolo dalen fɛ u kan tuma min na, a nana ni wari ye k'a fɔ Pierɛ ni Yuhana ye
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ko: «A' ye nin sebaaya di ne fana ma, walisa ne mana ne bolow da mɔgɔ min kan, o ka Ni Senu sɔrɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ni i ka wari fila bɛɛ ka halaki, k'a masɔrɔ i bɛ miiri ko Ala ka nilifɛn bɛ se ka san ni wari ye!
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Niyɔrɔ ni jɔyɔrɔ tɛ i fɛ nin ko la, katuguni i dusukun ma tilen Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I ka nimisa i ka juguya la ka Matigi deli ko a ka o miirili jugu yafa i ma, ni o bɛ se ka kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Katuguni ne y'a ye ko i dusukun falen bɛ ɲɛngoya la. Jurumu ka jɔnya juru sirilen bɛ i kan na.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Simɔn y'a fɔ Pierɛ ni Yuhana ye ko: «Aw yɛrɛw ka Matigi deli ne ye, walisa aw ye min fɔ, o si kana ne sɔrɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Seereya bɔlen kɔ u fɛ, ka Matigi ka kuma fɔ, o ciden fila kɔseginna Jerusalɛm. U taatɔ ye Kibaru Duman fɔ dugu caman na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ y'a fɔ Filipe ye ko: «Wuli ka taa worodugu yanfan fɛ. Sira min bɛ bɔ Jerusalɛm ka taa Gaza, i ka taa o sira fɛ.» O ye kungokolon sira de ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Filipe wulila ka taa. K'a to sira kan, a ye cɛ dɔ ye. Etiopi masa musoman Kandase ka kuntigiba dɔ tun don, min tun bɛ a ka nafolo bɛɛ kun na. O Etiopika tun taara Jerusalɛm ka Ala bato.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A kɔsegintɔ ka taa a ka so, a sigilen tun bɛ a ka wotoro kɔnɔ. A tun bɛ kira Esayi ka kitabu kalan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni Senu y'a fɔ Filipe ye ko: «I madon nin wotoro la ka taa a fɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Filipe bolila ka madon wotoro la, a ye Etiopika kan mɛn, o tun bɛ kira Esayi ka kitabu kalan. Filipe y'a ɲininka ko: «I bɛ min kalan, i bɛ o faamu wa?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ y'a jaabi ko: «Ne bɛ se k'a faamu cogo di, ni mɔgɔ ma a kɔrɔ fɔ ne ye?» A ye Filipe deli ko a ka don wotoro kɔnɔ ka sigi a kɛrɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun bɛ Kitabu yɔrɔ min kalan, o filɛ nin ye ko: «A minɛna ka taa i ko saga min bɛ taa faga yɔrɔ la. I ko sagaden min tɛ a kan bɔ a si kanbaaw bolo, a ma a da yɛlɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A majiginlen tun don, mɔgɔw ma sɔn ka jo di a ma. Jɔni na a bɔnsɔn ko fɔ? Katuguni a si tigɛra ka bɔ dugukolo kan.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kuntigi y'a fɔ Filipe ye ko: «Ne b'i deli, a ɲɛ fɔ ne ye yala kira bɛ kuma jɔni ko la, a yɛrɛ wa, wala mɔgɔ wɛrɛ?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Filipe ye kuma ta ka Kibaru Duman fɔ Yesu ko la ka bɔ kitabu o yɔrɔ yɛrɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka u to sira kan ka taa, u sera yɔrɔ dɔ la, ji tun bɛ yen. Kuntigi ko: «Ji filɛ, mun bɛ ne bali ka batise?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] [Filipe y'a jaabi ko: «Ni i ye dannaya kɛ ni i dusukun bɛɛ ye, i bɛ se ka batise.» O cɛ ko: «Ne dara a la ko Yesu Krisita ye Ala Denkɛ ye.»]
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, kuntigi y'a fɔ ko wotoro ka jɔ. U fila jiginna ka don ji la. Filipe y'a batise.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɔlen kɔ ji la, Matigi Ni ye Filipe ta ka taa. Kuntigi ma a ye tun, nka a ɲagalilen ye sira minɛ ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Filipe kɔni taara a yɛrɛ sɔrɔ Azɔt. O kɔ, a tun bɛ taa dugu ni dugu ka Kibaru Duman fɔ o yɔrɔw bɛɛ la fo ka taa se Sesare.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Saul to kangari dali la Matigi ka kalandenw ye ka u fagali ko fɔ, a taara sarakalasebaaw kuntigi sɛgɛrɛ,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ka o deli ko a ka sɛbɛnw di a ma, a ka taa n'u ye Damasi ka u di Alabatosow mɔgɔw ma, walisa ni a ye Matigi ka sira taamabaa dɔw sɔrɔ yen, cɛ fara muso kan, a ka olu minɛ ka taa ni u sirilen ye Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Saul to sira kan ka taa Damasi, a surunyalen o dugu la, o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ kɛnɛyeelen manamanana a fan bɛɛ la ka bɔ sankolo la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A binna duguma, a ye kumakan dɔ mɛn, o y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Saul, Saul, mun na i bɛ ne tɔɔrɔ?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saul y'a ɲininka ko: «I ye jɔni ye, Matigi?» Matigi y'a jaabi ko: «Ne ye Yesu ye. I bɛ min tɔɔrɔ, ne don. [A ka gɛlɛn i ma ka nɛgɛ nun bɔlen tan.]
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka wuli ka don dugu kɔnɔ. I ka kan ka min kɛ, o na fɔ i ye yen.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saul taamaɲɔgɔnw ja tigɛlen jɔlen tora, u ma se ka foyi fɔ. U ye o kan mɛn, nka u ma mɔgɔ si ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saul wulila ka bɔ duguma. A ye a ɲɛ yɛlɛ, nka a ma foyi ye. U ye a bolo minɛ ka taa n'a ye Damasi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile saba kɔnɔ a ma foyi ye, a ma dumuni kɛ, a ma ji min.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dannabaa dɔ tun bɛ Damasi, o tɔgɔ ko Ananiyasi. Matigi y'i jira o la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ananiyasi.» Ananiyasi y'a jaabi ko: «Naamu, Matigi.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Wuli joona ka taa. Sira min bɛ wele Tilennen, i ka taa o fɛ ka se Juda ka so, ka Tarseka dɔ ɲini, o tɔgɔ ko Saul. A bɛ Ala deli.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'o to delili la, a ye cɛ dɔ ye jiralifɛn na, o tɔgɔ ko Ananiyasi. O donna Saul yɔrɔ ka a bolow da a ɲɛw kan walisa a ka yeli kɛ ko kura.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ananiyasi y'a jaabi ko: «Matigi, nin cɛ ye ko jugu minnu bɛɛ kɛ i ka mɔgɔw la Jerusalɛm, mɔgɔ caman ye olu fɔ ne ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yan fana, fanga bɛ a bolo, a y'o sɔrɔ sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw fɛ ka i tɔgɔ welebaaw bɛɛ minɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Matigi y'a fɔ Ananiyasi ye ko: «Taa, katuguni ne y'a ɲɛnatɔmɔ ka kɛ ne ka baarakɛ minɛn ye ka ne tɔgɔ fɔ siya wɛrɛw ni u ka masakɛw ani Israɛl mɔgɔw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka kan ka tɔɔrɔba minnu muɲu ne tɔgɔ kosɔn, ne yɛrɛ na olu jira a la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, Ananiyasi taara ka se o so kɔnɔ. A ye a bolow da Saul kan k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ne balimakɛ Saul, Matigi Yesu min y'i jira i la ka i to sira kan ka na yan, o ye ne ci i ma, walisa i ka yeli kɛ ko kura ka fa Ni Senu la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin kelen fɛn dɔw binna ka bɔ Saul ɲɛw kan, olu bɔlen bɛ faraw fɛ, a ye yeli kɛ ko kura. A wulila ka batise.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a ye dumuni kɛ, a ye barika sɔrɔ. Ayiwa, Saul tora dannabaaw fɛ Damasi ka tile dama dɔ kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin kelen, a y'a daminɛ ka waajuli kɛ Alabatosow kɔnɔ k'a fɔ ko Yesu ye Ala Denkɛ ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu tun bɛ a lamɛn, olu bɛɛ kabakoyara k'a fɔ ko: «Mɔgɔ min tun bɛ Yesu tɔgɔ welebaaw tɔɔrɔ Jerusalɛm, o tɛ nin ye wa? A ma na yan fana walisa ka o mɔgɔw minɛ ka taa n'u sirilen ye sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ɲɛ kɔrɔ wa?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta Saul tun bɛ barika sɔrɔ ka taa ɲɛ waajuli la, ko Yesu ye Krisita ye, fo Yahutu minnu sigilen tun bɛ Damasi, olu ma cogo sɔrɔ ka a jaabi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile dama dɔw tɛmɛnnen kɔ, Yahutuw ye jɛ siri ka Saul faga cogo ɲini,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] nka o ko dɔnna Saul fɛ. U ye dugu dondaw kɔlɔsi fana su fara tile kan walisa ka Saul faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Saul ka kalandenw y'a ta su fɛ ka a lajigin saba kɔnɔ dugu kogo kɔfɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saul sera Jerusalɛm tuma min na, a tun b'a fɛ ka jɛ dannabaaw fɛ, nka u bɛɛ siranna a ɲɛ, katuguni u ma da a la ko a kɛra dannabaa ye sɛbɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Barnabasi taara n'a ye cidenw yɔrɔ k'a fɔ u ye ko Saul ye Matigi ye sira la ani Matigi kumana a fɛ. Saul tun ye waajuli kɛ Yesu tɔgɔ la Damasi ni ja gɛlɛya ye cogo min na, Barnabasi ye o fana fɔ u ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Saul tora ka yaala u fɛ Jerusalɛm ka waajuli kɛ ni ja gɛlɛya ye Matigi tɔgɔ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun bɛ kuma Helenisitew fɛ, a ni olu tun bɛ sɔsɔli kɛ, nka olu tun bɛ cogo ɲini ka a faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw ye o dɔn tuma min na, u taara ni Saul ye fo Sesare, ka a bila ka taa Tarse.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la egilisi tun bɛ hɛrɛ la Jude ani Galile ni Samari jamanaw bɛɛ la. A tun bɛ barika sɔrɔ ka taa ɲɛ Matigi ɲɛsiran na, ka jiidi Ni Senu ka laadili barika la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Pierɛ to jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ yaalali la, a sera Lide dannabaaw yɔrɔ fana.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye cɛ dɔ sɔrɔ yen, o tɔgɔ ko Ene. A dalen tun bɛ dalan kan kabini san segin, o fanfilasalen tun don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'a fɔ o ye ko: «Ene, Yesu Krisita bɛ i kɛnɛya. Wuli ka i ka dalan labɛn.» O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ Ene wulila.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lidekaw ni Sarɔn jamana mɔgɔw bɛɛ y'a ye minkɛ, u tuubira Matigi ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso dɔ tun bɛ Jope, dannabaa tun don, ko Tabita, (grɛkikan na, a tɔgɔ ko Dɔrkasi). A tun bɛ ko ɲuman kɛ tuma bɛɛ ka faantanw dɛmɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la a banana, a sara. U y'a su ko ka a da sankanso dɔ kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lide ni Jope cɛ tun man jan, Jope dannabaaw y'a mɛn ko Pierɛ bɛ Lide. U ye cɛ fila ci a ma k'a fɔ a ye ko: «An b'i deli i ka na an ka yɔrɔ la sisan, i kana mɛn.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ Pierɛ wulila ka taa u fɛ. A selen, u taara n'a ye o sankanso kɔnɔ. Muso cɛ salenw y'u madon a la, u tun bɛ kasi. Dɔrkasi tun ye dulɔki misɛn ni dulɔkiba minnu kala ka a to u fɛ yen, u ye olu jira Pierɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ye o mɔgɔw bɛɛ labɔ kɛnɛma, k'i ɲɔngiri ka Ala deli. O kɔ, a y'i yɛlɛma su fan fɛ k'a fɔ ko: «Tabita, wuli.» Muso ye a ɲɛ yɛlɛ, a ye Pierɛ ye tuma min na, a wulila k'i sigi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'a bolow minɛ k'a lawuli. O kɔ, Pierɛ ye dannabaaw ni muso cɛ salenw wele ka Dɔrkasi ɲɛnama jira u la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jopekaw bɛɛ ye o ko dɔn, u caman dara Matigi la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ye waati jan kɛ Jope, wolodogina Simɔn ka so.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ Sesare, o tɔgɔ ko Kɔrnɛye. Sɔrɔdasikulu min tɔgɔ ko Italikulu, o jalasabatigi tun don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ tun ye Ala ɲɛsiranbaa ye, a ni a ka so mɔgɔw bɛɛ tun bɛ Ala bato ɲɔgɔn fɛ. A tun bɛ Yahutu faantan caman dɛmɛ. A tun tɛ sɛgɛn Ala delili la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don dɔ wula fɛ a ye Ala ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ ye jiralifɛn na, o donna a ka yɔrɔ la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Kɔrnɛye!»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kɔrnɛye sirantɔ y'i ɲɛ jɔ mɛlɛkɛ la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Mun don, Matigi?» O y'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ye delili minnu kɛ ani i ye faantanw dɛmɛ cogo min na, Ala sɔnna olu ma ka a hakili to i la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sisan kɔni, i ka mɔgɔ dɔw ci ka taa Jope ka Simɔn wele ka na i yɔrɔ, o bɛ wele fana Pierɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A jiginnen bɛ wolodogina Simɔn ka so, o bɛ kɔgɔji da la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɛlɛkɛ min kumana a fɛ, o taalen kɔ, Kɔrnɛye ye a ka so kɔnɔ jɔnkɛ fila wele, ani a kɔrɔsigi sɔrɔdasi kelen, min tun bɛ siran Ala ɲɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye o ko bɛɛ lakali u ye, o kɔ, ka u ci ka taa Jope.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, ka u to sira kan ka surunya o dugu la, Pierɛ yɛlɛnna so kun na tilegan fɛ ka Ala deli yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kɔngɔ y'a minɛ, a tun b'a fɛ ka dumuni kɛ. Ka u to dumuni labɛnni la Pierɛ ye, a ye jiralifɛn dɔ ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye sankolo dayɛlɛlen ye, ka fɛn dɔ jigintɔ ye ka bɔ yen, i n'a fɔ finiba, o seleke naani sirilen tun bɛ, a sera duguma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sen naanima fɛnw ni fɛn fofotaw ani sanfɛ kɔnɔw, o fɛnw sifa bɛɛ tun bɛ o kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kumakan dɔ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Wuli, Pierɛ, ka fɛn dɔ faga ka dumuni kɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Pierɛ y'a jaabi ko: «Ayi Matigi, katuguni ne ma fɛn dagabali wala fɛn nɔgɔlen si dun abada.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kumakan y'a fɔ a ye ko kura ko: «Ala ye min saniya, i kana o jate fɛn nɔgɔlen ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ko kɛra siɲɛ saba tuma min na, o yɔrɔnin kelen, o fɛnw kɔseginna ka taa sankolo kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Pierɛ hakili ɲaaminen to o jiralifɛn kɔrɔ ko la, Kɔrnɛye ka cidenw tun bɛ Simɔn ka so ɲininkali kɛ ka se so da la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye foli kɛ ka ɲininkali kɛ ko: «Simɔn min bɛ wele Pierɛ, o jiginnen bɛ yan wa?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Pierɛ to miirili la o jiralifɛn kɔrɔ ko la, Ni Senu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «A filɛ, mɔgɔ saba b'i ɲini.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Wuli ka jigin ka taa u fɛ, i kana sigasiga, k'a masɔrɔ ne de ye u ci i ma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa Pierɛ jiginna ka taa o mɔgɔw yɔrɔ k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw bɛ min ɲini, ne don. Aw nakun ye mun ye?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a jaabi ko: «Jalasabatigi Kɔrnɛye ye an ci. Mɔgɔ sɛbɛ, Ala ɲɛsiranbaa don. Yahutuw bɛɛ bɛ a tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ. Ala y'a jira a la mɛlɛkɛ fɛ ko a ka i wele ka taa a ka so, walisa a ka kuma dɔ mɛn i fɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ye u lajigin ka si yen. O dugusajɛ, a wulila ka taa u fɛ. Jope balima dɔw farala u kan ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, u sera Sesare. Kɔrnɛye tun bɛ u makɔnɔ, a tun ye a ka so mɔgɔw ni a teriw wele.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ dontɔ so kɔnɔ, Kɔrnɛye nana a kunbɛn k'i bin a sen kɔrɔ k'a bato.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'a lawuli, a ko: «Wuli, ne fana ye mɔgɔ ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka u to kuma la ɲɔgɔn fɛ, u donna so kɔnɔ ka mɔgɔ caman lajɛlen sɔrɔ yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw y'a dɔn ko a dagalen tɛ Yahutu ye ko a ni siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔ ka jɛ, wala ka don a ka so kɔnɔ, nka Ala y'a jira ne la ko ne kana mɔgɔ si jate saniyabali wala mɔgɔ nɔgɔlen ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn aw ye ne wele tuma min na, ne nana, ne ma sɔsɔli don a la. Ayiwa aw ye ne wele kun min na, ne b'a fɛ ka o dɔn.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kɔrnɛye y'a jaabi ko: «Bi ye a tile naani ye, ne tun bɛ Ala delili la ne ka so kɔnɔ wula fɛ delili waati la. O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, cɛ dɔ nana i jɔ ne ɲɛ kɔrɔ, a ka fini tun bɛ manamana.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ye kuma ta ko: «Tiɲɛ la, ne y'a faamu sisan ko Ala tɛ mɔgɔ bɔ mɔgɔ la,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] nka siya o siya la, mɔgɔ min bɛ siran a ɲɛ ka ko tilennen kɛ, o de ko ka di a ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ye kuma min ci Israɛl bɔnsɔn ma, o filɛ nin ye: A ye hɛrɛ ko Kibaru Duman fɔ u ye Yesu Krisita fɛ, o min ye mɔgɔw bɛɛ Matigi ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ko min kɛra Jude jamana bɛɛ la k'a daminɛ Galile, Yuhana ka batiseli waajuli kɛlen kɔ, aw ye o dɔn.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ma i jira mɔgɔw bɛɛ la, fo seere minnu ɲɛnatɔmɔlen tun bɛ Ala fɛ ka kɔrɔ, anw kɔni minnu ye dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ a fɛ a kununlen kɔ ka bɔ suw cɛma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ an ye ko an ka mɔgɔw waaju k'a jira u la k'a jɛya ko Ala ye min sigi ka kɛ ɲɛnamaw ni suw kiritigɛla ye, o ye ale de ye.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Pierɛ to kuma la, Ni Senu jiginna o kuma lamɛnbaaw bɛɛ kan.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni u y'a mɛn ko olu bɛ kan wɛrɛw fɔ ka Ala bonya. Pierɛ ko:
