[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw ni balima minnu tun bɛ Jude jamana la, olu y'a mɛn ko siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔ dɔw fana sɔnna Ala ka kuma ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ kɔseginna Jerusalɛm tuma min na, Yahutuw dannabaaw y'a kɔrɔfɔ
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ko: «I donna mɔgɔ bolokobaliw ka so ka dumuni kɛ u fɛ dɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O la Pierɛ ye o ko lakali ka a bɛɛ tugutugu ɲɔgɔn na, a ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ka ne to delili la Jope dugu kɔnɔ, ne ye jiralifɛn dɔ ye. O bɔlen tun bɛ finiba fɛ. A seleke naani sirilen tun bɛ. O jiginna ka bɔ sankolo la ka se ne ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye ne ɲɛ jɔ a la kosɛbɛ, ne ye sen naanima fɛnw ni kungo kɔnɔ waraw ni fɛn fofotaw ani sanfɛ kɔnɔw ye a kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye kumakan dɔ mɛn, o y'a fɔ ne ye ko: ‘Wuli, Pierɛ, ka fɛn dɔ faga ka dumuni kɛ.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne y'a jaabi ko: ‘Ayi, Matigi, katuguni fɛn dagabali wala fɛn nɔgɔlen si ma don ne da la fɔlɔ.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye o kan mɛn ka bɔ sankolo la ko kura ko: ‘Ala ye min saniya, i kana o jate fɛn nɔgɔlen ye.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ko kɛra siɲɛ saba. O kɔ, o fɛn bɛɛ kɔseginna sankolo kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O waati yɛrɛ la, ne tun bɛ so min kɔnɔ, cɛ saba sera yen, u tun cira ne ma ka bɔ Sesare.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni Senu ko ne ka taa u fɛ, ne kana sigasiga. Nin balimakɛ wɔɔrɔ fana taara ne fɛ Sesare, an bɛɛ donna Kɔrnɛye ka so kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale y'a fɔ an ye ko a ye mɛlɛkɛ dɔ ye a ka so kɔnɔ, o y'a fɔ a ye ko a ka mɔgɔ dɔw ci Jope ka Simɔn wele, o tɔgɔ ko Pierɛ fana.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ko o na kuma dɔ fɔ a ye, a ni a ka mɔgɔw bɛɛ na kisi o fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka ne to kuma la u fɛ, Ni Senu jiginna u kan, i ko a jiginna an kan fɔlɔ cogo min na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne hakili jiginna Matigi ka kuma fɔlen na ko: ‘Yuhana ye batiseli kɛ ji la, nka aw na batise Ni Senu de la.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An minnu dara Matigi Yesu Krisita la, Ala ye nilifɛn min di an ma, ni a ye o bɔɲɔgɔnko di olu fana ma, ne ye jɔn ye ka Ala sɔsɔ?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye o kuma mɛn tuma min na, u dusu sumana, u ye Ala tanu, ko: «Tiɲɛ la, Ala ye nimisali dusu di siya wɛrɛw fana ma, walisa u ka ɲɛnamaya sɔrɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tɔɔrɔ min wulila Etiɛni faga tuma la, minnu jɛnsɛnna o kosɔn, olu taara Fenisi ni Siprɛ ni Antiose. U ma Ala ka kuma fɔ mɔgɔ si ye Yahutuw kɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, Siprɛ ni Sirɛnɛ dannabaa dɔw taara Antiose ka Matigi Yesu Kibaru Duman fɔ Grɛkiw fana ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi ka sebaaya tun bɛ u kan, fo mɔgɔ caman ye dannaya kɛ ka tuubi Matigi ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jerusalɛm egilisi mɔgɔw ye o kibaru mɛn, u ye Barnabasi ci ka taa Antiose.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Barnabasi selen Antiose ka Ala ka nɛɛma nɔ ye, a ɲagalila. A ye u bɛɛ laadi ko u nɔrɔlen ka to Matigi la ni hakili sigilen ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Barnabasi tun ye mɔgɔ sɛbɛ ye, a falen tun bɛ Ni Senu ni dannaya la. Mɔgɔ caman sɔrɔla Matigi ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Barnabasi taara Tarse ka Saul ɲini.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a ye tuma min na, a taara n'a ye Antiose. U fila bɛɛ ye san kelen dafalen kɛ egilisi mɔgɔw cɛma ka mɔgɔ caman kalan. Ka dannabaaw wele kretiɛnw, o daminɛna Antiose.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O donw la kira dɔw bɔra Jerusalɛm ka se Antiose.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U la kelen, o tɔgɔ ko Agabus, o wulila k'a fɔ Ni Senu barika la ko sɔɔni kɔngɔba na kɛ dugukolo yɔrɔ bɛɛ la. (O kɛra masakɛ Klode tile la.)
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dannabaaw y'a latigɛ ko u na dɛmɛni dɔ ci Jude jamana balimaw ma ka kɛɲɛ ni u bɛɛ kelen-kelen se ko ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye nilifɛnw labɛn k'u ci Jude cɛkɔrɔbaw ma Barnabasi ni Saul bolo.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O waati la masakɛ Hɛrɔde ye egilisi mɔgɔ dɔw minɛ ka u tɔɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye Yuhana balimakɛ Yakuba faga ni npan ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a ye ko o diyara Yahutuw ye tuma min na, a ye Pierɛ fana minɛ. O kɛra nbuuru fununbali seli waati la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ minɛlen kɔ, Hɛrɔde y'a bila kaso la k'a don sɔrɔdasi naani sigiyɔrɔma naani bolo, ko u ka a kɔlɔsi. Hɛrɔde tun b'a fɛ ka taa n'a ye mɔgɔw ɲɛ kɔrɔ Tɛmɛnkan seli tɛmɛnnen kɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa Pierɛ maralen tun bɛ kaso la, nka egilisi mɔgɔw jijalen tora Ala delili la a ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde tun b'a fɛ ka taa ni Pierɛ ye mɔgɔw ɲɛ kɔrɔ don min na, o don su fɛ, Pierɛ sunɔgɔlen tun bɛ sɔrɔdasi fila furancɛ la. A sirilen tun bɛ ni nɛgɛ jɔlɔkɔ fila ye. Dakɔlɔsibaaw jɔlen tun bɛ kasobon da la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A filɛ, Matigi ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ nana, yeelenba kɛra kasobon kɔnɔ. Mɛlɛkɛ ye Pierɛ gosi a kɛrɛ la ka a lakunun, a ko: «Wuli joona.» O yɔrɔnin kelen jɔlɔkɔw binna ka bɔ Pierɛ bolow la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, mɛlɛkɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ka finiw ni i ka sabara don k'i cɛsiri.» Pierɛ ye o kɛ. O kɔ, mɛlɛkɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ka dulɔkiba don ka tugu ne nɔfɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ bɔra ka tugu mɛlɛkɛ nɔfɛ. Mɛlɛkɛ ye min kɛ, Pierɛ tun m'a dɔn ko o ye ko sɛbɛ ye, nka a tun bɛ miiri ko jiralifɛn don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tɛmɛnna dakɔlɔsibaa fɔlɔ ni filanan la ka se nɛgɛ kon ma min bɛ mɔgɔ labɔ kɛnɛma ka taa dugu kɔnɔ. O kon yɛlɛla u ɲɛ a yɛrɛma. U bɔra ka taa ɲɛ sira kan dɔɔnin, o yɔrɔnin kelen mɛlɛkɛ taara ka Pierɛ to yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ye hakili sɔrɔ minkɛ, a ko: «Ne y'a dɔn sisan k'a jɛya ko Matigi ye a ka mɛlɛkɛ ci ka na ne tila Hɛrɔde ka fanga la, ani Yahutuw tun bɛ ne tɔɔrɔ ko minnu ɲɛnafilɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'i miiri minkɛ, a taara Mariyama ka so. Yuhana min bɛ wele Marka, o ba tun don. Mɔgɔ caman lajɛlen tun bɛ yen ka Ala deli.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pierɛ ye du donda kɔnkɔn. Baarakɛmuso dɔ nana da la walisa a k'a yɛlɛ, o tɔgɔ ko Rode.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ye Pierɛ kan dɔn tuma min na, a ma se ka da yɛlɛ ɲagali kosɔn, nka a bolila ka taa so kɔnɔ k'a fɔ ko Pierɛ jɔlen bɛ da la kɛnɛma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Fa b'i la!» Nka a y'a fɔ u ye k'a jɛya ko tiɲɛ don. U ko: «A mɛlɛkɛ don.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta Pierɛ tora ka da kɔnkɔn. U ye da yɛlɛ k'a ye minkɛ, u kabakoyara kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a bolo kɔrɔta ko u ka u makun. Matigi y'a labɔ kaso la cogo min na, a y'o lakali u ye, a ko fana: «Aw ka nin kibaru fɔ Yakuba ni balima tɔw ye.» O kɔ, a bɔra yen ka taa yɔrɔ wɛrɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dugu jɛlen, sɔrɔdasiw ja wulila katuguni Pierɛ kɛra cogo min na, u ma o dɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde ye Pierɛ ɲini, a ma a ye minkɛ, a ye sɔrɔdasiw sɛgɛsɛgɛ o ko la, k'a fɔ ko olu ka faga. O kɔ, Hɛrɔde bɔra Jude jamana la ka taa Sesare ka waati dɔ kɛ yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde tun diminna Tirkaw ni Sidɔnkaw kɔrɔ kosɛbɛ. Olu bɛnna a la ko u ka taa Hɛrɔde ɲɛ kɔrɔ. U ye masakɛ ka sibon kuntigi Blasitus kɛ u teri ye. O kɔ, u taara hɛrɛ ɲini Hɛrɔde fɛ, katuguni u ka jamana balo tun bɛ bɔ masakɛ ka jamana la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don latigɛlen selen, Hɛrɔde ye a ka masakɛ dulɔkiba don k'i sigi a ka masasigilan kan ka kumabaw fɔ u ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ pɛrɛnna ko: «Ala kan don, mɔgɔ kan tɛ!»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ Matigi ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ ye Hɛrɔde gosi, katuguni a ma Ala bonya. Ntumuw donna a la, a sara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta Ala ka kuma tun bɛ jɛnsɛn ka ta'a fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Barnabasi ni Saul nana Jerusalɛm ci min kama, o dafalen kɔ, u kɔseginna. U taara ni Yuhana ye u fɛ, o bɛ wele fana Marka.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kiraw ni karamɔgɔw tun bɛ Antiose egilisi la. Olu tun ye ninnu ye: Barnabasi ni Simɔn min bɛ wele Nijɛr, ani Lusius min bɔra Sirɛnɛ, ni Manahɛn ani Saul. Manahɛn ni jamana kuntigi Hɛrɔde mɔna so kelen kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don dɔ, ka u to Matigi batoli la ka sun don, Ni Senu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ne ye Barnabasi ni Saul wele baara min kama, aw ka u bila ne ye, walisa u ka o kɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U sunnen kɔ ka Ala deli, u ye u bolow da Barnabasi ni Saul kan ka u bila ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Barnabasi ni Saul cilen Ni Senu fɛ, u taara Sɛlusi. U donna kurun kɔnɔ yen ka taa Siprɛ gun na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U selen Salaminɛ, u ye Ala ka kuma fɔ Yahutuw ka Alabatosow kɔnɔ. Yuhana tun bɛ u fɛ ka u dɛmɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye o gun cɛtigɛ fo ka se Pafɔsi. U ye cɛ dɔnbaa dɔ ye yen, Yahutu kira nkalontigɛla dɔ tun don, o tɔgɔ ko Barjesu.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tun bɛ gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ Sɛrjius Polus fɛ yen. O gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ tun ye mɔgɔ hakilitigi ye. A ye ci bila ka Barnabasi ni Saul wele, katuguni a tun b'a fɛ ka Ala ka kuma mɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka dɔnbaa Elimas, o ye Barjesu tɔgɔ ye grɛkikan na, o ye Barnabasi ni Saul sɔsɔ. A tun bɛ cogo ɲini ka gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ bali ka dannaya kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Saul, min bɛ wele fana Paul, o falen Ni Senu la, o ye a ɲɛ jɔ o dɔnbaa la k'a fɔ ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ falen keguya ni nanbara sifa bɛɛ la, Sitanɛ den, tilennenya bɛɛ jugu, i tɛ Matigi ka sira tilennenw yɛlɛmani dabila wa?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi bolo filɛ i kan sisan, i na kɛ fiyentɔ ye, i tɛna tile yeelen ye waati dama dɔ kɔnɔ.» O yɔrɔnin kelen Elimas ɲɛw lafinna, o kɔ, a fiyenna. A tun bɛ munumunu fan bɛɛ la, walisa ka mɔgɔ sɔrɔ ka a bolo minɛ ka taa n'a ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ye o ko kɛlen ye tuma min na, a ye dannaya kɛ. Kalan min kɛra Matigi ko la, o y'a kabakoya kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ni a taamaɲɔgɔnw donna kurun kɔnɔ Pafɔsi ka taa Pɛrje, o bɛ Panfili jamana la. Yuhana farala u la yen ka kɔsegin ka taa Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye u ka sira minɛ ka bɔ Pɛrje ka taa se Antiose, o bɛ Pisidi jamana la. U donna Alabatoso kɔnɔ lafiɲɛ don na, k'u sigi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya ni kiraw ka kitabuw kalannen kɔ, Alabatoso kuntigi ye ci lase u ma ko: «Balimaw, ni waajuli kuma dɔw bɛ aw fɛ ka jira jama la, aw bɛ se ka kuma sisan.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul wulila ka a bolo kɔrɔta k'a fɔ ko: «Israɛl mɔgɔw, ani aw minnu bɛ siran Ala ɲɛ, a' ye aw tulow majɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Israɛl mɔgɔw ka Ala ye an bɛnbaw ɲɛnatɔmɔ. A ye u siya caya ka u to siginfɛya la Misira. O kɔ, a ye u labɔ yen ni a ka sebaayaba ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye u ko muɲu kungokolon kɔnɔ san binaani kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye siya wolonwula halaki Kanan jamana kɔnɔ, o kɔ, ka olu ka jamana di u ma ka kɛ u ta ye
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] san kɛmɛ naani ni biduuru ɲɔgɔn kɔnɔ. O kɔ, a ye kiritigɛlaw di an bɛnbaw ma fo ka taa se kira Samuɛl tile ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O tuma la u ye masakɛ ɲini Ala fɛ. A ye Kis denkɛ Saul di u ma, o bɔra Benjamɛn bɔnsɔn na. O sigira u kun na san binaani kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala bannen kɔ Saul la, a ye Dawuda di u ma ka kɛ masakɛ ye. A y'a fɔ o ko la ko: ‘Ne ye Isayi denkɛ Dawuda sɔrɔ. A ko diyara ne ye, a na ne sagola kow bɛɛ kɛ ka dafa.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ye Dawuda bɔnsɔn dɔ kɛ Israɛl Kisibaa ye ka kɛɲɛ ni a ka layidu ye, o ye Yesu de ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sani o ka na, Yuhana tun bɛ Israɛl mɔgɔw bɛɛ waaju ko u ka nimisa u ka jurumuw la ka batise.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ka baara dafa tuma surunyalen, a tun b'a fɔ ko: ‘Aw bɛ miiri ko ne ye jɔn ye? Aw bɛ min ɲɛnafilɛ, ne t'o ye. A filɛ, a bɛ na ne kɔ, ne man kan ni a ka sabara juru fonili ye.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Balimaw Ibrahima bɔnsɔnw, ani aw minnu bɛ siran Ala ɲɛ, nin kisili kuma cira anw ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jerusalɛmkaw ni u kuntigiw ma Yesu ko faamu. Kiraw ka kuma minnu bɛ kalan lafiɲɛ donw la, u ma olu fana faamu, nka u ye o kuma dafa ni u ye Yesu jalaki tuma min na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali k'a sɔrɔ u ma saya sababu si ye a la, u ye Pilate deli ko a ka faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ko minnu sɛbɛnnen tun bɛ Kitabu la Yesu ko la, olu bɛɛ dafalen kɔ u fɛ, u y'a lajigin ka bɔ fagalijiri kan k'a don kaburu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Ala y'a lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ni minnu tun bɔra Galile ɲɔgɔn fɛ ka taa Jerusalɛm, a y'i jira olu la tile caman kɔnɔ. Sisan olu kɛra a seerew ye ka kuma Israɛl mɔgɔw fɛ a ko la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Anw bɛ nin Kibaru Duman fɔ aw ye ko Ala tun ye layidu min ta an bɛnbaw ye,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] a y'o dafa an ye bi, anw minnu kɛra u bɔnsɔnw ye. A ye Yesu lakunun i ko a sɛbɛnnen bɛ Zaburu filanan la ko: ‘I ye ne Denkɛ ye, ne ye i bange bi.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala tun y'a fɔ ko a na a lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma walisa a kana toli. A tun y'a fɔ ten ko: ‘Ne ye layidu min ta Dawuda ye, ne na o duba senumaw da aw kan, u tɛ se ka wuli.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to a y'a fɔ Zaburuw yɔrɔ wɛrɛ la ko: ‘I tɛna sɔn i ka Senuma ka toli.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dawuda kɔni ye Ala ka ko latigɛlenw dafa a tile la, o kɔ, a sara. A su donna a bɛnbaw kɛrɛ fɛ, a tolila.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Ala ye min lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma, o ma toli.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw, aw k'a dɔn ko jurumuw yafa ko bɛ fɔ aw ye Yesu la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ko aw tɛ se ka jo sɔrɔ ko minnu na Musa ka sariya barika la, mɔgɔ minnu bɛ dannaya kɛ, olu bɛɛ bɛ se ka jo sɔrɔ o kow bɛɛ la nin Yesu de barika la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, a' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi, walisa kiraw ye ko minnu fɔ, olu kana na aw sɔrɔ. U ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ‘A filɛ aw nparabɔlaw, aw ka kabakoya ka halaki, k'a masɔrɔ ne na ko dɔ kɛ aw tilew la, ni mɔgɔ dɔ ye o lakali aw ye, aw tɛna da o la.’»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ni Barnabasi bɔtɔ Alabatoso kɔnɔ, mɔgɔw ye u deli ko lafiɲɛ don natɔ, u ka kuma u fɛ o ko la ko kura.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lajɛli bannen kɔ, Yahutuw ni u ka tuubiden Ala batobaa caman tugura Paul ni Barnabasi nɔfɛ. Olu tun bɛ kuma u fɛ ka u laadi ko u nɔrɔlen ka to Ala ka nɛɛma la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O lafiɲɛ don kunɲɔgɔn, dugu kɔnɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye u lajɛ ko u bɛ Ala ka kuma lamɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw ye o jamaba ye tuma min na, u dusuw fara keleya la, u tun bɛ Paul ka kuma sɔsɔ ka a neni.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ni Barnabasi kumana u fɛ ni ja gɛlɛya ye ko: «Wajibi tun don Ala ka kuma ka fɔ aw fɔlɔ ye. Nka aw banna a la, ka aw yɛrɛw jate ko aw man kan ni ɲɛnamaya banbali ye. Ayiwa an na taa siya wɛrɛw fan fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Katuguni Matigi ye min fɔ anw ye, o filɛ: ‘Ne ye i sigi ka kɛ siya wɛrɛw ka kɛnɛ ye, walisa i ka taa ni kisili kuma ye fo dugukolo yɔrɔ bɛɛ la.’»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Siyaw ye o kuma mɛn tuma min na, u ɲagalila ka Matigi ka kuma bonya. Ɲɛnamaya banbali latigɛra minnu ye, olu bɛɛ ye dannaya kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi ka kuma jɛnsɛnna o jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yahutuw ye muso tɔgɔba Ala ɲɛsiranbaa dɔw ani dugu kɔnɔ mɔgɔba dɔw kɔnɔnasu Paul ni Barnabasi kama ka u tɔɔrɔ ka u gɛn ka bɔ u ka jamana la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 51 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu ye u senna buguri yuguyugu u kama, o kɔ, ka taa Ikonɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 52 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dannabaaw kɔni fara ɲagali ni Ni Senu la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ni Barnabasi selen Ikonɛ, u donna Yahutuw ka Alabatoso kɔnɔ. U kuma cogo de y'a to Yahutu caman ni Grɛki caman ye dannaya kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yahutu dannabaliw ye siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw kɔnɔnasu ka u bila balimaw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, Paul ni Barnabasi mɛnna Ikonɛ ka kuma ni ja gɛlɛya ye, u jigi dalen Matigi kan. Ale de tun bɛ a ka nɛɛma kuma seereya kɛ ni taamashyɛnw ni kabakow kɛli ye u bolo.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dugu kɔnɔ mɔgɔw kan tilara, u dɔw tun bɛ Yahutuw fɛ, dɔw tun bɛ cidenw fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw ni siya wɛrɛw ni u kuntigiw tun bɛ u labɛn ka ko jugu kɛ Paul ni Barnabasi la ka u bon ni kabakurunw ye ka u faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu y'o dɔn tuma min na, u bolila ka taa Likaoni jamana la, ka taa dugu dɔw la, Lisitre ni Dɛrbɛ ani u dafɛ duguw.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye Kibaru Duman fɔ o yɔrɔw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ Lisitre. A sigilen tun bɛ tuma bɛɛ, sabu a nabarama bangera, a ma se ka taama abada.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun bɛ Paul ka kuma lamɛn. Paul y'a ɲɛ jɔ a la k'a ye ko dannaya b'a fɛ ka kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ o cɛ ye ni kanba ye ko: «Wuli k'i jɔ i senw kan.» Cɛ y'i pan k'i jɔ ka taama.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama ye Paul ka ko kɛlen ye tuma min na, u pɛrɛnna k'a fɔ Likaonikan na ko: «Batofɛnw kɛra mɔgɔw ye ka jigin an cɛma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye Barnabasi tɔgɔ da ko Zus, ka Paul tɔgɔ da ko Hɛrmɛs, katuguni ale de tun bɛ kuma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Zus batoso dɔ tun bɛ dugu donda la. A ka sarakalasebaa nana ni ntura dɔw ye o yɔrɔ la, u masirilen tun bɛ ni jiri feerew ye. A ni jama tun b'a fɛ ka saraka bɔ Barnabasi ni Paul ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ciden fila ye o dɔn tuma min na, u ye u ka finiw fara ka boli ka taa jama cɛma ka pɛrɛn ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mun na aw bɛ nin kow kɛ? An fana ye aw bɔɲɔgɔnko mɔgɔw de ye. An nana ni Kibaru Duman ye, walisa aw ka fara nin ko fufafuw la ka yɛlɛma Ala ɲɛnama fan fɛ, o min ye sankolo ni dugukolo ni kɔgɔji ani u kɔnɔ fɛnw bɛɛ da.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Waati tɛmɛnnenw la Ala ye siyaw to u yɛrɛw sagona siraw kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta a y'a yɛrɛ cogo jira a ka ko ɲumanw fɛ. A bɛ sanji di aw ma ka bɔ sankolo la, ka suman di a waati la, ka dumunifɛn caman di aw ma ka aw dusuw fa ɲagali la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali k'a sɔrɔ cidenw kumana ten, u tun bɛ ɲini ka dɛsɛ ka jama bali ka saraka faga u ye. Jate Zus ka ciden.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen, Yahutu dɔw nana ka bɔ Pisidi Antiose ni Ikonɛ. U ye jama miirili yɛlɛma, fo u ye Paul bon ni kabakurunw ye ko u b'a faga. O kɔ, u y'a sama ka bɔ dugu kɔnɔ. A tun bɛ u kɔnɔ ko a sara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka dannabaaw y'a lamini tuma min na, a wulila ka don dugu kɔnɔ. O dugusajɛ, a ni Barnabasi bɔra yen ka taa Dɛrbɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ni Barnabasi ye Kibaru Duman fɔ Dɛrbɛ dugu kɔnɔ. U ye dannabaa caman sɔrɔ. O kɔ, u kɔseginna Lisitre ni Ikonɛ ani Antiose.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun bɛ dannabaaw ja gɛlɛya ka u laadi ko u sabatilen ka to dannaya la, u ko: «Wajibi don tɔɔrɔ caman ka an sɔrɔ sani an ka don Ala ka masaya la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye ɲɛminɛbaaw sigi egilisiw bɛɛ kelen-kelen na. U tilalen kɔ sun ni delili la, u ye u kalifa Matigi ma, u tun dara o min na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, u ye Pisidi jamana cɛtigɛ ka se Panfili.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye Ala ka kuma fɔ Pɛrje, o kɔ, ka taa Atali.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ yen ka taa Antiose, u tun kalifara Ala ka nɛɛma ma yɔrɔ min na. O kɛra baara min kama, o dafara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U sera Antiose tuma min na, Ala ye ko minnu kɛ u bolo, ani a ye da yɛlɛ siya wɛrɛw ye cogo min na, walisa olu fana ka dannaya kɛ, u ye dannabaaw lajɛ ka o kow bɛɛ lakali u ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tora dannabaaw fɛ yen ka waati jan kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔw nana ka bɔ Jude jamana la ka balimaw kalan ko: «Ni aw ma boloko ka kɛɲɛ ni Musa ka sariya ye, aw tɛ se ka kisi.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Wɔyɔ ni sɔsɔliba donnen kɔ olu ni Paul ni Barnabasi cɛ, a latigɛra ko Paul ni Barnabasi ni u dɔw ka taa Jerusalɛm ka kuma cidenw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw fɛ o ko la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Egilisi ye u ci ka taa. U taatɔ, u ye Fenisi ni Samari cɛtigɛ, u tun bɛ siya wɛrɛw tuubi ko fɔ balimaw ye. O kɛra ɲagaliba ye u bɛɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ni Barnabasi selen Jerusalɛm, egilisi mɔgɔw ni cidenw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw ye u minɛ ko ɲuman. Ala ye ko minnu kɛ Paul ni Barnabasi bolo, u ye olu bɛɛ lakali u ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛn minnu ye dannaya kɛ, olu dɔw wulila k'a fɔ ko: «Wajibi don siyaw la dannabaaw ka boloko ka Musa ka sariyaw bɛɛ dafa.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw ye ɲɔgɔn lajɛ ka o ko sɛgɛsɛgɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔrɔfɔ kɛlen kɔ, Pierɛ wulila ka kuma, a ko: «Balimaw, aw y'a dɔn ko Ala ye ne ɲɛnatɔmɔ ka bɔ aw cɛma kabini tuma jan, walisa ne ka Kibaru Duman fɔ siyaw ye, walisa u ka o mɛn ka dannaya kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ dusukun dɔnbaa Ala y'a jira ko a sɔnna siya wɛrɛw ma, katuguni a ye Ni Senu di olu ma, i ko a y'a di an fana ma cogo min na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ma faranfasili si kɛ an ni u cɛ. A ye u dusukunw saniya dannaya barika la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sisan kɔni, mun y'a to aw bɛ Ala kɔrɔbɔ ka doni girin da dannabaaw kan, an ni an bɛnbaw tun tɛ se min kɔrɔ?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta an dara a la ko an bɛ kisi Matigi Yesu ka nɛɛma barika la, i ko olu fana.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la jama bɛɛ ye u makun ka Barnabasi ni Paul lamɛn. Ala ye taamashyɛn ni kabako minnu kɛ u bolo siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw cɛma, u ye olu bɛɛ lakali.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tilalen kɔ o kuma la, Yakuba ye kuma ta, a ko: «Balimaw, a' ye ne lamɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala y'a janto siya wɛrɛw la kabini fɔlɔfɔlɔ ka mɔgɔ dɔw ɲɛnatɔmɔ ka bɔ u la ka u kɛ a yɛrɛ taw ye cogo min na, Simɔn ye o lakali.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ni kiraw ka kuma bɛnna ɲɔgɔn ma, i ko a sɛbɛnnen bɛ Kitabu la ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi ko: ‘O kɔ, ne na kɔsegin. Dawuda ka so min binna, ne na o jɔ ko kura. Ne na a tomon jɔ ka a latilen,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] walisa mɔgɔ tɔw ka Matigi ɲini, ani ne ye siya minnu bɛɛ wele ka kɛ ne taw ye,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi min y'a to o kow ka dɔn kabini fɔlɔfɔlɔ, o ko ten.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O de y'a to ne bɛ miiri ko, siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔ minnu bɛ sɔn Ala ma, an kana ko gɛlɛnma da olu kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka an ka sɛbɛn ci u ma ko u kana bolisɔn sogo dun ka u yɛrɛw nɔgɔ. U ka u yɛrɛw tanga kakalaya ma. U kana fɛn kan cɔrinnen sogo wala joli dun.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kabini tuma jan waajuli bɛ kɛ Musa ka sariya ko la duguw bɛɛ la, a bɛ kalan Alabatosow kɔnɔ lafiɲɛ donw bɛɛ la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la a diyara cidenw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw ani egilisi mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye ka mɔgɔ dɔw ɲɛnatɔmɔ u cɛma, ka u ci ka taa Antiose Paul ni Barnabasi fɛ. U ye Jude ni Silasi ɲɛnatɔmɔ. Jude bɛ wele fana Barsabasi. Balimaw la mɔgɔbaw tun don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye sɛbɛn min di u ma ka taa, o filɛ: «Aw siya wɛrɛw la balimaw, aw minnu sigilen bɛ Antiose ani Siri ni Silisi jamanaw la, cidenw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw bɛ u ka foli lase aw ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An y'a mɛn ko dɔw bɔra an cɛma ka taa aw fɛ ka aw tɔɔrɔ ni u ka kumaw ye ka aw hakili ɲaami, k'a sɔrɔ an ma u ci.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to an bɛnna a la k'a latigɛ ko an ka mɔgɔ dɔw ɲɛnatɔmɔ ka u ci aw ma. Olu ni an balima kanulenw Barnabasi ni Paul na taa ɲɔgɔn fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɔgɔw jɛna u yɛrɛw ni kɔ Matigi Yesu Krisita tɔgɔ kosɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, an bɛ Jude ni Silasi ci aw ma. An ye ko minnu sɛbɛn, u yɛrɛw na olu fɔ aw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A diyara Ni Senu ani an fana ye, ko an kana doni wɛrɛ da aw kan, fɔ nin ko wajibiyalenw:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana bolisɔn sogo dun, wala joli, wala fɛn kan cɔrinnen sogo. Aw ka aw yɛrɛw tanga kakalaya ma. Ni aw bɛ aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi o kow ma, o de ka ɲi. K'an bɛn.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw labilalen kɔ, u taara Antiose ka jama lajɛ ka o sɛbɛn di u ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu y'o kalan tuma min na, u ɲagalila o laadili kuma kosɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jude ni Silasi fana tun ye kiraw ye, olu ye balimaw ja gɛlɛya ka u sabati ni kuma caman ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye waati dama dɔ kɛ yen. Balimaw ye foli di u ma ko u ka se hɛrɛ la, o kɔ, ka u bila ka taa u cibaaw ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] [O bɛɛ n'a ta, a diyara Silasi ye ka to u fɛ yen.]
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ni Barnabasi tora Antiose. U ni mɔgɔ caman wɛrɛw tun bɛ mɔgɔw kalan ka Matigi ka Kibaru Duman fɔ u ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile dama tɛmɛnnen kɔ, Paul y'a fɔ Barnabasi ye ko: «An tun taara dugu minnu na ka Matigi ka Kibaru Duman fɔ, an ka kɔsegin olu bɛɛ la, k'a filɛ yala ni balimaw bɛ cogo min na.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Barnabasi tun b'a fɛ Yuhana ka taa u fɛ, o tun bɛ wele fana Marka.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Paul ko a man kan ka taa u fɛ, sabu a tun farala u la Panfili, a ma sɔn ka taa u fɛ baara la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sɔsɔliba donna Paul ni Barnabasi cɛ, fo u farala ɲɔgɔn na. Barnabasi taara ni Marka ye a fɛ, u donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ ka taa Siprɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Paul ye Silasi ɲɛnatɔmɔ ka taa a fɛ, u kalifalen kɔ Matigi ka nɛɛma ma balimaw fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye Siri ni Silisi jamana bɛɛ yaala ka egilisiw sabati dannaya la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Paul taara Dɛrbɛ ni Lisitre. Dannabaa dɔ tun bɛ yen, o tɔgɔ ko Timote. A ba tun ye Yahutu dannabaa dɔ ye, a fa tun ye Grɛki ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lisitre ni Ikonɛ balimaw tun bɛ a tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul tun b'a fɛ Timote ka taa u fɛ. A ye Timote boloko o jamana Yahutuw kosɔn, katuguni u bɛɛ tun y'a dɔn ko a fa tun ye Grɛki ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tɛmɛnna dugu minnu bɛɛ fɛ, cidenw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw ye ko minnu latigɛ Jerusalɛm, u tun bɛ olu fɔ dannabaaw ye ko u ka o ciw mara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Egilisiw mɔgɔw tun bɛ sabati dannaya la. Dɔw tun bɛ fara u kan don o don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye Friji ni Galasi jamanaw cɛtigɛ, katuguni Ni Senu tun ye u bali ka Ala ka kuma fɔ Asi jamana la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U sera Misi da fɛ tuma min na, u tun b'a fɛ ka taa Bitini jamana la, nka Yesu Ni ma sɔn u ka taa yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tɛmɛnna Misi kɛrɛ fɛ ka se Troas.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O su fɛ Paul ye jiralifɛn dɔ ye. A ye Masedwanɛ cɛ dɔ ye, o jɔlen tun bɛ ka a deli ko: «Na Masedwanɛ jamana la ka an dɛmɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jiralifɛn yelen kɔ Paul fɛ, an y'an labɛn o yɔrɔnin kelen ka taa Masedwanɛ. An y'a dɔn ko Ala ye an wele ka taa Kibaru Duman fɔ o jamana mɔgɔw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ Troas ka sin Samotrase ma. O dugusajɛ an sera Nɛapolis.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɔra yen ka taa Filipe, Masedwanɛ jamana fan kelen duguba dɔ don. Romɛkaw ka dugu tun don. An ye tile dama dɔ kɛ o dugu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lafiɲɛ don na, an bɔra dugu kɔnɔ ka taa ba da la, an tun bɛ miiri ko an na Ala deli yɔrɔ dɔ sɔrɔ yen. Muso dɔw lajɛlen tun bɛ yen, an ye an sigi ka kuma olu fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso dɔ tun bɛ yen min bɔra Tiyatirɛ, o tɔgɔ ko Lidi. Lomaasa fini feerebaa tun don. A tun bɛ Ala bato. Ale de ye an ka kuma lamɛn. Matigi y'a dusu dayɛlɛ, fo a y'a tulo majɔ Paul ka kuma la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ni a so mɔgɔw batiselen kɔ, a ye an deli, a ko: «Ni aw bɛ ne jate dannabaa ye Matigi la, a' ye na jigin ne ka so.» A ye an karaba fo an sɔnna.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An taatɔ Ala deli yɔrɔ la, an ni jɔnmuso dɔ bɛnna. Jinɛ yelikɛla tun b'a la, a makɛw tun bɛ wari caman sɔrɔ a ka filɛli la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tugura an ni Paul nɔfɛ ka to ka pɛrɛn ko: «Nin cɛw ye Ala Kɔrɔtalenba ka jɔnw ye. U bɛ kisili cogo fɔ aw ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tora ka o kɛ tile caman kɔnɔ. Paul sɛgɛnnen, a y'i yɛlɛma k'a fɔ jinɛ ye ko: «Ne b'a fɔ i ye Yesu Krisita tɔgɔ la, bɔ a la.» Jinɛ bɔra o yɔrɔnin kelen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jɔnmuso makɛw y'a ye ko u tɛ wari sɔrɔ a ka filɛli la minkɛ, u ye Paul ni Silasi minɛ ka olu sama ka taa n'u ye kiritigɛlaw ɲɛ kɔrɔ fɛrɛkɛnɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye u jɔ kiritigɛlaw ɲɛ kɔrɔ k'a fɔ ko: «Nin cɛw bɛ an ka dugu ɲaami haali.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw don, u bɛ laada dɔw fɔ, a dagalen tɛ an Romɛkaw ye ka sɔn olu ma wala ka u kɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama fana wulila u kama. Kiritigɛlaw ye Paul ni Silasi wɔrɔn k'a fɔ ko u ka gosi ni berew ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U gosilen kɔ kosɛbɛ, u ye u bila kaso la k'a fɔ kasotigi ye ko a ka u kɔlɔsi kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kasotigi y'o mɛn minkɛ, a ye u bila kasobon dogodogo la ka u senw don jirikuru la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dugutila fɛ Paul ni Silasi tun bɛ Ala deli ka Ala tanuli dɔnkiliw da. Kasolamɔgɔ tɔw tun bɛ u lamɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin kelen, dugukolo yɛrɛyɛrɛla kosɛbɛ. Kasobon jusigilanw yuguyugura, kasobon daw bɛɛ yɛlɛla. Kasolamɔgɔw bɛɛ ka jɔlɔkɔw fonina.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kasotigi kununna. A ye kasobon daw yɛlɛlen ye tuma min na, a ye a ka npan foosi ko a bɛ a yɛrɛ faga. A tun bɛ miiri ko kasolamɔgɔw bɛɛ bolila.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Paul pɛrɛnna ni kanba ye ko: «I kana foyi kɛ i yɛrɛ la, an bɛɛ bɛ yan.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la kasotigi ko u ka na ni yeelen ye. A bolila ka don kasobon kɔnɔ, a sirantɔ yɛrɛyɛrɛtɔ y'i bin Paul ni Silasi sen kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a ye u labɔ ka u ɲininka ko: «Cɛmɔgɔbaw, ne ka mun kɛ walisa ne ka kisi?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a jaabi ko: «Da Matigi Yesu la, i na kisi, i ni i ka denbaya.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye Matigi ka kuma fɔ a ni a so mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kasotigi taara n'u ye o su waati yɛrɛ la ka u jogindaw ko. O kɔ, a batisera, a ni a so mɔgɔw bɛɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A taara ni Paul ni Silasi ye a ka so ka dumuni di u ma. O kasotigi ni a ka denbaya bɛɛ ɲagalila, k'a masɔrɔ u dara Ala la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dugu jɛlen kɔ, kiritigɛlaw ye garadiw ci kasotigi ma ko a ka o cɛw bila.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kasotigi nana k'a fɔ Paul ye ko: «Kiritigɛlaw ye ci bila k'a fɔ ko ne ka aw bila. Ayiwa, a' ye bɔ ka taa hɛrɛ la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Paul y'a fɔ u ye ko: «U ye an Romɛkaw gosi mɔgɔw bɛɛ ɲɛ na k'a sɔrɔ kiri ma tigɛ, o kɔ, u ye an bila kaso la. Sisan u b'a fɛ ka an bila dogo la wa? Ayi dɛrɛ! U yɛrɛw ka na ka an labɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Garadiw taara ka o kuma fɔ kiritigɛlaw ye. Olu y'a mɛn ko Romɛkaw don minkɛ, u siranna.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U nana yafa ɲini Paul ni Silasi fɛ, o kɔ, ka u labɔ ka u deli ko u ka bɔ o dugu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɔlen kɔ kaso la, u taara Lidi ka so. U ye balimaw ye ka u laadi, o kɔ, u taara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ni Silasi tɛmɛnna Anfipolis ni Apoloni fɛ ka se Tesalonike. Yahutuw ka Alabatoso dɔ tun bɛ yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul donna o kɔnɔ i ko a delila k'a kɛcogo min na. A ye mɔgɔ minnu sɔrɔ yen, a ye lafiɲɛ don saba kɛ ka kuma olu fɛ Kitabu kɔnɔ kumaw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a jira u la k'a jɛya ko wajibi tun don Krisita ka tɔɔrɔ, o kɔ, ka kunun ka bɔ suw cɛma. A ko: «Ne bɛ Yesu min ko fɔ aw ye, o de ye Krisita ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutu dɔw ni Grɛki Ala batobaa jamaba ani muso tɔgɔba caman dara a la ka nɔrɔ Paul ni Silasi la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka keleya donna Yahutuw la. U ye dugu kɔnɔ mɔgɔ kunntan dɔw lajɛ ɲɔgɔn kan ka golobogalaba ni mankanba wuli dugu kɔnɔ. U girinna ka taa Jasɔn ka so, ko u bɛ Paul ni Silasi minɛ ka taa n'u ye jama lajɛ yɔrɔ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ma u sɔrɔ yen minkɛ, u ye Jasɔn ni balima dɔw sama ka taa ni olu ye dugu kiritigɛlaw yɔrɔ. U pɛrɛnna ko: «Nin cɛ minnu ye diɲɛ bɛɛ ɲaami, olu nana yan fana.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jasɔn ye u lajigin a ka so. U bɛɛ bɛ Romɛ masakɛ ka sariya kama, u b'a fɔ ko masakɛ wɛrɛ bɛ yen, ko o ye Yesu ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kuma ye jama ni kiritigɛlaw hakili ɲaami.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye seereya ɲini Jasɔn ni tɔw fɛ, o kɔ ka u bila ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin kelen balimaw ye Paul ni Silasi bila su fɛ ka taa Bere. U sera yen tuma min na, u donna Yahutuw ka Alabatoso kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu tun ka fisa Tesalonike Yahutuw ye, u sɔnna Ala ka kuma ma ni diyaɲe ye. U tun bɛ Kitabuw kalan don o don k'a filɛ yala ni o kow ye tiɲɛ ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U caman ye dannaya kɛ, ani Grɛki faamamuso caman ani cɛ caman fana.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Tesalonike Yahutuw y'a mɛn tuma min na ko Paul bɛ Ala ka kuma fɔ Bere, u taara yen ka jama kɔnɔnasu.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la balimaw ye Paul ci ka taa kɔgɔji fan fɛ, nka Silasi ni Timote tora Bere.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul bilasirabaaw taara n'a ye fo Atɛnɛ. U kɔsegintɔ, Paul ye ci bila u fɛ ko Silasi ni Timote ka teliya ka na a yɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Paul to Silasi ni Timote makɔnɔni la Atɛnɛ, a dusu tɔɔrɔla katuguni a y'a ye ko o dugu fara boliw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun bɛ kuma Yahutuw ni siya wɛrɛw Ala batobaaw fɛ Alabatoso kɔnɔ. A tun bɛ minnu kunbɛn fɛrɛkɛnɛw la, a kumana olu fɛ don o don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ hakiliman minnu bɛ wele epikuriɛnw ni sitoisiɛnw, olu dɔw ye kuma daminɛ Paul fɛ. Dɔw ko: «Nin kuma fu fɔla bɛ mun fɔ?» Dɔw y'a mɛn a bɛ kuma Yesu ni su kununli ko la, u ko: «I n'a fɔ a bɛ siya wɛrɛw ka batofɛnw ko fɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U taara n'a ye u ka kiri yɔrɔ la, u ko: «I bɛ kalan kura min fɔ, anw bɛ se ka o dɔn wa?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Katuguni i bɛ ko kura minnu ko fɔ, an b'a fɛ ka olu kɔrɔ dɔn.» (
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Atɛnɛkaw bɛɛ ni u ka siginfɛw tun bɛ u ka waati bɛɛ tɛmɛn kalan kuraw fɔli ni u lamɛnni la.)
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul y'i jɔ kiritigɛ yɔrɔ la jama cɛma k'a fɔ ko: «Atɛnɛkaw, ne y'a ye aw timinan ka di batoli kow la kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye aw ka dugu yaala minkɛ, ne ye aw ka batofɛn saraka bɔ yɔrɔ caman ye. Ne ye kelen ye, a sɛbɛnnen bɛ o kan ko: ‘Batofɛn dɔnbali ka saraka bɔlan’. Ayiwa aw bɛ min bato k'a sɔrɔ aw ma o dɔn, ne bɛ o de ko fɔ aw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala, o min ye diɲɛ ni a kɔnɔ fɛnw bɛɛ da, sankolo ni dugukolo Matigi, o tɛ sigi mɔgɔw ka so dilalenw kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ bolo tɛ se ka baara kɛ a ye i n'a fɔ a mago bɛ fɛn na, katuguni ale yɛrɛ bɛ ɲɛnamaya ni ninakili ani fɛn bɛɛ di mɔgɔw bɛɛ ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye siyaw bɛɛ da joli kelen na, ka u sigi dugukolo fan bɛɛ la, ka u ka tumaw ni u sigi yɔrɔ danw latigɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A b'a fɛ u ka Ala ɲini, ni u mɔmɔli kɛtɔ bɛ se ka a sɔrɔ, hali k'a sɔrɔ a yɔrɔ man jan an si la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ ale la, an bɛ ani an bɛ ɲɛnamaya ka an lamaga. Aw yɛrɛw ka dɔnkili dala dɔw y'a fɔ ko: ‘An ye a denw ye.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a sɔrɔ an ye ale denw ye, an man kan ka miiri ko Alaya bɛ i ko sanu wala warijɛ wala kabakurun minnu dilalen bɛ mɔgɔw bolo fɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔ hakili ni a se ko ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ma o ko dɔnbaliya tumaw jate, nka sisan a bɛ mɔgɔw bɛɛ wele yɔrɔw bɛɛ ko u ka nimisa u ka jurumuw la,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ a ye don dɔ sigi, a na kiri tigɛ diɲɛ bɛɛ kan ni tilennenya ye a ka cɛ ɲɛnatɔmɔlen bolo. A ye taamashyɛn jɛlen kɛ o la mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye, katuguni a y'a lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye suw kununli ko mɛn tuma min na, u dɔw ye yɛlɛ bɔ a ma. Dɔw ko: «An na i lamɛn don wɛrɛ tun.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa Paul bɔra u cɛma ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, dɔw farala a kan ka dannaya kɛ. U la kelen tɔgɔ ko Denisi u ka dugu kiritigɛ jamakulu mɔgɔ dɔ tun don, ani muso min tɔgɔ ko Damaris, ani mɔgɔ wɛrɛw fana.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Paul bɔra Atɛnɛ ka taa Kɔrɛnte.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye Yahutu dɔ ye yen, o tɔgɔ ko Akilas, Ponka don. A ni a muso Prisiye nalen kura tun don ka bɔ Itali, k'a masɔrɔ masakɛ Klode tun y'a fɔ ko Yahutuw bɛɛ ka wuli ka bɔ Romɛ. Paul taara olu ɲini
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ka sigi u fɛ ka baara kɛ u fɛ, katuguni u bɛɛ tun bɛ baara sifa kelen kɛ, finiso dilabaaw tun don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul tun bɛ waajuli kɛ Alabatoso kɔnɔ lafiɲɛ donw bɛɛ la. A tun b'a fɛ ka faamuli di Yahutuw ni Grɛkiw fila bɛɛ ma ka u kun yɛlɛma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Silasi ni Timote sera yen ka bɔ Masedwanɛ jamana la tuma min na, Paul ye a ka waati bɛɛ ta ka waajuli kɛ ka seereya kɛ Yahutuw ye ko Yesu ye Krisita de ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yahutuw ye Paul sɔsɔ ni lagosili kumaw ye. O de kosɔn Paul ye a ka finiw yuguyugu u kama k'a fɔ ko: «Aw joli hakɛ ka bin aw yɛrɛw kan, jalaki tɛ ne kan tun. Kabini sisan, ne na taa siya wɛrɛw fan fɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul bɔra yen ka taa Ala batobaa dɔ ka so, o tɔgɔ ko Tite Jusitus. A ka so gunnen tun bɛ Alabatoso la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Alabatoso kuntigi Krisipus ni a ka denbaya bɛɛ dara Matigi la. Kɔrɛnteka minnu ye Paul ka kuma lamɛn, olu caman fana ye dannaya kɛ ka batise.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi y'a fɔ Paul ye jiralifɛn na su fɛ ko: «I kana siran. I ka to ka kuma, i kana i makun,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni ne bɛ i fɛ. Mɔgɔ si tɛna se ka bin i kan ka ko jugu kɛ i la, k'a masɔrɔ ne ka mɔgɔ caman bɛ nin dugu kɔnɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul tora Kɔrɛnte ka san kelen ni kalo wɔɔrɔ kɛ ka mɔgɔw kalan Ala ka kuma la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Galiɔn tun ye Romɛ gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ye Akayi jamana kun na tuma min na, Yahutuw ye ɲɔgɔn lajɛ Paul kama. U taara n'a ye kiritigɛlaw ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ko: «Nin cɛ bɛ mɔgɔw kun yɛlɛma ka Ala bato cogo min na, o bɛ an ka sariya tiɲɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul tun b'a fɛ ka kuma tuma min na, Galiɔn y'a fɔ Yahutuw ye ko: «Aw Yuhutuw, ni tilenbaliya wala kojuguba ko tun don, siga t'a la ne tun na aw lamɛn,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] nka ni a kɛra kumaw wala tɔgɔw wala aw yɛrɛw ka sariya kow ye, o ɲɛnabɔli bɛ aw yɛrɛw ma. Ne tɛ sɔn ka o kow kiri tigɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye u gɛn ka bɔ kiritigɛ yɔrɔ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la u bɛɛ ye Alabatoso kuntigi Sositɛnɛ minɛ ka a gosi kiritigɛ yɔrɔ da la, nka Galiɔn ma o jate.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul tora Kɔrɛnte ka waati jan kɛ. O kɔ, a bɔra balimaw yɔrɔ, a ni Prisiye ni Akilas donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ ɲɔgɔn fɛ ko u bɛ taa Siri jamana la. A ye a kun di Sankrɛ, k'a masɔrɔ a tun y'i dafale Ala la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U selen Efese, Paul ye Prisiye ni Akilas to yen. A yɛrɛ donna Alabatoso kɔnɔ ka kuma Yahutuw fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu y'a deli ko a ka waati dɔ kɛ u fɛ, nka a ma sɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'i sara u la ko: «Ne na kɔsegin aw fɛ yan, ni Ala sɔnna.» O kɔ, a donna kurun kɔnɔ Efese ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A sera Sesare tuma min na, a taara Jerusalɛm ka egilisi fo, o kɔ, a taara Antiose.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye waati dɔ kɛ yen, o kɔ, a taara ka Galasi ni Friji jamanaw yaala ka dannabaaw bɛɛ sabati.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutu dɔ sera Efese, Alɛkisandrika don, o tɔgɔ ko Apolosi. A tun bɛ se kuma la kosɛbɛ, a kalannen tun don Kitabuw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ kalannen tun bɛ Matigi ka sira ko la, a dusu bɛɛ tun b'a la ka Yesu ko fɔ ka mɔgɔw kalan o la k'a jɛya. Nka a ka dɔnniya danna Yuhana ka batiseli la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye kuma daminɛ ni ja gɛlɛya ye Alabatoso kɔnɔ. Prisiye ni Akilas y'a mɛn tuma min na, u taara n'a ye u ka so ka Ala sira jira a la k'a jɛya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Apolosi tun b'a fɛ ka taa Akayi jamana la. Balimaw ye a ja gɛlɛya o la ka sɛbɛn ci yen dannabaaw ma ko u k'a minɛ ko ɲuman. A selen yen, minnu kɛra dannabaaw ye Ala ka nɛɛma barika la, a ye olu dɛmɛ kosɛbɛ,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni a ka kuma ye se sɔrɔ Yahutuw ka kuma kan mɔgɔw bɛɛ ɲɛ na. A y'a jira ka bɔ Kitabuw la ko Yesu ye Krisita de ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Apolosi to Kɔrɛnte, Paul ye Asi kulu jamana cɛtigɛ ka se Efese. A ye dannabaa dɔw sɔrɔ yen,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] a y'a fɔ olu ye ko: «Aw ye dannaya kɛ tuma min na, aw ye Ni Senu sɔrɔ wa?» U y'a jaabi ko: «An ma a mɛn yɛrɛ ko Ni Senu bɛ yen.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ko: «Aw dun batisera batiseli jumɛn la?» U y'a jaabi ko: «Yuhana Batiselikɛla ta.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ko: «Yuhana tun bɛ batiseli min kɛ, o tun b'a jira ko mɔgɔw nimisara u ka jurumuw la. A tun b'a fɔ ko min bɛ na ale kɔ, mɔgɔw ka da o la, o ye Yesu de ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye o kuma mɛn tuma min na, u batisera Matigi Yesu tɔgɔ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ye a bolow da u kan, o kɛlen, Ni Senu jiginna u kan, u ye kan wɛrɛw fɔ ka kiraya kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ tan ni fila ɲɔgɔn tun don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul donna Alabatoso kɔnɔ ka kuma ni ja gɛlɛya ye kalo saba kɔnɔ. A tun bɛ u waaju ka u kalan Ala ka masaya ko la. A tun b'a fɛ ka u kun yɛlɛma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka kunkolo gɛlɛn dɔw ma sɔn ka dannaya kɛ, u tun bɛ Matigi ka sira lagosi jama ɲɛ na. O tuma la, Paul ye u to yen ka taa ni dannabaaw ye u dan na ka u kalan don o don Tiranus ka kalan yɔrɔ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye o kɛ san fila kɔnɔ fo Asikaw bɛɛ, Yahutuw ani Grɛkiw ye Matigi ka kuma mɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala tun bɛ kabakobaw kɛ Paul bolo,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] fo fini wala musɔrɔ minnu tun magara Paul farikolo la, mɔgɔw tun bɛ taa ni olu ye ka u bila banabaatɔw kan, olu tun bɛ kɛnɛya. Jinɛw tun bɛ bɔ jinɛtɔw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutu minnu tun bɛ yaalayaala ka jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la, olu dɔw y'a kɔrɔbɔ k'a filɛ ni u bɛ se ka jinɛw gɛn Matigi Yesu tɔgɔ la. U y'a fɔ jinɛw ye ko: «Paul bɛ waajuli kɛ Yesu min ko la, an b'a fɔ o tɔgɔ kosɔn: A' ye bɔ a la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu tun bɛ o kɛ, olu tun ye Yahutuw ka sarakalasebaaw kuntigi Seva denkɛ wolonwula ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka jinɛ y'u jaabi ko: «Ne bɛ Yesu dɔn, ne bɛ Paul fana dɔn, nka aw ye jɔnw ye?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jinɛtɔ binna u kan ka se u la fo u farilankolon joginnenw bolila ka bɔ so kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ko dɔnna Efesekaw bɛɛ fɛ, Yahutuw ni Grɛkiw, u bɛɛ siranna, u ye Matigi Yesu tɔgɔ bonya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu kɛra dannabaaw ye, olu caman tun bɛ na ka jɔ u ka ko kɛlenw la jama ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔnbaayakɛla caman nana ni u ka sɛbɛnw ye ka u jeni mɔgɔw bɛɛ ɲɛ na. O kitabuw sɔngɔ jatelen tun bɛ warijɛ waa biduuru bɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la Matigi ka kuma jɛnsɛnna ni fanga ye ka a ka sebaaya jira.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kow kɛlen kɔ, Paul y'a latigɛ ko a na Masedwanɛ ni Akayi cɛtigɛ ka taa Jerusalɛm. A ko: «Ni ne sera yen, wajibi don ne ka Romɛ fana ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye a dɛmɛbaa fila, Timote ni Erasite ci ka taa Masedwanɛ jamana la, nka a yɛrɛ tora Asi jamana la fɔlɔ ka waati dɔ kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O waati la golobogalaba kɛra Matigi ka sira kosɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sanu faga numu min tɔgɔ ko Dɛmɛtrius, o tun bɛ u ka batofɛn musoman Artemis batoso bisigiw dila ni warijɛ ye ka tɔnɔ caman sɔrɔ o baarakɛlaw ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye olu ni o ɲɔgɔn baarakɛlaw lajɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ k'a fɔ ko: «Cɛw, aw y'a dɔn ko an bɛ nafaba sɔrɔ nin baara de la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nin Paul ye min kɛ, aw y'o ye k'a mɛn. A ko batofɛn minnu dilara mɔgɔ bolo fɛ, ko olu tɛ batofɛn sɛbɛw ye. A sera ka mɔgɔ caman kun yɛlɛma, yan Efese dama tɛ, nka a bɛ ɲini k'a kɛ Asi jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛ siran an ka baara kana na tiɲɛ. O dama tɛ, an ka batofɛn musoman Artemis batoso na jate fu ye. Asikaw bɛɛ ani diɲɛ mɔgɔw bɛɛ bɛ o batofɛn musoman min bato, tanga na bɔ o kan.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɔgɔw ye o kuma mɛn minkɛ, u diminna ka pɛrɛn ni kanba ye ko: «Efesekaw ka Artemis de ka bon!»

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul tun b'a fɛ ka taa o yɔrɔ la, nka dannabaaw y'a bali.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ye dannabaa dɔw sɔrɔ yen ka dɔgɔkun kelen kɛ olu fɛ. U tora k'a fɔ Paul ye Ni Senu barika la ko a kana taa Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dɔgɔkun dafalen kɔ u fɛ yen, an ye an ka taama sira minɛ ka taa. U ni u musow ni u denw bɛɛ taara an bilasira fo dugu kɔfɛ. An ye an ɲɔngiri kɔgɔji da la ka Ala deli.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ye foli di ɲɔgɔn ma tuma min na, anw donna kurun kɔnɔ, olu seginna u ka so.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɔra Tir ka taa Potolomais, an ka kɔgɔji kan taama danna yen. An ye foli di yen balimaw ma ka tile kelen kɛ u fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ an bɔra yen ka taa Sesare. An donna Kibaru Duman fɔbaa Filipe ka so ka jigin yen. Ale tun ye o mɔgɔ wolonwula ɲɛnatɔmɔlenw la kelen ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Denmuso npogotigi naani tun bɛ o fɛ yen, olu tun bɛ kiraya kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ye tile dama dɔ kɛ u fɛ. K'an to yen, kira dɔ nana ka bɔ Jude jamana la, o tɔgɔ ko Agabus.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ye an sɔrɔ yen. A ye Paul ka cɛsirilan ta ka a yɛrɛ senw ni a bolow siri n'o ye. A ko: «Ni Senu ye min jira, o filɛ nin ye: Nin cɛsirilan ye cɛ min ta ye, Yahutuw na o siri nin cogo la Jerusalɛm, o kɔ, ka a don siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw bolo.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ye o kuma mɛn tuma min na, an ni yen mɔgɔw ye Paul deli ko a kana taa Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul y'an jaabi ko: «Mun y'a to aw bɛ kasi ka ne dusu tiɲɛ? Ne labɛnnen bɛ saya kama Jerusalɛm Matigi Yesu tɔgɔ kosɔn, janko sirili.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ma se ka a bali minkɛ, an y'a to yen k'a fɔ ko: «Matigi sago ka kɛ.»
