[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sesare dannabaa dɔw ye an bilasira ka taa ni an ye Siprɛka Mnason ka so, ko an na jigin o fɛ. Dannabaa kɔrɔ tun don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An selen Jerusalɛm, an na ko diyara balimaw ye. U ye an minɛ ko ɲuman.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ Paul taara ni an ye Yakuba ka so. Egilisi cɛkɔrɔbaw bɛɛ fana taara yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ye foli di u ma. O kɔ, Ala ye ko minnu bɛɛ kɛ a bolo siya wɛrɛw cɛma a ka baara waatiw bɛɛ la, a ye olu bɛɛ kelen-kelen lakali u ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'o mɛn minkɛ, u ye Ala tanu. O kɔ, u y'a fɔ Paul ye ko: «An balimakɛ, i ɲɛ b'a la ko Yahutu caman-caman kɛra dannabaaw ye, u bɛɛ dusu bɛ sariya ko la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A fɔra olu ye ko Yahutu minnu bɛ sigi siya wɛrɛw cɛma, ko i bɛ olu kalan ko u ka fara Musa ka sariya la, ko i b'a fɔ u ye ko u kana u denw boloko, ko u kana tugu Yahutuw ka laadaw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ka kan ka mun kɛ sa? Katuguni siga t'a la, u bɛɛ n'a dɔn ko i sera yan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to an bɛna min fɔ i ye, i ka o kɛ. Cɛ naani bɛ an fɛ yan minnu ye u dafale Ala la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I ka taa ni olu ye ka aw saniya ɲɔgɔn fɛ. I ka u kun di wari bɔ. O cogo la mɔgɔw bɛɛ n'a dɔn ko u ye ko minnu mɛn i ko la, ko olu si tɛ tiɲɛ ye, ko i yɛrɛ bɛ taama ka kɛɲɛ ni sariya ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Siya wɛrɛw dannabaaw kɔni, an bɛnna a la ka sɛbɛn ci olu ma ko u kana bolisɔn sogo dun wala joli wala fɛn kan cɔrinnen, ko u ka u tanga kakalaya ma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa Paul taara ni o cɛ naani ye. O dugusajɛ u saniyalen kɔ, u donna Alabatosoba kɔnɔ ka saniyali donw dafali ko fɔ, ani u bɛɛ kelen-kelen ka saraka ka kan ka bɔ don min na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tile wolonwula tun bɛ ɲini ka dafa tuma min na, Asi jamana Yahutuw ye Paul ye Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, u ye mɔgɔw kɔnɔnasu ko u k'a minɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U pɛrɛnna ko: «Israɛl mɔgɔw, a' ye na an dɛmɛ. Cɛ min bɛ kuma yɔrɔ bɛɛ mɔgɔw bɛɛ fɛ Israɛl mɔgɔw ni sariya ani nin Alabatosoba kama, o filɛ. Ka fara o kan, a ye Grɛki mɔgɔ dɔw ladon Alabatosoba kɔnɔ ka nin yɔrɔ senuma nɔgɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Trofimɛ min bɔra Efese, u tun ye o ni Paul ye ɲɔgɔn fɛ dugu kɔnɔ. U tun bɛ miiri ko Paul ye o ladon Alabatosoba kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mankanba kɛra dugu kɔnɔ, mɔgɔw girinna ka bɔ fan bɛɛ la ka taa yen. U ye Paul minɛ k'a sama ka bɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ ka so daw tugu.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun b'a fɛ ka Paul faga tuma min na, o kibaru sera sɔrɔdasikulu jaladuurutigi ma ko Jerusalɛm yɔrɔ bɛɛ girinna.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ a ye sɔrɔdasi dɔw ni jalasabatigi dɔw ɲɛminɛ ka boli ka taa mɔgɔw yɔrɔ. Olu ye jaladuurutigi ni sɔrɔdasiw ye minkɛ, u ye Paul gosili dabila.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jaladuurutigi gɛrɛla Paul la k'a minɛ k'a fɔ ko a ka siri ni nɛgɛ jɔlɔkɔ fila ye. A ye ɲininkali kɛ ko: «Jɔni don? A ye mun kɛ?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama la mɔgɔ dɔw tun bɛ pɛrɛn ka ko dɔ fɔ, dɔ wɛrɛw ye ko wɛrɛ fɔ. Jaladuurutigi ma se ka ko jɛlen si sɔrɔ u ka kuma ɲaaminenw cɛma tuma min na, a ko u ka taa ni Paul ye sɔrɔdasiw ka kube kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U sera yɛlɛnyɛlɛnnan ma tuma min na, sɔrɔdasiw ye Paul ta u bolo, jama ka fariya kosɔn,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ u bɛɛ tun bɛ tugu a nɔfɛ ka pɛrɛn ko a ka faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sɔrɔdasiw tun bɛ Paul ladon u ka kube kɔnɔ tuma min na, a y'a fɔ jaladuurutigi ye ko: «I bɛ sɔn ne ka kuma dɔ fɔ i ye wa?» Jaladuurutigi y'a ɲininka ko: «I bɛ grɛkikan dɔn wa?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Misiraka min murutira kosa in na ka taa ni mɔgɔfagala waa naani ye kungokolon kɔnɔ, i tɛ o ye wa?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul y'a jaabi ko: «Ne ye Yahutu ye. Tarse min bɛ Silisi jamana la, ne ye o duguba dugulen dɔ ye. Ne b'i deli i k'a to ne ka kuma jama fɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jaladuurutigi sɔnna. Ka Paul jɔlen to yɛlɛnyɛlɛnnan kan, a y'a bolo kɔrɔta mɔgɔw ye. U bɛɛ y'u makun. Paul kumana u fɛ hɛburukan na, a ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ne faw ni ne balimaw, ne bɛna ne yɛrɛ lafasa cogo min na sisan, a' ye o kuma lamɛn.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a mɛn ko a bɛ kuma u fɛ hɛburukan na tuma min na, u ye dɔ fara u makunni kan. A ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ne ye Yahutu ye. Tarse min bɛ Silisi jamana la, ne bangera yen. Ne mɔna Jerusalɛm yan. Ne kalanna Gamaliɛl sen kɔrɔ an bɛnbaw ka sariya kow bɛɛ la. Ne dusu bɛɛ tun bɛ Ala ko la i ko aw yɛrɛw dusu b'a la cogo min na bi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tugura nin sira taamabaaw la ka u tɔɔrɔ fo ka se saya ma. Ne ye cɛw ni musow siri ka u bila kaso la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ni cɛkɔrɔbaw jamakulu bɛɛ ye ne seerew ye o kow la. Ne ye sɛbɛnw sɔrɔ olu fɛ ka di Damasi dugu balima Yahutuw ma. Ne tun bɛ taa yen ka yen dannabaaw minɛ ka na n'u sirilen ye Jerusalɛm yan ka u tɔɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ka ne to sira kan ka surunya Damasi la, yɔrɔnin kelen tilegan fɛ, kɛnɛyeelenba bɔra sankolo la ka manamana ne lamini na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne binna duguma, ne ye kan dɔ mɛn. O y'a fɔ ne ye ko: ‘Saul, Saul, mun y'a to i bɛ ne tɔɔrɔ?’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ko: ‘I ye jɔni ye, Matigi?’ A y'a fɔ ne ye ko: ‘Ne ye Yesu Nazarɛtika ye. I bɛ min tɔɔrɔ, ne don.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne taamaɲɔgɔnw ye o kɛnɛyeelen ye, nka min kumana ne fɛ, u ma o kan mɛn. O tuma la ne ye ɲininkali kɛ ko: ‘Matigi, ne ka mun kɛ?’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi y'a fɔ ne ye ko: ‘Wuli ka taa Damasi. Ala b'a fɛ i ka min kɛ, o na fɔ i ye yen.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛnɛyeelenba ye ne ɲɛ lafin fo ne ma se ka yeli kɛ. Ne taamaɲɔgɔnw ye ne bolo minɛ ka taa ni ne ye Damasi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ yen, o tɔgɔ ko Ananiyasi, a tun bɛ siran Ala ɲɛ ka sariya sira taama. Damasi Yahutuw bɛɛ tun b'a tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O nana ne yɔrɔ ɲini k'a ye k'i jɔ ne kɛrɛ fɛ k'a fɔ ne ye ko: ‘Ne balimakɛ Saul, i ɲɛw ka yɛlɛ.’ O yɔrɔnin kelen ne ɲɛw yɛlɛla, ne ye Ananiyasi ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko: ‘An bɛnbaw ka Ala ye i ɲɛnatɔmɔ, walisa i ka a sago dɔn, ka Ala ka Tilennen ye, ka kuma dɔw mɛn o da la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Katuguni i ye ko minnu ye ka u mɛn, i na kɛ a seere ye o kow la mɔgɔw bɛɛ ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sisan i bɛ mun makɔnɔ tun? Wuli ka Matigi tɔgɔ wele ka batise ka i ka jurumuw ko ka bɔ i la.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ne kɔseginnen kɔ Jerusalɛm, ka ne to Ala delili la Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, ne ye jiralifɛn dɔ ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye Matigi ye, a ko: ‘I teliya ka bɔ Jerusalɛm joona, k'a masɔrɔ i bɛ seereya min bɔ ne ko la, u tɛna sɔn o ma.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne y'a jaabi ko: ‘Matigi u yɛrɛw b'a dɔn ko ne donna Alabatosow kɔnɔ ka i dannabaaw minɛ walisa u ka bila kaso la ka u gosi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye i seere Etiɛni faga tuma min na, ne yɛrɛ tun bɛ yen. Ne sɔnna u ka kɛtaw ma, ne ye a fagabaaw ka dulɔkiw kɔlɔsi.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Matigi y'a fɔ ne ye ko: ‘Taa, katuguni ne na i ci ka taa yɔrɔ jan siya wɛrɛw ma.’»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama ye Paul ka kuma lamɛn fo ka se o kuma ma. O tuma la u pɛrɛnna k'a fɔ ko: «A' ye nin cɛ bɔ yen, a ka faga, a ɲɛnama man kan ka to.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U kulola ka u ka dulɔkiw bɔ u la ka u fili, ka buguri cɛ ka a seri san fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jaladuurutigi ye ci fɔ ko Paul ka ladon sɔrɔdasiw ka kube kɔnɔ, ka bugɔ ni gɛɲɛ ye walisa kun min y'a to jama bɛ kulo a nɔfɛ, a ka o dɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun b'a la ka Paul siri bugɔli kama tuma min na, jalasabatigi dɔ tun bɛ yen, Paul y'a fɔ o ye ko: «A dagalen bɛ ka Romɛka hɔrɔn bugɔ k'a sɔrɔ kiri ma tigɛ a kan wa?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jalasabatigi ye o kuma mɛn tuma na, a taara o fɔ jaladuurutigi ye ko: «I bɛna mun kɛ ten? Nin cɛ ye Romɛka hɔrɔn ye dɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jaladuurutigi taara Paul yɔrɔ k'a ɲininka ko: «A fɔ ne ye, i ye Romɛka hɔrɔn ye wa?» Paul y'a jaabi ko: «ɔwɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jaladuurutigi ko: «Ne ye o hɔrɔnya sɔrɔ ni wari caman ye.» Paul ko: «Ne kɔni y'a sɔrɔ bange fɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin kelen, minnu tun bɛna Paul bugɔ, olu ye u mabɔ a la. Jaladuurutigi y'a dɔn ko Paul ye Romɛka hɔrɔn ye tuma min na, a siranna, katuguni a tun y'a siri.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw tun bɛ Paul sendon kun min na, jaladuurutigi tun b'a fɛ ka o dɔn k'a jɛya. O de kosɔn o dugusajɛ, a ye Paul foni ka ci fɔ ko sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni kiritigɛ jamakulu bɛɛ ka ɲɔgɔn lajɛ. O kɔ, a taara ni Paul ye k'a jɔ u ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ye a ɲɛ jɔ kiritigɛ jamakulu la k'a fɔ ko: «Balimaw, ne dusu ma ne jalaki ne ka kɛta si la Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ fo ka na se bi ma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sarakalasebaaw kuntigi Ananiyasi y'a fɔ a kɛrɛfɛ mɔgɔw ye ko u ka Paul gosi a da la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Paul y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ala na i gosi, e min bɔlen bɛ kogo kɔkanna jɛyalen fɛ. I sigilen bɛ yan ka kiri tigɛ ne kan ka kɛɲɛ ni sariya ye, nka i b'a fɔ ko ne ka gosi, o ye sariya tiɲɛni de ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A kɛrɛfɛ mɔgɔw ko: «I bɛ Ala ka sarakalasebaaw kuntigi dɔgɔya dɛ!»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul y'a jaabi ko: «Balimaw, ne tun m'a dɔn ko sarakalasebaaw kuntigi don. Tiɲɛ don, a sɛbɛnnen bɛ Kitabu la ko: ‘I kana kuma jugu fɔ i ka mɔgɔw kuntigi ma.’»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul tun b'a dɔn ko kiritigɛ jamakulu tila kelen tun ye Saduseɛnw ye, ko a tɔw ye Farisiɛnw ye. O la, a pɛrɛnna u cɛma ko: «Balimaw, ne bangebaaw tun ye Farisiɛnw ye, ne fana ye Farisiɛn ye. An jigi b'a kan ko suw bɛ kunun, o jigi de ye ne don nin kiri la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye o kumaw fɔ tuma min na, sɔsɔli donna Saduseɛnw ni Farisiɛnw cɛ fo jamakan tilara. (
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saduseɛnw b'a fɔ ko suw tɛna kunun, ko mɛlɛkɛ si tɛ yen, ko ni si tɛ yen, k'a sɔrɔ Farisiɛnw dara o kow bɛɛ la.)
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A kɛra wɔyɔba ye. Farisiɛnw ka sariya karamɔgɔ dɔw wulila ka kuma ta ni fariya ye ko: «An ma ko jugu si sɔrɔ nin cɛ la. A dɔrɔ ni wala mɛlɛkɛ dɔ kumana a fɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sɔsɔli bonyara kosɛbɛ, fo jaladuurutigi siranna ko Paul kana na farafara u fɛ. A ye sɔrɔdasiw bila ka jigin ka taa Paul bɔsi u bolo ka taa n'a ye sɔrɔdasiw ka kube kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O don su fɛ Matigi y'i jira Paul la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ja gɛlɛya, i ye ne seereya kɛ Jerusalɛm cogo min na, wajibi don i ka o ɲɔgɔn seereya kɛ Romɛ fana.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ sɔgɔma, Yahutu dɔw ye jɛ siri ka u kali ka u yɛrɛw danga ko u tɛna dumuni kɛ wala ka minni kɛ sani u ka Paul faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jɛ siribaaw tun ka ca ni mɔgɔ binaani ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U taara sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw sɛgɛrɛ k'a fɔ olu ye ko: «An ye an kali ka an yɛrɛw danga ko an tɛna dumuni kɛ sani an ka Paul faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni, ani kiritigɛ jamakulu bɛɛ k'a fɔ jaladuurutigi ye ko a ka na ni Paul ye aw yɔrɔ, i n'a fɔ aw b'a fɛ ka a ka koɲɛw dɔn ka a jɛya. An kɔni labɛnnen bɛ ka a faga sani a ka se aw ma.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Paul balimamuso denkɛ ye u ka jɛ sirili ko mɛn. Ale taara sɔrɔdasiw ka kube la ka o ko fɔ Paul ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ye jalasabatigi dɔ wele k'a fɔ o ye ko: «Taa ni nin kamalen ye jaladuurutigi yɔrɔ, katuguni kuma dɔ b'a fɛ ka fɔ o ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jalasabatigi taara ni o kamalen ye jaladuurutigi yɔrɔ, a ko: «Kasolamɔgɔ Paul ye ne wele ka ne deli ko ne ka na ni nin kamalen ye i yɔrɔ, ko kuma dɔ b'a fɛ ka fɔ i ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jaladuurutigi ye kamalen bolo minɛ ka taa n'a ye u dan na, k'a ɲininka ko: «I b'a fɛ ka mun fɔ ne ye?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a jaabi ko: «Yahutuw kanbɛnna ko u bɛ Paul ɲini i fɛ ka taa kiritigɛ jamakulu ɲɛ kɔrɔ sini, ka a kɛ i n'a fɔ u b'a fɛ ka a ka koɲɛ dɔn k'a jɛya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka i kana sɔn, katuguni minnu bɛna u dogo k'a faga, olu ka ca ni mɔgɔ binaani ye. U ye u kali ka u yɛrɛw danga, ko u tɛna dumuni kɛ wala ka minni kɛ sani u ka Paul faga. U labɛnnen bɛ sisan, u tɛ foyi makɔnɔ fo i ka jaabili.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jaladuurutigi y'a fɔ o kamalen ye ko: «I kana fɔ mɔgɔ si ye ko i ye o ko fɔ ne ye.» O kɔ, a y'a bila ka taa.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la jaladuurutigi ye jalasabatigi fila wele k'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye sɔrɔdasi kɛmɛ fila ni so kan yɛlɛnbaa biwolonwula ani taamatigi kɛmɛ fila lajɛ ka u labɛn ka taa Sesare. Aw ka taa surɔfana dun waati tɛmɛnnen kɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka sow labɛn, walisa Paul fana ka yɛlɛn dɔ kan ka taa se gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ Feliksi yɔrɔ hɛrɛ la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye nin kuma sɛbɛn ka ci u fɛ:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Klode Lisiyas bɛ nin sɛbɛn ci gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ Feliksi ma. I ni hɛrɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw ye nin cɛ minɛ, u tun bɛ ɲini ka a faga. Ne ni sɔrɔdasiw taara a minɛ u la, sabu ne y'a mɛn ko Romɛka hɔrɔn don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw tun bɛ nin cɛ sendon ko min na, ne tun b'a fɛ ka o dɔn. Ne taara n'a ye u ka kiritigɛ jamakulu ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne y'a sɔrɔ ko u y'a sendon u yɛrɛw ka sariya kow la, nka a ma foyi kɛ min ka kan ni saya wala kaso ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A fɔra ne ye tuma min na ko u dɔw ye jɛ siri a kama, o yɔrɔnin kelen ne y'a ci i ma k'a fɔ a sendonbaaw ye ko u ka taa a sendon i yɛrɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ. K'an bɛn.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sɔrɔdasiw taara ni Paul ye su fɛ fo Antipatris, i ko a fɔra u ye cogo min na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, u ye sotigiw bila ka taa ni Paul ye, u yɛrɛw kɔseginna u ka kube la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sotigiw selen Sesare, u ye o sɛbɛn di gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ma ka Paul jira a la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ye o sɛbɛn kalan minkɛ, a ye Paul ɲininka ko a bɔra jamana jumɛn la? A y'a mɛn tuma min na ko a bɔra Silisi,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] a y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ni i sendonbaaw sera yan tuma min na, ne na i ka ko ɲɛnabɔ.» A y'a fɔ ko u ka Paul mara Hɛrɔde ka kube kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile duuru tɛmɛnnen kɔ, sarakalasebaaw kuntigi Ananiyasi sera Sesare, a ni cɛkɔrɔba dɔw ani kuma dɔnna dɔ, o tɔgɔ ko Tɛritule. U ye Paul sendon gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul welelen ka na, Tɛritule y'a sendonni kuma daminɛ tan ko: «Gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ Feliksi, an bɛ hɛrɛba min na, o bɛ bɔ e de la. I ka ko ɲɛnabɔli ye ko ɲuman caman kɛ nin siya ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O diyara an bɛɛ ye. An bɛ barika da i ye o kow la tuma bɛɛ, yɔrɔ bɛɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka walisa ne kana i sɛgɛn, ne b'i deli i ka ɲumaya kosɔn, i ka an lamɛn dɔɔnin.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An y'a sɔrɔ ko nin cɛ bɛ an tɔɔrɔ i n'a fɔ fiɲɛbana bɛ an cɛma. A bɛ Yahutuw bɛɛ lamuruti diɲɛ yɔrɔ bɛɛ la. Nazarɛtikaw ka jɛ kuntigi don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun b'a fɛ ka Alabatosoba nɔgɔ fana. O tuma la an y'a minɛ. [An tun b'a fɛ ka kiri tigɛ a kan ka kɛɲɛ ni an ka sariya ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka jaladuurutigi Lisiyas nana k'a bɔsi ka bɔ an bolo ni fanga ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Lisiyas y'a fɔ a sendonbaaw ye ko u ka na i ɲɛ kɔrɔ.] Ni i bɛ nin cɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛ, an bɛ a sendon ko minnu na, i na o kow dɔn tiɲɛ ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw sɔnna a sendonni kow ma, ko o kow bɛɛ kɛra ten.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ye kuma di Paul ma. Paul ye kuma ta, a ko: «Ne y'a dɔn ko i ye nin siya ka kiritigɛla ye kabini san caman. O de kosɔn ne jigi sigilen bɛ ne yɛrɛ lafasa i ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I yɛrɛ bɛ se k'a sɛgɛsɛgɛ k'a dɔn ko ne seli ma tɛmɛn tile tan ni fila kan Jerusalɛm ka Ala bato.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ma ne sɔrɔ sɔsɔli la mɔgɔ si fɛ, wala jama lamurutili la Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, wala Alabatoso dɔw, wala dugu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛ ne sendon ko minnu na sisan, u tɛ se ka olu fɔ k'a jɛya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, ne bɛ jɔ nin de la i ɲɛ kɔrɔ, ko u b'a fɔ ko sira min tɛ tiɲɛ ye, ne bɛ baara kɛ an bɛnbaw ka Ala ye ka kɛɲɛ ni o sira ye. Ko minnu sɛbɛnna sariya ni kiraw ka kitabuw la, ne dara olu bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne jigi dalen bɛ Ala kan, i ko u fana jigi b'a kan cogo min na, ko mɔgɔw bɛɛ suw na kunun, mɔgɔ tilennenw ni mɔgɔ tilenbaliw bɛɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to ne bɛ ne jija tuma bɛɛ ko ne dusukun jalakibali ka sɔrɔ Ala ni mɔgɔw bɛɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «San dama dɔ tɛmɛnna. Sisan ne nana ni dɛmɛni wari ye ka di ne ka siya mɔgɔw ma, ani ka Ala bato.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye ne saniyalen sɔrɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ o kɛli la, jama tun tɛ yen, wɔyɔ ma wuli.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Asi Yahutu dɔw tun bɛ yen, olu tun ka kan ka kɛ i ɲɛ kɔrɔ yan ka ne sendon, ni a y'a sɔrɔ u ye ko jugu ye ne la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Feliksi ye o sira ko dɔn kosɛbɛ, a ye u labila fo waati wɛrɛ, a ko: «Jaladuurutigi Lisiyas mana na, ne na aw ka ko ɲɛnabɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ jalasabatigi ye ko a ka Paul bila kaso la ka a kɔlɔsi, nka a kana a degun, a k'a to Paul teriw ka na a mago ɲɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile dama tɛmɛnnen kɔ, Feliksi ni a muso Drusiye nana, o muso tun ye Yahutu ye. Feliksi ye ci bila ka taa Paul wele ka na. Paul ye kuma minnu fɔ Yesu Krisita dannaya ko la, a ye olu lamɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul tun bɛ kuma tilennenya ni yɛrɛ minɛli ni kiri nata ko la tuma min na, Feliksi siranna haali, a ko: «I bɛ se ka taa sisan. Ni ne ye waati wɛrɛ sɔrɔ, ne na i wele tun.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A jigi tun b'a kan fana ko Paul na wari dɔ di a ma. O de y'a to a y'a wele ko caman ka na ka baro kɛ a fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] San fila tɛmɛnnen kɔ, Pɔrsius Fɛsitus sigira Feliksi nɔ na. Feliksi tun b'a fɛ ka Yahutuw diyaɲeko kɛ, a ye Paul to kaso la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛsitus selen o jamana la, o tile sabanan, a bɔra Sesare ka taa Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni Yahutuw ka faama dɔw ye Paul sendon a ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye Fɛsitus deli ko a ka Paul lana Jerusalɛm. U tun ye jɛ siri ko u b'a faga sira la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛsitus y'u jaabi ko Paul bɛ kaso la Sesare, ko ale bɛna kɔsegin yen sɔɔni.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko: «Aw ka ɲɛ mɔgɔ dɔw ka taa ne fɛ yen. Ni o cɛ ye ko jugu kɛ, u ka a sendon.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛsitus ma tɛmɛn tile segin wala tan kan u fɛ yen, o kɔ, a kɔseginna ka taa Sesare. O dugusajɛ a y'i sigi kiritigɛ yɔrɔ la ka ci bila ko Paul ka na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul selen kɔ, Yahutu minnu nana ka bɔ Jerusalɛm, olu ye Paul lamini ka a sendon ni kuma jugu caman ye, nka u ma se ka o si jɛya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul kumana a yɛrɛ ko la, a ko: «Ne ma ko jugu si kɛ Yahutuw ka sariya kama, wala Alabatosoba kama, wala Romɛ masakɛ kama.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Fɛsitus tun b'a fɛ ka Yahutuw diyaɲeko kɛ, a y'a fɔ Paul ye ko: «I bɛ sɔn ka taa Jerusalɛm, walisa i ka kiri ka tigɛ ne ɲɛ kɔrɔ yen nin ko la wa?»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul y'a jaabi ko: «Ne bɛ taa Romɛ masakɛ ka kiri yɔrɔ la, ne ka kiri ka kan ka ɲɛnabɔ yɔrɔ min na. Ne ma ko jugu si kɛ Yahutuw la, i yɛrɛ b'o dɔn k'a jɛya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni ne jalaki don, ni ne ye ko jugu kɛ min ka kan ni saya ye, ne tɛ ban fagali ma. Nka ni u ka sendonni ko si tɛ tiɲɛ ye, mɔgɔ si tɛ se ka ne don u bolo. Ne bɛ ne ka koɲɛ to Romɛ masakɛ bolo.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛsitus kumana a kɔrɔ sigibaaw fɛ, o kɔ, a ko: «I ye i ka koɲɛ to Romɛ masakɛ bolo, i na taa Romɛ masakɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile dama o kɔ, masakɛ Agripa ni Berenise sera Sesare ka Fɛsitus fo.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye tile dama dɔ kɛ yen minkɛ, Fɛsitus ye Paul ko fɔ masakɛ ye. A ko: «Feliksi ye cɛ dɔ to kaso la yan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne taara Jerusalɛm tuma min na, sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni Yahutuw cɛkɔrɔbaw ye o cɛ sendon k'a fɔ ko ne ka a jalaki.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye u jaabi ko: ‘Romɛkaw ma deli ka mɔgɔ don bolo la sani a ni a sendonbaaw ka kɛ yɔrɔ kelen na, a ka a yɛrɛ lafasa o sendonni ko la.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la u nana yan. Ne m'a bila ka mɛn, o dugusajɛ ne ye ne sigi kiri yɔrɔ la ka ci bila ka o cɛ wele.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A sendonbaaw selen, ne tun bɛ miiri ko u na a sendon ko jugu minnu na, ne ma o si sɔrɔ a la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛn wɛrɛ tun tɛ, fɔ u tun bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔsɔ u yɛrɛw ka diinɛ sira ko la, ani cɛ dɔ ko la, o tɔgɔ ko Yesu. O sara, nka Paul ko a ɲɛnama don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tun ma o ɲɛnabɔ cogo dɔn, o de y'a to ne ye Paul ɲininka yala ni a bɛ sɔn ka taa Jerusalɛm, a ka kiri ka ɲɛnabɔ yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Paul ye a ka koɲɛ to Romɛ masakɛ bolo. O tuma la ne ko a ka to kaso la sani ne ka a bila ka taa masakɛ yɔrɔ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Agripa y'a fɔ Fɛsitus ye ko: «Ne yɛrɛ b'a fɛ ka o cɛ ka kuma lamɛn.» Fɛsitus y'a jaabi ko: «Sini i n'a lamɛn.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, Agripa ni Berenise mɔgɔbalama nana ka don ɲɔgɔnlajɛ yɔrɔ la, u ni jaladuurutigiw ni dugu mɔgɔbaw. Fɛsitus ye ci bila ka Paul wele ka na.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Fɛsitus ko: «Masakɛ Agripa ani aw minnu bɛɛ bɛ an fɛ yan, aw ɲɛ bɛ nin cɛ min na, Yahutuw jama bɛɛ ye o sendon ne ɲɛ kɔrɔ Jerusalɛm, ani yan fana u bɛ pɛrɛn ko a ɲɛnama kana to.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni y'a sɔrɔ ko a ma ko jugu si kɛ min ka kan ni fagali ye. A yɛrɛ ye a ka koɲɛ to Romɛ masakɛ bolo, o de kosɔn ne y'a latigɛ ko a ka taa yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ma ko jɛlen si sɔrɔ k'a sɛbɛn ka ci masakɛ ma a ko la. O de y'a to ne nana n'a ye aw ɲɛ kɔrɔ, janko e yɛrɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ, masakɛ Agripa, walisa a sɛgɛsɛgɛlen kɔ, ne k'a fɛn dɔ sɔrɔ ka sɛbɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 25 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ɲɛ na, ka kasolamɔgɔ ci, ni fɛn jɛlen ma sɔrɔ ka sɛbɛn a ko la, o tɛ ko bɛnnen ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Agripa y'a fɔ Paul ye ko: «I bɛ se ka i yɛrɛ ka koɲɛ fɔ.» Paul ye a bolo kɔrɔta ka a fɛ taw fɔ ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Masakɛ Agripa, Yahutuw bɛ ne sendon ko minnu bɛɛ la, a diyara ne ye ka ne yɛrɛ sɔrɔ i ɲɛ kɔrɔ ka ne yɛrɛ lafasa o kow la,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ i bɛ Yahutuw ka laadaw ni u ka sɔsɔli kow dɔn kosɛbɛ. O de kosɔn, ne b'i deli ko i ka i muɲu ka ne lamɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ne tun bɛ Jerusalɛm ne yɛrɛ siya cɛma cogo min na kabini ne denmisɛnma, Yahutuw bɛɛ bɛ o dɔn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛ ne dɔn kabini tuma jan, ni u bɛ sɔn ka seereya kɛ, ko ne tun bɛ an ka diinɛ sira bɛɛ la gɛlɛnma taama, Farisiɛnya kɔni.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ye layidu min ta an bɛnbaw ye, ne jigi bɛ o kan, o de y'a to ne bɛ kiri yɔrɔ la sisan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An siya tan ni fila jigi b'a kan ko o layidu na dafa. U jijalen bɛ Ala batoli la ka baara kɛ a ye su fara tile kan. Masakɛ, o jigi kosɔn Yahutuw bɛ ne sendon.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mun y'a to aw bɛ miiri ko mɔgɔ tɛ se ka da a la ko Ala bɛ mɔgɔw suw lakunun?
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ne kɔni tun bɛ miiri ko ne tun ka kan ka ne se ko kɛ ka Yesu Nazarɛtika tɔgɔ fɔli bali.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye o de kɛ Jerusalɛm. Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ye fanga di ne ma, ne ye dannabaa caman bila kaso la. Ni u jalaki kɛra saya ye, ne sɔnna o ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tuma caman na, ne tun bɛ u tɔɔrɔ Alabatosow bɛɛ kɔnɔ, ne tun b'a fɛ ka u karaba ka Yesu tɔgɔ tiɲɛ. Ne dusu diminnen kojugu u kɔrɔ, ne tun bɛ tugu u nɔfɛ ka u tɔɔrɔ fo jamana wɛrɛ duguw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O cogo la sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ye fanga ni ci di ne ma tuma min na, ne taara Damasi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa o tuma la, masakɛ, ka ne to sira la tilegan fɛ kɛnɛyeelenba bɔra sankolo la ka tɛmɛn tile yɛrɛ kɛnɛyeelen kan, o manamanana ka ne ni ne taamaɲɔgɔnw lamini.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛɛ binna duguma. O kɛlen, ne ye kumakan dɔ mɛn, o y'a fɔ ne ye hɛburukan na ko: ‘Saul, Saul, mun y'a to i bɛ ne tɔɔrɔ? A ka gɛlɛn i ma ka nɛgɛ nun bɔlen tan!’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne y'a ɲininka ko: ‘Matigi, i ye jɔni ye?’ Matigi y'a fɔ ko a ye Yesu ye, ko ne bɛ min tɔɔrɔ, ale don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ko ne ka wuli ka jɔ, katuguni a y'i jira ne la nin de kosɔn. Ko ne ye ko minnu ye, ani a na i jira ne la ko minnu na, ko a ye ne kɛ o kow baarakɛla ni u seere ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ko a na ne tila Yahutuw la ani ko a na ne ci siya wɛrɛ minnu ma,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ko a na ne ci olu ma walisa u ɲɛw ka yɛlɛ ka bɔ dibi la ka na kɛnɛyeelen na. U ka bɔ Sitanɛ bolo ka na Ala ma, walisa u ka jurumuw yafa sɔrɔ ka sigi yɔrɔ sɔrɔ dannabaaw cɛma, olu minnu saniyara u ka dannaya fɛ ale la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ayiwa masakɛ Agripa, fɛn min jirala ne la ka bɔ sankolo la, ne ma ban o ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tun bɛ waajuli kɛ Damasi fɔlɔ, o kɔ, Jerusalɛm ni Jude jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la ani siya wɛrɛw cɛma, ko u ka nimisa u ka jurumuw la ka tuubi Ala ye. Kɛwale minnu b'a jira ko u nimisara, u ka olu kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn Yahutu dɔw ye ne minɛ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, u tun b'a fɛ ka ne faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Ala ka dɛmɛni kosɔn ne bɛ yan halibi, ka ne seereya bɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye, mɔgɔ dɔgɔmanninw ni mɔgɔbaw. Ne ma fɛn fɔ ka tɛmɛn kiraw ni Musa ka ko nata fɔlenw kan,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ko Krisita ka kan ka tɔɔrɔ, ko ale fɔlɔ bɛna kunun ka bɔ suw cɛma ka kɛnɛyeelen ko fɔ an siya ni siya wɛrɛw ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Paul to a yɛrɛ lafasali la, Fɛsitus pɛrɛnna ni kanba ye ko: «Paul, fa b'i la! I ka kalanba ye fa bila i la!»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul y'a jaabi ko: «Fa tɛ ne la, Fɛsitus. Ne bɛ tiɲɛ kuma hakiliman de fɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Masakɛ yɛrɛ bɛ nin kow bɛɛ dɔn. Ne bɛ se ka kuma ni ja gɛlɛya ye a ɲɛ kɔrɔ. Ne dalen bɛ a la ko ale bɛ nin kow bɛɛ dɔn, sabu u ma kɛ dogo la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Masakɛ Agripa, i dara kiraw ka kumaw la wa? Ne y'a dɔn ko i dara u la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Agripa y'a fɔ Paul ye ko: «Sɔɔni i na ne yɛlɛma ka kɛ kretiɛn ye!»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ko: «Ala m'a kɛra e kelen dama tɛ, nka mɔgɔ minnu bɛ ne ka kuma mɛn bi, cogo o cogo aw bɛɛ ka kɛ ne bɔɲɔgɔnko ye, ni nin sirilanw sen t'a la.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la masakɛ wulila, ani gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ni Berenise ani mɔgɔ minnu bɛɛ tun bɛ u fɛ yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɔlen kɔ, u y'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: «Nin cɛ ma ko jugu si kɛ min ka kan ni fagali wala kaso ye.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 26 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Agripa y'a fɔ Fɛsitus ye ko: «Nin cɛ tun bɛ se ka bila ka taa, ni a tun ma a ka koɲɛ to Romɛ masakɛ bolo.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A latigɛra ko an ka don kurun kɔnɔ ka taa Itali. U ye Paul ni kasolamɔgɔ dɔw don jalasabatigi Julius bolo, o tun ye Romɛ masakɛ ka sɔrɔdasikulu kuntigi ye.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kurun dɔ tun bɛna bɔ Adramite ka taa Asi dankanw la. An donna o kɔnɔ ka taa. Masedwanɛka dɔ taara an fɛ, o tɔgɔ ko Arisitarke, Tesalonike dugu mɔgɔ dɔ don.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ an sera Sidɔn. Julius ye ko ɲuman kɛ Paul ye, a sɔnna Paul ka taa a teriw fɛ walisa olu ka a mago ɲɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɔlen kɔ yen, an taara Siprɛ gun kɛrɛ fɛ, katuguni fiɲɛ tun bɛ an kunbɛn.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ye kɔgɔji cɛtigɛ ka tɛmɛn Silisi ni Panfili kɛrɛ fɛ ka se Mira, Lisi jamana la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jalasabatigi ye kurun dɔ sɔrɔ yen, o tun bɔra Alɛkisandri, a tun bɛ taa Itali. A ye an ladon o kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An taamana ji kan nɛmɛnɛmɛ tile caman kɔnɔ, an seli gɛlɛyara Kinide dugu da fɛ. Fiɲɛ ye an bali ka taa ɲɛ o fan fɛ tuma min na, an taara Salmone ka Krete gun to an ni fiɲɛ cɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Krete gun kɛrɛfɛ tɛmɛnni gɛlɛyara an ma. An sera yɔrɔ dɔ la, o tɔgɔ ko Dankan ɲumanw, olu ni Lase dugu cɛ man jan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Waati caman tun tɛmɛnna, ji kan taama kɛra farati ye, katuguni Sundon seli tun tɛmɛnna ka ban. O de y'a to Paul ye u lasɔmi,
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] a ko: «Cɛmɔgɔw, ne ɲɛ b'a la ko nin taama na kɛ farati ye, kurun ni a doni dɔrɔn tɛ, nka an niw fana bɛ se ka tunun.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka jalasabatigi dara kurun ko ɲɛnabɔla ni kuruntigi ka kuma la ka tɛmɛn Paul ta kan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yen kurun dankan man ɲi fonɛnɛ tuma la, u caman ko u ka bɔ yen ka u jija ka se Fenikis, ka fonɛnɛ kɛ yen. O ye Krete dankan dɔ ye, a sinnen bɛ worodugu ni tilebin seleke ani saheli ni tilebin seleke ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fiɲɛ dɔɔnin cira ka bɔ worodugu fan fɛ tuma min na, u tun bɛ miiri ko u ye min latigɛ, ko o na se ka kɛ. U ye banamini ta ka tɛmɛn Krete kɛrɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sɔɔni fiɲɛba cira ka bɔ gun fan fɛ, o fiɲɛ tɔgɔ ko Urakilon.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ye kurun sama. An ma se k'an bɔ a bolo. O ye an bali ka taa ɲɛ, fo an ye an yɛrɛw bila fiɲɛ bolo.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An tɛmɛnna gun misɛn dɔ kɔrɔ, o tɔgɔ ko Kloda. An ye kurun misɛn bila kurunba kɔnɔ, o bilali gɛlɛyara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye o ladon kurunba kɔnɔ, o kɔ, u ye kurun cɛmancɛ siri ni jurukisɛw ye walisa a kana ci. U tun bɛ siran ko kurun na yɛlɛn Sirtɛ cɛncɛnma yɔrɔ kan tuma min na, u ye kurun fini lajigin ka u yɛrɛw bila fiɲɛ bolo.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a sɔrɔ fiɲɛba tun bɛ an tɔɔrɔ kosɛbɛ, o dugusajɛ u ye kurun kɔnɔ doni dɔw fili kɔgɔji la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile sabanan don, u yɛrɛw bolow ye kurun kɔnɔ minɛnw ta ka u fili.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile dama dɔ kɛra, tile ma bɔ, dolow fana ma bɔ, fiɲɛ sɛbɛkɔrɔ cira kosɛbɛ, fo an jigi tun tigɛra ko an tɛna se ka kisi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An mɛnna an ma dumuni kɛ. O tuma la Paul wulila k'i jɔ u cɛma k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Cɛmɔgɔw, ne tun ye lasɔmili kuma min fɔ k'an to Krete, aw tun ka kan ka o lamɛn. An tun tɛna bɔ yen, nin tɔɔrɔ ni nin tiɲɛni ko tun tɛna an sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sisan ne bɛ aw laadi. Aw ka aw ja gɛlɛya, katuguni aw si tɛna tunun, fɔ kurun dɔrɔn.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ ne ye ko: ‘Paul, i kana siran.’ Ko wajibi don ne ka jɔ Romɛ masakɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ. Ko Ala ye ne taamaɲɔgɔnw bɛɛ di ne ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to cɛw, a' ye aw ja gɛlɛya, k'a masɔrɔ ne dara Ala ka kuma la ko a ye min fɔ, o na kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka wajibi don an ka fili gun dɔ kan.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An su tan ni naaninan la, k'an to fiɲɛ bolo taa ka segin la Adriyatike kɔgɔji kan, dugutila fɛ, kurun kɔnɔ baarakɛlaw tun bɛ miiri ko an surunyara gele dɔ la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 27 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye ji suma, u y'a sɔrɔ ko o yɔrɔ dunya tun ye mɛtɛrɛ bisaba ni wolonwula ye. U taara ɲɛ dɔɔnin k'a suma ko kura, u y'a sɔrɔ ko o yɔrɔ dunya tun ye mɛtɛrɛ mugan ni segin ye.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An kisilen kɔ, an y'a sɔrɔ o gun tɔgɔ ko Malte.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yen mɔgɔw ye ko ɲuman min kɛ an ye, o bɔɲɔgɔnko sɔrɔ man di. U ye tasumaba mana ka an bɛɛ wele ka na o kɔrɔ, katuguni sanji tun nana ka nɛnɛba kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul taara dɔgɔ dɔ cɛ ko a b'a bila tasuma la, fɔnfɔnnin bɔra o la funteni kosɔn ka Paul cin ka balan a bolo la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O gun mɔgɔw ye sa dulonnen ye Paul bolo la minkɛ, u y'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: «Nin cɛ ye mɔgɔfagala ye, siga t'a la, hali k'a sɔrɔ a kisira ka bɔ kɔgɔji la. Tiɲɛ ma sɔn a ka balo.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Paul ye a bolo seri, o sa binna tasuma la, foyi ma kɛ Paul la.

[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O gun na mɔgɔba min tɔgɔ ko Publius, o ka forow tun ka surun yen na. A ye an minɛ i ko a teriw. A ye an lajigin a ka so tile saba kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An y'a sɔrɔ Publius fa dalen tun bɛ farigan ni tɔgɔtɔgɔnin bolo. Paul donna o yɔrɔ ka Ala deli k'i bolow da a kan, a kɛnɛyara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen kɔ, o gun na banabaatɔ tɔw fana nana, u kɛnɛyara.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu fana ye an bonya kosɛbɛ. An taa tuma selen, an mago tun bɛ fɛn o fɛn na, u ye o bɛɛ di an ma.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalo saba tɛmɛnnen kɔ, an donna Alɛkisandri kurun dɔ kɔnɔ ka taa, o taamashyɛn tun ye Filaninw ye, o tun ye fonɛnɛ kɛ yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An selen Sirakuse, an ye tile saba kɛ yen.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɔlen kɔ yen, an munumununa ka se Rejio. O dugusajɛ fiɲɛ cira ka bɔ worodugu yanfan fɛ, an sera Puzole tile fila kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ye balima dɔw ye yen, u ye an deli ko an ka dɔgɔkun kelen kɛ u fɛ yen. O cogo la an taara Romɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Romɛ balimaw ye an kibaru mɛn ka na an kunbɛn Apius Fɔrum la ani Dunanjiginso Saba la. Paul ye u ye tuma min na, a ye barika da Ala ye ka a ja gɛlɛya.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An selen Romɛ, u sɔnna Paul ka to a dan na, ani sɔrɔdasi kelen min tun b'a kɔlɔsi.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile saba tɛmɛnnen kɔ, Paul ye Romɛ Yahutu mɔgɔbaw wele ka na a yɔrɔ. U ye u lajɛ tuma min na, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Balimaw, ne ma ko jugu si kɛ an siya la, ne ma an bɛnbaw ka laadaw fana tiɲɛ, hali o, ne minɛna Jerusalɛm ka don Romɛkaw bolo.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu ye ne ɲininka minkɛ, u tun b'a fɛ ka ne bila, sabu u ma foyi sɔrɔ ne la min b'a to ne ka kan ka faga.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yahutuw ma sɔn o ma, o de y'a to a tun kɛra wajibi ye ne ka ne ka koɲɛ to Romɛ masakɛ bolo, o tɛ ko ne b'a fɛ ka ne siya sendon mɛnɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn ne ye aw wele ka na ne yɔrɔ walisa ne ka aw ye ka kuma aw fɛ, katuguni Israɛl jigi bɛ min kan, ne sirilen bɛ ni nin jɔlɔkɔ ye o kosɔn.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a fɔ a ye ko: «An ma sɛbɛn si sɔrɔ ka bɔ Jude jamana la i ko la. Balima si fana ma bɔ yen ka kibaru jugu si fɔ i ko la yan.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka an b'a fɛ ka i ka miirili dɔn nin jɛ ko la, katuguni an y'a dɔn ko sɔsɔli bɛ kɛ a la yɔrɔ bɛɛ.»
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ni Paul ye don dɔ sigi. O don na mɔgɔ caman nana a yɔrɔ la. Paul ye kunnafoni di u ma kabini sɔgɔma fo wula fɛ. A ye Ala ka masaya ko fɔ u ye. A tun bɛ Yesu ko fɔ u ye k'a jɛya ka bɔ Musa ka sariya ni kiraw ka kitabuw la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔw sɔnna Paul ka kuma ma, nka dɔw ma sɔn ka da a la.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ka kuma ma bɛn ɲɔgɔn ma minkɛ, u tun bɛ daminɛ ka taa. Sani u ka taa, Paul ye nin kuma fɔ u ye ko: «Ni Senu ye min fɔ aw bɛnbaw ye kira Esayi da la, o ye tiɲɛ ye ko:
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ‘Taa k'a fɔ nin siya ye ko: Aw tulow majɔlen na mɛnni kɛ, nka aw tɛna faamuli kɛ. Aw ɲɛw jɔlen na filɛli kɛ, nka aw tɛna yeli kɛ.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ nin mɔgɔw hakili goyara. U ye u tulow tugu, u ye u ɲɛw tugu, walisa u ɲɛw kana na yeli kɛ, u tulow kana na mɛnni kɛ, u hakili kana na faamuli kɛ, u kana na u yɛlɛma ne fan fɛ, walisa ne ka u kɛnɛya.’
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Paul ye san fila dafalen kɛ a yɛrɛ ka so luwanselen kɔnɔ. Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ taara bɔ a ye, a ye olu bɛɛ ladon.
[BOOK] ACT [CHAPTER] 28 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun bɛ waajuli kɛ Ala ka masaya ko la, ka mɔgɔw kalan Matigi Yesu Krisita ko la ni ja gɛlɛya ye, mɔgɔ si ma a bali.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne Paul bɛ nin sɛbɛn ci, ne min kɛra ciden ye, nka mɔgɔw ma ne ci, o cidenya fana ma bɔ mɔgɔ la, fɔ Yesu Krisita yɛrɛ ani Fa Ala, o min y'a lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balima minnu bɛɛ bɛ ne fɛ yan, ne ni olu bɛ nin sɛbɛn ci Galasi jamana egilisiw ma.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An Fa Ala ni Matigi Yesu Krisita ka nɛɛma ni dususuma di aw ma.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Krisita y'a yɛrɛ di an ka jurumuw kosɔn, walisa ka an tila nin diɲɛ juguman la, ka kɛɲɛ ni an Fa Ala sago ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nɔɔrɔ ka da ale kan badaa-badaa! Amiina.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min ye aw wele Krisita ka nɛɛma barika la, aw ye o bila joona ka aw yɛlɛma Kibaru Duman sifa wɛrɛ fan fɛ, o de ye ne kabakoya haali.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tɛ ko Kibaru Duman wɛrɛ bɛ yen, nka mɔgɔ dɔw b'a kan ka aw hakili ɲaami. Olu b'a fɛ ka Krisita Kibaru Duman yɛlɛma.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni an yɛrɛw wala sankolola mɛlɛkɛ dɔ bɛ Kibaru Duman wɛrɛ fɔ aw ye, min ni an ka fɔlɔ fɔlen tɛ kelen ye, o tigi ka danga!
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An y'a fɔ ka ban cogo min na, ne bɛ segin o kan sisan tun ko: Ni mɔgɔ dɔ ye Kibaru Duman wɛrɛ fɔ aw ye, ni o tɛ aw ka minɛlen ye, o tigi ka danga!
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, ne b'a fɛ ka ne ko diya mɔgɔw ye wa, wala Ala ye? Yala ne b'a fɛ ka mɔgɔw diyaɲekow kɛ wa? Ni ne tun b'a fɛ ka mɔgɔw diyaɲekow kɛ halibi, ne tun tɛna kɛ Krisita ka baaraden ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw, ne b'a fɔ aw ye k'a jɛya ko ne ye Kibaru Duman min fɔ aw ye, o ma bɔ mɔgɔw la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ma o sɔrɔ mɔgɔ fɛ. Mɔgɔ si fana ma ne kalan o la, nka a jirala ne la Yesu Krisita de fɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tun bɛ taama Yahutuw ka diinɛ sira la cogo min na fɔlɔ, aw y'o mɛn. Aw y'a dɔn ko ne tun bɛ tugu Ala ka egilisi nɔfɛ ka a tɔɔrɔ fo ka dama tɛmɛn, walisa ka a tiɲɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tun tɛmɛnna ne filaɲɔgɔn Yahutuw caman kan Yahutuw ka diinɛ kow la. Ne dusu bɛɛ tun bɛ an bɛnbaw ka laada fɔlenw na.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Ala ye ne ɲɛnatɔmɔ sani ne ka bange, ka ne wele a ka baara kama a ka nɛɛma barika la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A diyara a ye ka a Denkɛ jira ne la walisa ne ka o Kibaru Duman fɔ siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw ye tuma min na, o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ ne ma mɔgɔ si ɲininka.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu kɛra cidenw ye ne ɲɛ, ne ma taa olu sɛgɛrɛ Jerusalɛm, nka ne sinna ka taa Arabi jamana la. O kɔ, ne kɔseginna ka taa Damasi.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] San saba tɛmɛnnen kɔ, ne taara Jerusalɛm walisa ne ni Piɛrɛ ka ɲɔgɔn dɔn. Ne ye tile tan ni duuru kɛ a fɛ yen.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne ma ciden tɔw si ye, fɔ Matigi balimakɛ Yakuba.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ ko, ne bɛ nin ko minnu sɛbɛn, nkalon tɛ olu la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, ne taara Siri ni Silisi jamanaw la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O waati bɛɛ la, Krisita ka egilisi minnu bɛ Jude jamanaw la, olu tun ma ne ye ka ne dɔn.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun b'a mɛn dɔrɔn ko min tun tugura u nɔfɛ ka u tɔɔrɔ, k'i gɛlɛya ka dannaya tiɲɛ, ko o bɛ o dannaya ko waajuli kɛ sisan.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la u tun bɛ Ala tanu ne ko la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] San tan ni naani tɛmɛnnen kɔ, ne ni Barnabasi kɔseginna Jerusalɛm. Ne taara ni Tite fana ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne taara ka kɛɲɛ ni Ala ka jirali ye ne la. Ne delila ka Kibaru Duman min waajuli kɛ siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw cɛma, ne y'o bɛɛ jira u ɲɛ mɔgɔw la u dan na, walisa ne ye baara min kɛ ka tɛmɛn, ani ne bɛ baara min kɛ sisan, a kana na sɔrɔ ko ne ye o kɛ fu.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, ne taamaɲɔgɔn Tite min ye Grɛki ye, olu ma o wajibiya ka boloko,
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] hali k'a sɔrɔ balima nkalontigɛla dɔw tun b'a fɛ k'a wajibiya o la. Olu tun y'u dogo ka don an cɛma, walisa an ye hɔrɔnya min sɔrɔ Krisita Yesu la, u ka o tiɲɛ ka sɔrɔ ka an bila jɔnya la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ma u kan minɛ, an ma kolo u ye hali waati kunkurunnin kɔnɔ, walisa Kibaru Duman tiɲɛ ka to aw fɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka minnu jatera ɲɛ mɔgɔw ye, (tiɲɛ la u tun ye o min ye, o tɛ fɛn ye ne ɲɛ na, sabu Ala tɛ mɔgɔ filɛ a kɔkanna fɛ,) minnu jatera ɲɛ mɔgɔw ye, olu kɔni ma foyi fara ne ka Kibaru Duman fɔlen kan.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u yɛrɛw y'a ye ko Ala ye baara kalifa ne ma ko ne ka Kibaru Duman fɔ siya wɛrɛw cɛma, i ko a y'a di Piɛrɛ ma k'a fɔ Yahutuw cɛma cogo min na.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ Ala ye Piɛrɛ labɛn ka kɛ Yahutuw ka ciden ye cogo min na, a ye ne labɛn ka kɛ siya wɛrɛw ka ciden ye ten.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yakuba ni Piɛrɛ ni Yuhana minnu tun jatera i ko samasenw, olu y'a ye ko o baara kalifara ne ma Ala ka nɛɛma barika la tuma min na, olu ye u tɛgɛ don ne ni Barnabasi tɛgɛ k'a jira ko an kɛra jɛɲɔgɔnw ye. U sɔnna an ka taa baara kɛ siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw cɛma, ko olu na taa Yahutuw cɛma.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'an deli dɔrɔn ko an ka an hakili to dannabaa faantanw la. Ne fana ye ne jija ka o kɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Piɛrɛ nalen kɔ Antiose, ne y'a sɔsɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ ɲɛ na, katuguni a jalaki tun don.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sani mɔgɔ dɔw ka se yen ka bɔ Yakuba yɔrɔ, o y'a sɔrɔ a tun bɛ dumuni kɛ siya wɛrɛ balimaw fɛ. Nka olu sera yen tuma min na, a y'i mabɔ u la, a ma sɔn ka dumuni kɛ u fɛ tun, k'a masɔrɔ a siranna bolokolenw ɲɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balima Yahutu tɔw fana ye a ka filankafoya ɲɔgɔn kɛ, fo Barnabasi yɛrɛ lafilila u ka filankafoya fɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne y'a ye ko u tun tɛ taama ka tilen ka kɛɲɛ ni Kibaru Duman tiɲɛ ye tuma min na, ne y'a fɔ Piɛrɛ ye u bɛɛ ɲɛ na ko: «E min ye Yahutu ye, ni e bɛ siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw cogo ta, ka Yahutuw cogo bila, i bɛ se ka siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw karaba ka Yahutuw cogo ta cogo di?»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An kɔni ye Yahutu bangelenw ye, an tɛ siya wɛrɛ mɔgɔw jurumukɛlaw ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, an y'a dɔn ko mɔgɔ si tɛ jo sɔrɔ Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ sariya kɛwalew barika la, fɔ Krisita Yesu dannaya barika la. O de kosɔn an fana dara Krisita Yesu la walisa an ka jo sɔrɔ Krisita dannaya barika la, o kana kɛ sariya kɛwalew nɔ ye, k'a masɔrɔ mɔgɔ si tɛ jo sɔrɔ Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ sariya kɛwalew barika la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, k'an to jo ɲinili la Krisita barika la, ni an yɛrɛw sɔrɔla jurumukɛlaw ye, o kɔrɔ ko Krisita bɛ baara kɛ jurumu ye wa? Ayi dɛrɛ!
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne tun ye fɛn minnu tiɲɛ, ni ne ye olu dila ko kura, ne bɛ ne yɛrɛ jira sariya tiɲɛbaa ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni salen don sariya ta fan fɛ, sariya yɛrɛ fɛ, walisa ne ka ɲɛnamaya Ala ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ni Krisita gengenna jiri la ɲɔgɔn fɛ. Ne ɲɛnama don, ne yɛrɛ tɛ mɛnɛ, Krisita de bɛ ɲɛnamaya ne kɔnɔ. Ne bɛ ɲɛnamaya min na sisan, ne bɛ taama o la Ala Denkɛ dannaya barika la. Ale de ye ne kanu k'a yɛrɛ di ne kosɔn.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tɛ ban Ala ka nɛɛma la, k'a masɔrɔ ni tilennenya bɛ sɔrɔ sariya barika la, Krisita sara fu.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw Galasika hakilintanw! Yesu Krisita gengenni jiri la, o ko jirala aw la k'a jɛya, jɔni ye aw malasa?
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɛ ka nin dɔrɔn de dɔn aw fɛ: Aw ye Ni Senu sɔrɔ sariya kɛwalew barika la wa, wala Kibaru Duman lamɛnni ni a dannaya barika la?
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw dun kɛra hakilintanw ye ten cogo di? Aw y'a daminɛ Ni Senu barika la, sisan aw b'a fɛ k'a dafa aw yɛrɛw barika la wa?
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ye koba minnu sɔrɔ, aw ye olu sɔrɔ fu wa? Nka olu tɛ se ka kɛ fu.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ye Ni Senu di aw ma ka kabakow kɛ aw cɛma tuma min na, a y'o kɛ aw ka sariya kɛwalew kɛli kosɔn wa, wala Kibaru Duman lamɛnni ni a dannaya kosɔn?
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la Kitabu bɛ kuma Ibrahima ko la ko: «A dara Ala ka kuma la, o de jatera a ye tilennenya ye.»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to aw k'a dɔn ko minnu bɛ dannaya sira kan, olu ye Ibrahima bɔnsɔn sɛbɛw ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kitabu kɔnna k'a ye ko Ala na jo di siya tɔw ma dannaya barika la, o de kosɔn a kɔnna k'a Kibaru Duman fɔ Ibrahima ye ko: «Siyaw bɛɛ na duba sɔrɔ e de la.»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to minnu bɛ dannaya sira kan, olu bɛ duba sɔrɔ i ko dannabaa Ibrahima ye duba sɔrɔ cogo min na.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ minnu bɛɛ bɛ sariya kɛwalew sira kan, olu bɛ danga kɔrɔ, katuguni a sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: «Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ tɛ to ka sariya kitabu ko sɛbɛnnenw bɛɛ kɛ, o dangalen bɛ.»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa a jɛlen don ko mɔgɔ si tɛ jo sɔrɔ Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ sariya barika la, katuguni a sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: «Mɔgɔ tilennen na ɲɛnamaya dannaya de barika la.»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya kɔni tɛ dannaya ko ye, k'a masɔrɔ a sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: «Min bɛ sariya ci fɔlenw kɛ, o de na ɲɛnamaya u barika la.»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Krisita ye an kunmabɔ sariya ka danga ma. Ale yɛrɛ kɛra danga ye an nɔ na, k'a masɔrɔ a sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: «Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ dulonna jiri la, o dangalen bɛ.»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛra walisa Ibrahima ye duba min sɔrɔ, o ka lase siyaw bɛɛ ma Yesu Krisita fɛ, walisa Ni Senu min layidu tara, an ka o sɔrɔ dannaya barika la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw, ne bɛna kuma ka kɛɲɛ ni Hadamadenw ka ko kɛcogo ye. Ni mɔgɔ dɔ bɛ layidu ta k'a sigi ko ɲuman, mɔgɔ wɛrɛ tɛ se ka o tiɲɛ wala ka fɛn wɛrɛ fara o kan.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, Ala tun ye layiduw ta Ibrahima ni a bɔnsɔn ye. Kitabu ma kuma a bɔnsɔn caman ko la, ko «bɔnsɔnw,» nka a kumana a bɔnsɔn kelen ko la, ko «a bɔnsɔn,» o ye Krisita de ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɛ ka min fɔ, o filɛ nin ye ko: Ala ye layidu ta k'a sigi ko ɲuman. Sariya min sigira san kɛmɛ naani ni bisaba o layidu talen kɔ, o tɛ se ka o layidu yɛlɛma ka a ko fɔlen tiɲɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ Ala ye ciyɛn min di, ni o tun basigira sariya kan, o tun tɛna kɛ layidu nɔ ye tun, nka Ala y'a di Ibrahima ma ka kɛɲɛ ni a ka layidu ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la sariya sigi kun ye mun ye? A sigira layidu talen kɔ, sariya tiɲɛni kow de kosɔn. A tun ka kan ka to yen fo layidu tara Ibrahima bɔnsɔn min ko la, o ka na. O sariya sigira mɛlɛkɛw fɛ, a tɛmɛnna mɔgɔ bolo fɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min bɛ tɛmɛn mɔgɔ bolo fɛ, o tɛ mɔgɔ kelen ka ko ye, k'a sɔrɔ Ala ye kelenpe de ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yala sariya bɛ Ala ka layiduw kama wa? Ayi dɛrɛ! Sariya min bɛ se ka ɲɛnamaya di mɔgɔw ma, ni o tun sigira, o tuma la mɔgɔw tun na tilennenya sɔrɔ sariya barika la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Kitabu y'a fɔ ko Hadamadenw bɛɛ bɛ jurumu fanga kɔrɔ, walisa layidu nilifɛn min bɛ sɔrɔ Yesu Krisita dannaya fɛ, o ka di a dannabaaw ma.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sani dannaya waati ka se, an tun bɛ sariya ka mara la, an bilara yen ka o dannaya nata jirali makɔnɔ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to sariya kɛra an denmisɛnma bilasirabaa ye ka an lase Krisita ma, walisa an ka jo sɔrɔ Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ dannaya barika la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dannaya waati selen, an tɛ denmisɛnma bilasirabaa bolo tun.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw bɛɛ ye Ala denw ye dannaya de barika la Krisita Yesu la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw minnu bɛɛ batisera Krisita la, aw ye Krisita don aw kan na i ko dulɔki.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn faranfasi tɛ Yahutuw ni siya tɔw cɛ tun, wala jɔnw ni hɔrɔnw, wala cɛw ni musow, k'a masɔrɔ aw bɛɛ ye kelen ye Krisita Yesu la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa ni aw ye Krisita taw ye, aw ye Ibrahima bɔnsɔnw fana ye, ani ciyɛntalaw, ka kɛɲɛ ni Ala ka layidu ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ko: Ka ciyɛntala denmisɛnma to, faranfasi si tɛ a ni jɔn cɛ, hali k'a sɔrɔ a ye fɛn bɛɛ kuntigi ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a denmisɛnma to, a bɛ kɔlɔsibaaw ni ko ɲɛnabɔlaw bolo fo ka se a fa ka waati latigɛlen ma.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An fana bɛ ten. Ka an to denmisɛnya la, an tun bɛ diɲɛ kow ka jɔnya la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka waati dafalen selen, Ala ye a Denkɛ ci ka na. A bangera muso fɛ, a bangera sariya kɔrɔ,
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] walisa a ka sariya kɔrɔ mɔgɔw kunmabɔ walisa an ka don yɔrɔ sɔrɔ Ala denya la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ye Ala denkɛw ye, o de kosɔn Ala ye a Denkɛ Ni ci ka na don an dusukunw na. O Ni bɛ pɛrɛn ko: «Aba, an Fa.»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to i tɛ jɔn ye tun, fɔ denkɛ. Ayiwa, ni i ye denkɛ ye, i ye ciyɛntala fana ye Ala barika la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Waati tɛmɛnnen na, aw tun tɛ Ala dɔn. Aw tun bɛ minnu ka jɔnya la, olu tɛ batofɛn sɛbɛw ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sisan, kabini aw ye Ala dɔn, ayi, kabini aw dɔnna Ala fɛ, aw bɛ kɔsegin o ko fu barikantanw ma cogo di? Aw b'a fɛ ka don olu ka jɔnya la ko kura cogo di?
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw bɛ donw ni kalow ni waatiw ni sanw bila!
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ siran aw ko la ko a kana na sɔrɔ ne ye baara kɛ aw kosɔn fu.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw, ne bɛ aw deli ko aw ka kɛ i ko ne, katuguni ne fana bɛ i ko aw. Aw ma ne tɔɲɔ foyi la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw y'a dɔn ko ne taa ko fɔlɔ ka Kibaru Duman fɔ aw ye, o y'a sɔrɔ ne tun man kɛnɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ye kɔrɔbɔli sɔrɔ ne ka bana kosɔn, o bɛɛ n'a ta aw ma ne mafiɲɛya wala ka ɲigin ne la, nka aw ye ne minɛ i ko Ala ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ, wala Krisita Yesu yɛrɛ.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw nisɔndiyalen tun don ne ko la kosɛbɛ. Nka o nisɔndiya dun bɛ min? K'a masɔrɔ ne ye aw seere ye ko ni a tun bɛ se ka kɛ, aw tun na aw yɛrɛw ɲɛw bɔ ka u di ne ma.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye tiɲɛ fɔ aw ye, o de kosɔn ne kɛra aw jugu ye sisan wa?
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɔgɔw jijalen don aw ko la, nka u ka miiriliw man ɲi. U b'a fɛ ka an ni aw fara ka bɔ ɲɔgɔn na, walisa aw ka jija u ko la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jijali kɔni ka ɲi ko ɲuman ta fan fɛ, tuma bɛɛ. O kana kɛ ka ne to aw cɛma dɔrɔn.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ka denmisɛnw, ne bɛ tin na aw kosɔn ko kura, fo Krisita ka kɛ aw kɔnɔ sɛbɛ la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tun b'a fɛ ka ne yɛrɛ sɔrɔ aw cɛma sisan, walisa ne ka se ka ne kuma cogo yɛlɛma, sabu ne sigalen don aw ko la!
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' y'a fɔ ne ye, aw minnu b'a fɛ ka kɛ sariya kɔrɔ, yala aw tɛ sariya kuma lamɛn wa?
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko denkɛ fila tun bɛ Ibrahima fɛ. Kelen tun ye a ka jɔnmuso den ye, a tɔ kelen tun ye a ka hɔrɔnmuso den ye.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jɔnmuso denkɛ bangera farisogo barika la. Hɔrɔnmuso denkɛ bangera Ala ka layidu barika la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kɔrɔ wɛrɛ bɛ o ko la: O muso fila ye layidu fila bisigiw ye. Kelen ye Agar ye, o ye Sinayi kulu bisigi ye. A bɛ denw bange jɔnya la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Agar ye Sinayi kulu ye Arabi jamana la. O bɛ kɛɲɛ ni Jerusalɛm sisanlama ye, k'a masɔrɔ a ni a denw bɛ jɔnya la.
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sanfɛ Jerusalɛm ye hɔrɔnmuso ye, o de ye an bɛɛ ba ye.

[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni balimaw, aw ye layidudenw ye i ko Isaka.

[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Kitabu bɛ mun fɔ? A ko: «I ka jɔnmuso ni a denkɛ gɛn, k'a masɔrɔ jɔnmuso denkɛ ni hɔrɔnmuso denkɛ tɛna ciyɛn ta ɲɔgɔn fɛ.»
[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn balimaw, an tɛ jɔnmuso denw ye, fɔ hɔrɔnmuso denw.

[BOOK] GAL [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ ko minnu man di Ni Senu ye, farisogo ɲɛ bɛ bɔ olu fɛ. Ko minnu ka di farisogo ye, Ni Senu tɛ olu fɛ fewu. U bɛ ɲɔgɔn kɛlɛ, walisa aw b'a fɛ ka ko minnu kɛ, aw kana olu kɛ.

[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a ɲininka ko: «Ayiwa, a bɛ di? I ye Eli ye wa?» Yuhana ko: «Ayi, ne tɛ o ye.» U ko: «I ye o kira ye wa?» A ye u jaabi ko: «Ayi.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ayiwa, i ye min ye, o fɔ an ye, walisa an ka jaabili lase an cibaaw ma. I bɛ mun fɔ i yɛrɛ ko la?»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ye u jaabi ko: «‘Cɛ min bɛ pɛrɛn kungokolon kɔnɔ ko: A' ye Matigi ka sira latilen!’ ne ye o tigi kan de ye,» i ko kira Esayi y'a fɔ cogo min na.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu cira ka taa Yuhana fɛ, Farisiɛn dɔw tun don,
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] olu y'a ɲininka ko: «Ni i tɛ Krisita ye, wala Eli, wala o kira, mun y'a to i bɛ batiseli kɛ?»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ye u jaabi ko: «Ne kɔni bɛ batiseli kɛ ji la, nka dɔ bɛ aw cɛma, aw tɛ o tigi dɔn.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale bɛ na ne kɔ, nka ne man kan ni a ka sabara juru fonili ye.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kow bɛɛ kɛra Bɛtani, Jurdɛn ba kɔfɛ, Yuhana tun bɛ batiseli kɛ yɔrɔ min na.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, Yuhana ye Yesu natɔ ye a ma, a ko: «Ala ka Sagaden min bɛ diɲɛ ka jurumu ta k'a bɔ yen, o filɛ.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kumana cɛ min ko la ko min bɛ na ne kɔ, o kɛra ne ɲɛ, katuguni a tun bɛ yen sani ne ka bange, nin don.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni tun ma ale dɔn, nka ne nana batiseli kɛ ji la walisa a ka jira Israɛl la.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ye seereya kɛ ko: «Ne ye Ni Senu jigintɔ ye ka bɔ sankolo la i ko jɛnɛntuban, o nana sigi a kan.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni tun ma ale dɔn, nka Ala, o min ye ne ci ko ne ka batiseli kɛ ji la, o y'a fɔ ko, ne mana Ni Senu jigintɔ ye ka sigi cɛ min kan, o de bɛ batiseli kɛ Ni Senu la.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne y'a ye ka seereya kɛ ko, nin ye Ala Denkɛ de ye.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, Yuhana ni a ka kalandenw la fila jɔlen tun bɛ yen ko kura,
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] a ye Yesu tɛmɛntɔ ye. A ko: «Ala ka Sagaden filɛ!»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ka o kalanden fila y'a ka kuma mɛn minkɛ, u tugura Yesu nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'i yɛlɛma ka u tugulen ye a nɔfɛ, a y'u ɲininka ko: «Aw bɛ mun de ɲini?» U y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Rabi, (o kɔrɔ, Karamɔgɔ,) i jiginnen bɛ min?»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye u jaabi ko: «A' ye na a filɛ.» U taara a fɛ, u y'a jiginyɔrɔ ye, ka tile tɔ kɛ a fɛ yen. O y'a sɔrɔ tile suma tuma tun don.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kalanden fila minnu ye Yuhana ka kuma mɛn ka tugu Yesu nɔfɛ, u la kelen tun ye Andre ye, Simɔn Pierɛ balimakɛ don.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Andre fɔlɔ taara Simɔn sɛgɛrɛ k'a fɔ a ye ko: «An ye Masiya ye.» (O kɔrɔ, Krisita.)
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye Simɔn ɲɛminɛ ka taa Yesu yɔrɔ. Yesu ye Simɔn mafilɛ, a ko: «I ye Yuhana denkɛ Simɔn ye, i tɔgɔ na da Sefas.» (O kɔrɔ, Pierɛ wala farakurun.)
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, Yesu y'a latigɛ ko a bɛ taa Galile jamana la. A ni Filipe bɛnna, a y'a fɔ o ye ko: «Tugu ne nɔfɛ!»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] (Filipe tun ye Bɛtisayidaka ye, Andre ni Pierɛ fana bɔra o dugu la.)
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Filipe ye Natanaɛl ye k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Musa ye sɛbɛnni kɛ min ko la sariya la, ni kiraw fana ye sɛbɛnni kɛ a ko la, an y'o ye. Yusufu denkɛ Yesu don, ka bɔ Nazarɛti.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Natanaɛl y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Fɛn ɲuman bɛ se ka bɔ Nazarɛti wa?» Filipe y'a jaabi ko: «Na a filɛ.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye Natanaɛl natɔ ye a ma tuma min na, a ko: «Israɛl mɔgɔ sɛbɛ dɔ filɛ, nanbara si t'a la!»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Natanaɛl y'a ɲininka ko: «I ye ne dɔn yɔrɔ jumɛn?» Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Ne ɲɛ tun b'i la k'i to torosun kɔrɔ, sani Filipe ka i wele.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Natanaɛl y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, i ye Ala Denkɛ ye, i ye Israɛl ka masakɛ ye!»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Ne y'a fɔ i ye ko ne ɲɛ tun b'i la k'i to torosun kɔrɔ, o de kosɔn i ye dannaya kɛ wa? I na kobaw ye ka tɛmɛn ninnu kan!»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 51 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko fana: «Tiɲɛ tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: Aw na sankolo dayɛlɛlen ye, ka Ala ka mɛlɛkɛw yɛlɛntɔ ni u jigintɔ ye Mɔgɔ Denkɛ kan!»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kow kɛli tile sabanan don, kɔɲɔ dɔ kɛra Kana, o ye Galile dugu dɔ ye. Yesu ba tun bɛ yen.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ni a ka kalandenw fana welelen tun bɛ o kɔɲɔ la.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Diwɛn dɛsɛra tuma min na, Yesu ba y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Diwɛn tɛ u fɛ.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Muso, i bɛ mun de ɲini ne fɛ? Ne ka waati ma se fɔlɔ.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ba y'a fɔ baaradenw ye ko: «A mana fɛn o fɛn fɔ aw ye, a' ye o bɛɛ kɛ.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, kaba daga wɔɔrɔ tun bɛ yen Yahutuw ka koli kama, ka kɛɲɛ ni u ka saniyali laadaw ye. Filenba ɲɛ duuru wala wɔɔrɔ ji tun bɛ kɛ o dagaw bɛɛ kelen-kelen kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ baaradenw ye ko: «A' ye nin dagaw fa ji la.» Olu ye u fa fo u da la.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye dɔ soli sisan, ka taa a di dumuni tilabaaw kuntigi ma.» U taara n'a ye.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ji min yɛlɛmana ka kɛ diwɛn ye, dumuni tilabaaw kuntigi y'o nɛnɛ. A ma o diwɛn bɔ yɔrɔ dɔn, nka baaraden minnu ye ji soli, olu kɔni tun b'a bɔ yɔrɔ dɔn. Dumuni tilabaaw kuntigi ye kɔɲɔcɛ wele
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Mɔgɔw bɛɛ delila ka diwɛn bɛɛ la ɲuman di mɔgɔw ma fɔlɔ. Ni u ye caman min, o kɔ, diwɛn min ka ɲi dɔɔnin, o bɛ sɔrɔ ka di u ma. E dun ye diwɛn bɛɛ la ɲuman mara fo sisan!»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛra Yesu ka taamashyɛn kɛlenw fɔlɔ ye, a y'o kɛ Galile Kana k'a nɔɔrɔ jira. A ka kalandenw dara a la.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen kɔ, a taara Kapɛrnaum, a ni a ba ni a balimakɛw ani a ka kalandenw. U ye tile dama dɔ kɛ yen.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw ka Tɛmɛnkan seli surunyalen, Yesu taara Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ minnu tun bɛ misiw ni sagaw ani jɛnɛntubanw feere, a ye olu sɔrɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, ani wari falennaw, u sigilen tun bɛ u ka tabaliw kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye jurukisɛw kɛ gɛɲɛ ye ka u bɛɛ gɛn ka bɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, ani u ka sagaw ni u ka misiw. A ye wari falennaw ka wari fili duguma ka u ka tabaliw dabiri.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ jɛnɛntuban feerebaaw ye ko: «A' ye nin fɛnw bɔ yan! Aw kana ne Fa ka so kɛ jagokɛ yɔrɔ ye!»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka kalandenw hakili jiginna Kitabu kuma la min b'a fɔ ko: «I ka so ko ka di ne ye haali, a hami bɛ ne la kosɛbɛ.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw y'a ɲininka ko: «I bɛ se ka taamashyɛn jumɛn kɛ k'a jira an na ko jo bɛ i fɛ ka nin kow kɛ?»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «A' ye nin Alabatosoba ci, ne n'a jɔ ko kura tile saba kɔnɔ.»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw y'a fɔ a ye ko: «San binaani ni wɔɔrɔ de kɛra nin Alabatosoba jɔli la, e dun bɛna a jɔ ko kura tile saba kɔnɔ cogo di?»
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu kan tun bɛ Alabatosoba min ma, o tun ye a yɛrɛ farikolo de ye.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu kununlen kɔ ka bɔ suw cɛma, a ka kalandenw hakili jiginna a la ko a tun ye o kow fɔ, u dara Kitabu ni Yesu ka kuma fɔlenw la.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to Jerusalɛm, Tɛmɛnkan seli waati la, mɔgɔ caman y'a ka taamashyɛn kɛlenw ye minkɛ, u dara a la.
[BOOK] JHN [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu m'a yɛrɛ to u bolo, katuguni a ye u bɛɛ dɔn.
