[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye yɛlɛ bɔ a ma. O tuma la a ye u bɛɛ labɔ kɛnɛma. Denmuso tun bɛ bon min kɔnɔ, a donna yen ni den fa ni a ba ani a ka kalanden saba ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye dennin ta a bolo ma k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Talita, kumi,» o kɔrɔ, «Dennin, ne b'a fɔ i ye, wuli.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, dennin wulila ka taama. A si tun ye san tan ni fila de ye. U kabakoyara kosɛbɛ haali.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'a fɔ u ye k'a gɛlɛya u ma ko mɔgɔ si kana o dɔn. O kɔ, a y'a fɔ u ye ko u ka dumuni di a ma.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bɔra o yɔrɔ la, a mɔna dugu min na, a taara yen. A ka kalandenw taara a fɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A donna Alabatoso kɔnɔ lafiɲɛ don na k'a daminɛ ka mɔgɔw kalan. Mɔgɔ caman y'a lamɛn, u kabakoyara. U tun b'a fɔ ko: «A ye nin kow sɔrɔ min? Nin hakilitigiya min dira a ma, o ye mun ye? Nin kabakow bɛ kɛ a fɛ cogo di?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mariyama denkɛ jiridɛsɛla tɛ nin ye wa? A balimakɛw tɛ Yakuba ni Jose ni Jude ani Simɔn ye wa? A balimamusow tɛ an fɛ yan wa?» O miirili de y'a to u ma da a la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Kira bɛ bonya yɔrɔ bɛɛ, fɔ a yɛrɛ ka dugu kɔnɔ ani a balimaw cɛma ani a yɛrɛ ka so.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ma se ka kabako si kɛ yen nin kɔ, a y'a bolow da banabaatɔ dɔw kan ka u kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ka dannabaliya ye Yesu kabakoya. O kɔ, Yesu taara mɔgɔw kalan dafɛ duguw la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye a ka kalanden tan ni fila wele ka u ci fila-fila. A ye fanga di u ma jinɛw kan.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye nin ci fɔ u ye ko: «Aw kana foyi ta fɔ bere dama. Aw kana sirafana ta, wala dugutaa minɛn. Aw kana wari bila aw kun.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka sabara don aw senw na, nka aw kana dulɔki fila don.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ni aw ye jatigila sɔrɔ yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ, a' ye to yen fo aw taa tuma ka se.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni yɔrɔ dɔ mɔgɔw ma sɔn ka aw ladon, wala ka aw lamɛn, aw bɔtɔ ka aw senna buguri yuguyugu yen. O na kɛ seereya ye ka u lasɔmi.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalandenw taara ka waajuli kɛ ko mɔgɔw ka nimisa u ka jurumuw la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye jinɛ caman gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la, ka tulu mun banabaatɔ caman la ka u kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Masakɛ Hɛrɔde ye Yesu ko mɛn, katuguni Yesu tɔgɔ tun bɔra yɔrɔ bɛɛ la. Mɔgɔ dɔw tun b'a fɔ ko: «Yuhana Batiselikɛla kununna ka bɔ suw cɛma. O de y'a to a bɛ se ka o kabakow kɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔw tun b'a fɔ ko Eli don. Dɔw fana ko kira dɔ don, i ko fɔlɔ kiraw la kelen.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde ye o mɛn tuma min na, a ko: «Ne ye Yuhana min kunkolo tigɛ, o don. A kununna ka bɔ suw cɛma.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde yɛrɛ tun ye ci bila ka Yuhana minɛ k'a siri k'a bila kaso la, katuguni Yuhana tun ye a kɔrɔfɔ ko: «A dagalen tɛ i ye ka i balimakɛ muso furu.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana tun y'o fɔ, katuguni Hɛrɔde ye a yɛrɛ balimakɛ Filipe muso Hɛrɔdiyas furu.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔdiyas diminna Yuhana kɔrɔ kosɛbɛ, a tun b'a fɛ k'a faga, nka a tun tɛ se Hɛrɔde kosɔn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde tun bɛ siran Yuhana ɲɛ, k'a masɔrɔ a y'a dɔn ko mɔgɔ ɲuman senuma don. A y'a mara ko ɲuman. Ka Yuhana to kuma la, Hɛrɔde hakili tun bɛ ɲaami, nka a tun ka di a ye ka Yuhana lamɛn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Hɛrɔdiyas ye don bɛnnen sɔrɔ. Hɛrɔde bangedon kunbɛn na, Hɛrɔde ye dumuniba dila a ka gɔfɛrɛnaman mɔgɔw ye, ani a ka sɔrɔdasi kuntigiw ani Galile mɔgɔbaw ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔdiyas denmuso donna u yɔrɔ ka dɔn kɛ. O diyara Hɛrɔde ni a ka mɔgɔ welelenw ye. O kɛlen, masakɛ y'a fɔ o denmuso ye ko: «I bɛ fɛn o fɛn fɛ, o fɔ ne ye, ne na o di i ma.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'i kali ko: «Ni i ye fɛn o fɛn ɲini ne fɛ, ne na o di i ma, hali ne ka masaya tilancɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Denmuso bɔra ka taa a ba ɲininka ko: «Ne ka mun deli?» A y'a jaabi ko: «Yuhana Batiselikɛla kunkolo.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ denmuso y'i teliya ka kɔsegin masakɛ yɔrɔ k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ne b'a fɛ i ka Yuhana Batiselikɛla kunkolo di ne ma minɛn dɔ kɔnɔ sisan.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Masakɛ ɲɛnasisira kosɛbɛ, nka a ma sɔn k'i ban a ma a ka kalilikan kosɔn a ka mɔgɔ welelenw ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ a ye sɔrɔdasi kelen ci ko a ka na ni Yuhana kunkolo ye. Sɔrɔdasi bɔra ka taa kaso la ka Yuhana kunkolo tigɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A nana n'o ye minɛn dɔ kɔnɔ k'a di denmuso ma. O taara a di a ba ma.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ka kalandenw ye o ko mɛn minkɛ, u taara ka a su ta k'a don kaburu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw ye mɔgɔw kalan ka ko minnu kɛ, u kɔseginna ka o kow bɛɛ lakali Yesu ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nabaaw ni taabaaw tun ka ca, fo Yesu ni a ka kalandenw ma waati sɔrɔ ka dumuni kɛ. O de kosɔn a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye na an ka taa kungo kɔnɔ yɔrɔ dɔ la an dan na walisa aw ka lafiya dɔɔnin.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ ka taa kungokolon yɔrɔ dɔ la u dan na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka mɔgɔ caman ye u taatɔ ye ka u dɔn. Olu bolila ka taa yen u sen na ka bɔ duguw bɛɛ la, ka kɔn Yesu ni a ka kalandenw ɲɛ yen.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bɔra kurun kɔnɔ tuma min na, a ye o jamaba ye. U hinɛ donna a la, k'a masɔrɔ o mɔgɔw tun bɛ i ko gɛnbaa tɛ saga minnu la. A y'a daminɛ ka u kalan fɛn caman na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile jiginnen kɔ, Yesu ka kalandenw gɛrɛla a la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Tile bɛ ɲini ka ban. An bɛ kungokolon la yan.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw labila walisa u ka taa an dafɛ bugufyɛw la ani duguw kɔnɔ ka dumunifɛn san.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Aw yɛrɛw ka dumuni di u ma.» U y'a fɔ a ye ko: «An ka taa nbuuru san ni wari dɛɲɛ kɛmɛ fila ye k'a di u ma wa?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Nbuurukun joli bɛ aw fɛ? A' ye taa a lajɛ.» U taara a filɛ minkɛ, u y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Nbuurukun duuru ani jɛgɛ fila.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko u ka jama lasigi kulu-kulu bin kɛnɛ kan.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye u sigi kɛmɛ-kɛmɛ ni biduuru-duuru.

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni u kɔseginna ka bɔ sugu la, u tun tɛ dumuni kɛ ni u ma ko fɔlɔ. U tun bɛ laada ko caman wɛrɛw kɛ, i n'a fɔ jifilen koli ni daga ni nsiranɛgɛ minɛnw ani kalaka koli.

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛ ne bato fu. U ka kalan ye mɔgɔw ka ci fɔlenw dama ye.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw bɛ Ala ka ci fɔlenw bila ka mɔgɔw ka laadaw kɛ.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Musa ko: ‘I ka i fa ni i ba bonya.’ A ko fana: ‘Min ye kuma jugu fɔ a fa wala a ba ma, o tigi ka kan ka faga.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka aw kɔni b'a fɔ ko ni mɔgɔ dɔ b'a fɔ a fa wala a ba ye ko a tun bɛ se ka u dɛmɛ ni a ka nafolo min ye, o ye kɔrban ye, (o kɔrɔ, a dira Ala ma),
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] aw t'a to a ka a fa ni a ba dɛmɛ tun.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la aw bɛ Ala ka kuma kɛ fu ye ni aw ka laadaw ye. Aw bɛ o bɔɲɔgɔnko caman kɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye jama wele ko kura k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw bɛɛ ka ne lamɛn ka faamuli kɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛn o fɛn bɛ don mɔgɔ kɔnɔ, o si tɛ se k'a nɔgɔ. Nka min bɛ bɔ a dusu la, o de b'a nɔgɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] [Tulo bɛ min fɛ ka lamɛnni kɛ, o ka lamɛnni kɛ dɛ.]»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bɔra jama kɔrɔ ka don so kɔnɔ. A ka kalandenw y'a ɲininka o ntalen kɔrɔ la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw fana, aw ma hakili sɔrɔ wa? Aw m'a faamu ko min bɛ don mɔgɔ kɔnɔ, o tɛ se k'a nɔgɔ,
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ o tɛ don a dusu la, nka a bɛ don a kɔnɔbara la, o kɔ, a bɛ taa banakɔ?» O kuma de fɛ Yesu y'a jira ko dumunifɛn bɛɛ jɛlen don.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ fana ko: «Min bɛ bɔ mɔgɔ kɔnɔ, o de b'a nɔgɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ kɔnɔ, o kɔrɔ, a dusukun, miirili juguw bɛɛ bɛ bɔ yen, ani kakalaya ni sonyali ni mɔgɔfaga
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ni jatɔya ni wasabaliya ni juguya ni mɔgɔ lafilili ni janburuya ni keleya ni tɔgɔ tiɲɛni ni yɛrɛjiranciya ani hakilintanya.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O fɛn juguw bɛɛ bɛ bɔ mɔgɔ kɔnɔ, olu de b'a nɔgɔ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu wulila ka bɔ o yɔrɔ la ka taa Tir dugu da fɛ. A donna so dɔ kɔnɔ. A tun t'a fɛ mɔgɔ si k'a dɔn ko a bɛ yen, nka a ma se ka dogo.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso dɔ y'a kibaru mɛn, jinɛ tun bɛ o denmuso la. O muso nana ka i bin Yesu sen kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O muso tun ye dunan ye, a bangera Sirɔ-Fenisi jamana la. A ye Yesu deli ko a ka jinɛ gɛn ka bɔ a denmuso la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «A to denw ka dumuni kɛ k'u fa fɔlɔ, katuguni a tɛ bɛn ka denw ka dumuni fili wuludenw kɔrɔ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso y'a jaabi ko: «Tiɲɛ don, Matigi, nka wuluden minnu bɛ tabali kɔrɔ, olu bɛ denw ka dumuni murumuru dɔw dun.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O la Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «O kuma kosɔn i ka kɔsegin so, jinɛ bɔra i denmuso la.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A kɔseginna so ka a den dalen ye kalaka kan, jinɛ tun bɔra a la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bɔra Tir da fɛ ka tɛmɛn Sidɔn fɛ ka Dekapole jamana cɛtigɛ ka se Galile ba da la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔw taara Yesu sɛgɛrɛ ni cɛ sigisigitɔ tulogeren dɔ ye ka a deli ko a ka a bolo da o kan.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu taara ni o cɛ ye a dan na ka i mabɔ jama la. A ye a bolonkɔniw don o cɛ tulow rɔ ka daji tu ka maga a nɛnkun na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu ye a ɲɛ kɔrɔta san fɛ ka a ninakili sama k'a fɔ o cɛ ye ko: «Efata,» o kɔrɔ ko, «Da yɛlɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, cɛ tulow da yɛlɛla, a nɛnjuru fonina, a kumana k'a jɛya.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u bɛɛ ye k'a gɛlɛya ko u kana o ko fɔ mɔgɔ si ye, nka a y'a gɛlɛya u ma cogo o cogo, u ye dɔ fara u ka welewele dali kan.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw kabakoyara kosɛbɛ, u tun b'a fɔ ko: «A ka ko kɛlenw bɛɛ ka ɲi haali. A b'a to tulogerenw bɛ mɛnni kɛ, bobow bɛ kuma.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O donw la, jamaba y'u lajɛ ko kura. Dumunifɛn tun tɛ u fɛ. Yesu ye a ka kalandenw wele k'a fɔ u ye ko:
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Nin mɔgɔw hinɛ bɛ ne la, k'a masɔrɔ bi ye u tile saba ye ne fɛ yan, dumunifɛn si tɛ u fɛ tun.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni ne bɛ u dumunikɛbali labila ka taa, u barika na dɛsɛ sira la, k'a masɔrɔ u dɔw bɔ yɔrɔ ka jan.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka kalandenw y'a jaabi ko: «An bɛ se ka dumuni sɔrɔ yɔrɔ jumɛn ka ninnu bɛɛ fa kungokolon kɔnɔ yan?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u ɲininka ko: «Nbuurukun joli bɛ aw fɛ?» U y'a jaabi ko: «Wolonwula.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, a ko jama k'i sigi duguma. A ye o nbuurukun wolonwula ta ka barika da Ala ye k'u karikari k'u di a ka kalandenw ma, olu k'u tila jama cɛ. Kalandenw y'u tila jama cɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jɛgɛ misɛn dɔw tun bɛ u fɛ fana. Yesu ye barika da Ala ye olu kosɔn k'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko u ka olu fana tila u cɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Bɛɛ ye dumuni kɛ k'u fa. Kalandenw ye segi wolonwula fa dumuni kunkurun tɔ tolenw la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dumunikɛlaw tun ye mɔgɔ waa naani ɲɔgɔn ye. O kɔ, Yesu ye u labila.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, a ni a ka kalandenw donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ ka taa Dalmanuta jamana la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛnw taara ka sɔsɔli daminɛ Yesu fɛ. U ko Yesu ka taamashyɛn kabakoma dɔ jira ka bɔ sankolo la. U ye o fɔ walisa u ka a kɔrɔbɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye a ninakili sama kosɛbɛ k'a fɔ ko: «Mun na bi mɔgɔw bɛ kabako ɲini? Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye, kabako si tɛna jira u la.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a bɔra u kɔrɔ ka don kurun kɔnɔ ko kura ka taa ba kɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalandenw tun ɲinɛna, u ma dumunifɛn ta. Foyi tun tɛ u fɛ kurun kɔnɔ fɔ nbuurukun kelenpe.

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: «A y'o fɔ k'a masɔrɔ nbuuru tɛ an fɛ.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ɲɛ bɛ aw fɛ, aw tɛ yeli kɛ wa? Tulo bɛ aw fɛ, aw tɛ mɛnni kɛ wa? Aw hakili tɛ to fɛn na wa?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye nbuurukun duuru karikari k'u di mɔgɔ waa duuru ma tuma min na, aw ye segi joli fa ni o nbuuru kunkurun tɔ tolenw ye?» U y'a jaabi ko: «Tan ni fila.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U selen Bɛtisayida, o yɔrɔ la mɔgɔ dɔw taara Yesu sɛgɛrɛ ni fiyentɔ dɔ ye k'a deli ko a ka maga o la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye fiyentɔ minɛ a bolo ma, ka taa n'a ye dugu kɔfɛ. A ye daji kɛ o cɛ ɲɛw la k'a bolo da a kan k'a ɲininka ko: «I bɛ fɛn ye wa?»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a bila ka taa so k'a fɔ a ye ko: «I kana don dugu kɔnɔ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ni a ka kalandenw taara Sesare Filipe dafɛ dugu la. Ka u to sira kan, Yesu ye a ka kalandenw ɲininka ko: «Mɔgɔw b'a fɔ ko ne ye jɔn ye?»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a gɛlɛya u ma ko u kana o ko fɔ mɔgɔ si ye.

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye tun ko: «Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko mɔgɔ minnu bɛ yan, u dɔw tɛna sa sani u ka Ala ka masaya natɔ ye ni sebaaya ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ tile wɔɔrɔ, Yesu taara ni Piɛrɛ ni Yakuba ani Yuhana ye kulu jan dɔ kan u dan na. A cogo yɛlɛmana u ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka finiw manamanana ka jɛya cogo min na, mɔgɔ si tɛ dugukolo kan min bɛ se ka fɛn jɛya ka o bɔ.

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye denmisɛn dɔ ta k'a jɔ u cɛma, k'a ta a kɔnkɔn na, k'a fɔ u ye ko:

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana y'a fɔ Yesu ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, an ye cɛ dɔ ye, a bɛ jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la i tɔgɔ la. An y'a fɔ a ye ko a kana o kɛ, katuguni a ma kɛ an dɔ ye.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Nin denmisɛn minnu bɛ da ne la, mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ olu dɔ kunnatiɲɛ, a tun ka fisa o ma ni kabakurun belebeleba sirila a kan na, k'a fili kɔgɔji la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔ la, ‘u ntumu tɛ sa, o tasuma tɛ dufa.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ na kɔrɔbɔ tasuma fɛ, i ko kɔgɔ bɛ kɛ sarakaw bɛɛ la cogo min na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Kɔgɔ ka ɲi, nka ni a timiya bɔra a la, i na mun kɛ ka a timiya tun? Kɔgɔ ka kɛ aw yɛrɛw la, hɛrɛ ka kɛ aw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu wulila ka bɔ yen ka taa Jude jamana la ani Jurdɛn ba kɔfɛ. Jama nana u lajɛ a kɔrɔ tun. A ye u kalan i ko a delila ka a kɛcogo min na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛn dɔw gɛrɛla a la k'a ɲininka walisa u ka a dakɔrɔbɔ, u ko: «A dagalen bɛ cɛ ka a muso furu sa wa?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Musa ye mun ci fɔ aw ye?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ko: «Musa sɔnna an ka furu sa sɛbɛn kɛ, o kɔ ka muso bila.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka kabini diɲɛ daminɛ, Ala ye u kɛ cɛ ni muso ye,
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] o de kosɔn cɛ na a fa ni a ba bila ka nɔrɔ a muso la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U fila na kɛ farisogo kelen ye. O cogo la u tɛ fila ye tun, fɔ kelen.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ye min kɛ kelen ye, mɔgɔ si kana o fara.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U donnen so kɔnɔ, kalandenw ye Yesu ɲininka furu sa ko la tun.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ a muso furu sa ka dɔ wɛrɛ furu, o bɛ jatɔya kɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la ni muso bɛ a cɛ bila ka furu cɛ wɛrɛ ma, o bɛ jatɔya kɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw nana Yesu yɔrɔ ni denmisɛn dɔw ye walisa a ka maga u la, nka kalandenw ye u kɔrɔfɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye o ye minkɛ, a diminna. A y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «A' y'a to denmisɛnw ka na ne ma, aw kana u bali, katuguni Ala ka masaya ye olu bɔɲɔgɔnkow de ta ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye, mɔgɔ min tɛ Ala ka masaya minɛ i ko denmisɛn, o tɛna don a la fewu.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a ye denmisɛnw ta a kɔnkɔn na, ka a bolow da u kan ka dubaw kɛ u ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu taatɔ sira fɛ, cɛ dɔ bolila ka i ɲɔngiri a kɔrɔ, k'a ɲininka ko: «Karamɔgɔ ɲuman, ne ka kan ka mun kɛ walisa ne ka ɲɛnamaya banbali sɔrɔ?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Mun na i bɛ ne wele ɲuman? ɲuman si tɛ, Ala kelen kɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I bɛ ci fɔlenw dɔn ko: ‘I kana mɔgɔ faga. I kana jatɔya kɛ. I kana sonyali kɛ. I kana nkalon da i mɔgɔ ɲɔgɔn na. I kana mɔgɔ si tɔɲɔ. I ka i fa ni i ba bonya.’»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ ko: «Karamɔgɔ, ne ye o ci fɔlenw bɛɛ mara kabini ne denmisɛnma.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a mafilɛ ni kanuya ye k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Fɛn kelen b'i jɛ. Taa i bolofɛnw bɛɛ feere ka o wari di faantanw ma. O tuma la, i na nafoloba sɔrɔ sankolo la. O kɔ, na tugu ne la.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ ɲɛ kumuna o kuma kosɔn. A ɲɛnasisilen taara, k'a masɔrɔ nafoloba tun b'a fɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye a kɛrɛw filɛ, k'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «Nafolobatigi donni ka gɛlɛn Ala ka masaya la kosɛbɛ.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u filɛ k'a fɔ u ye ko: «O tɛ se ka kɛ mɔgɔw fɛ, nka o bɛ se ka kɛ Ala fɛ, katuguni Ala tɛ kɛɲɛ foyi la.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun bɛ sira kan ka taa Jerusalɛm. Yesu tun bɛ a ka kalandenw ɲɛfɛ, kalandenw hakili ɲaaminen tun don. U nɔfɛ mɔgɔw sirannen tun don. Yesu taara ni a ka tan ni fila ye u dan na ko kura. Ko min bɛna kɛ a la, a y'a daminɛ ka o fɔ u ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «An taatɔ filɛ Jerusalɛm, Mɔgɔ Denkɛ na don sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ani sariya karamɔgɔw bolo yen. U na a jalaki ko a ka kan ni saya ye k'a don Ala dɔnbaliw bolo.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu na yɛlɛ bɔ a ma ka daji tu a kan k'a bugɔ ni gɛɲɛ ye k'a faga. A tile sabanan don, a na kunun.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Zebede denkɛw Yakuba ni Yuhana gɛrɛla Yesu la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, an bɛna fɛn min deli i fɛ, an b'a fɛ i ka o kɛ an ye.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An fa Dawuda ka masaya min natɔ don, Ala ka duba o ye. Tanuli ka kɛ Ala ye sanfɛ yɔrɔ kɔrɔtalenbaw la.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu donna Jerusalɛm ka taa Alabatosoba kɔnɔ k'a fan bɛɛ filɛ. O kɔ, a ni a ka kalandenw bɔra ka taa Bɛtani, katuguni fitiri donda tun sera ka ban.

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a to yɔrɔ jan, a ye torosun dɔ ye, fura tun b'a la. A taara a filɛ yala ni a bɛ den sɔrɔ o la, nka a selen jirisun kɔrɔ, a ma foyi ye o la fura kɔ, k'a masɔrɔ toro den tuma tun ma se fɔlɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O la, Yesu y'a fɔ torosun ye ko: «Mɔgɔ si tɛna i den dun tun abada.» A ka kalandenw y'o mɛn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U sera Jerusalɛm tuma min na, Yesu donna Alabatosoba kɔnɔ. Minnu tun bɛ sannifeere kɛ yen, a y'a daminɛ ka olu gɛn ka bɔ yen. A ye wari falennaw ka tabaliw ni ntubanni feerelaw ka sigilanw dabiri.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ma sɔn minɛntigi si ka tɛmɛn Alabatosoba kɔnɔ.

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ani sariya karamɔgɔw ye o mɛn, o de kosɔn u ye cogo ɲini ka Yesu faga. U siranna a ɲɛ k'a masɔrɔ a ka kalan tun ye mɔgɔw kun minɛ kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Wula selen, Yesu ni a ka kalandenw bɔra dugu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ sɔgɔma da joona fɛ, u tɛmɛntɔ sira kan, u ye o torosun jalen ye fo ka se a dili ma.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ko min tun kɛra, Piɛrɛ hakili jiginna o la, a y'a fɔ Yesu ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, i ye torosun min danga, o jalen filɛ.»

[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko aw mana Ala deli fɛn o fɛn na, a' ye da a la ko aw ye o sɔrɔ, o na kɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw mana jɔ ka Ala deli, k'a sɔrɔ dɔ ye aw hakɛ ta, a' ye yafa o ma, walisa aw sankolola Fa ka aw ka hakɛw yafa aw ma fana.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] [Ni aw ma yafa tɔw ma, aw sankolola Fa tɛna aw ka hakɛw yafa aw ma fana.]»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U taara Jerusalɛm ko kura. Ka Yesu to yaalayaala la Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni sariya karamɔgɔw ani cɛkɔrɔbaw taara Yesu sɛgɛrɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a ɲininka ko: «Sebaaya jumɛn b'a to i bɛ nin kow kɛ? Jɔni ye o fanga di i ma?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Ne bɛ aw ɲininka ko kelen na. Ni aw ye ne jaabi, o tuma la sebaaya min b'a to ne bɛ nin kow kɛ, ne na o fɔ aw ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jɔni de ye Yuhana ci ko a ka batiseli kɛ, Ala wa, wala mɔgɔw? A' ye ne jaabi.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la, u kumana ɲɔgɔn fɛ ko: «Ni an ko Ala y'a ci, a n'a fɔ ko mun y'a to an ma da a la?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni an ko mɔgɔw y'a ci–» U tun bɛ siran jama ɲɛ, katuguni mɔgɔw bɛɛ tun bɛ Yuhana jate kira yɛrɛ de ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn u ye Yesu jaabi ko: «Anw ma o dɔn.» Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ayiwa, sebaaya min b'a to ne bɛ nin kow kɛ, ne fana tɛna o fɔ aw ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu y'a daminɛ ka ntalen da u ye ko: «Cɛ dɔ ye rezɛn nakɔ bin ka sinsan kɛ ka o lamini. A ye dingɛ sen ka rezɛn ji bɔ yɔrɔ dila, ka sankanso jan jɔ kɔlɔsili kama. O kɔ, a ye o nakɔ kalifa rezɛn sɛnɛkɛla dɔw ma ka taa jamana wɛrɛ la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Rezɛn mɔ tuma selen, a ye baaraden dɔ ci o rezɛn sɛnɛkɛlaw ma, ko o ka rezɛn mɔ minɛ u fɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye baaraden minɛ k'a bugɔ k'a bolo lankolon bila ka taa.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nakɔtigi ye baaraden wɛrɛ ci ka taa. U ye o kunkolo jogin k'a minɛ ko juguya.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nakɔtigi ye dɔ wɛrɛ ci, u y'o faga. O kɔ, a ye baaraden caman wɛrɛw ci. U ye dɔw bugɔ ka dɔw faga.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Denkɛ kelenpe tun bɛ nakɔtigi fɛ, a tun bɛ o kanu kosɛbɛ. A ye o ci u ma olu bɛɛ kɔ, a ko: ‘U na ne denkɛ kɔni bonya.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka rezɛn sɛnɛkɛlaw y'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: ‘A ciyɛntala filɛ nin ye. A' ye na an ka a faga, a ciyɛn na kɛ an ta ye.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye a denkɛ minɛ k'a faga k'a fili nakɔ kɔfɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ayiwa, rezɛn nakɔtigi na mun de kɛ sa? A na na ka o rezɛn sɛnɛkɛlaw bɛɛ faga, ka rezɛn nakɔ kalifa mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ma.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ma nin kalan Kitabu la wa, ko: ‘Sojɔlaw banna kabakurun min na, o kɛra so selekela kabakurun lakika ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A filɛ, Matigi de ye o kɛ, kabako don an ɲɛ na.’»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw kuntigiw ye Yesu minɛ cogo ɲini, k'a masɔrɔ u y'a dɔn ko Yesu ye o ntalen da u yɛrɛw de kama, nka u siranna jama ɲɛ. O tuma la u y'a to yen ka taa.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye Farisiɛn dɔw ni Hɛrɔde ka mɔgɔ dɔw ci Yesu ma, walisa ka a minɛ a yɛrɛ da la kuma fɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U nana k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, an y'a dɔn ko i ye tiɲɛtigi ye, ko i tɛ siran mɔgɔ si ɲɛ, katuguni mɔgɔw bɛɛ ka kan i ɲɛ na, ko i bɛ mɔgɔw kalan Ala sira la k'a jɛya. A dagalen bɛ an ka nisɔngɔ sara Romɛ masakɛ ye wa, wala o dagalen tɛ? An ka kan k'a sara wa, wala an man kan k'a sara?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ye u ka filankafoya dɔn, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Mun y'a to aw bɛ ne dakɔrɔbɔ? A' ye na ni wari dɛɲɛ kelen ye, ne k'a filɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye kelen jira a la. Yesu ye u ɲininka ko: «Jɔni ja ni a ka sɛbɛnni bɛ nin kan?» U y'a jaabi ko: «Romɛ masakɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye masakɛ ta sara masakɛ ye, ka Ala ta di Ala ma.» U kabakoyara o la kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saduseɛnw tun b'a fɔ ko su kununli tɛna kɛ. U dɔw taara Yesu sɛgɛrɛ k'a ɲininka ko:
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Karamɔgɔ, Musa ye nin ci sɛbɛn k'a di an ma ko: ‘Ni cɛ dɔ sara k'a sɔrɔ a muso ma den sɔrɔ, a balimakɛ ka o muso furu ka bɔnsɔn sɔrɔ o cɛ salen ye.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, balimakɛ wolonwula tun bɛ yen. Fɔlɔ ye muso furu, o sara k'a sɔrɔ a ma den sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A filanan ye o muso kelen furu, a sara, a ma den to. A sabanan fana kɛra ten.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U wolonwula bɛɛ ye o muso furu, u bɛɛ denntan sara. O kɔ, o muso fana sara.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa su kununli don na, o muso na kɛ u la jumɛn kelen ta ye? K'a sɔrɔ u wolonwula bɛɛ y'a furu.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Aw ka filili sababu tɛ nin ye wa, ko aw ma Kitabu kuma faamu, aw ma Ala ka sebaaya fana dɔn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Suw mana kunun, cɛw tɛna musow furu, musow tɛna di cɛw ma, nka u na kɛ i ko sankolola mɛlɛkɛw.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Su kununli ko ta fan fɛ, aw ma a kalan Musa ka Kitabu la jirinin ko la wa, ko Ala y'a fɔ Musa ye ko: ‘Ne ye Ibrahima ka Ala ye, ani Isaka ka Ala ani Yakuba ka Ala.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala tɛ suw ka Ala ye, ɲɛnamaw ta don. Aw fililen bɛ kosɛbɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya karamɔgɔ dɔ ye o sɔsɔli kuma mɛn. A y'a ye ko Yesu ye Saduseɛnw jaabi ko ɲuman. A gɛrɛla a la k'a ɲininka ko: «Ci fɔlenw bɛɛ la fɔlɔfɔlɔ ye jumɛn ye?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Ci fɔlenw fɔlɔfɔlɔ filɛ nin ye ko: ‘Israɛl, lamɛnni kɛ. Matigi an ka Ala ye Matigi kelenpe de ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I ka i Matigi Ala kanu ni i dusukun bɛɛ ye, ani i ni bɛɛ, ni i hakili bɛɛ ni i barika bɛɛ.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A filanan filɛ nin ye: ‘I ka i mɔgɔ ɲɔgɔn kanu i ko i yɛrɛ.’ Ci fɔlen si man bon ni olu ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O sariya karamɔgɔ y'a fɔ Yesu ye ko: «Tiɲɛ don, karamɔgɔ. I ye min fɔ, o ye tiɲɛ ye, katuguni Ala kelenpe bɛ yen, dɔ wɛrɛ si tɛ ale kɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Ala kanu ni i dusukun bɛɛ ye, ni i hakili bɛɛ, ani i barika bɛɛ, ka i mɔgɔ ɲɔgɔn kanu i ko i yɛrɛ, o ka bon ni saraka jenitaw ani saraka sifa bɛɛ ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a ye ko a ye jaabili kɛ ni hakilitigiya ye. A y'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ni Ala ka masaya cɛ man jan.» O kɔ, mɔgɔ si ma a ja gɛlɛya k'a ɲininka foyi la tun.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to mɔgɔ kalan na Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, a ye u ɲininka ko: «Sariya karamɔgɔw b'a fɔ cogo di ko Krisita ye Dawuda Bɔnsɔn ye?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dawuda yɛrɛ y'a fɔ Ni Senu barika la ko: ‘Matigi y'a fɔ ne Matigi ye: I sigi ne kinin fɛ, fo ne ka i juguw kɛ i senkɔrɔ dalan ye.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dawuda yɛrɛ bɛ Krisita wele Matigi. Ale dun ye Dawuda Bɔnsɔn ye cogo di?» Yesu ka kuma lamɛnni diyara jama bɛɛ ye kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye a ka kalan na ko: «A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi sariya karamɔgɔw la. Ka dulɔki janw don ka yaala ani mɔgɔw ka u mɔgɔba fo fɛrɛkɛnɛw la, o de ka di u ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Alabatoso kɔnɔ ɲɛfɛ sigiyɔrɔw ani dumunibaw la sigi yɔrɔ ɲumanw fana ka di u ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛ muso cɛ salenw bolofɛnw bɛɛ minɛ u la, o kɔ, ka taa mɛn Ala delili la, walisa ka u yɛrɛw mɔgɔ sɛbɛ jira. U jalaki tɔɔrɔ na juguya.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'i sigi Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, nilifɛnw bila kɛsu kuntilenna la. A tun bɛ mɔgɔw ka wari bila cogo filɛ. Nafolotigi caman tun bɛ wari caman bila kɛsu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso faantan cɛ salen dɔ nana ka wari misɛn fila bila kɛsu kɔnɔ. O wari tun tɛ tɛmɛn tama kelen ɲɔgɔn kan.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu ye a ka kalandenw wele k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko nin muso faantan cɛ salen ye min bila kɛsu kɔnɔ, o ka ca u tɔw bɛɛ ta ye,
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ olu bɛɛ ye dɔ di ka bɔ u ka nafolow la. Ale kɔni ni a ka faantanya, a ye a balo fɛn bɛɛ di. Balo wari si ma to a bolo.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bɔtɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, a ka kalandenw la kelen y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, nin kabakurunbaw ni nin sow jɔ cogo filɛ dɛ!»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «I ɲɛ bɛ nin sobaw la wa? Kabakurun si tɛna to ɲɔgɔn kan yan, u bɛɛ na bin.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu sigilen to Oliviye kulu kan Alabatosoba kuntilenna la, Piɛrɛ ni Yakuba ni Yuhana ani Andre nana ka a ɲininka u dan na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ko: «I tɛ o kow kɛ tuma fɔ an ye wa? Ni o kow kɛ tuma sera, mun taamashyɛn na kɛ fɔlɔ?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu ye kuma daminɛ k'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi, mɔgɔw si kana aw lafili.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ caman bɛna na ne tɔgɔ la k'a fɔ ko u yɛrɛw ye Krisita de ye. U na mɔgɔ caman lafili.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw ye kɛlɛ kow kibaru mɛn, ka kɛlɛ kow ŋunuŋunukan mɛn tuma min na, aw hakili kana ɲaami. Wajibi don o kow ka kɛ, nka o tɛ a laban ye fɔlɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Siya dɔ na wuli siya dɔ wɛrɛ kama. Masaya dɔ na wuli masaya dɔ wɛrɛ kama. Dugukolo yɛrɛyɛrɛw na kɛ yɔrɔ caman na. Kɔngɔbaw na kɛ. Olu ye tɔɔrɔ kow daminɛ dama ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Nka a' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi, katuguni mɔgɔw na aw don kiritigɛ jama bolo. U na aw bugɔ Alabatosow kɔnɔ. U na taa ni aw ye gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛw ni masakɛw ɲɛ kɔrɔ ne tɔgɔ kosɔn. O n'a to aw ka seereya kɛ u ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sani o kow ka kɛ, wajibi don Kibaru Duman waajuli ka kɛ siyaw bɛɛ ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni u bɛ aw minɛ ka aw don bolo la tuma min na, aw kana kɔnɔgan aw ka fɔta la, nka kuma min mana jigin aw hakili la o waati yɛrɛ la, aw ka o fɔ, katuguni aw yɛrɛw tɛna kɛ kumabaaw ye, fɔ Ni Senu.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balima na a balima don bolo la walisa a ka faga. Fa na o ɲɔgɔn kɛ a den na. Denw fana na wuli u bangebaaw kama walisa u ka faga.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ na aw koniya ne tɔgɔ kosɔn. Nka min bɛ muɲuli kɛ fo a laban na, o na kisi.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Fɛn haramulen min bɛ tiɲɛni kɛ, o man kan ka kɛ yɔrɔ min na, aw na o jɔlen ye yen. (Min bɛ nin kalan, o k'a faamu.) O tuma la, Jude jamana mɔgɔw ka boli ka taa kuluma yɔrɔw la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min bɛ a ka so kun na, o kana jigin ka don so kɔnɔ ka fɛn ta.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min bɛ foro la, o kana kɔsegin ka a ka dulɔki ta.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso kɔnɔmaw ani minnu bɛ sin di den ma, olu na tɔɔrɔ o donw la kosɛbɛ!
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye Ala deli ko o kow kana kɛ fonɛnɛ tuma la,
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni tɔɔrɔ kow na bonya o donw la, o bɔɲɔgɔnko tɔɔrɔ ma kɛ kabini Ala ye diɲɛ da fo ka na se bi ma! O bɔɲɔgɔnko tɔɔrɔ tɛna kɛ tun abada.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni Matigi tun ma dɔ bɔ o donw dama la, mɔgɔ si tun tɛna kisi, nka a ye dɔ bɔ u la a ka mɔgɔ ɲɛnatɔmɔlenw kosɔn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni mɔgɔ dɔ b'a fɔ aw ye o tuma la ko: ‘A filɛ, Krisita bɛ yan,’ wala ‘a bɛ yen,’ aw kana da o la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sabu Krisita nkalontigɛlaw ni kira nkalontigɛlaw na wuli. U na taamashyɛnw ni kabakow kɛ walisa ka mɔgɔw lafili. Ni u tun bɛ se ka Ala ka ɲɛnatɔmɔlenw lafili, u tun na o kɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni ka aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi dɛ. Ne ye o kow bɛɛ suda aw la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O donw na, o tɔɔrɔ tɛmɛnnen kɔ, tile na dibi, kalo tɛna yeelen bɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dolow na bin ka bɔ sankolo la, sankolola sebaayaw na yɛrɛyɛrɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la, u na Mɔgɔ Denkɛ natɔ ye sankabaw kan ni fangaba ni nɔɔrɔ ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A na mɛlɛkɛw ci ka a ka ɲɛnatɔmɔlenw lajɛ ka bɔ diɲɛ fan naani la, k'a daminɛ dugukolo dan na ka taa bila sankolo dan na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ɲɛjirali dɔ filɛ nin ye torosun ko la: Ni a bolow bɛ daminɛ ka nugu, aw b'a dɔn ko samiyɛ surunyara.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la, aw mana o kow kɛtɔ ye tuma min na, aw k'a dɔn ko a surunyara, a sera da la yɛrɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko mɔgɔ minnu ɲɛnama don sisan, olu bɛɛ tɛna sa sani o kow bɛɛ ka dafa.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sankolo ni dugukolo na tɛmɛn, nka ne ka kumaw tɛna tɛmɛn abada.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Nka mɔgɔ si tɛ o don ni o waati dɔn, hali sankolola mɛlɛkɛw t'a dɔn. Ala Denkɛ fana t'a dɔn, Fa Ala kelenpe de b'a dɔn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi ka to aw ɲɛ na, k'a masɔrɔ aw tɛ o ko se tuma dɔn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A na kɛ i ko cɛ dɔ taatɔ dugu la, o bɔtɔ ye a ka fɛn bɛɛ kalifa a ka jɔnw ma. A ye bɛɛ kelen-kelen ka baara jira u la k'a fɔ so da kɔlɔsibaa ye ko a ka to a ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de la a' ye to aw ɲɛ na, k'a masɔrɔ sotigi bɛ na wula fɛ wala dugutila fɛ, wala donon kasi tuma, wala sɔgɔma fɛ, aw ma o dɔn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A kana na bala aw la ka aw sunɔgɔlen sɔrɔ dɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ min fɔ aw ye, ne bɛ o fɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye: A' ye to aw ɲɛ na.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile fila tun bɛ u ni Tɛmɛnkan ni nbuuru fununbali seli cɛ. Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni sariya karamɔgɔw tun bɛ cogo ɲini ka Yesu minɛ keguya la k'a faga.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ko: «An kana a minɛ seli la, walisa balawu kana wuli mɔgɔw cɛma.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to dumuni la Simɔn kunatɔ ka so kɔnɔ Bɛtani, muso dɔ nana ni daganin dɔ ye, o tun dilara ni kabakurun sɔngɔ gɛlɛn ye. O falen tun bɛ tulu suma duman yɛrɛwolo dɔ la min tɔgɔ ko nar, o sɔngɔ tun ka gɛlɛn kosɛbɛ. A ye o daga da walon ka a kɔnɔ tulu kɛ Yesu kun na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ minnu tun bɛ yen, olu dɔw diminna k'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: «Nin tulu suma duman tiɲɛ kun ye mun ye?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tulu suma duman tun bɛ se ka feere wari dɛɲɛ kɛmɛ saba la ka o di faantanw ma.» U ye o muso kɔrɔfɔ kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ko: «A' y'a to yen. Mun y'a to aw b'a dusu kasi? A ye min kɛ, o ka ɲi dɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Faantanw bɛ aw cɛma tuma bɛɛ. Tuma min ka di aw ye, aw bɛ se ka ko ɲuman kɛ u ye. Nka ne kɔni tɛna kɛ aw cɛma tuma bɛɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye a se ko de kɛ. A ye ne kasanke tulu suma duman kɛ ne kan sani ne ka sa.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: Kibaru Duman mana fɔ diɲɛ yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ la, nin muso ye min kɛ, o fana na lakali yen, ka mɔgɔw hakili jigin a ko la.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Juda Isikariɔti min tun ye a ka tan ni fila la kelen ye, o taara sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw sɛgɛrɛ, ko a bɛ Yesu don u bolo.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye a ka kuma mɛn minkɛ, o diyara u ye kosɛbɛ. U y'a latigɛ ko u na wari di a ma. Juda tun bɛ cogo bɛnnen ɲini ka Yesu don u bolo.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nbuuru fununbali seli don fɔlɔ, Tɛmɛnkan saraka sagaden bɛna faga don min na, Yesu ka kalandenw y'a ɲininka ko: «I b'a fɛ an ka Tɛmɛnkan seli dumuni labɛn i ye yɔrɔ jumɛn?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye a ka kalandenw la fila ci, k'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye taa dugu kɔnɔ. Aw ni cɛ dɔ na bɛn, daga jima b'a kun. Aw ka tugu o nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A mana don yɔrɔ min na, aw k'a fɔ o sotigi ye ko Karamɔgɔ ko, a ni a ka kalandenw bɛna Tɛmɛnkan seli dumuni kɛ bon min kɔnɔ, ko o bɛ min?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A na bonba dɔ jira aw la sankanso la, minɛnw b'a kɔnɔ, a labɛnnen bɛ. Aw ka Tɛmɛnkan seli dumuni labɛn an ye yen.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kalandenw taara ka don dugu kɔnɔ, u y'a sɔrɔ i ko a tun y'a fɔ u ye cogo min na. U ye Tɛmɛnkan seli dumuni labɛn yen.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Su kolen, Yesu ni a ka kalanden tan ni fila nana.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka u sigilen to dumuni la, Yesu y'a fɔ ko: «Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko aw la kelen min bɛ dumuni la ne fɛ, o na ne don bolo la.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalandenw ɲɛnasisilen, u bɛɛ kelen-kelen y'a ɲininka ko: «Ne don wa?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Aw tan ni fila la kelen don, min bɛ a bolo don ne fɛ minɛn kɔnɔ, o don.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ Denkɛ na sa i ko a sɛbɛnnen bɛ a ko la cogo min na, nka min bɛ Mɔgɔ Denkɛ don bolo la, bɔnɛ bɛ o tigi ye. Ni o cɛ tun ma bange yɛrɛ, o tun ka fisa a ma.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka u to dumuni la, Yesu ye nbuuru ta ka barika da Ala ye, ka o karikari k'a di a ka kalandenw ma. A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye nin dɔ ta. Nin ye ne farikolo ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a ye jifilen ta ka barika da Ala ye k'a di u ma, u bɛɛ ye dɔ min.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Nin ye ne joli ye, Ala ka layidu sigili joli. A bɔnna mɔgɔ caman kosɔn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko ne tɛna rezɛn ji min tun, fo ne ka a kɛnɛ min Ala ka masaya la don min na.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala tanuli dɔnkili dalen kɔ, u bɔra yen ka taa Oliviye kulu la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «Aw bɛɛ na boli ka ne kelen to, katuguni a sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘Ne na sagagɛnna faga, sagaw bɛɛ na jɛnsɛn.’
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne mana kunun ka bɔ suw cɛma, ne na taa aw ɲɛ Galile jamana la.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Piɛrɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Hali ni tɔw bɛɛ bolila k'i to, ne tɛna i bila abada.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ i ye ko bi su in na, sani donon ka kasi siɲɛ fila, i na i dalacɛ ne la siɲɛ saba ko i tɛ ne dɔn.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Piɛrɛ y'a fɔ a ye tun k'a gɛlɛya kosɛbɛ ko: «Ne bɛ sa i fɛ dɛ, ne tɛna ne dalacɛ i la fewu.» U tɔw bɛɛ fana ko ten.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, u taara yɔrɔ dɔ la min tɔgɔ ko Jetisɛmanɛ. Yesu y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «A' ye aw sigi yan, sani ne ka taa Ala deli.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A taara ɲɛ ni Piɛrɛ ni Yakuba ani Yuhana ye. Hakili ɲaami y'a sɔrɔ, a dusu kasilen tun don kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ne dusu tɔɔrɔlen bɛ, fo ne bɛ ɲini ka sa. A' ye to yan ka to aw ɲɛ na.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A taara ɲɛfɛ dɔɔnin ka i bin duguma ka Ala deli ko ni a bɛ se ka kɛ, o waati tɔɔrɔ ka tɛmɛn a kan.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ ko: «Ne Fa, i tɛ kɛɲɛ foyi la. I ka nin tɔɔrɔ jifilen mabɔ ne la. O bɛɛ n'a ta, ne sago kana kɛ, fɔ e sago.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A kɔseginna ka na kalandenw yɔrɔ ka u sunɔgɔlen sɔrɔ. A y'a fɔ Piɛrɛ ye ko: «Simɔn, i bɛ sunɔgɔ wa? I ma se ka to i ɲɛ na, hali ka lɛrɛ kelen kɛ wa?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye to aw ɲɛ na ka Ala deli walisa aw ka tanga kɔrɔbɔli ma. Mɔgɔ ni sɔnnen bɛ, nka a farisogo barika ka dɔgɔ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bɔra u kɔrɔ tun ka Ala deli ka segin o kuma kelen kan.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a kɔseginna a ka kalandenw yɔrɔ ka u sunɔgɔlen sɔrɔ ko kura, sabu sunɔgɔ tun bɛ u la kosɛbɛ. U ma a jaabi cogo dɔn.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A nana a siɲɛ sabanan la k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw bɛ sunɔgɔ halisa ka aw lafiya wa? O b'a bɔ. Waati sera. A filɛ, Mɔgɔ Denkɛ bɛna don jurumukɛlaw bolo.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye wuli, an ka taa. Min bɛ ne don bolo la, o selen filɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to o kuma la, o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ Juda sera. Kalanden tan ni fila la kelen don. A nana ni jamaba ye. Npanw ni berew tun bɛ u bolo. Olu cilen tun bɛ sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni sariya karamɔgɔw ani cɛkɔrɔbaw fɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Juda min tun bɛna Yesu don bolo la, o tun ye taamashyɛn jira jama la, ko: «Ne mana cɛ min da susu, o don. A' ye o minɛ k'a kɔlɔsi kosɛbɛ ka taa n'a ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Juda selen, a sinna Yesu la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ.» O kɔ, a ye Yesu da susu.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen, u ye Yesu minɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu fɛ mɔgɔw la kelen ye a ka npan foosi ka sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ka jɔnkɛ tulo caron.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw nana ni npan ni berew ye ne minɛli kama, i n'a fɔ ne ye binkannikɛla ye wa?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne tun bɛ aw fɛ don o don ka mɔgɔw kalan Alabatosoba kɔnɔ. Aw dun ma ne minɛ. Nka o kɛra walisa Kitabuw kuma ka dafa.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka kalandenw bɛɛ bolila ka a to yen.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 51 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kamalen dɔ tugulen tun bɛ Yesu nɔfɛ, birifini dɔrɔn melekelen tun b'a la. Jama la mɔgɔ dɔw y'a minɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 52 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye a ka birifini to u bolo, a lankolon bolila ka taa.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 53 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U taara ni Yesu ye sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ka so. Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw ani sariya karamɔgɔw bɛɛ ye u lajɛ yen.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 54 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Piɛrɛ y'i to yɔrɔ jan ka tugu Yesu nɔfɛ fo ka don sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ka du kɔnɔ. A y'i sigi garadiw kɛrɛ fɛ ka i laja tasuma la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 55 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ani kiritigɛ jamakulu tun bɛ seereya ɲini Yesu kama walisa ka a faga, nka u ma a sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 56 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ caman ye nkalon seereya kɛ Yesu kama, nka u ka kumaw tun bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔsɔ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 57 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔw wulila ka nkalon da Yesu la ko:
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 58 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A y'a fɔ an ɲɛ na ko: ‘Mɔgɔw ye nin Alabatosoba min jɔ, ne na o ci ka dɔ wɛrɛ jɔ tile saba kɔnɔ, mɔgɔw bolo ma min jɔ.’»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 59 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta u ka seereya kuma ma kɛ kelen ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 60 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la sarakalasebaaw kuntigi wulila k'i jɔ jama cɛma ka Yesu ɲininka ko: «Nin mɔgɔw bɛ seereya min kɛ i kama, o bɛ di? I tɛ o si jaabi wa?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 61 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'i makun, a ma jaabili si kɛ. Sarakalasebaaw kuntigi y'a ɲininka ko kura ko: «E de ye Krisita, Dubatigi Ala Denkɛ ye wa?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 62 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «ɔwɔ, ne ye o ye. Aw na Mɔgɔ Denkɛ sigilen ye Ala Sebaayabɛɛtigi kinin fɛ. Aw na a natɔ ye fana sankabaw kan ka bɔ sankolo la.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 63 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O la, sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ye a yɛrɛ ka finiw fara k'a fɔ ko: «An mago bɛ mun na seerew fɛ tun?
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 64 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw tulo bɛ a ka Ala tɔgɔ tiɲɛni kuma la. Mun bɛ aw kɔnɔ?» U bɛɛ y'a jalaki ko a ka kan ni saya ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 65 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔw ye daji tu Yesu kan. U ye a ɲɛ siri k'a bugɔ ni u bolokurunw ye k'a fɔ a ye ko: «I bugɔbaa tɔgɔ fɔ an ye.» Garadiw fana ye Yesu bugɔ ni u bolow ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 66 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Piɛrɛ to sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ka dukɛnɛ la duguma, sarakalasebaaw kuntigi ka baarakɛ muso dɔ nana.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 67 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye Piɛrɛ ye, a tun b'i laja tasuma la, a y'a mafilɛ kosɛbɛ k'a fɔ a ye ko: «E fana tun bɛ Yesu Nazarɛtika fɛ.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 68 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a y'i dalacɛ a la ko: «I bɛ min fɔ, ne ma o dɔn, ne ma a kɔrɔ dɔn.» O kɔ, a bɔra ka taa so da la. Donon kasira.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 69 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Baarakɛ muso y'a ye ko kura k'a fɔ o yɔrɔ mɔgɔw ye ko: «Nin cɛ in ye u dɔ ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 70 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Piɛrɛ y'i dalacɛ a la ko kura. Waati dɔɔnin tɛmɛnnen kɔ, mɔgɔ minnu tun bɛ yen, olu y'a fɔ Piɛrɛ ye fana ko: «Siga t'a la, i ye u dɔ ye, katuguni e fana ye Galileka ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 71 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Piɛrɛ y'i kali k'a yɛrɛ danga ko: «Aw bɛ kuma cɛ min ko la, ne tɛ o dɔn.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 72 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin kelen donon kasira a siɲɛ filanan la. Piɛrɛ hakili jiginna Yesu ka kuma fɔlen na ko: «Sani donon ka kasi siɲɛ fila, i na i dalacɛ ne la siɲɛ saba ko i tɛ ne dɔn.» A miirila o la ka kasi.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sɔgɔma da joona fɛ, sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni cɛkɔrɔbaw ni sariya karamɔgɔw ani kiritigɛ jamakulu y'u lajɛ ka ɲɔgɔn ye. U ye Yesu siri ka taa n'a ye k'a don gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ Pilate bolo.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate y'a ɲininka ko: «I ye Yahutuw ka masakɛ ye wa?» Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «ɔwɔ, ne ye o ye.»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw y'a sendon ni kuma caman ye.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate y'a ɲininka ko kura ko: «I tɛ jaabili si kɛ wa? U bɛ i sendon ko minnu na, i tulo tɛ olu la wa?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ma jaabili si kɛ tun, o ye Pilate kabakoya.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tɛmɛnkan seli o seli, Yahutuw mana kasolamɔgɔ min ɲini Pilate fɛ, a tun bɛ o bila.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ min tɔgɔ ko Barabasi, o ni a murutiɲɔgɔnw tun bɛ kaso la o waati la. Olu tun ye mɔgɔ faga u ka murutili sen fɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama taara Pilate yɔrɔ k'a deli ko a delila ka ko min kɛ u ye, a ka o kɛ.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate ye u jaabi ko: «Aw b'a fɛ ne ka Yahutuw ka masakɛ bila wa?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate tun y'a dɔn ko Yesu keleya de y'a to sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw y'a don bolo la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ye jama kɔnɔnasu, ko u ka Pilate deli ko a ka Barabasi bila.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate kumana jama fɛ ko kura k'a fɔ ko: «Aw bɛ min wele Yahutuw ka masakɛ, ne ka mun kɛ o la?»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U pɛrɛnna ko kura ko: «A gengen jiri la!»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate ye u ɲininka ko: «A ye mun ko jugu kɛ?» Nka u pɛrɛnna kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛn fɔlɔ kan ko: «A gengen jiri la!»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate tun b'a fɛ ka jama sago kɛ. O de kosɔn a ye Barabasi bila ka Yesu bugɔ ni gɛɲɛ ye, ka a don sɔrɔdasiw bolo, a ka gengen jiri la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sɔrɔdasiw taara ni Yesu ye gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ka du kɔnɔ ka u ka kulu mɔgɔw bɛɛ lajɛ yen.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye lomaasa fini don Yesu kan na ka ŋɔni dɛfɛ k'o kɛ jalamugu ye k'a don Yesu kun na.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye foli di a ma ko: «I ni se, Yahutuw ka masakɛ!»
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun bɛ a bugɔ a kun na ni bere ye, ka daji tu a kan, k'u biri a kɔrɔ i n'a fɔ u b'a bonya.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yɛlɛ bɔlen kɔ a ma, u ye o lomaasa fini bɔ a kan na, ka a yɛrɛ ka finiw don a la. U bɔra ka taa n'a ye, a ka gengen jiri la.
[BOOK] MRK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sirɛnɛka dɔ bɔtɔ a ka foro la, sɔrɔdasiw y'o karaba ka Yesu gengenjiri ta. O cɛ tɔgɔ ko Simɔn, Alɛkisandre ni Rufus fa don.

[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw bɛ ko dɔ yafa mɔgɔ dɔ ma, ne fana bɛ o yafa a ma. Ni ne ye ko dɔ yafa dɔ ma, ne ye o yafa aw de kosɔn Krisita ɲɛ kɔrɔ,
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] walisa Sitanɛ kana se sɔrɔ an kan, k'a masɔrɔ an bɛ a ka ko kɛtaw kala ma.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne sera Troas Krisita Kibaru Duman fɔli kama tuma min na, ne y'a sɔrɔ ko Matigi ye da yɛlɛ ne ɲɛ yen.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali o, ne dusukun ma lafiya si sɔrɔ, katuguni ne ma an balimakɛ Tite sɔrɔ yen. O de y'a to ne ye ne sara u la ka bɔ yen ka taa Masedwanɛ jamana la.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Barika Ala ye, ale bɛ an kɛ se sɔrɔbaaw ye tuma bɛɛ Krisita la, ka an kɛ Krisita dɔnniya jirabaaw ye yɔrɔ bɛɛ, i ko tulu suma duman suma bɛ se yɔrɔ bɛɛ la cogo min na.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Katuguni an kɛra Krisita suma duman ye Ala ye kisilenw ni halakibaatɔw ko la.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔw ko la, an ye saya suma ye saya kama. Dɔ wɛrɛw ko la, an ye ɲɛnamaya suma ye ɲɛnamaya kama. Jɔni bɛ se ka o kow kɛ ka dafa?
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ caman bɛ Ala ka kuma kɛ jago fɛn ye. An kɔni tɛ olu dɔw ye, nka an cilen don Ala fɛ, o de kosɔn an bɛ kuma ni jɛlenya ye Krisita la Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An b'a daminɛ ko kura ka an yɛrɛw tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ wa? Yala an mago b'a la ka sɛbɛn dɔw di aw ma minnu bɛ an tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ i ko dɔw b'a kɛcogo min na wa, wala ka o ɲɔgɔn sɛbɛn sɔrɔ ka bɔ aw fɛ yen?
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw yɛrɛw ye an tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ sɛbɛn ye min sɛbɛnnen bɛ an dusukunw la. Mɔgɔw bɛɛ bɛ o kɔnɔna ko dɔn k'a kalan.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ɔwɔ, a jɛlen don ko aw ye Krisita ka lɛtɛrɛ sɛbɛnnen ye an bolo fɛ. O ma sɛbɛn ni lankiri ye, fɔ Ala ɲɛnama Ni. O ma sɛbɛn kabakurun walahaw kan, fɔ mɔgɔw dusukun walahaw kan.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An jigi sigilen bɛ o ko la Krisita barika la Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tɛ ko an bɛ miiri ko an bɛ se ka o baara kɛ an yɛrɛw barika la, nka an ka se bɛ bɔ Ala de la.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale de ye se di an ma fana ka kɛ layidu kura baarakɛlaw ye. Sariya sɛbɛnnen ta tɛ, fɔ Ni Senu ta, k'a masɔrɔ saya bɛ bɔ sariya sɛbɛnnen na, nka Ni Senu bɛ ɲɛnamaya di.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya min ɲɛgɛnna kabakurunw kan ni sɛbɛndenw ye, saya bɔra o la. O bɛɛ n'a ta Ala nɔɔrɔ y'i jira o waati la. Musa ɲɛda tun manamanana fo Israɛl mɔgɔw ma se ka u ɲɛw jɔ a la, nka o nɔɔrɔ tun ye nɔɔrɔ banta ye. Ni sariya ka baara jirala ni Ala nɔɔrɔ ye, hali k'a sɔrɔ saya bɔra o la,
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni Senu ka baara tɛna i jira ni Ala nɔɔrɔ ye ka tɛmɛn o kan wa?
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Baara min bɛ jalakili kɛ, ni nɔɔrɔ tun bɛ o la, baara min bɛ tilennenya di, o nɔɔrɔ na bonya ka tɛmɛn dɔ ta kan kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka kɛɲɛ n'o ye, o nɔɔrɔ tɛmɛnnen tɛ foyi ye, sabu nɔɔrɔ dɔ wɛrɛ nana min ka bon ni o ye kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni nɔɔrɔ tun bɛ fɛn banta la, fɛn banbali nɔɔrɔ na bonya o ta ye kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jigi ɲuman bɛ an fɛ, o de y'a to an bɛ kuma ni ja gɛlɛya ye ka a jɛya.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An t'a kɛ i ko Musa. Ale ye fini biri a ɲɛda la, walisa Israɛl mɔgɔw kana a nɔɔrɔ banta laban ye,
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] nka u hakiliw gerenna. Halibi, ni u bɛ Layidu Kɔrɔ Kitabuw kalan tuma min na, o fini birilen bɛ u hakili la, a ma bɔ yen, katuguni a bɛ bɔ Krisita de barika la.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Halibi, ni u bɛ Musa ka Kitabuw kalan tuma o tuma, o fini birilen bɛ u hakili la.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka «Ni mɔgɔ dɔ bɛ yɛlɛma Matigi fan fɛ, o fini birilen bɛ bɔ yen.»
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, Matigi min ko bɛ fɔ yan, o ye Ni Senu de ye. Matigi Ni bɛ yɔrɔ min na, hɔrɔnya fana bɛ yen.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fini birilen tɛ an ɲɛda la, o de y'a to an bɛɛ bɛ Matigi nɔɔrɔ lajɛ ka o nɔɔrɔ jira i ko mɔgɔ bɛ fɛn lajɛ dubalen na cogo min na. An bɛ yɛlɛma o fɛ ka kɛ Matigi bɔɲɔgɔnko ye. An bɛ bɔ nɔɔrɔ dɔ la ka se nɔɔrɔ dɔ wɛrɛ ma, o bɛ kɛ Matigi Ni barika la.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala makarila an na ka an bila nin baara la, o de kosɔn an tɛ sɛgɛn.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Maloya ko minnu bɛ kɛ dogo la, an banna olu bɛɛ ma. An tɛ taama ni keguya ye. An tɛ Ala ka kuma yɛlɛma, nka an bɛ tiɲɛ fɔ k'a jɛya, walisa mɔgɔw bɛɛ kelen-kelen dusukun ka an tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ Ala ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, ni an ka Kibaru Duman dogolen bɛ, a dogolen bɛ halakibaatɔw de la.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu tɛ dannaya kɛ katuguni nin diɲɛ batofɛn ye u hakiliw fiyen, walisa Krisita min ye Ala ja ye, ale nɔɔrɔ Kibaru Duman kɛnɛ kana yeelen bɔ u ye.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An tɛ an yɛrɛw ko waajuli kɛ. An bɛ Krisita Yesu ko waajuli kɛ ko ale ye Matigi de ye, ko an ye aw ka baaradenw ye Yesu kosɔn.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala, o min y'a fɔ ko kɛnɛ ka bɔ dibi la, ale de ye kɛnɛ bɔ an dusukunw na, walisa Ala nɔɔrɔ min bɛ ye Krisita ɲɛda la, o dɔnniya ka di an ma ka kɛnɛ bɔ an ye.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An minnu ye bɔgɔ minɛnw ye, o nafoloba bɛ sɔrɔ an kɔnɔ, walisa mɔgɔw k'a ye ko o sebaaya dama dɔnbali bɛ bɔ Ala la, ko o tɛ bɔ an na.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛ tɔɔrɔ cogo bɛɛ la, nka an ma dɛsɛ. An hakili ɲaaminen don, nka an jigi ma tigɛ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tugu kɛra an nɔfɛ ka an tɔɔrɔ, nka Ala ma an bila. An gosira ka bin duguma, nka an ma sa.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛ Yesu saya ko jira an farikolo la tuma bɛɛ, walisa a ka ɲɛnamaya ka i jira an farikolo la fana.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ka diɲɛ latigɛ la, an bɛ saya da la tuma bɛɛ Yesu kosɔn, walisa Yesu ka ɲɛnamaya fana ka i jira an farikolo sata la.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la, saya bɛ baara la an kɔnɔ, nka ɲɛnamaya bɛ baara la aw kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kitabu b'a fɔ ko: «Ne ye dannaya kɛ, o de y'a to ne kumana.» An fana ye dannaya kɛ ni o dannaya dusu kelen ye, o de kosɔn an bɛ kuma.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An y'a dɔn ko min ye Matigi Yesu lakunun ka bɔ suw cɛma, o na an fana lakunun Yesu fɛ ka an ni aw ladon a yɛrɛ ɲɛ kɔrɔ ɲɔgɔn fɛ.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kow bɛɛ kɛra aw kosɔn, walisa Ala ka nɛɛma bɛ bonya mɔgɔ caman na ka ta'a fɛ cogo min na, o k'a to mɔgɔ caman ka barika da Ala ye ka nɔɔrɔ da a kan.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to an tɛ sɛgɛn. Hali k'a sɔrɔ an farikolo bɛ tiɲɛ, an ni bɛ kuraya don o don.
[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ka waatinin tɔɔrɔ fiɲɛma bɛ nɔɔrɔba dama dɔnbali labɛn an ye, a banbali don.

[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An sigilen bɛ bugu min kɔnɔ dugukolo kan, an farikolo kɔni, ni o binna, Ala ye so di an ma sankolo la, mɔgɔ bolo ma min jɔ. Sigi yɔrɔ banbali don.

[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn an ja gɛlɛyalen don tuma bɛɛ. An b'a dɔn ko k'an to nin farikolo la, an yɔrɔ ka jan Matigi la.

[BOOK] 2CO [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka fɛn bɛɛ ɲɛ, ni an tora nin farikolo la wo, ni an bɔra a la wo, an b'a fɛ an ko ka diya Matigi ye.
