[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A taamashyɛn filɛ nin ye: Aw na denyɛnin dɔ ye, fini melekelen bɛ o la, k'a da so waaro kɔnɔ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin kelen, mɛlɛkɛkulu caman kɛra o mɛlɛkɛ kɛrɛ fɛ ka bɔ sankolo la, u tun bɛ Ala tanu, u ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ala ka tanu sanfɛ yɔrɔ kɔrɔtalenbaw la, hɛrɛ ka kɛ dugukolo kan a diyaɲe mɔgɔw cɛma!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɛlɛkɛw bɔlen kɔ sagagɛnnaw kɔrɔ ka taa sankolo kɔnɔ, u y'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: «A' ye na, an ka taa Bɛtilɛhɛm. Matigi ye nin ko kɛlen min kibaru fɔ an ye, an ka taa o filɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'u teliya ka taa. U ye Mariyama ni Yusufu sɔrɔ yen, ani denyɛnin, o dalen tun bɛ so waaro kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye denyɛnin ye minkɛ, kuma min fɔra u ye o den ta fan fɛ, u y'o lakali.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sagagɛnnaw ka kuma mɛnbaaw bɛɛ kabakoyara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Mariyama ye o kow bɛɛ to a hakili la ka miiri u la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, sagagɛnnaw seginna ka taa u ka yɔrɔ la. U tun bɛ Ala bonya k'a tanu u ka ko mɛnnenw ni u ka ko yelenw bɛɛ kosɔn. O bɛɛ kɛra ka kɛɲɛ ni mɛlɛkɛ ka kibaru fɔlen ye u ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Deɲɛni bange tile segin dafalen, u y'a boloko k'a tɔgɔ da Yesu. O tɔgɔ tun dara a la mɛlɛkɛ fɛ sani a ba k'a kɔnɔ ta.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saniyali donw dafalen kɔ, ka kɛɲɛ ni Musa ka sariya ye, Yusufu ni Mariyama taara ni den ye Jerusalɛm k'a di Matigi ma,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] i ko a sɛbɛnnen bɛ Matigi ka sariya la ko: «Den fɔlɔw bɛɛ ka kɛ Matigi ta ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye saraka bɔ fana ka kɛɲɛ ni Matigi ka sariya ye ko «ntubanni fila wala jɛnɛntubanden fila.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ Jerusalɛm, o tɔgɔ ko Simeɔn. Mɔgɔ tilennen Ala ɲɛsiranbaa tun don. A tun bɛ Israɛl ɲɛsumali makɔnɔ, Ni Senu tun b'a kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala tun y'a jira a la Ni Senu fɛ ko a tɛna sa sani a k'a ɲɛ da Matigi ka Krisita kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni Senu y'a ɲɛminɛ ka don Alabatosoba kɔnɔ. Yesu bangebaaw donna n'a ye sariya ko dafali kama tuma min na,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Simeɔn ye denyɛnin ta a bolo ka Ala tanu k'a fɔ ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Matigi, sisan i bɛ se ka i ka jɔnkɛ bila ka taa hɛrɛ la ka kɛɲɛ ni i ka kuma fɔlen ye,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni ne ɲɛ ye i ka kisili ko ye,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] i ye o kisili min labɛn mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O na kɛ kɛnɛ ye ka kɛnɛ bɔ siyaw ye, ka nɔɔrɔ da i ka mɔgɔw Israɛl kan.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kuma minnu fɔra Simeɔn fɛ Yesu ko la, den fa ni a ba kabakoyara olu la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Simeɔn ye dubaw kɛ u ye k'a fɔ Yesu ba Mariyama ye ko: «A filɛ, nin den nana Israɛl mɔgɔ caman binni ni u lawulili kama. A na kɛ taamashyɛn ye, sɔsɔli na kɛ min ko la,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] walisa mɔgɔ caman ka miiriliw ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan. E kɔni, npan dɔ na i dusu jogin.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kira musoman dɔ tun bɛ yen, o tɔgɔ ko Anɛ. Fanuɛl denmuso dɔ tun don, a bɔra Asɛr siya la. A tun ye si caman sɔrɔ. A npogotigilama furula cɛ ma ka san wolonwula kɛ, o kɔ, a cɛ sara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tora ten. A si san bɛɛ lajɛlen tun bɛ san bisegin ni naani ɲɔgɔn bɔ. A tun tɛ bɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, nka a tun bɛ baara kɛ Ala ye ni sun ni delili ye su fara tile kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale sera u yɔrɔ o waati yɛrɛ la ka barika da Ala ye. A kumana o den ko la kunmabɔli makɔnɔbaaw bɛɛ fɛ Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi ye sariya minnu fɔ den dili ko la Ala ma, Yesu bangebaaw ye olu bɛɛ dafa tuma min na, u kɔseginna Galile jamana la ka taa u yɛrɛw ka dugu la Nazarɛti.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Den tun bɛ bonya ka barika sɔrɔ. A fara hakilitigiya la, Ala ka nɛɛma tun b'a kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bangebaaw tun bɛ taa Jerusalɛm Tɛmɛnkan seli la san o san.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye san tan ni fila sɔrɔ tuma min na, u taara Jerusalɛm ka kɛɲɛ ni seli laada cogo ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Seli donw dafalen kɔ, u ye sira minɛ ka taa so, nka denmisɛn Yesu tora u kɔ Jerusalɛm, a bangebaaw tun ma o dɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a bisigi ko Yesu tun bɛ sɔrɔ u taamaɲɔgɔnw fɛ. U ye tile kelen taama kɛ k'a ɲini u balimaw ni u dɔnbaaw cɛma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U m'a ye minkɛ, u kɔseginna ka taa a ɲini Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile saba tɛmɛnnen kɔ, u y'a sɔrɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, a sigilen tun bɛ karamɔgɔw cɛma ka olu lamɛn ani ka u ɲininka.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu tun b'a lamɛn, olu bɛɛ kabakoyara a ka hakilitigiya ni a ka jaabili cogo la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bangebaaw y'a ye tuma min na, u kabakoyara. A ba y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ne den, mun y'a to i ye nin ko kɛ an na? A filɛ, ne ni i fa hakili ɲaaminen tun b'i ɲini.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Mun y'a to aw tun bɛ ne ɲini? Aw m'a dɔn ko ne ka kan ka sɔrɔ ne Fa ka so kɔnɔ wa?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a ye kuma min fɔ u ye, u ma o faamu.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 51 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa Yesu taara u fɛ Nazarɛti, a kolola u ye. A ba kɔni ye o kow bɛɛ to a hakili la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 52 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tun bɛ bonya hakili ni farikolo la, a ko diyara Ala ni mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Romɛ masakɛ Tibɛrɛ ka masaya san tan ni duurunan la, o y'a sɔrɔ Pɔnse Pilate tun ye gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ ye Jude kun na, Hɛrɔde tun bɛ Galile jamana kun na. A balimakɛ Filipe tun bɛ Iturɛ ni Trakonite jamanaw kun na. Lisaniyas tun bɛ Abilɛnɛ jamana kun na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Anɛ ni Kayifɛ tun ye sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ye. O tuma la Ala ka kuma sera Zakari denkɛ Yuhana ma k'a to kungokolon kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana taara Jurdɛn ba da la jamanaw bɛɛ la. A tun bɛ mɔgɔw waaju ko u ka nimisa u ka jurumuw la ka batise, walisa u ka jurumuw yafa sɔrɔ,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] i ko a sɛbɛnnen bɛ kira Esayi ka kitabu la ko: «Pɛrɛnkan bɛ bɔ kungokolon kɔnɔ ko: A' ye Matigi ka sira labɛn, ka a ka sira misɛnw latilen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kuluw furancɛw bɛɛ na lafa, kuluw ni tintinw bɛɛ na majigin ka dalakɛɲɛ. Sira dulenw na latilen, yɔrɔ dakɛɲɛbaliw na dakɛɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hadamadenw bɛɛ na Ala ka kisili ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama minnu tun bɛ na ka batise Yuhana fɛ, a tun b'a fɔ olu ye ko: «Fɔnfɔnnindenw, jɔni ye aw lasɔmi ko aw ka boli Ala ka diminya nata ɲɛ?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kɛwale minnu b'a jira ko aw nimisara aw ka jurumuw la, a' ye olu kɛ. Aw kana fɔ aw yɛrɛw kɔnɔ ko Ibrahima ye aw fa ye, katuguni ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, Ala bɛ se ka nin kabakurunw yɛlɛma ka u kɛ Ibrahima bɔnsɔnw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali sisan, jele tara jiriw dili tigɛli kama ka ban. Jiri o jiri tɛ den ɲuman kɛ, o bɛ tigɛ ka fili tasuma la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama tun b'a ɲininka ko: «O tuma la an ka kan ka mun kɛ?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'u jaabi ko: «Dulɔki fila bɛ min fɛ, o ka kelen di fɛɛrɛtɔ ma. Dumunifɛn bɛ min fɛ, o fana k'a kɛ ten.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Faama wari minɛbaa dɔw fana nana walisa u ka batise, olu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, an ka kan ka mun kɛ?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'u jaabi ko: «Dama min fɔra aw ye, aw kana fɛn minɛ ka tɛmɛn o kan.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sɔrɔdasi dɔw y'a ɲininka ko: «Anw dun, an ka kan ka mun kɛ?» A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw kana mɔgɔ si ka wari minɛ ni diyagoya ye. Aw kana mɔgɔ si sendon ni nkalon ye. Aw ka sara ka aw wasa.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw tun bɛ ɲɛnafilɛli la, u bɛɛ tun bɛ miirili kɛ Yuhana ta fan fɛ, yala ni ale tɛ Krisita ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ye u bɛɛ jaabi ko: «Ne kɔni bɛ aw batise ji la, nka dɔ bɛ na, o fanga ka bon ni ne ta ye. Ne man kan ni a ka sabara juru fonili ye. Ale de na aw batise Ni Senu ni tasuma la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka ɲɔfyɛ minɛn b'a bolo ka a ka ɲɔ gosilen fyɛ ka bɔ ɲaga la. A na ɲɔkisɛ kɛ a ka jiginɛ kɔnɔ, nka a na ŋɛɲɛ jeni tasuma sabali la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana tun bɛ kuma wɛrɛ caman kɛ ka mɔgɔw waaju ka Kibaru Duman fɔ u ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yuhana ye gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ Hɛrɔde kɔrɔfɔ a balimakɛ muso Hɛrɔdiyas furuli kosɔn, k'a kɔrɔfɔ fana a ka ko jugu kɛlenw bɛɛ kosɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Hɛrɔde ye ko jugu wɛrɛ kɛ tun, a ye Yuhana bila kaso la.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni Senu farikoloma jiginna a kan i ko jɛnɛntuban. Kumakan dɔ bɔra sankolo la, ko: «I ye ne Denkɛ kanulen de ye, i ko ka di ne ye haali.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a ka baara daminɛ tuma min na, a si tun bɛ san bisaba ɲɔgɔn bɔ. Mɔgɔw tun bɛ miiri ko Yusufu den don. Yusufu tun ye Eli denkɛ ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Eli bɔra Matat la. Matat bɔra Levi la. Levi bɔra Mɛlki la. Mɛlki bɔra Janayi la. Janayi bɔra Yusufu la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yusufu bɔra Matitiya la. Matitiya bɔra Amɔs la. Amɔs bɔra Nahum la. Nahum bɔra Esili la. Esili bɔra Nagayi la.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kenan bɔra Enɔs la. Enɔs bɔra Sɛti la. Sɛti bɔra Hadama la. Hadama bɔra Ala la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu falen Ni Senu la, a kɔseginna ka bɔ Jurdɛn ba da la. Ni Senu y'a ɲɛminɛ ka taa kungokolon kɔnɔ,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ka tile binaani kɛ. A tun bɛ kɔrɔbɔ Sitanɛ fɛ. A ma dumuni si kɛ o donw la. O donw tɛmɛnnen kɔ, kɔngɔ y'a minɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Sitanɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ni i ye Ala Denkɛ ye, a fɔ ko nin kabakurun ka yɛlɛma ka kɛ nbuuru ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «A sɛbɛnnen bɛ Kitabu la ko: ‘Dumunifɛn dama tɛ mɔgɔ balo.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Sitanɛ taara n'a ye san fɛ ka diɲɛ masayaw bɛɛ jira a la yɔrɔnin kelen na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sitanɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ne bɛ nin kuntigiya ni a nɔɔrɔ bɛɛ di i ma, katuguni a donna ne bolo. Ne b'a fɛ k'a di min ma, ne b'a di o ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] N'i dun bɛ i biri ne kɔrɔ ka ne bato, o bɛɛ na kɛ i ta ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «A sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘I ka i Matigi Ala bato, ka baara kɛ o kelenpe ye.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sitanɛ y'a ɲɛminɛ ko kura ka taa Jerusalɛm, k'a bila Alabatosoba kuncɛ ma, k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ni i ye Ala Denkɛ ye, i cun duguma,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ a sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘Ala n'a fɔ a ka mɛlɛkɛw ye ko u ka i mara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U na i minɛ u bolow la walisa i sen kana na gosi kabakurun si la.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «A sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘I kana i Matigi Ala kɔrɔbɔ.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sitanɛ tilalen kɔ o kɔrɔbɔliw bɛɛ la, a taara k'a to yen fɔlɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu kɔseginna ka taa Galile jamana la Ni Senu barika la. A tɔgɔ bɔra jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun bɛ mɔgɔw kalan u ka Alabatosow kɔnɔ, mɔgɔw bɛɛ tun b'a bonya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu sera Nazarɛti, a lamɔna yɔrɔ min na. A donna Alabatoso kɔnɔ lafiɲɛ don na, i ko a tun delila k'a kɛcogo min na. A wulila k'i jɔ walisa ka Kitabu kalan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kira Esayi ka Kitabu dira a ma. A ye Kitabu dayɛlɛ ka yɔrɔ dɔ sɔrɔ, a sɛbɛnnen bɛ yen ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Matigi Ni bɛ ne kan, katuguni a ye ne mun, walisa ne ka Kibaru Duman fɔ faantanw ye. A ye ne ci ko ne ka jɔnw ni kasolamɔgɔw hɔrɔnyali ani fiyentɔw ɲɛw yɛlɛli ko welewele da, ka mɔgɔ degunnenw bɔ tɔɔrɔ la ka u bila hɛrɛ sira kan,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ka Matigi ka nɛɛma san ko welewele da.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu ye Kitabu datugu k'a di baaraden ma ka i sigi. Alabatoso kɔnɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ ɲɛw jɔlen tora a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu ye kuma daminɛ k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Bi kɔni, aw ye nin Kitabu kuma minnu mɛn, olu dafara.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛɛ tun b'a tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ. Kuma ɲuman minnu fɔra a fɛ, u tun bɛ kabakoya olu la. U tun b'a fɔ ko: «Yusufu denkɛ tɛ nin ye wa?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Siga t'a la, aw bɛna nin ntalen da ko: ‘Furakɛla, i yɛrɛ kɛnɛya.’ Aw n'a fɔ ko: ‘An y'a mɛn ko i ye ko minnu kɛ Kapɛrnaum, i ka o bɔɲɔgɔnkow kɛ i yɛrɛ ka dugu la yan fana.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko fana: «Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, kira si tɛ minɛ ko ɲuman a yɛrɛ ka dugu la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne b'a fɔ aw ye tiɲɛ la ko muso cɛ salen caman tun bɛ Israɛl jamana la kira Eli tile la, sanji ma na san saba ni kalo wɔɔrɔ kɔnɔ tuma min na. Kɔngɔba tun bɛ o jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, Eli ma ci ka taa olu si sɛgɛrɛ, fɔ muso cɛ salen dɔ, o tun bɛ Sidɔn jamana dugu dɔ la, o tɔgɔ ko Sarɛpita.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kunatɔ caman tun bɛ Israɛl jamana la kira Elise tile la, o bɛɛ n'a ta u si ma kɛnɛya fɔ Siri jamana mɔgɔ dɔ min tɔgɔ ko Naaman.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Alabatoso kɔnɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ y'o kumaw mɛn minkɛ, u dusu bɔra kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U wulila ka Yesu sama ka bɔ dugu kɔnɔ. U ka dugu jɔlen tun bɛ kulu min kan, u taara n'a ye o kun na, ko u b'a ɲɔni ka bin kulu dingɛ kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ale kɔni tɛmɛnna u cɛmancɛ la ka taa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu taara Galile dugu dɔ la, o tɔgɔ ko Kapɛrnaum. A tun bɛ mɔgɔw kalan lafiɲɛdonw la yen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu kabakoyara a ka mɔgɔ kalan cogo la, k'a masɔrɔ a tun bɛ kuma ni fanga ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ jinɛtɔ dɔ tun bɛ Alabatoso kɔnɔ, o pɛrɛnna ni kanba ye ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «E! I bɛ mun ɲini an fɛ, Yesu Nazarɛtika? I nana ka an halaki wa? I ye min ye, ne bɛ o dɔn, Ala ka Senuma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye jinɛ kɔrɔfɔ ko: «I makun ka bɔ nin cɛ la.» Jinɛ y'a labin duguma u cɛma ka bɔ a la, a ma foyi kɛ a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ kabakoyara, u tun bɛ kuma ɲɔgɔn fɛ ko: «Nin ye mun kuma ye? A bɛ kuma jinɛw fɛ ni fanga ni sebaaya ye, u bɛ bɔ mɔgɔw la!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kosɔn, Yesu tɔgɔ bɔra o jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bɔlen kɔ Alabatoso kɔnɔ, a taara Simɔn ka so. A y'a sɔrɔ Simɔn muso ba tɔɔrɔlen tun bɛ farigan bolo. U ye Yesu deli ko a k'a kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu taara i biri a kun na ka farigan kɔrɔfɔ. Farigan y'a bila. O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, a wulila ka baara daminɛ k'u mago ɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tilebin tuma la, mɔgɔw taara a sɛgɛrɛ ni u ka banabaatɔw bɛɛ ye. A y'a bolow da u bɛɛ kelen-kelen kan ka u kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jinɛw fana bɔra mɔgɔ caman na, u tun bɛ pɛrɛn ko: «I ye Ala Denkɛ ye!» Nka Yesu ye u kɔrɔfɔ, a ma sɔn u ka kuma, katuguni u y'a dɔn ko ale ye Krisita ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dugu jɛlen, Yesu bɔra ka taa kungo kɔnɔ yɔrɔ dɔ la. Jama tun b'a ɲini. U sera a yɔrɔ ka a koori walisa a kana taa ka u to yen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Wajibi don ne ka Ala ka masaya Kibaru Duman fɔ dugu tɔw fana la, k'a masɔrɔ ne cira o de kosɔn.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun bɛ waajuli kɛ Alabatosow kɔnɔ Jude jamana la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don dɔ, ka Yesu to Jenɛsarɛti ba da la, jama tun y'a degun walisa u ka Ala ka kuma lamɛn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye kurun fila ye ba da la, mɔnnikɛlaw tun bɔra u kɔnɔ, u tun bɛ u ka jɔw ko.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A donna o kurunw la kelen kɔnɔ, o tun ye Simɔn ta ye, k'a ɲini Simɔn fɛ ko o ka kurun terun ka mabɔ dankan na dɔɔnin. O kɛlen, a y'i sigi kurun kɔnɔ ka jama kalan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tilalen kɔ kuma la, a y'a fɔ Simɔn ye ko: «I ka kurun madon dun na, ka aw ka jɔw fili ji la ka mɔnni kɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Simɔn y'a jaabi ko: «Karamɔgɔ, an sira baara la, an ma foyi minɛ, nka i ka kuma kosɔn, ne na jɔw fili ji la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen kɔ u fɛ, u ye jɛgɛ caman minɛ, fo u ka jɔw binna tigɛli la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye u bolow fili u tɔɲɔgɔnw ma kurun wɛrɛ kɔnɔ, ko olu ka na u dɛmɛ. Olu nana, u ye kurun fila bɛɛ fa, fo kurunw tun bɛ ɲini ka tunun ji la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Simɔn Piɛrɛ y'o ye minkɛ, a y'i bin Yesu sen kɔrɔ k'a fɔ ko: «Matigi, i mabɔ ne la, katuguni ne ye jurumutɔ de ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale ni a tɔɲɔgɔnw bɛɛ kabakoyara u ka jɛgɛ caman minɛlenw la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Zebede denkɛw Yakuba ni Yuhana minnu tun ye Simɔn jɛɲɔgɔnw ye, olu fana kabakoyalen tun don. Yesu y'a fɔ Simɔn ye ko: «I kana siran. Kabini sisan, i na kɛ mɔgɔw ɲinina ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la u nana u ka kurunw jɔ dankan na, ka fɛn bɛɛ to yen ka tugu Yesu nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to dugu dɔ la, cɛ dɔ tun bɛ yen, kuna tun b'a fari yɔrɔ bɛɛ la. O ye Yesu ye tuma min na, a y'i bin k'a ɲɛ biri duguma, k'a deli ko: «Matigi, ni i bɛ sɔn, i bɛ se ka ne saniya.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a bolo mɔɔnɔbɔ ka maga a la, a ko: «Ne sɔnna, i ka saniya.» O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ a ka kuna kɛnɛyara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a gɛlɛya a ma ko: «I kana o ko fɔ mɔgɔ si ye, nka taa i yɛrɛ jira sarakalasebaa la ka saraka bɔ i saniyali kosɔn i ko Musa y'a fɔ cogo min na, o na kɛ seereya ye i kɛnɛyali ko la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, Yesu tɔgɔ bɔra ka ta'a fɛ, fo jamaba tun bɛ u lajɛ a fɛ walisa k'a lamɛn ani u ka banaw ka kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu tun bɛ to ka taa kungo kɔnɔ a kelen na ka Ala deli.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don dɔ la ka Yesu to mɔgɔw kalan na, Farisiɛnw ni sariya karamɔgɔ dɔw sigilen tun bɛ yen. U tun nana ka bɔ Galile ani Jude duguw bɛɛ la, ani Jerusalɛm. Matigi ka sebaaya tun bɛ Yesu la ka banabaatɔw kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔw nana ni cɛ fanfilasalen dɔ ye dalan kan. U ye cogo ɲini k'a ladon so kɔnɔ k'a da Yesu sen kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ma cogo sɔrɔ k'a ladon jama kosɔn minkɛ, u yɛlɛnna so san fɛ k'a sanfɛla dɔ wɔrɔn ka o cɛ ni a ka dalan lajigin o wo fɛ Yesu ɲɛ kɔrɔ jama cɛma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye o mɔgɔw ka dannaya ye minkɛ, a ko: «Cɛ, i ka jurumuw yafara i ma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya karamɔgɔw ni Farisiɛnw y'u miiri ko: «Nin cɛ ye jɔn ye, fo a bɛ Ala tɔgɔ tiɲɛ? Jɔn bɛ se ka jurumuw yafa, Ala kelen kɔ?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u ka miiriliw dɔn, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Mun y'a to aw bɛ o kow miiri aw kɔnɔ?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nin kuma fila la jumɛn fɔli ka nɔgɔn? K'a fɔ ko: I ka jurumuw yafara i ma, wala k'a fɔ ko: Wuli ka taama?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka walisa aw k'a dɔn ko fanga bɛ Mɔgɔ Denkɛ fɛ k'a to dugukolo kan ka jurumuw yafa,» –a y'a fɔ o cɛ fanfilasalen ye ko: «Ne b'a fɔ i ye, wuli ka i ka dalan ta ka taa so.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, a wulila u bɛɛ ɲɛ na k'a ka dalan ta ka taa so, a tun bɛ Ala bonya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛɛ kabakoyara ka Ala bonya. U siranna kosɛbɛ k'a fɔ ko: «An ye kabakow ye bi.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kow kɔ, Yesu bɔra yen, a ye faama wari minɛbaa dɔ ye, o tɔgɔ ko Levi. O sigilen tun bɛ faama wari minɛ yɔrɔ la. Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Tugu ne la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Levi ye fɛn bɛɛ to yen ka wuli ka tugu a nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Levi ye dumuniba labɛn Yesu ye a ka so. Faama wari minɛbaa caman ni mɔgɔ caman wɛrɛw sigilen tun bɛ dumuni la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛnw ni sariya karamɔgɔw tun bɛ dajukɔrɔ kuma la, u y'a fɔ Yesu ka kalandenw ye ko: «Mun y'a to aw bɛ dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ faama wari minɛbaaw ani jurumutɔw fɛ?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Mɔgɔ minnu ka kɛnɛ, olu mago tɛ furakɛla la, banabaatɔw de mago b'a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ma na mɔgɔ tilennenw wele ko u ka nimisa u ka jurumuw la, fɔ jurumukɛlaw.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔw kumana Yesu fɛ, ko: «Yuhana ka kalandenw ni Farisiɛnw ka kalandenw bɛ sun ko caman ka Ala deli, k'a sɔrɔ e ka kalandenw bɛ dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Aw bɛ se ka kɔɲɔcɛ tɔɲɔgɔnw wajibiya ka sun, ka u ni kɔɲɔcɛ to ɲɔgɔn fɛ wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka waati bɛ na, kɔɲɔcɛ na bɔsi u la, u na sun o donw la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye nin ntalen fana da u ye ko: «Mɔgɔ si tɛ fini kunkurun fara ka bɔ fini kura la ka fini kɔrɔ bari. Ni o kɛra, fini kura faralen na to, fini kunkurun fana tɛna bɛn fini kɔrɔ ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ si tɛ diwɛn kɛnɛ kɛ foroko kɔrɔw kɔnɔ. Ni o kɛra, diwɛn kɛnɛ na forokow fara ka bɔn, forokow na tiɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka diwɛn kɛnɛ ka kan ka kɛ foroko kuraw de kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, mɔgɔ min ye diwɛn kɔrɔlen min, o tɛna sɔn diwɛn kura ma, katuguni a b'a fɔ ko: ‘Kɔrɔlen de ka ɲi.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lafiɲɛ don dɔ la, Yesu tun bɛ tɛmɛn ɲɔforo dɔw fɛ. A ka kalandenw ye ɲɔtinsan dɔw tigɛ ka u cɔngɔ u tɛgɛw kɔnɔ ka olu kisɛ ɲimi.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛn dɔw y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ko min dagalen tɛ lafiɲɛ don na, mun na aw bɛ o kɛ?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'u jaabi ko: «Kɔngɔ ye Dawuda ni a nɔfɛ mɔgɔw minɛ tuma min na, a ye min kɛ, aw ma o kalan wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A donna Ala ka so kɔnɔ ka jirali nbuurukun dɔw ta ka u dun, ka dɔ di a nɔfɛ mɔgɔw fana ma. O dumuni dagalen tun tɛ mɔgɔ si ye fɔ sarakalasebaaw dama.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye fana ko: «Mɔgɔ Denkɛ ye lafiɲɛ don Matigi de ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu donna Alabatoso dɔ kɔnɔ lafiɲɛ don dɔ wɛrɛ la, ka mɔgɔw kalan. Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ yen, a kininbolo jalen tun don.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya karamɔgɔw ni Farisiɛnw tun bɛ Yesu kɔlɔsi k'a filɛ yala ni a na mɔgɔ dɔ kɛnɛya lafiɲɛ don na, walisa u k'a sendon sababu sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu tun bɛ u ka miiriliw dɔn. O tuma la a y'a fɔ cɛ bolojalen ye ko: «Wuli k'i jɔ mɔgɔw cɛma.» A wulila k'i jɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ne bɛ aw ɲininka yala a dagalen bɛ lafiɲɛ don na ka ko ɲuman kɛ wa, wala ka ko jugu kɛ? Ka mɔgɔ kisi wa, wala ka mɔgɔ faga?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a ɲɛ yaala ka mɔgɔw bɛɛ filɛ, o kɔ, a y'a fɔ o cɛ ye ko: «I bolo mɔɔnɔbɔ.» A y'a bolo mɔɔnɔbɔ, a kɛnɛyara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U dusu bɔra kosɛbɛ. U tun bɛ kuma ɲɔgɔn fɛ ko u bɛ se ka mun kɛ Yesu la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu taara kulu kan don dɔ la ka Ala deli, a sira Ala delili la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dugu jɛlen, a ye a ka kalandenw wele, ka tan ni fila ɲɛnatɔmɔ u la, ka olu wele cidenw.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu filɛ ninnu ye: Simɔn, (a ye o tɔgɔ da Piɛrɛ), ani a balimakɛ Andre, Yakuba ni Yuhana, Filipe ni Bartɛlɛmi,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matiyu ni Tɔma, Alifɛ denkɛ Yakuba ni Simɔn Zelote,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yakuba denkɛ Jude ni Juda Isikariɔti, o de ye Yesu don bolo la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ni a ka kalandenw jiginna ka bɔ kulu kan ka se kɛnɛba dɔ ma, a ka kalandenw caman tun bɛ yen ani jamaba. Olu tun nana ka bɔ Jude jamana bɛɛ la ani Jerusalɛm ni kɔgɔji da la jamana dugubaw Tir ni Sidɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun nana walisa k'a ka kuma lamɛn ani a ka u kɛnɛya. Minnu tɔɔrɔlen tun bɛ jinɛw fɛ, olu fana kɛnɛyara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama bɛɛ tun bɛ u jija ka maga a la, katuguni sebaaya tun bɛ bɔ a la ka u bɛɛ kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu y'a ɲɛ kɔrɔta ka a ka kalandenw filɛ, a ko: «Aw minnu ye faantanw ye, aw ye dubadenw ye, katuguni Ala ka masaya ye aw ta ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Kɔngɔ bɛ aw minnu na sisan, aw ye dubadenw ye, katuguni aw na fa! «Aw minnu bɛ kasi sisan, aw ye dubadenw ye, katuguni aw na yɛlɛ ɲagali fɛ!
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni mɔgɔw bɛ aw koniya ka u mago bɔ aw la, ka aw neni, ka aw tɔgɔ jugu fɔ Mɔgɔ Denkɛ kosɔn, o tuma la aw ye dubadenw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O don na, aw na nisɔndiya ka ɲagali kosɛbɛ, katuguni aw ka baraji ka bon sankolo la. U bɛnbaw fana ye kiraw tɔɔrɔ ten.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Nka aw nafolobatigiw, bɔnɛ bɛ aw ye, katuguni aw ye aw ka ɲɛsuma sɔrɔ ka ban!
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw minnu falen bɛ dumuni ɲumanw la sisan, bɔnɛ bɛ aw ye, katuguni kɔngɔ na aw minɛ! «Aw minnu bɛ yɛlɛ sisan, bɔnɛ bɛ aw ye, katuguni aw na ɲɛnasisi ka kasi!
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni mɔgɔw bɛɛ bɛ aw tɔgɔ ɲuman fɔ tuma min na, bɔnɛ bɛ aw ye, katuguni u bɛnbaw ye kira nkalontigɛlaw bonya o cogo la!
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Nka aw minnu bɛ ne lamɛn, ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: A' ye aw juguw kanu, ka ko ɲuman kɛ aw koniyabaaw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye dubaw kɛ aw dangabaaw ye. Minnu bɛ aw tɔɲɔ, a' ye Ala deli olu ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ dɔ y'a tɛgɛ ci i taman kelen na, i ka fan dɔ jɔ a ye. Ni dɔ ye i ka dulɔkiba ta, i kana a bali ka i ka dulɔki misɛn fana ta.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ ye fɛn dɔ deli i fɛ, i ka o sɔn. Ni dɔ ye i ka fɛn dɔ ta, i kana a fɔ ko o tigi ka o kɔsegin.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw b'a fɛ mɔgɔw ka ko min kɛ aw ye, aw ka o ɲɔgɔn kɛ u ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni aw bɛ aw kanubaaw kanu, aw na mun tanuli sɔrɔ o la? Hali jurumutɔw fana bɛ u kanubaaw kanu.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu bɛ ko ɲuman kɛ aw ye, ni aw bɛ ko ɲuman kɛ olu dama ye, aw na mun tanuli sɔrɔ o la? Hali jurumutɔw fana bɛ o de kɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw jigi b'a la ko aw nafɛn dɔ sɔrɔ minnu fɛ, ni aw bɛ juru don olu dama la, aw na mun tanuli sɔrɔ o la? Jurumutɔw fana bɛ juru don u tɔɲɔgɔnw la walisa u ka u ta ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ko kura.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a' ye aw juguw kanu ka ko ɲuman kɛ u ye ka juru don u la, aw kana aw jigi da fɛn sɔrɔ kan. Aw na barajiba sɔrɔ, aw na kɛ Ala Kɔrɔtalenba denw ye, katuguni ale ka ɲi fitiriwalew ni mɔgɔ juguw ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka kɛ makarikɛlaw ye i ko aw Fa ye makarikɛla ye cogo min na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw kana kiri tigɛ tɔw kan, kiri tɛna tigɛ aw kan. Aw kana tɔw jalaki, aw tɛna jalaki. Aw ka yafali kɛ, yafa na kɛ aw ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye mɔgɔw sɔn, mɔgɔw na aw sɔn. U na mure ta ka aw ta suma k'a digidigi k'a yigiyigi ka dɔ fara a kan fo a bɛ bɔn, ka o yɛlɛma aw ka dulɔki jufabaw kɔnɔ, k'a masɔrɔ aw bɛ tɔw ta suma ni minɛn min ye, aw ta na suma ni o minɛn yɛrɛ de ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye ntalen da u ye fana, a ko: «Fiyentɔ bɛ se ka fiyentɔ ka bere minɛ wa? N'o kɛra, u fila bɛɛ tɛna bin dingɛ kɔnɔ wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalanden man bon ni a karamɔgɔ ye, nka kalanden o kalanden kalanna ka se, o na kɛ i ko a karamɔgɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Kalanin min bɛ i balima ɲɛ kan, mun na i bɛ o filɛ? k'a sɔrɔ so cɛtigɛ jiri bɛ i yɛrɛ ɲɛ kan, i ma o ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] E min tɛ so cɛtigɛ jiri ye i yɛrɛ ɲɛ kan, i bɛ se k'a fɔ i balima ye cogo di ko: ‘Ne balima, kalanin min bɛ i ɲɛ kan, a to ne ka o bɔ?’ Filankafo, so cɛtigɛ jiri bɔ i yɛrɛ ɲɛ kan fɔlɔ. Ni o kɛra, i na se ka yeli kɛ ko ɲuman ka kalanin bɔ i balima ɲɛ kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Jiri ɲuman tɛ den jugu kɛ, jiri jugu tɛ den ɲuman kɛ.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ ɲuman bɛ fɛn ɲumanw bɔ a ka fɛn ɲuman mara yɔrɔ la, o min ye a dusukun ye. Mɔgɔ jugu bɛ fɛn juguw bɔ a ka fɛn jugu mara yɔrɔ la. Mɔgɔ dusukun falen bɛ min na, a da bɛ o de fɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mun y'a to aw bɛ ne wele ‘Matigi, Matigi,’ k'a sɔrɔ ne bɛ min fɔ aw tɛ o kɛ?

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka min bɛ ne ka kumaw mɛn, ni a ma u kɛ, o bɔlen bɛ cɛ dɔ fɛ min y'a ka so jɔ duguma, ni a ma jusigilan kɛ a kɔrɔ. Baji sera o so ma tuma min na, a binna o yɔrɔnin kelen, o so tiɲɛ ko juguyara.»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kuntigi dɔw bɛ ne kun na, sɔrɔdasi dɔw fana bɛ ne bolo. Ne b'a fɔ u dɔ ye ko ‘Taa’, o bɛ taa. Ne b'a fɔ dɔ wɛrɛ ye ko ‘Na’, o bɛ na, k'a fɔ ne ka baaraden ye ko ‘Nin kɛ’, a b'a kɛ.»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛn dɔ ye Yesu deli ko a ka taa dumuni kɛ a fɛ. Yesu taara o ka so k'i sigi dumuni la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jatɔmuso dɔ tun bɛ o dugu kɔnɔ. A y'a mɛn tuma min na ko Yesu tun bɛ dumuni la o Farisiɛn ka so, a nana ni daganin dɔ ye, o tun dilara ni kabakurun sɔngɔ gɛlɛn ye, o falen tun bɛ tulu suma duman la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A kasitɔ y'i jɔ Yesu kɔfɛ a sen yanfan fɛ. A ye Yesu senw ɲigin ni a ɲɛji ye, ka u jɔsi ni a kunsigi ye, ka a senw susu, ka tulu suma duman yɛlɛma u kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛn min ye Yesu wele dumuni la, o y'o ye minkɛ, o y'a fɔ a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ ko: «Ni nin cɛ tun ye kira ye, nin muso min magara a la, a tun n'a dɔn ko o ye jatɔmuso ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la, Yesu ye kuma ta k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Simɔn, fɛn dɔ bɛ ne fɛ k'a fɔ i ye.» Simɔn y'a jaabi ko: «Karamɔgɔ, a fɔ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ko: «Juru donna dɔ ka juru tun bɛ mɔgɔ fila la. A ka wari dɛɲɛ kɛmɛ duuru tun bɛ dɔ la, dɛɲɛ biduuru tun bɛ tɔ kelen na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cogo tun tɛ u si fɛ ka o sara, o tuma la a ye u fila bɛɛ ka juruw yafa u ma. A fɔ, o cɛ ko na diya jumɛn ye ka tɛmɛn jumɛn kan?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Simɔn y'a jaabi ko: «Ne bɛ miiri ko a ye caman yafa min ma.» Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ye tiɲɛ fɔ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu y'i yɛlɛma muso fan fɛ k'a fɔ Simɔn ye ko: «I ɲɛ bɛ nin muso la wa? Ne donna i ka so kɔnɔ, i ma senko ji di ne ma, nka ale kɔni ye ne senw ɲigin ni a ɲɛji ye ka u jɔsi ni a kunsigi ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I ma ne ladon ni da susuli ye, nka kabini ne donna so kɔnɔ, ale ma ne senw susuli dabila.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I ma tulu yɛlɛma ne kun na, nka ale ye tulu suma duman yɛlɛma ne senw kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to ne b'a fɔ i ye ko: Nin muso ka kanuyaba b'a jira ko a ka jurumuw ni u caya bɛɛ yafara a ma. Nka dɔɔnin yafara min ma, o ka kanuya ka dɔgɔ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu y'a fɔ o muso ye ko: «I ka jurumuw yafara i ma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A dumunikɛɲɔgɔnw y'a daminɛ k'a fɔ u yɛrɛw kɔnɔ ko: «Nin ye jɔni ye, ni a bɛ jurumuw yafa fana?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ o muso ye ko: «I ka dannaya ye i kisi. I ka taa hɛrɛ la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kow kɔ, Yesu tun bɛ dugubaw ni dugu misɛnw yaala, a tun bɛ waajuli kɛ ka Ala ka masaya Kibaru Duman fɔ. A ka kalanden tan ni fila taara a fɛ,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ani muso dɔw fana. A tun ye o musow ka banaw kɛnɛya ka jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ u la. Muso kelen tɔgɔ ko Mariyama, o tun bɛ wele Magadala Mariyama. Jinɛ wolonwula tun bɔra o la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔ tɔgɔ ko Janɛ, o tun ye Hɛrɔde ka sokunnasigibaa Kuza muso ye. Susanɛ ni muso caman wɛrɛw tun bɛ yen. Olu bɛɛ tun bɛ Yesu ni a ka kalandenw dɛmɛ ni u bolofɛnw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw tun bɛ bɔ duguw bɛɛ la ka taa Yesu sɛgɛrɛ. Jamaba y'u lajɛ a fɛ yen tuma min na, Yesu ye nin ntalen da u ye ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Cɛ dɔ bɔra ka taa a ka serilifɛnw seri. K'a to serili la, a ka kisɛ dɔw binna sira da la. Mɔgɔw taamana u kan, kɔnɔw ye olu sogin.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kisɛ dɔw binna farakolo kan. U falennen kɔ, u jara, katuguni sumaya tun tɛ yen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kisɛ dɔw binna ŋɔniw cɛma. U ni ŋɔniw wulila ɲɔgɔn fɛ, ŋɔniw y'u degun.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kisɛ dɔw binna dugukolo ɲuman na. U falenna ka bonya ka kisɛ, ka u ɲɔgɔn kɛmɛ kɛ.» O kumaw fɔlen kɔ, Yesu pɛrɛnna ko: «Tulo bɛ min fɛ ka lamɛnni kɛ, o ka lamɛnni kɛ dɛ!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ka kalandenw y'a ɲininka ko: «O ntalen kɔrɔ ye mun ye?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'u jaabi ko: «Ala ka masaya gundow dɔnniya dira aw de ma, nka a ko bɛ fɔ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ye ntalenw de la, walisa ‘u filɛli kɛtɔ kana a ye, u mɛnni kɛtɔ kana a faamu.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O ntalen kɔrɔ filɛ nin ye: Kisɛ minnu serila, olu ye Ala ka kuma de ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔw ye sira da la taw ye. O mɔgɔw ye o kuma mɛn minkɛ, Sitanɛ bɛ na o kuma bɔ u kɔnɔ, walisa u kana na dannaya kɛ ka kisi.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farakolo kan taw ye minnu ye, olu bɛ o kuma mɛn k'a minɛ ni ɲagali ye. Nka dili tɛ u la, u bɛ dannaya kɛ ka waati dɔɔnin dɔrɔn kɛ. Kɔrɔbɔli mana u sɔrɔ, u bɛ dannaya bila.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ŋɔniw cɛma taw ye minnu ye, olu bɛ o kuma mɛn, nka u taatɔ, nin diɲɛ hami kow ni nafolo kow ni ɲɛnajɛ kow bɛ u degun, fo u den tɛ kɔgɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dugukolo ɲuman taw ye minnu ye, olu bɛ o kuma mɛn k'a minɛ sɛbɛ la ni dusu ɲuman ye, ka to o kuma kan fo u bɛ den.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ si tɛ lanpa mana ka minɛn dɔ kɛ k'a datugu wala k'a bila dalan dɔ jukɔrɔ, nka a b'a sigi fɛn dɔ kan, walisa a ka yeelen bɔ so kɔnɔ donbaaw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɛn si dogolen tɛ min tɛna bɔ kɛnɛ kan. Gundo si tɛ ni a tɛna dɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye aw ka lamɛnni cogo dɔn k'a masɔrɔ fɛn bɛ min bolo, dɔ na di o ma ka fara a ta kan, nka fɛn tɛ min bolo, a miirili bɛ a bolo ta min na, o na bɔsi a la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ba ni a balimakɛw taara a yɔrɔ, nka u ma se ka gɛrɛ a la jama kosɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔ y'a fɔ Yesu ye ko: «I ba ni i balimakɛw jɔlen filɛ kɛnɛma, u b'a fɛ ka i ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ko: «Minnu bɛ Ala ka kuma lamɛn k'a kɛ, olu de ye ne ba ni ne balimakɛw ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don dɔ la, Yesu y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «An ka taa ba kɔ.» U donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ ka ba tigɛ daminɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka u to ji kan, Yesu sunɔgɔra. Fiɲɛba wulila baji kan, kurun tun bɛ ɲini ka fa ji la, fo u tun bɛ ɲini ka tunun.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la kalandenw gɛrɛla Yesu la, k'a lakunun k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, Karamɔgɔ, an tɔ to filɛ ji la!» Yesu wulila ka fiɲɛ ni jikuruw kɔrɔfɔ, fiɲɛ jɔra, ji madara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ kalandenw ye ko: «Aw ka dannaya bɛ min?» U sirannen kabakoyalen tun b'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: «Nin cɛ ye jɔn ye? fo a bɛ kuma fɔ fiɲɛ ni ji ye, u b'a kan minɛ!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U sera Gadarakaw ka jamana la, o bɛ ba kɔ, Galile kuntilenna la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bɔlen kurun kɔnɔ, dugu kɔnɔ cɛ dɔ nana a kunbɛn, jinɛw tun b'a la. Kabini tuma jan, a tun tɛ sɔn ka fini don, a tun tɛ sɔn ka to so kɔnɔ. A sigi yɔrɔ tun ye kaburudo de ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye Yesu ye minkɛ, a ye kulokanba ci ka i bin Yesu sen kɔrɔ k'a fɔ ni kanba ye ko: «I bɛ mun ɲini ne fɛ, Yesu, Ala Kɔrɔtalenba Denkɛ? Ne b'i deli, i kana ne tɔɔrɔ!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye o fɔ katuguni Yesu tun y'a fɔ jinɛ ye ko a ka bɔ o cɛ la. O jinɛ tun b'a bin ko caman na. Mɔgɔw tun b'a siri ni nɛgɛjɔlɔkɔw ye, k'a senw don nɛgɛ la walisa k'a kɔlɔsi, nka a tun bɛ o sirilanw tigɛ. Jinɛ tun b'a gɛn ka taa n'a ye kungokolon kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a ɲininka ko: «I tɔgɔ bɛ di?» A ko: «Jamaba.» A y'o fɔ katuguni jinɛ caman tun donna a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jinɛw ye Yesu deli ko a kana u ci ka taa halaki dingɛ kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lɛkuluba tun bɛ dumuni la kulu kɛrɛ la. O jinɛw ye Yesu deli ko a ka sɔn u ka taa don o lɛw la. A sɔnna.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la jinɛw bɔra cɛ la ka taa don o lɛw la. Lɛkulu bɛɛ girinna ka jigin kulu jiginjigin jugu fɛ ka don baji la, u sara yen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O lɛgɛnnaw ye o ko kɛlen ye minkɛ, u bolila ka taa o kibaru fɔ dugu kɔnɔ ani a dafɛ bugufyɛw la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɔra ka taa o ko kɛlen filɛ. U selen Yesu yɔrɔ, u ye o cɛ ye, jinɛw tun bɔra a la, a sigilen tun bɛ Yesu sen kɔrɔ, finiw tun b'a kan na, a hakili sigilen tun don. U siranna.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ jinɛtɔ kɛnɛyara minnu ɲɛ na, olu ye o kow bɛɛ lakali u ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la, Gadarakaw ka jamana mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye Yesu deli ko a ka taa ka bɔ u ka jamana la, katuguni u sirannenba tun don. Yesu donna kurun kɔnɔ, ko a bɛ taa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jinɛtɔ kɔrɔ ye Yesu deli ko a b'a fɛ ka to a fɛ. Nka Yesu y'a lasegin, a ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Segin ka taa so. Ala ye koba minnu kɛ i ye, i ka olu bɛɛ lakali.» Yesu ye koba minnu kɛ o cɛ ye, a taara ka o kow bɛɛ lakali dugu kɔnɔ yɔrɔ bɛɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu kɔseginna ka bɔ ba kɔ tuma min na, a na ko diyara mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye, katuguni u bɛɛ tun b'a makɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la cɛ dɔ nana, o tɔgɔ ko Jayirus, Alabatoso kuntigi tun don. O y'i bin Yesu sen kɔrɔ k'a deli ko a ka taa a ka so,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni denmuso kelenpe tun b'a bolo, o si tun bɛ san tan ni fila la, o tun bɛ ɲini ka sa. Yesu taatɔ yen, jama y'a lamini k'a degun.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso dɔ tun bɛ yen, jolibɔbana b'a la kabini san tan ni fila. A tun ye a bolofɛnw bɛɛ di furakɛlaw ma, nka u si ma se k'a kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O muso gɛrɛla Yesu la a kɔfɛ ka maga a ka fini dawolo la. O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, a ka jolibɔ jɔra.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ko: «Jɔn magara ne la?» U bɛɛ y'u dalacɛ a la tuma min na, Piɛrɛ ko: «Karamɔgɔ, jama b'i lamini k'i degun dɛ!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ko: «Mɔgɔ dɔ magara ne la, katuguni ne bɔra a seere ma ko sebaaya dɔ bɔra ne la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O muso y'a ye ko a tɛ se ka dogo minkɛ, a yɛrɛyɛrɛtɔ nana i bin Yesu sen kɔrɔ. Sababu min y'a to a magara Yesu la, ani a kɛnɛyara o yɔrɔnin kelen cogo min na, a y'o lakali a ye mɔgɔw bɛɛ ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ne denmuso, i ka dannaya ye i kɛnɛya. I ka taa hɛrɛ la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to o kuma la, ciden dɔ nana ka bɔ Alabatoso kuntigi Jayirus ka so, k'a fɔ a ye ko: «I denmuso sara. I kana karamɔgɔ sɛgɛn tun.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'o mɛn minkɛ, a y'a fɔ Jayirus ye ko: «I kana siran. Dannaya kɛ dɔrɔn, i denmuso na kɛnɛya.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 51 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu sera a ka so tuma min na, a ma sɔn mɔgɔ si ka don a fɛ yen, fɔ Piɛrɛ ni Yuhana ni Yakuba ani den fa ni a ba.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 52 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ tun bɛ denmuso su kasi ka kulo. Yesu ko: «Aw kana kasi, k'a masɔrɔ den ma sa, a bɛ sunɔgɔ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 53 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye yɛlɛ bɔ a ma, katuguni u y'a dɔn ko a sara ka ban.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 54 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'a ta a bolo ma k'a fɔ ni kanba ye ko: «Dennin, wuli!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 55 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ni seginna a ma, o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, a wulila. Yesu ko u ka dumuni di a ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 56 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Den bangebaaw kabakoyara haali. Yesu y'a fɔ u ye k'a gɛlɛya ko u kana o ko kɛlen fɔ mɔgɔ si ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye a ka kalanden tan ni fila wele ka sebaaya ni fanga di u ma jinɛw bɛɛ kan, ani ka banaw kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a ye u ci ka taa Ala ka masaya waajuli kɛ ani ka banabaatɔw kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw taatɔ kana foyi ta aw bolo, bere wo, dugutaa minɛn wo, dumunifɛn wo, wari wo. Aw si kana dulɔki fila ta.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw ye jatigila sɔrɔ yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ, a' ye to yen fo aw taa tuma ka se.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔw ma sɔn ka aw ladon yɔrɔ min na, aw bɔtɔ o dugu kɔnɔ, aw ka aw senna buguri yuguyugu yen, o na kɛ u seere ye ka u lasɔmi.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalandenw taara. U tɛmɛnna duguw bɛɛ la ka Kibaru Duman fɔ ka banabaatɔw kɛnɛya yɔrɔw bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ Hɛrɔde ye o ko kɛlenw bɛɛ kibaru mɛn tuma min na, a hakili ɲaamina, katuguni mɔgɔ dɔw y'a fɔ ko: «Yuhana Batiselikɛla kununna ka bɔ suw cɛma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔ wɛrɛw ko: «Eli nana.» Dɔ wɛrɛw fana ko: «Fɔlɔ kiraw la kelen kununna ka bɔ suw cɛma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Hɛrɔde ko: «Ne ye Yuhana kunkolo tigɛ. Ayiwa ne bɛ nin kow mɛn min ta fan fɛ, o ye jɔn ye?» A tun bɛ cogo ɲini ka Yesu ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw kɔseginna Yesu yɔrɔ ka u ka ko kɛlenw bɛɛ lakali a ye. Yesu taara n'u ye u dan na ka se dugu dɔ da fɛ, o tɔgɔ ko Bɛtisayida.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama y'o dɔn tuma min na, u tugura a nɔfɛ. Yesu y'u minɛ ko ɲuman ka kuma u fɛ Ala ka masaya ko la. Minnu mago tun bɛ kɛnɛyali la, a ye olu kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile tun bɛ ɲini ka jigin tuma min na, kalanden tan ni fila gɛrɛla Yesu la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Jama labila, walisa u ka taa an dafɛ duguw ni bugufyɛw la ka dumuni ni siyɔrɔ ɲini, katuguni an bɛ kungokolon la yan.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw yɛrɛw ka dumuni di u ma.» U y'a jaabi ko: «Foyi tɛ an bolo nbuurukun duuru ni jɛgɛ fila kɔ, fo n'i b'a fɛ an ka taa dumuni san nin mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun bɛ cɛ waa duuru ɲɔgɔn bɔ. Yesu y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «A' ye nin mɔgɔw lasigi biduuru-duuru ɲɔgɔn.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalandenw ye jama bɛɛ lasigi o cogo la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye o nbuurukun duuru ni jɛgɛ fila ta k'a ɲɛ kɔrɔta san fɛ ka barika da Ala ye u kosɔn. O kɔ, a y'u karikari ka u di kalandenw ma, ko kalandenw k'u sigi jama kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛɛ ye dumuni kɛ k'u fa. U ye segi tan ni fila fa dumuni kunkurunw tɔ tolenw la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don dɔ la, ka Yesu to Ala delili la a dan na, a ka kalandenw tun bɛ a kɛrɛ fɛ. Yesu ye u ɲininka ko: «Mɔgɔw b'a fɔ ko ne ye jɔn ye?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a jaabi ko: «Dɔw ko Yuhana Batiselikɛla, dɔ wɛrɛw ko Eli, dɔ wɛrɛw fana ko fɔlɔ kiraw la kelen kununna ka bɔ suw cɛma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u ɲininka ko: «Nka aw dun, aw yɛrɛw ɲɛ na, ne ye jɔni ye?» Piɛrɛ y'a jaabi ko: «Ala ka Krisita.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a gɛlɛya u ma ko u kana o fɔ mɔgɔ si ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ fana ko: «Wajibi don Mɔgɔ Denkɛ ka tɔɔrɔ kosɛbɛ, cɛkɔrɔbaw ni sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ani sariya karamɔgɔw ka ban a la. A na faga, a saya tile sabanan don, a na kunun.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a y'a fɔ u bɛɛ ye ko: «Ni mɔgɔ dɔ b'a fɛ ka ne nɔ minɛ, o ka ban a yɛrɛ la, ka a gengenjiri ta don o don, ka tugu ne la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ min b'a fɛ ka a yɛrɛ ni kisi, o na bɔnɛ a la, nka min bɛ bɔnɛ a ni la ne kosɔn, o de na a ni kisi.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bɛ mun ɲɛ mɔgɔ ye ka diɲɛ bɛɛ sɔrɔ, ni a bɛ bɔnɛ a yɛrɛ ni la ka halaki?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ min maloyara ne ni ne ka kumaw ma, Mɔgɔ Denkɛ na maloya o tigi ma, ni a nana ni a yɛrɛ nɔɔrɔ ye tuma min na, ani a Fa nɔɔrɔ, ani mɛlɛkɛ senumaw nɔɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, minnu bɛ yan, olu dɔw tɛna sa fewu, sani u ka Ala ka masaya ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kumaw fɔ tile segin ɲɔgɔn, Yesu taara ni Piɛrɛ ni Yuhana ni Yakuba ye kulu kan walisa ka Ala deli.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a to delili la, a ɲɛda cogo yɛlɛmana, a ka finiw jɛyara ka manamana.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, cɛ fila kɛra yen ka kuma Yesu fɛ, olu tun ye Musa ni Eli ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'u jira ni nɔɔrɔba ye. Yesu bɛna a ka baara dafa sɔɔni ka sa cogo min na Jerusalɛm, u tun bɛ kuma a fɛ o kow la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sunɔgɔba tun bɛ Piɛrɛ ni a fɛ mɔgɔw ɲɛ la, nka u kununlen ye Yesu nɔɔrɔma ye, ka o cɛ fila jɔlen ye a kɛrɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛw taatɔ ka bɔ Yesu kɔrɔ, Piɛrɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, an bɛ yan, o ka ɲi. An ka bugu saba jɔ, e ta kelen, Musa ta kelen, Eli ta kelen.» A tun ka kan ka min fɔ, a ma o dɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a to o kuma la, sankaba nana ka u datugu. Kalandenw dontɔ sankaba kɔrɔ, u siranna.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kumakan dɔ bɔra o sankaba la ko: «Nin ye ne Denkɛ ɲɛnatɔmɔlen de ye. A' ye a lamɛn.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kumakan bɔlen kɔ, u ma mɔgɔ si ye Yesu kelen kɔ. Kalandenw ye u makun, u ma u ka ko yelenw lakali mɔgɔ si ye o waati la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, u jiginnen ka bɔ kulu kan, jamaba taara Yesu kunbɛn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ jama la, o pɛrɛnna ko: «Karamɔgɔ, ne b'i deli, i ka ne denkɛ filɛ, ne denkɛ kelenpe don.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jinɛ dɔ b'a minɛ, o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ a bɛ kulo, jinɛ b'a yigiyigi, fo kanga bɛ bɔ a da la. O jinɛ bɔ ko ka gɛlɛn a la, a bɔtɔ b'a fari birindi kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne ye i ka kalandenw deli ko u k'a gɛn, nka u ma se.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Aw kɔni, siya dannabali, mɔgɔ dulenw, ne na to aw fɛ yan ka aw ko muɲu fo tuma jumɛn? Na ni i denkɛ ye yan.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Den gɛrɛla a la tuma min na, jinɛ y'a bin duguma k'a yigiyigi kosɛbɛ. Nka Yesu ye jinɛ kɔrɔfɔ ka cɛnin kɛnɛya k'a segin a fa ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ka sebaayaba ye mɔgɔw bɛɛ kabokoya. Ka u bɛɛ kabakoyalen to Yesu ka ko kɛlenw bɛɛ la, a y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye aw tulo majɔ ka nin kuma lamɛn: Mɔgɔ Denkɛ bɛna don mɔgɔw bolo.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u ma o kuma kɔrɔ dɔn. O dogolen tun bɛ u la walisa u kana o kɔrɔ faamu. U sirannen ma se k'a ɲininka o ko la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalandenw tun bɛ ɲɔgɔn ɲininka ko u la jumɛn ka bon tɔw bɛɛ ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u ka miirili dɔn. A ye denmisɛn dɔ ta k'a jɔ a kɛrɛ fɛ,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Min bɛ nin denmisɛn minɛ ko ɲuman ne kosɔn, o bɛ ne minɛ ko ɲuman. Min bɛ ne minɛ ko ɲuman, o bɛ ne cibaa de minɛ ko ɲuman. Min ye aw bɛɛ la dɔgɔmannin ye, o de ye aw la mɔgɔba ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ye kuma ta, a ko: «Karamɔgɔ, an ye cɛ dɔ ye, o tun bɛ jinɛw gɛn i tɔgɔ la, an y'a bali k'a kɛ, katuguni a tɛ an dɔ ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Aw kana a bali, katuguni min tɛ aw jugu ye, o ye aw ɲin ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 51 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tun ka kan ka bɔ diɲɛ la ka taa sankolo la waati min na, o surunyalen, a y'i kun da Jerusalɛm kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 52 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye cidenw bila ka taa a ɲɛ. Olu taatɔ, u donna Samari dugu dɔ kɔnɔ ko u bɛ jatigila ɲini a ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 53 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka o dugu mɔgɔw ma sɔn k'a ladon, k'a masɔrɔ a kun dalen tun bɛ Jerusalɛm kan.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Suman tigɛta ka ca, nka baarakɛlaw ka dɔgɔ. O de kosɔn aw ka Sumantigi deli ko a ka baarakɛlaw ci ka taa a ka suman tigɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye taa! Ne bɛ aw ci ka taa i n'a fɔ sagadenw bɛ taa waraw cɛma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana wari bilalan ta, wala dugutaa minɛn wala sabara. Aw kana jɔ ka mɔgɔ si fo sira la.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni hɛrɛden dɔ sɔrɔla yen, aw ka hɛrɛ na to a kan, n'o tɛ, aw ka hɛrɛ na segin aw ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka to o so kɔnɔ. U mana min di aw ma, a' ye o dun ka o min, katuguni baarakɛla ka kan ni a sara ye. Aw kana yɛlɛma sow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw donna dugu dɔ kɔnɔ, ni olu ye aw minɛ ko ɲuman, u bɛ dumuni minnu sigi aw kɔrɔ, a' ye olu dun.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, aw kana ɲagali ko jinɛw kolola aw ye, nka a' ye ɲagali katuguni aw tɔgɔw sɛbɛnnen bɛ sankolo la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O waati la, Yesu ɲagalila kosɛbɛ Ni Senu barika la, a ko: «Ne Fa, sankolo ni dugukolo Matigi, ne bɛ barika da i ye, k'a masɔrɔ i ye nin kow dogo hakilitigiw ni mɔgɔ kalannenbaw la, ka u jira denmisɛnw na. Ɔwɔ, ne Fa, katuguni o de diyara i ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Fɛnw bɛɛ donna ne bolo ne Fa fɛ. Ala Denkɛ ye min ye, mɔgɔ si tɛ o dɔn, fɔ ne Fa kelenpe. Ne Fa ye min ye, mɔgɔ si tɛ o dɔn, fɔ a Denkɛ kelenpe, ani a Denkɛ b'a fɛ k'a Fa jira mɔgɔ min na.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu y'i yɛlɛma a ka kalandenw fan fɛ k'a fɔ olu dama ye ko: «Aw ye dubadenw ye aw ka fɛn yetaw kosɔn.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Mun sɛbɛnnen bɛ sariya la? I bɛ mun kalan a la?»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ka jaabili ɲɛ na. I ka o kɛ, i na ɲɛnamaya.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka o sariya karamɔgɔ tun b'a fɛ ka jo di a yɛrɛ ma. A ye Yesu ɲininka ko: «Jɔn dun ye ne mɔgɔ ɲɔgɔn ye?»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la sarakalasebaa dɔ tɛmɛnna o sira fɛ. A y'o cɛ ye tuma min na, a tɛmɛnna sira fan dɔ fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la fana, Levite dɔ sera o yɔrɔ la k'a ye, o fana tɛmɛnna sira fan dɔ fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Samarika dɔ dugu taatɔ sera a ma k'a ye, a hinɛ donna o la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O gɛrɛla a la ka tulu ni diwɛn kɛ a jogindaw la ka u siri. O kɔ, a y'a layɛlɛn a yɛrɛ ka bagan kan ka taa n'a ye dunanjigin yɔrɔ dɔ la, k'i janto a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dugusajɛ, o Samarika ye wari dɛɲɛ fila bɔ ka u di jatigikɛ ma k'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘I janto o cɛ la. Ni i ye min kɛ a ye ka tɛmɛn o kan, ne kɔsegintɔ na o sara.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] E ɲɛ na, binkannikɛlaw binna cɛ min kan, o cɛ saba la jumɛn kɛra a mɔgɔ ɲɔgɔn ye?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya karamɔgɔ y'a jaabi ko: «Min makarila a la.» Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «I yɛrɛ ka taa o ɲɔgɔn kɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu ni a ka kalandenw to sira kan, a donna dugu dɔ kɔnɔ. Muso dɔ y'a ladon a ka so, o tɔgɔ ko Marte.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimamuso dɔ tun bɛ Marte fɛ, ko Mariyama. O y'i sigi Matigi sen kɔrɔ k'a ka kumaw lamɛn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Marte hakili ɲaaminen tun don a ka so kɔnɔ baara caman kosɔn. A taara k'a fɔ Yesu ye ko: «Matigi, ne balimamuso ye ne kelenpe to baara la, o tɛ i ɲɛnafɛn ye wa? A fɔ a ye ko a ka ne dɛmɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi y'a jaabi ko: «Marte, Marte, i b'i yɛrɛ sɛgɛn k'i kɔnɔgan fɛn caman na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ mago bɛ fɛn kelenpe de la. Mariyama ye niyɔrɔ ɲuman de ɲɛnatɔmɔ, o tɛna bɔsi a la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don dɔ la, Yesu tun bɛ Ala deli yɔrɔ dɔ la. A tilalen kɔ, a ka kalanden dɔ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Matigi, an dege Ala delili la, i ko Yuhana fana ye a ka kalandenw dege cogo min na.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ni aw bɛ Ala deli tuma min na, aw k'a fɔ ko: ‘An Fa, i tɔgɔ ka saniya, i ka masaya ka na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ka don o don dumuni di an ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ka jurumuw yafa an ma, katuguni an fana bɛ yafa an hakɛ tabaaw ma. I kana an don kɔrɔbɔli la.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye fana ko: «Aw la mɔgɔ jumɛn, ni teri dɔ b'a fɛ, ni a taara o sɛgɛrɛ dugutila fɛ k'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘Ne teri, i ka nbuurukun saba juru don ne la,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni ne teri dɔ nana sisan ka bɔ taama la, foyi tɛ ne bolo ka di a ma.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni o y'i to so kɔnɔ k'a jaabi ko: ‘I kana ne sɛgɛn. Da sɔgɔra, ne ni ne denw dalen don. Ne tɛ se ka wuli ka nbuuru di i ma.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, ni a ma wuli ka u di a ma teriya kosɔn, a na wuli k'a mago nbuuru bɛɛ di a ma a ka misɛnya kɔni kosɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni b'a fɔ aw ye ko: A' ye delili kɛ, aw na sɔrɔli kɛ. A' ye ɲinili kɛ, aw na yeli kɛ. A' ye da kɔnkɔn, da na yɛlɛ aw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ delili kɛ, o bɛ sɔrɔli kɛ. Min bɛ ɲinili kɛ, o bɛ yeli kɛ. Min bɛ da kɔnkɔn, da na yɛlɛ o ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw fɛn o fɛn denkɛ bɛ jɛgɛ deli a fɛ, mɔgɔ bɛ aw la min bɛ sɔn ka sa di a den ma jɛgɛ nɔ na wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Walima ni aw dɔ den ye shɛfan deli, o bɛ sɔn ka bunteni di a den ma shɛfan nɔ na wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw minnu ka jugu, ni aw bɛ fɛn ɲumanw di cogo dɔn aw denw ma, aw sankolola Fa tɛna Ni Senu di a delibaaw ma ka tɛmɛn aw ta di cogo kan kosɛbɛ wa?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tun bɛ jinɛ bobo gɛn ka bɔ cɛ dɔ la. Jinɛ bɔlen kɔ, o cɛ sera ka kuma. Jama bɛɛ kabakoyara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u dɔw ko: «A bɛ jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la jinɛw kuntigi Bɛlzebul de barika la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔ wɛrɛw tun b'a fɛ k'a kɔrɔbɔ, olu ye taamashyɛn kabakoma dɔ deli a fɛ ka bɔ sankolo la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ye u ka miiriliw dɔn, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Masaya o masaya, ni a fan kelen wulila a fan dɔ kama, o bɛ tiɲɛ. So o so, ni a ka mɔgɔw wulila ɲɔgɔn kama, o bɛ tiɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sitanɛ fana, ni a wulila a yɛrɛ kama, a ka masaya na sigi cogo di? K'a masɔrɔ aw ko ne bɛ jinɛw gɛn Bɛlzebul barika la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni ne bɛ jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la Bɛlzebul barika la, aw ka mɔgɔw dun bɛ u gɛn jɔn barika la? Olu yɛrɛw na kiri tigɛ aw kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni ne bɛ jinɛw gɛn ni Ala bolo ye, o b'a jira ko Ala ka masaya sera aw ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni cɛ barikama dɔ bɛ a ka so kɔlɔsi, kɛlɛkɛ minɛnw b'a bolo, a ka fɛnw bɛɛ maralen bɛ ko ɲuman.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka cɛ min barika ka bon ni a ta ye, ni o nana ka se sɔrɔ a kan, a jigi tun bɛ a ka minɛn minnu kan, a na olu bɔsi a la ka a bolofɛnw bɛɛ cɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Min tɛ ne ɲin ye, o ye ne jugu de ye. Min tɛ ne dɛmɛ ka ɲɛni kɛ, o bɛ tiɲɛni de kɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni jinɛ bɔra mɔgɔ la tuma min na, a bɛ yaala yɔrɔ jintanw la ka lafiya yɔrɔ ɲini. Ni a m'a sɔrɔ, a b'a fɔ a yɛrɛ ye ko: ‘Ne bɔra ne ka so min kɔnɔ, ne na kɔsegin ka taa yen.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A kɔseginnen b'a sɔrɔ o so furalen labɛnnen don.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la a bɛ taa ka na ni jinɛ wolonwula wɛrɛw ye minnu ka jugu ni a yɛrɛ ye, a ni olu bɛ don o so kɔnɔ k'u sigi yen. O cogo la o mɔgɔ laban ko na juguya ka tɛmɛn a fɔlɔ ta kan.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to o kuma la, muso dɔ y'i to jama cɛma ka pɛrɛn ko: «Muso min ye i kɔnɔ ta ka sin di i ma, o ye dubaden ye!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ko: «ɔwɔ, nka minnu bɛ Ala ka kuma lamɛn k'a kɛ, olu ye dubadenw de ye!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu lamininen to jama fɛ fo k'a degun, a ye kuma daminɛ, a ko: «Bi mɔgɔw ka jugu. U bɛ taamashyɛn kabakoma dɔ ɲini, nka taamashyɛn si tɛna jira u la ni kira Jonasi ta tɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jonasi kɛra taamashyɛn ye ka jira Ninivɛkaw la cogo min na, o cogo la Mɔgɔ Denkɛ fana na kɛ taamashyɛn ye ka jira bi mɔgɔw la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kiritigɛ don na worodugu yanfan masa musoman na wuli ka bi mɔgɔw jalaki, katuguni ale nana ka bɔ dugukolo dan na walisa ka Solomani ka hakilitigiya kumaw lamɛn. Dɔ bɛ yan min ka bon ni Solomani ye!
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kiritigɛ don na, Ninivɛkaw na wuli ka bi mɔgɔw jalaki, k'a masɔrɔ Ninivɛkaw nimisara u ka jurumuw la Jonasi ka waajuli kosɔn. Dɔ bɛ yan min ka bon ni Jonasi ye!
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ si tɛ lanpa mana k'a dogo wala ka minɛn dɔ biri a da la, nka a b'a sigi so kɔnɔ, walisa so kɔnɔ donbaaw ka a yeelen ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ ɲɛw ye a farikolo lanpa ye. Ni i ɲɛkisɛw ka kɛnɛ, i farikolo bɛɛ bɛ yeelen na, nka n'i ɲɛw man ɲi, i farikolo bɛɛ bɛ dibi la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I yɛrɛ kɔlɔsi, walisa i kɔnɔna yeelen kana kɛ dibi ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la, ni i farikolo bɛɛ bɛ kɛnɛ la, ni dibi tɛ a yɔrɔ si la, a yɔrɔw bɛɛ na kɛnɛ bɔ, i ko lanpa yeelen bɛ kɛnɛ bɔ i ye cogo min na.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to o kuma la, Farisiɛn dɔ y'a deli ko a ka na tilerɔfana dun ale ka so. Yesu donna o ka so kɔnɔ k'i sigi dumuni la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O Farisiɛn y'a ye ko Yesu ma a tɛgɛ ko sani a ka dumuni kɛ minkɛ, a kabakoyara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Matigi y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Aw Farisiɛnw kɔni bɛ jifilenw ni tasaw kɔkanna ko ka u jɛ, k'a sɔrɔ aw kɔnɔw falen bɛ binkanni kow ni juguya sifa bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hakilintanw! Ala min ye fɛnw kɔkanna dila, o ma u kɔnɔ fana dila wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka aw ka u kɔnɔ fɛnw di faantanw ma, o cogo la fɛnw bɛɛ na saniya aw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Bɔnɛ bɛ aw Farisiɛnw ye, k'a masɔrɔ aw bɛ nanaye ni nafɛnw ani nakɔfɛn tɔw bɛɛ jaka bɔ, nka aw bɛ tilennenya kow ni Ala kanuya to yen. Aw tun ka kan ka nin belebelebaw kɛ, ka o fɛn misɛnw fana fara u kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Bɔnɛ bɛ aw Farisiɛnw ye, k'a masɔrɔ Alabatoso kɔnɔ sigi yɔrɔ fɔlɔw ani mɔgɔw ka aw fo fɛrɛkɛnɛw la, olu de ka di aw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Bɔnɛ bɛ aw ye, k'a masɔrɔ aw bɔlen bɛ kaburu dogolenw fɛ, mɔgɔw bɛ taama u kan k'a sɔrɔ u m'a dɔn.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya karamɔgɔ dɔ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, o kumaw fɔtɔ, i bɛ an fana lagosi.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Bɔnɛ bɛ aw sariya karamɔgɔw fana ye, k'a masɔrɔ doni minnu tali ka gɛlɛn, aw bɛ olu da mɔgɔw kun, aw tɛ sɔn ka aw bolonkɔni kelen kɛ ka u dɛmɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Bɔnɛ bɛ aw ye, katuguni aw bɛ kiraw ka kaburuw dila ko ɲuman, k'a sɔrɔ aw bɛnbaw de ye u faga.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O b'a jira ko aw sɔnna aw bɛnbaw ka kɛwalew ma, katuguni olu de ye kiraw faga, aw kɔni ye u ka kaburuw dila.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn fana Ala ka hakilitigiya ko: ‘Ne na kiraw ni cidenw ci u ma. U na u dɔw faga, ka tugu dɔ wɛrɛw nɔfɛ ka u tɔɔrɔ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ na kɛ walisa kira minnu fagara kabini diɲɛ da tuma, olu joli ɲininkali ka kɛ bi mɔgɔw la,

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 53 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bɔlen kɔ o yɔrɔ la, sariya karamɔgɔw ni Farisiɛnw y'a daminɛ ka digi a la k'a dala ɲini cogo bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 54 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun b'a kɔlɔsi, walisa u k'a sendon sababu sɔrɔ ka bɔ a yɛrɛ da la kumaw la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O waati la, jamaba y'u lajɛ, u tun bɛ mɔgɔ waa caman bɔ, fo u tun bɛ yɛlɛn ɲɔgɔn senw kan. Yesu ye kuma daminɛ a ka kalandenw fɛ fɔlɔ, a ko: «A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi Farisiɛnw ka buurufunun fɛn na, o kɔrɔ, u ka filankafoya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Foyi dogolen tɛ min tɛna bɔ kɛnɛ kan. Gundo si tɛ ni a tɛna dɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn aw ye fɛn o fɛn fɔ su fɛ dibi la, o na mɛn kɛnɛ kan tile fɛ. Ni aw ye fɛn o fɛn fɔ mɔgɔ tulo kɔrɔ soɲɛkɔnɔ na, o welewele na da sow san fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ne teriw, ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, minnu bɛ mɔgɔ farikolo faga ni u tɛ se ka foyi kɛ o kɔ, aw kana siran olu ɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka kan ka siran min ɲɛ, ne bɛ o jira aw la. Fanga bɛ Ala min fɛ ka mɔgɔ faga, o kɔ, k'a ni fili jahanama kɔnɔ, a' ye siran o de ɲɛ. Ɔwɔ, ne b'a fɔ aw ye, a' ye siran o de ɲɛ.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni, hali aw kunsigi bɛɛ dama dɔnnen don. Aw kana siran, aw ka fisa cɔrɔnin caman ye!

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ kuma jugu fɔ Mɔgɔ Denkɛ ma, o na yafa a ma, nka ni min ye Ni Senu tɔgɔ tiɲɛ, yafa tɛna kɛ o ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni mɔgɔw taara ni aw ye Alabatosow kɔnɔ ani kiritigɛlaw ni fangatigiw ɲɛ kɔrɔ, aw hakili kana ɲaami aw ka jaabili ni aw ka fɔta la,

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ y'i to jama la k'a fɔ Yesu ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, a fɔ ne balimakɛ ye ko a ka an fa ciyɛn tila an cɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «Ne teri, jɔn ye ne sigi ka kɛ aw ka kiritigɛla wala aw ka ciyɛntilabaa ye?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u bɛɛ ye ko: «A' ye aw janto aw yɛrɛw la ka aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi wasabaliya bɛɛ ma, katuguni mɔgɔ ka nafolo caya o caya, a ka ɲɛnamaya tɛ bɔ o la dɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la a ye nin ntalen da u ye, ko: «Cɛ nafolotigi dɔ ka sɛnɛ diyara kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'i miiri ko: ‘Ne na mun kɛ sa, katuguni ne ka suman bɛɛ lasagon yɔrɔ tɛ yen?’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko: ‘A filɛ, ne na nin de kɛ. Ne na ne ka jiginɛw ci ka dɔ wɛrɛw jɔ ka u bonya fɔlɔ taw ye. Ne na ne ka suman ni ne bolofɛnw bɛɛ lajɛ u kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, ne n'a fɔ ne yɛrɛ ye ko fɛn caman maralen bɛ ne ye san caman ɲɛ. Ne na ne lafiya, ka dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ ka n'ɲɛnajɛ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Ala y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘Nalonma! Bi su fɛ i ni na minɛ i la. O tuma la, i ye nin fɛn minnu lajɛ, olu dun na kɛ jɔn ta ye?’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ nafoloba lajɛ a yɛrɛ diyaɲekow kama, k'a sɔrɔ a tɛ nafolotigi ye Ala ta fan fɛ, o bɛ ten.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «O de kosɔn ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: Aw kana hami aw balo ko la, ko aw na mun dun? Aw kana hami aw fɛɛrɛbɔ ko la ko aw na mun fini don?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ mɔgɔ ni ka girin dumuni ma, farikolo ka girin fini ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye miiri nkankan kɔnɔw ko la. U tɛ danni kɛ, u tɛ suman tigɛ. Fɛn mara yɔrɔ wala jiginɛ yɛrɛ tɛ u fɛ, o bɛɛ n'a ta, Ala bɛ u balo. Aw man fisa kɔnɔw ye kosɛbɛ wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw la mɔgɔ jumɛn bɛ se ka hali dɔɔnin fara a yɛrɛ si dama kan ni hami ye?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn, ni aw tɛ se ka o fɛn fitinin kɛ, mun y'a to aw bɛ hami ko tɔw la?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye miiri kungo kɔnɔ bagaw falen cogo la. U tɛ baara kɛ, u tɛ paratali kɛ, o bɛɛ n'a ta ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko masa Solomani ni a ka faamaya bɛɛ, a ka finiw si ma o baga feerew la kelen bɔ cɛɲɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Bin min bɛ kungo kɔnɔ bi, k'a sɔrɔ tasuma na a jeni sini, ni Ala bɛ o fɛɛrɛ bɔ ten, a tɛna aw fɛɛrɛ bɔ ka tɛmɛn o kan kosɛbɛ wa? Aw ka dannaya ka dɔgɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw na min dun ka min min, aw kana hami olu ɲinili la, aw kana sigasiga u sɔrɔli la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Siya minnu tɛ Ala dɔn, olu bɛɛ bɛ o fɛnw bɛɛ ɲini, nka aw Fa b'a dɔn ko aw mago bɛ olu la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni ka Ala ka masaya de ɲini. O kɔ, Ala na o fɛnw bɛɛ di aw ma ka fara o kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw kana siran, sagakuluninn, k'a masɔrɔ a diyara aw Fa ye ka a ka masaya di aw ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye aw bolofɛnw feere ka o wari di faantanw ma. A' ye foroko kɔrɔbaliw dila aw yɛrɛw ye ka nafolo banbali lajɛ sankolo la, nson tɛ se yen, ntumu tɛ se ka a tiɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ i ka nafolo bɛ yɔrɔ min na, i dusukun miirili fana bɛ yen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw cɛsirilen ni aw ka lanpa manalenw ka to.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka kɛ i ko baaraden minnu bɛ u kuntigi makɔnɔ, ni a bɛ na ka bɔ kɔɲɔ yɔrɔ la tuma min na, walisa ni a nana ka da kɔnkɔn, u ka da yɛlɛ a ye joona.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni kuntigi nana ka baaraden minnu sɔrɔ a ɲɛnafilɛli la, olu ye dubadenw ye. Ne b'a fɔ aw ye tiɲɛ la ko a na a cɛsiri ka u lasigi dumuni la ka dumuni tilatila u cɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni a nana dugutila fɛ wala dugujɛ da fɛ ka u sɔrɔ a ɲɛnafilɛli la, olu ye dubadenw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw k'a dɔn ko ni sotigi tun ye nson na tuma dɔn, a tun na to a ɲɛ na walisa a ka so daw kana kari.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw fana labɛnnen ka to, k'a masɔrɔ aw tɛ miiri ko Mɔgɔ Denkɛ bɛ na waati min na, a bɛ na o waati yɛrɛ de la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Piɛrɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Matigi, i bɛ nin ntalen da an dama kosɔn wa, wala mɔgɔw bɛɛ kosɔn?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi y'a jaabi ko: «Sokunnasigibaa dannamɔgɔ hakiliman min kuntigi b'a bila a ka jɔn tɔw kun na ka u ka dumuni ko ɲɛnabɔ a waati latigɛlen na, o ye jɔni ye?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jɔnkɛ min makɛ nalen y'a sɔrɔ a b'a kɛ a cogo la, o ye dubaden ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko o makɛ na o jɔnkɛ sigi a bolo fɛn bɛɛ kun na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni o jɔnkɛ y'i miiri a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ ko a makɛ na mɛn yen, ni a y'a daminɛ ka a jɔnɲɔgɔn cɛmanw ni musomanw gosi, ka dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ k'i fa dɔlɔ la,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ayiwa o jɔnkɛ tɛ a ɲɛnafilɛ don min na, a tɛ waati min dɔn, a makɛ bɛ na o waati yɛrɛ de la. A na o jɔnkɛ halaki ka a niyɔrɔ di a ma dannabaliw fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Jɔnkɛ min ye a makɛ sago dɔn, ni a ma labɛnni kɛ ka baara kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni o sago ye, o na gosi kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka jɔnkɛ min ma a makɛ sago dɔn, ni a ye ko dɔw kɛ minnu ka kan ni gosili ye, o na gosi dɔɔnin. Fɛn caman dira min ma, fɛn caman na ɲini o fɛ. Fɛn caman kalifara min ma, fɛn caman ɲininkali na kɛ o tigi la ka tɛmɛn o kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 49 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ne nana tasuma kerun dugukolo kan. Ni sisan tun y'a sɔrɔ a manana ka ban, o tun na diya ne ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 50 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Batiseli dɔ bɛ yen, wajibi don ne ka tɛmɛn o fɛ. Ne kɔrɔtɔlen bɛ kosɛbɛ sani o ka kɛ ka dafa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 51 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw bɛ miiri ko ne nana hɛrɛ kɛ dugukolo kan wa? Ayi dɛrɛ, ne b'a fɔ aw ye, fɔ tilali.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 52 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kabini sisan, mɔgɔ duuru na sɔrɔ so kelen kɔnɔ, u na tila. Mɔgɔ saba na kɛ mɔgɔ fila kama, mɔgɔ fila na kɛ mɔgɔ saba kama.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 53 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fa na kɛ a denkɛ kama, denkɛ na kɛ a fa kama. Ba na kɛ a denmuso kama, denmuso na kɛ a ba kama. Muso na kɛ a denkɛ muso kama, furumuso na kɛ a biranmuso kama.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 54 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ jama ye fana ko: «Ni aw bɛ sankaba wulitɔ ye tilebin yanfan fɛ tuma min na, aw b'a fɔ o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ ko sanji bɛ na, a bɛ kɛ ten.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 55 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni fiɲɛ bɛ ci ka bɔ worodugu yanfan fɛ, aw b'a fɔ ko funteni na kɛ, a bɛ kɛ ten.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 56 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Filankafow! Aw bɛ dugukolo ni sankolo ɲɛ faranfasi dɔn, mun y'a to aw tɛ nin waati kow faranfasi?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 57 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mun y'a to aw tɛ sira tilennen faranfasi aw yɛrɛw ma?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 58 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka i ni i kiriɲɔgɔn taatɔ to kiri yɔrɔ la, i jija i ka tila a la ka aw to sira kan, walisa a kana taa ni i ye kiritigɛla ɲɛ kɔrɔ, kiritigɛla kana na i don garadikɛ bolo, garadikɛ kana na i bila kaso la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 12 [VERSE_ID] 59 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ i ye ko i tɛna bɔ yen fewu sani i ka o juru bɛɛ sara, hali dɔrɔmɛ kelen tɛna to.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O waati la, Pilate tun ye Galileka minnu faga ka u to saraka baganw fagali la, ka u joli ni u ka saraka baganw joli ɲaami ɲɔgɔn na, mɔgɔ dɔw taara o kow kibaru fɔ Yesu ye.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lafiɲɛ don dɔ la, Yesu tun bɛ mɔgɔ kalan na Alabatoso dɔ kɔnɔ.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tun bɛ dugubaw ni dugu misɛnw yaala, a kun dalen tun bɛ Jerusalɛm kan. A taatɔ tun bɛ mɔgɔw kalan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔ y'a ɲininka ko: «Matigi, mɔgɔ minnu na kisi, olu dama ka dɔgɔ wa?» Yesu y'a jaabi ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' y'a jija ka don da dɔgɔmannin fɛ, katuguni ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko mɔgɔ caman na cogo ɲini ka don, nka u tɛna se.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni dutigi wulila ka da sɔgɔ tuma min na, ka aw to kɛnɛma, aw n'a daminɛ ka jɔ da la ka da kɔnkɔn k'a fɔ ko: ‘Matigi, da yɛlɛ an ye.’ A na aw jaabi ko a ma aw bɔ yɔrɔ dɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la aw n'a daminɛ k'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘An ye dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ i ɲɛ na, i ye an kalan an ka duguw bɔlɔnw la.’

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, wajibi don ne ka to sira kan ka taa, bi ani sini ani sinikɛnɛ, katuguni a bɛnnen tɛ kira dɔ ka faga yɔrɔ wɛrɛ ni Jerusalɛm tɛ.
