[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 13 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A filɛ, aw ka so lankolon na to aw ye. Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, aw tɛna ne ye tun sani aw k'a fɔ ko: ‘Min natɔ filɛ Matigi tɔgɔ la, o ye dubaden ye!’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lafiɲɛ don dɔ la, Yesu taara Farisiɛnw la mɔgɔba dɔ ka so ka dumuni kɛ yen. Farisiɛn minnu tun bɛ yen, olu tun b'a kɔlɔsi.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ yen, farikolo fununbana tun b'a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye kuma ta ka sariya karamɔgɔw ni Farisiɛnw ɲininka ko: «Ka kɛɲɛ ni sariya ye, a dagalen bɛ ka banabaatɔ kɛnɛya lafiɲɛ don na wa, wala a dagalen tɛ?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u m'a jaabi. O tuma la, Yesu ye o banabaatɔ ta k'a kɛnɛya k'a bila ka taa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ni aw dɔ denkɛ wala a ka misi binna kɔlɔn kɔnɔ, a tɛna teliya ka o labɔ, hali lafiɲɛ don na wa?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ma se k'a jaabi o ko la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ minnu welela dumuni la, Yesu ye ntalen da olu ye, katuguni a y'a kɔlɔsi ko u tun bɛ ɲɛfɛ sigiyɔrɔw ɲɛnatɔmɔ. A y'a fɔ u ye ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni mɔgɔ dɔ y'i wele kɔɲɔ dumuni la, i kana taa i sigi ɲɛfɛ sigi yɔrɔ la. I t'a dɔn yala ni mɔgɔ min jɔyɔrɔ ka bon ni i ta ye, ko o fana welelen bɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min ye aw fila bɛɛ wele, ni o nana k'a fɔ i ye ko i ka sigi yɔrɔ di nin cɛ ma, o tuma la i maloyalen na taa i sigi kɔfɛ sigi yɔrɔ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni i welela, taa i sigi kɔfɛ sigi yɔrɔ la, walisa i welebaa mana na, a k'a fɔ i ye ko: ‘Ne teri, taa i sigi ɲɛfɛ sigi yɔrɔ la.’ O tuma la i na bonyali sɔrɔ i dumunikɛɲɔgɔnw ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ a yɛrɛ kɔrɔta, o na majigin. Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ a yɛrɛ majigin, o na kɔrɔta.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min ye Yesu wele dumuni la, a y'a fɔ o fana ye ko: «Ni i bɛ dumuniba labɛn tile fɛ wala su fɛ, i kana i teriw wele, wala i badenw, wala i balimaw, wala i sigiɲɔgɔn nafolotigiw. Olu fana bɛ se ka i wele dumuni la ka i ka weleli juru sara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka n'i bɛ dumuniba labɛn, i ka faantanw ni mɔgɔ fiɲɛmaw ni nabaraw ani fiyentɔw wele.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I na duba sɔrɔ, katuguni olu tɛna se ka i ka weleli juru sara. I na o sara sɔrɔ mɔgɔ tilennenw suw kununli don na.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O dumunikɛlaw la kelen ye o kuma mɛn minkɛ, a ko: «Min na dumuni kɛ Ala ka masaya la, o ye dubaden ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Cɛ dɔ ye sula fanaba labɛn ka mɔgɔ caman wele.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dumuni waati selen, a ye a ka baaraden ci ka taa a fɔ mɔgɔ welelenw ye ko: ‘A’ ye na, katuguni fɛn bɛɛ labɛnna ka ban.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛɛ kelen-kelen binna yafa ɲini na ni dusu kelen ye. Fɔlɔ y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘Ne ye foro dɔ san, ne ka kan ka taa o filɛ. Ne b'i deli, i ka yafa ne ma.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔ wɛrɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘Ne ye ntura tan san, ne bɛ taa u kɔrɔbɔ. Ne b'i deli, i ka yafa ne ma.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔ wɛrɛ fana y'a fɔ ko: ‘Ne ye muso furu sisan, o de y'a to ne tɛ se ka taa.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Baaraden seginna ka taa o kuntigi fɛ ka o kow bɛɛ lakali a ye. Dutigi diminna, a y'a fɔ a ka baaraden ye ko: ‘I teliya ka taa dugu fɛrɛkɛnɛw ni nbɛdaw la ka faantanw ni mɔgɔ fiɲɛmaw ni fiyentɔw ani nabaraw wele ka na n'u ye yan.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen, baaraden y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘Ne kuntigi, i ye min fɔ, o kɛra, nka hali o, so ma fa.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kuntigi y'a fɔ baaraden ye ko: ‘Taa sirabaw ani sinsan kɛrɛfɛlaw la ka mɔgɔw karaba ka na, walisa ne ka so ka fa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, mɔgɔ minnu tun welela, olu si tɛna ne ka surɔfana nɛnɛ!’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jamaba tugulen tun bɛ Yesu nɔfɛ. A y'i yɛlɛma u fan fɛ k'a fɔ u ye ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni mɔgɔ dɔ nana ne nɔfɛ, ni o ma a fa koniya, ani a ba, ni a muso ni a denw, ni a balimakɛw ni a balimamusow, ani a yɛrɛkun fana, a tɛ se ka kɛ ne ka kalanden ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min tɛ a gengenjiri ta ka tugu ne la, o tɛ se ka kɛ ne ka kalanden ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw la jumɛn, ni a b'a fɛ ka sankanso jan jɔ, a tɛna i sigi fɔlɔ k'a jɔ sɔngɔ jate k'a filɛ ni fɛn b'a bolo k'a laban wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bɛ siran ko ni a y'a ju bɔ, n'a ma se k'a tɔ laban, o yebaaw bɛɛ n'a daminɛ ka yɛlɛ bɔ a ma,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a fɔ ko: ‘Nin cɛ ye so jɔli daminɛ, nka a ma se k'a laban.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Wala masakɛ jumɛn, n'a bɛ taa masakɛ wɛrɛ kɛlɛ, a tɛna i sigi fɔlɔ k'i miiri ni a ni cɛ waa tan bɛ se ka masakɛ wɛrɛ ni cɛ waa mugan kunbɛn wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni a tɛ se, ka masakɛ dɔ to yɔrɔ jan, a na cidenw bila ka taa u cɛ labɛn cogo ɲini.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la, aw la mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ tɛ jɛn a bolofɛnw bɛɛ kɔ, o tɛ se ka kɛ ne ka kalanden ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Kɔgɔ ka ɲi, nka ni a timiya bɔra a la, mun na a timiya tun?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 14 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tɛ foyi ɲɛ dugukolo la, a tɛ se ka kɛ nɔgɔ ye foro la fana, mɔgɔ b'a fili kɛnɛma. Tulo bɛ min fɛ ka lamɛnni kɛ, o ka lamɛnni kɛ dɛ!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Faama wari minɛbaaw ni jurumutɔw bɛɛ gɛrɛla Yesu la k'a ka kuma lamɛn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛnw ni sariya karamɔgɔw tun bɛ dajukɔrɔ kuma fɔ, u ko: «Nin cɛ bɛ jurumutɔw minɛ ko ɲuman, a ni u bɛ dumuni kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye nin ntalen da u ye ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw la mɔgɔ jumɛn, ni saga kɛmɛ b'a fɛ, ni olu la kelen tununna, a tɛna a tɔ bikɔnɔntɔn ni kɔnɔntɔn to kungokolon kɔnɔ, ka taa o tununnen ɲini, fo ka a ye wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni a y'a ye tuma min na, a ɲagalitɔ b'a da a kamankun kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A selen so, a bɛ a teriw ni a sigiɲɔgɔnw wele k'a fɔ u ye ko: ‘An ka ɲagali ɲɔgɔn fɛ, k'a masɔrɔ ne ye ne ka saga tununnen ye.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la, ne b'a fɔ aw ye, ni jurumukɛla kelen nimisara a ka jurumuw la, ɲagali bɛ kɛ sankolo kɔnɔ o tigi kosɔn ka tɛmɛn mɔgɔ tilennen bikɔnɔntɔn ni kɔnɔntɔn kan, minnu mago tɛ nimisali la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Muso jumɛn, ni warijɛ tan b'a fɛ, ni o kelen tununna, a tɛna lanpa mana ka so furan k'a ɲini kosɛbɛ, fo k'a ye wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni a y'a ye tuma min na, a b'a terimusow ni a sigiɲɔgɔn musow wele k'a fɔ u ye ko: ‘An ka ɲagali ɲɔgɔn fɛ, k'a masɔrɔ ne ye ne ka warijɛ tununnen ye.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la ne b'a fɔ aw ye, ni jurumukɛla kelen nimisara a ka jurumuw la, ɲagali bɛ kɛ Ala ka mɛlɛkɛw cɛma o tigi kosɔn.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ fana ko: «Denkɛ fila tun bɛ cɛ dɔ fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Denkɛ dɔgɔmannin y'a fɔ a fa ye ko: ‘Ne fa, i ka ne niyɔrɔ di ne ma ka bɔ i ka nafolo la.’ O tuma la fa ye a ka nafolo tila a denkɛ fila cɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tile dama dɔ tɛmɛnnen kɔ, denkɛ dɔgɔmannin y'a niyɔrɔ wari bɛɛ lajɛ ka taa jamana jan dɔ la, k'a bɛɛ tiɲɛ yen kakalaya la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka wari bɛɛ bannen kɔ, kɔngɔba donna o jamana la, a ka balo dɛsɛra.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A taara don baara la o jamana mɔgɔ dɔ fɛ, o y'a bila ka taa a ka forow la ka lɛw kɔlɔsi.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lɛw tun bɛ jiriden minnu dun, a tun b'a fɛ ka a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ fa ni olu ye, nka mɔgɔ si ma foyi di a ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye hakili sɔrɔ minkɛ, a ko: ‘Baaraden caman bɛ ne fa ka so, u bɛ dumuni kɛ fo k'a tɔ to, ne kɔni bɛ sa kɔngɔ bolo yan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne na wuli ka taa ne fa ka so, k'a fɔ a ye ko: Ne fa, ne ye Ala hakɛ ta, ne ye e fana hakɛ ta.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne man kan ka wele i denkɛ tun. I ka ne minɛ i ko i ka baaraden dɔ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A wulila ka taa a fa ka so. K'a to yɔrɔ jan, a fa y'a natɔ ye, a hinɛ donna a la. A bolila ka taa i meleke a denkɛ kan na k'a da susu.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Denkɛ y'a fɔ a fa ye ko: ‘Ne fa, ne ye Ala hakɛ ta, ne ye e fana hakɛ ta, ne man kan ka wele i denkɛ tun.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a fa y'a fɔ a ka baaradenw ye ko: ‘A’ y'aw teliya ka na ni dulɔki bɛɛ la ɲuman ye, ka o don a kan na, ka bololanɛgɛ don a bolo la, ka sabara don a sen na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye na ni misiden tɔlɔlen ye k'a faga. An ka dumuni kɛ ka ɲagali,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ ne denkɛ min filɛ nin ye, o salen tun bɛ, a ɲɛnamayara. A tun tununna, a yera.’ U ye ɲɛnajɛ daminɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A denkɛ fɔlɔ tun bɛ foro la. O surunyalen so la, a ye fɔlikan ni dɔnkɛkan mɛn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye baaraden dɔ wele ka o ɲininka o ɲɛnajɛkan sababu la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O y'a jaabi ko: ‘I dɔgɔkɛ nana, i fa ye misiden tɔlɔlen faga a ye, katuguni a y'a kɛnɛma sɔrɔ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Denkɛ fɔlɔ diminna, a ma sɔn ka don so kɔnɔ. A fa bɔra ka taa a deli.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a y'a fɔ a fa ye ko: ‘Ne san caman filɛ nin ye, ne bɛ baara kɛ i ye. Ne ma i kan bila tuma si. O bɛɛ n'a ta, i ma hali baden kelen di ne ma, walisa ne ni ne teriw ka ɲagali ɲɔgɔn fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka i denkɛ min filɛ nin ye, a ye i ka nafolo bɛɛ tiɲɛ jatɔmusow la. A nalen, i ye misiden tɔlɔlen faga a ye!’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A fa y'a jaabi ko: ‘Ne den, i bɛ ne fɛ yan tuma bɛɛ, ne ka fɛnw bɛɛ ye i ta ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 15 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka an ka kan ka ɲagali ka an ɲɛnajɛ, k'a masɔrɔ i dɔgɔkɛ min filɛ nin ye, o salen tun bɛ, a ɲɛnamayara. A tun tununna, a yera.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye fana ko: «Cɛ nafolobatigi dɔ tun bɛ yen, kunnasigibaa dɔ tun b'a fɛ, mɔgɔw ye o sendon ko o bɛ a kuntigi ka nafolo tiɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kuntigi ye o kunnasigibaa wele k'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘Ne bɛ min mɛn i ko la, o ye mun ye? An ka jate minɛ, katuguni i tɛ se ka to ne ka nafolo kun na tun.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la, kunnasigibaa y'a fɔ a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ ko: ‘Ne na mun kɛ sa? Ne kuntigi bɛ ne bɔ a ka nafolo kun na. Ne tɛ se ka sɛnɛ kɛ. Delili maloya bɛ ne la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ɔnhɔn! Ne na min kɛ, ne bɛ o dɔn, walisa ni ne bɔra nafolo kun na, mɔgɔ dɔw ka ne ladon u ka so.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la minnu ye juru ta a kuntigi fɛ, a ye u kelen-kelen wele. A y'a fɔ fɔlɔ ye ko: ‘Ne kuntigi ka joli b'i la?’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O y'a jaabi ko: ‘Tulu bidon kɛmɛ.’ A y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘I ka sɛbɛn ta k'i sigi joona ka tulu bidon biduuru sɛbɛn.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a y'a fɔ dɔ wɛrɛ ye ko: ‘E dun, i ta ye joli ye?’ O y'a jaabi ko: ‘ɲɔ bɔrɛ kɛmɛ.’ A y'a fɔ o ye ko: ‘I ka sɛbɛn ta ka ɲɔ bɔrɛ bisegin sɛbɛn.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kuntigi ye o kunnasigibaa tilenbali tanu a ka keguya kosɔn, k'a masɔrɔ nin diɲɛ mɔgɔw bɛ kow kɛ ni keguya ye u ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, ka tɛmɛn kɛnɛyeelendenw kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ne kɔni b'a fɔ aw ye ko: A' ye teriw sɔrɔ aw yɛrɛw ye ni tilenbaliya nafolo ye, walisa ni o banna, u ka aw ladon sigi yɔrɔ banbaliw la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min ye dannamɔgɔ ye ko fitininw ko la, o ye dannamɔgɔ ye kobaw fana ko la. Min ye tilenbali ye ko fitininw ko la, o ye tilenbali ye kobaw fana ko la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn, ni aw tɛ dannamɔgɔw ye nin tilenbaliya nafolo kow la, jɔni na nafolo sɛbɛ kalifa aw ma?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw ma kɛ dannamɔgɔw ye mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ka nafolo ko la, jɔni na aw yɛrɛw ta di aw ma?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Baaraden si tɛ se ka baara kɛ kuntigi fila ye, katuguni a na dɔ koniya k'a tɔ kelen kanu, wala a na i nɔrɔ kelen na k'i mago bɔ dɔ la. Aw tɛ se ka baara kɛ Ala ye k'a kɛ nafolo fana ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛnw fana ye o kumaw bɛɛ mɛn minkɛ, u ye yɛlɛ bɔ Yesu ma, k'a masɔrɔ nafolo ko tun ka di u ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Minnu bɛ u yɛrɛw jate tilennenw ye mɔgɔw ɲɛ na, o ye aw de ye, nka Ala bɛ aw dusukunw dɔn, katuguni ko min bɛ bonya Hadamadenw fɛ, o haramulen bɛ Ala fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Sariya ni kiraw ka kitabuw tun bɛ yen fo ka na se Yuhana Batiselikɛla ka waati ma. Kabini o tuma la, Ala ka masaya Kibaru Duman bɛ fɔ, mɔgɔw bɛɛ bɛ u jija ka don a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sankolo ni dugukolo bɛ se ka tɛmɛn, nka sariya sɛbɛnden si tɛna bɔ a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ a muso furu sa ka dɔ wɛrɛ furu, o bɛ jatɔya kɛ. Min bɛ muso furu salen furu, o bɛ jatɔya kɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Cɛ nafolobatigi dɔ tun bɛ yen, a tun bɛ lomaasa fini don ka faama dumuni kɛ k'i ɲɛnajɛ don o don.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ sɛgɛnbaatɔ dɔ dalen tun bɛ o ka so da la, o tɔgɔ ko Lazarɛ. Joliw tun bɛ a fari yɔrɔ bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dumuni murumuru minnu tun bɛ bin ka bɔ nafolobatigi ka tabali la, a tun b'a fɛ ka olu dun. Wuluw tun bɛ na ka a ka joliw lanɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa o sɛgɛnbaatɔ sara, mɛlɛkɛw y'a ta k'a bila Ibrahima kɛrɛ fɛ. Nafolobatigi fana sara, a su donna.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «K'a tɔɔrɔlen to Hadɛsi kɔnɔ, a y'a ɲɛ kɔrɔta ka Ibrahima ye yɔrɔ jan, ka Lazarɛ fana ye o kɛrɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la a pɛrɛnna ko: ‘Ne fa Ibrahima, makari ne la! I ka Lazarɛ bila ka taa a bolonkɔni nun su ji la ka na ne nɛnkun sumaya, katuguni ne tɔɔrɔlen bɛ nin tasuma kɔnɔ kosɛbɛ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ibrahima y'a jaabi ko: ‘Ne den, i hakili jigin a la ko i ye i ka fɛn ɲumanw bɛɛ sɔrɔ k'i to diɲɛ la, o cogo la Lazarɛ ye ko jugu de sɔrɔ. Sisan ale bɛ ɲɛsuma na, e kɔni bɛ ɲɛgan na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka fara o bɛɛ kan, folon dingɛba bɛ an ni aw cɛ, fo minnu b'a fɛ ka bɔ yan ka taa aw fɛ yen, olu tɛ se. Minnu b'a fɛ ka bɔ yen ka na yan, olu fana tɛ se.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la nafolobatigi ko: ‘Ne fa, ne b'i deli, i ka Lazarɛ bila ka taa ne fa ka so,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni ne balimakɛ duuru bɛ yen. A ka taa u lasɔmi, walisa u fana kana na nin tɔɔrɔ yɔrɔ la.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ibrahima y'a jaabi ko: ‘Musa ni kiraw ka kumaw bɛ u bolo, u ka olu lamɛn.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a ko: ‘Ayi, ne fa Ibrahima, nka ni mɔgɔ kelen su kununna ka taa u fɛ yen, u na nimisa u ka jurumuw la.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 16 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ibrahima y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘Ni u tɛ Musa ni kiraw ka kumaw lamɛn, hali ni mɔgɔ dɔ kununna ka bɔ suw cɛma, u tɛna dannaya kɛ.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «Kunnatiɲɛni kow tɛ se ka to kɛbali ye, nka mɔgɔ min bɛ olu kɛ, bɔnɛ bɛ o tigi ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min bɛ nin denmisɛnw la kelen kunnatiɲɛ, ni kabakurunba tun sirila o kan na ka a fili kɔgɔji la, o tun ka fisa a ma ni o kɛli ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi o kow ma. «Ni i balima ye jurumu kɛ, a kɔrɔfɔ. Ni a nimisara, yafa a ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni a ye i hakɛ ta siɲɛ wolonwula tile kelen kɔnɔ, ni a seginna i ma siɲɛ wolonwula k'a fɔ ko i ka hakɛ to, i ka yafa a ma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw y'a fɔ Matigi ye ko: «Dɔ fara an ka dannaya kan.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi y'a fɔ ko: «Ni aw ka dannaya tun bɛ hali mutarde kisɛ bɔ bonya la, aw tun n'a fɔ nin torosun ye ko a ni a diliw bɛɛ ka bɔ ka taa turu kɔgɔji la, o tun na aw kan minɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni baaraden bɛ aw dɔ fɛ, ni o bɛ sɛnɛ kɛ wala ka baganw kɔlɔsi, ni o nana ka bɔ kungo la tuma min na, a n'a fɔ o baaraden ye ko o ka na i sigi dumuni la wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a tɛna a fɔ o baaraden ye ko a ka dumuni dila ka a cɛsiri ka ale mago ɲɛ, fo ni ale tilara dumuni ni minni la tuma min na wa, o kɔ, o na sɔrɔ ka dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bɛ barika da o baaraden ye k'a masɔrɔ o ye a ka ko fɔlenw kɛ wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la aw fana, ci minnu fɔra aw ye, ni aw ye olu bɛɛ kɛ ka dafa, aw k'a fɔ ko, aw ye baaraden gansanw ye, ko aw ye aw niyɔrɔ baara dama de kɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to sira kan ka taa Jerusalɛm, a tɛmɛnna Samari jamana ni Galile jamana cɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A dontɔ dugu dɔ kɔnɔ, kunatɔ cɛ tan nana a kunbɛn. U ye u jɔ yɔrɔ jan
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ka pɛrɛn ko: «Karamɔgɔ Yesu, makari an na!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'u ye minkɛ, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye taa aw yɛrɛw jira sarakalasebaaw la.» Ka u to sira kan ka taa, u saniyara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U la kelen y'a ye ko a kɛnɛyara minkɛ, o kɔseginna ka Ala bonya ni kanba ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'i bin Yesu sen kɔrɔ k'a ɲɛ biri duguma ka barika da a ye. Samarika tun don.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ko: «Mɔgɔ tan ma saniya wa? U tɔ kɔnɔntɔn bɛ mini?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U si ma kɔsegin ka Ala bonya, nin dunankɛ kelen kɔ wa?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Wuli ka taa. I ka dannaya ye i kisi.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛnw ye Yesu ɲininka ko: «Ala ka masaya bɛ na tuma jumɛn?» A y'u jaabi ko: «Ala ka masaya tɛna na ka kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔw ka kɔlɔsili ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tɛna fɔ fana ko: ‘A filɛ yan,’ wala ‘A filɛ yen fɛ,’ katuguni Ala ka masaya bɛ aw cɛma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «Donw bɛ na, a tun na diya aw ye ka Mɔgɔ Denkɛ ka donw la kelen ye, nka aw tɛna a ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw n'a fɔ aw ye ko: ‘A filɛ, a bɛ yan,’ wala ‘A filɛ, a bɛ yen,’ nka aw kana taa yen, aw kana tugu u nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] San yɛgɛyɛgɛ bɛ kɛnɛ bɔ sankolo fan kelen na ka se sankolo fan dɔ ma cogo min na, Mɔgɔ Denkɛ fana na kɛ ten a na don na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sani o don ka se, wajibi don a ka tɔɔrɔ kosɛbɛ, bi mɔgɔw ka ban a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ko minnu tun bɛ kɛ Nuhun tile la, olu na kɛ Mɔgɔ Denkɛ ka donw fana la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw tun bɛ dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ, ka musow furu ka u denw di furu la, fo Nuhun donna kurunba kɔnɔ don min na. O tuma la jiba nana ka u bɛɛ halaki.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lɔti ka waati kɛra cogo min na, a na kɛ ten fana. Mɔgɔw tun bɛ dumuni kɛ ka minni kɛ, ka sanni kɛ ka fɛnw feere, ka sɛnɛ kɛ, ka sow jɔ,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] nka Lɔti bɔra Sodɔmɛ dugu kɔnɔ don min na, o don na, tasuma ni kiribi binna ka bɔ sankolo la i ko sanji, ka u bɛɛ halaki.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ Denkɛ na i jira don min na, a na kɛ ten o don na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O don na, min bɛ a ka so kun na, ni a bolofɛnw bɛ so kɔnɔ, o kana jigin ka olu ta. Min bɛ foro la, o kana kɔsegin a ka ton bila yɔrɔ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye aw hakili jigin Lɔti muso ko la!
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni min b'a fɛ k'a ni kisi, o na bɔnɛ a la. Min bɔnɛna a ni la, o na a ni kisi.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, o don su fɛ, mɔgɔ fila na kɛ dalan kelen kan, kelen na minɛ ka kelen to.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso fila na kɛ sili la ɲɔgɔn fɛ, kelen na minɛ ka kelen to.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] [Cɛ fila na kɛ foro la, kelen na minɛ ka kelen to.]»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 17 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalandenw y'a ɲininka ko: «Matigi, o na kɛ yɔrɔ jumɛn?» A y'u jaabi ko: «Fɛn su mana kɛ yɔrɔ min na, dugaw na u lajɛ yen.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye ntalen dɔ da u ye k'a jira u la ko mɔgɔw ka kan ka Ala deli tuma bɛɛ la, u kana sɛgɛn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko: «Kiritigɛla dɔ tun bɛ dugu dɔ la, o tun tɛ siran Ala ɲɛ, a tun tɛ mɔgɔ si jate.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso cɛ salen dɔ tun bɛ o dugu la, o tun bɛ to ka taa a fɛ k'a fɔ a ye ko a ka ale hakɛ bɔ a jugu la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A mɛnna, kiritigɛla tun ma sɔn. O kɔ, a y'a fɔ a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ ko: ‘Hali ni ne tɛ siran Ala ɲɛ, hali ni ne tɛ mɔgɔ si jate,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] o bɛɛ n'a ta nin muso cɛ salen bɛ ne sɛgɛn, o de kosɔn ne na a hakɛ bɔ a jugu la, walisa a kana to ka na ne tɔɔrɔ tuma bɛɛ.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Matigi ko: «Kiritigɛla tilenbali bɛ min fɔ, a' ye o lamɛn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ka ɲɛnatɔmɔlen minnu bɛ kasi a nɔfɛ su fara tile kan, a tɛna u hakɛ bɔ u juguw la, hali k'a sɔrɔ a bɛ muɲuli kɛ u ta fan fɛ wa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko a na u hakɛ bɔ joona. Nka ni Mɔgɔ Denkɛ nana tuma min na, a na dannaya sɔrɔ dugukolo kan wa?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ minnu jigi tun bɛ u yɛrɛw kan ko u tilennen don, k'a sɔrɔ u tun bɛ tɔw jate ko u tɛ foyi ye, Yesu ye nin ntalen da olu ta fan fɛ, a ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Cɛ fila taara Alabatosoba kɔnɔ ka Ala deli. Kelen tun ye Farisiɛn ye, a tɔ kelen tun ye faama wari minɛbaa ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛn y'i jɔ a dan na ka Ala deli a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ tan, ko: ‘Ala, ne bɛ barika da i ye, k'a masɔrɔ ne ni mɔgɔ tɔw tɛ kelen ye, binkannikɛlaw, kojugukɛlaw, jatɔw. Ne tɛ i ko hali nin faama wari minɛbaa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔgɔkun o dɔgɔkun, ne bɛ tile fila sun. Ne bɛ tɔnɔ min sɔrɔ, ne bɛ o bɛɛ jaka bɔ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Faama wari minɛbaa kɔni jɔlen tora yɔrɔ jan. A ma sɔn hali k'a ɲɛ kɔrɔta san fɛ, nka a ɲɛnasisilen y'a disi gosigosi k'a fɔ ko: ‘Ala, makari ne la, ne ye jurumukɛla ye.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: Nin cɛ jo sɔrɔlen taara so, nka Farisiɛn m'a sɔrɔ, katuguni mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ a yɛrɛ kɔrɔta, o na majigin. Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ a yɛrɛ majigin, o na kɔrɔta.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw nana Yesu yɔrɔ ni denmisɛn dɔw ye, walisa a ka maga u la. A ka kalandenw y'o ye minkɛ, u ye u kɔrɔfɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ye o denmisɛnw madon a la, a ko: «A' y'a to denmisɛnw ka na ne ma, aw kana u bali, katuguni Ala ka masaya ye olu bɔɲɔgɔnkow de ta ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ ma Ala ka masaya minɛ i ko denmisɛn, o tɛna don a la fewu.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yahutuw ka kuntigi dɔ ye Yesu ɲininka ko: «Karamɔgɔ ɲuman, ne ka kan ka mun kɛ walisa ne ka ɲɛnamaya banbali sɔrɔ?»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I bɛ ci fɔlenw dɔn: ‘I kana jatɔya kɛ, i kana mɔgɔ faga, i kana sonyali kɛ, i kana nkalon da i mɔgɔ ɲɔgɔn na, i ka i fa ni i ba bonya.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ ko: «Ne ye o ci fɔlenw bɛɛ mara kabini ne denmisɛnma.»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ y'o mɛn minkɛ, a ɲɛnasisira kosɛbɛ, k'a masɔrɔ nafoloba tun b'a fɛ.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ɲaamɛ donni ka nɔgɔn miseli wo fɛ ka tɛmɛn nafolobatigi donni kan Ala ka masaya la.»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] o tigi na o ɲɔgɔn caman sɔrɔ k'a to diɲɛ la, a na ɲɛnamaya banbali sɔrɔ sini.»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A na don Ala dɔnbaliw bolo, u na yɛlɛ bɔ a ma k'a neni, ka daji tu a kan,

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 18 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, a ye yeli kɛ. A tugura Yesu nɔfɛ, a tun bɛ Ala bonya. Mɔgɔw bɛɛ y'o ye tuma min na, u ye Ala tanu.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu donna Jeriko ka tɛmɛn dugu kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɛ dɔ tun bɛ yen, o tɔgɔ ko Zankɛ. O tun ye faama wari minɛbaaw kuntigi nafolobatigi dɔ ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun b'a fɛ ka Yesu ye ka a dɔn, nka a ma se k'a ye jama kosɔn, katuguni a tun ka surun.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la a bolila ka taa ɲɛfɛ ka yɛlɛn torosun na, walisa a ka Yesu ye, k'a masɔrɔ a bɛna tɛmɛn yen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu selen o yɔrɔ la, a y'a ɲɛ kɔrɔta ka sanfɛla filɛ ka Zankɛ ye k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Zankɛ, i teliya ka jigin. Wajibi don ne ka jigin i ka so kɔnɔ bi.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Zankɛ jiginna joona, a ɲagalilen taara n'a ye a ka so.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ y'o ye minkɛ, u binna dajukɔrɔ kuma la, ko: «Nin cɛ taara jigin jurumutɔ ka so!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Zankɛ wulila k'i jɔ k'a fɔ Matigi ye ko: «Matigi, a filɛ, ne bɛ ne ka nafolo tilancɛ di faantanw ma. Ni ne ye mɔgɔ dɔ ka fɛn dɔ nanbara, ne na o ɲɔgɔn naani segin o tigi ma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Kisili sera nin so kɔnɔ bi, k'a masɔrɔ nin cɛ fana ye Ibrahima bɔnsɔn dɔ ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min tununna, Mɔgɔ Denkɛ nana o ɲini k'a kisi.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka mɔgɔw to o kumaw lamɛnni la, Yesu ye nin ntalen da u ye, katuguni a surunyalen Jerusalɛm la, u tun b'a miiri ko Ala ka masaya na i jira o yɔrɔnin kelen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko: «Masakɛden dɔ taara jamana jan na, ko a bɛ taa masaya ɲini a yɛrɛ ye ka kɔsegin.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A taatɔ, a ye a ka jɔn tan wele ka wari manɛ kelen-kelen di u bɛɛ kelen-kelen ma k'a fɔ u ye ko: ‘A’ ye jago kɛ ni ninnu ye sani ne ka kɔsegin.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a ka siya mɔgɔw y'a koniya, u ye ci bila a nɔfɛ k'a fɔ ko: ‘An t'a fɛ nin cɛ ka sigi an kun na.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A ka masaya sɔrɔlen kɔ, a kɔseginna. A tun ye wari di jɔn minnu ma, a ye olu wele walisa u ye tɔnɔ min sɔrɔ jago la, a ka o dɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fɔlɔ nana k'a fɔ ko: ‘Ne kuntigi, i ka wari manɛ ye a ɲɔgɔn tan tɔnɔ sɔrɔ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Masakɛ y'a fɔ o ye ko: ‘A ɲɛ na, jɔn ɲuman. I kɛra dannamɔgɔ ye ko fitinin la, o de kosɔn ne bɛ i sigi dugu tan kun na.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jɔnkɛ filanan nana k'a fɔ ko: ‘Ne kuntigi, i ka wari manɛ ye a ɲɔgɔn duuru tɔnɔ sɔrɔ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Masakɛ y'a fɔ o fana ye ko: ‘Ne bɛ i sigi dugu duuru kun na.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, jɔn dɔ wɛrɛ nana k'a fɔ ko: ‘Ne kuntigi, i ka wari manɛ filɛ nin ye. Ne ye fini meleke a la ka a mara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne siranna i ɲɛ, katuguni i ye mɔgɔ gɛlɛn ye. I ma fɛn min bila, i bɛ o ta. I ma suman min dan, i bɛ o tigɛ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Masakɛ y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘Jɔn jugu, ne bɛ i ka kiri tigɛ ka kɛɲɛ n'i yɛrɛ da la kumaw ye. I tun b'a dɔn ko ne ye mɔgɔ gɛlɛn ye, ko ne ma fɛn min bila, ne bɛ o ta, ko ne ma suman min dan, ne bɛ o tigɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mun y'a to i ma ne ka wari bila banki la, walisa ne kɔseginnen ka o wari ni a tɔnɔ sɔrɔ?’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu jɔlen tun bɛ yen, a y'a fɔ olu ye ko: ‘A’ ye a ka wari bɔsi a la k'a di wari manɛ tan tigi ma.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a fɔ a ye ko: ‘An kuntigi, wari tan b'a bolo ka ban!’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'u jaabi ko: ‘Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: Fɛn bɛ min bolo, dɔ na di o ma, nka fɛn tɛ min bolo, hali fɛn fitinin min b'a bolo, o na bɔsi a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne juguw kɔni, minnu tun t'a fɛ ne ka sigi u kun na, a' ye na n'u ye yan, ka u faga ne ɲɛ kɔrɔ.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tilalen kɔ o kumaw la, a ye u ɲɛminɛ ka taa Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A surunyara Bɛtɛfajɛ ni Bɛtani la tuma min na, ka se kulu dɔ kɛrɛ fɛ, o tɔgɔ ko Oliviye kulu, a ye a ka kalandenw la fila ci ka taa u ɲɛ,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] a ko: «A' ye taa aw ɲɛfɛ dugu la. Ni aw donna dugu kɔnɔ tuma min na, aw na faliden dɔ sirilen sɔrɔ yen, mɔgɔ si ma yɛlɛn min kan fɔlɔ. A' ye o foni ka na n'a ye yan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ dɔ ye aw ɲininka ko: ‘Mun na aw b'a foni,’ aw k'a fɔ o ye ko: ‘Matigi mago b'a la.’»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cidenw taalen, Yesu y'a fɔ u ye cogo min na, u y'a sɔrɔ ten.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka u to faliden fonili la, falitigiw y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Mun y'a to aw bɛ nin faliden foni?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ko: «Matigi mago b'a la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, u taara ni faliden ye Yesu yɔrɔ. U ye u ka finiw da a kan ka Yesu layɛlɛn a kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A taatɔ, mɔgɔw ye u ka finiw fɛnsɛ sira kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu surunyalen Jerusalɛm la, Oliviye kulu jigin sira fɛ, a ka kalandenw jamakulu bɛɛ ɲagalitɔ binna Ala tanuli la ni kanba ye, u ka kabako yelenw bɛɛ kosɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ko: «Masakɛ min natɔ filɛ Matigi tɔgɔ la, o ye dubaden ye! Hɛrɛ ka kɛ sankolo la, tanuli ka kɛ Ala ye sanfɛ yɔrɔ kɔrɔtalenbaw la!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛn dɔw tun bɛ jama la, olu y'a fɔ Yesu ye ko: «Karamɔgɔ, i ka kalandenw kɔrɔfɔ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'u jaabi ko: «Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, ni ninnu ye u makun, hali kabakurunw na pɛrɛnkan bɔ!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu surunyalen Jerusalɛm la, a ye dugu filɛ ka kasi a kosɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ko: «E kɔni, n'i tun ye hɛrɛ sɔrɔ sira dɔn bi don na! Nka sisan o dogora i la, i ɲɛw tɛ se ka o ye!
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Katuguni donw bɛ na, i juguw na folon dingɛba sen k'i lamini, k'i degun i fan bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U na i ci, ka i kɔnɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ halaki, u tɛna kabakurun si to ɲɔgɔn kan, katuguni Ala nana i dɛmɛni kama tuma min na, i ma o dɔn!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu donna Alabatosoba kɔnɔ ka jagokɛlaw gɛn ka bɔ yen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘Ne ka so na kɛ Aladeliso ye,’ nka aw kɔni y'a kɛ binkannikɛlaw dogo yɔrɔ ye!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tun bɛ mɔgɔw kalan don o don Alabatosoba kɔnɔ. Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni sariya karamɔgɔw ani dugu mɔgɔbaw tun bɛ cogo ɲini k'a faga,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 19 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] nka u m'a sɔrɔ ka foyi kɛ a la, katuguni a ka kumaw ye mɔgɔw bɛɛ kun minɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Don dɔ la Yesu tun bɛ mɔgɔw kalan Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, ka Kibaru Duman waajuli kɛ. O tuma la sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni sariya karamɔgɔw ani Yahutu cɛkɔrɔbaw taara a sɛgɛrɛ,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a ɲininka ko: «Sebaaya min b'a to i bɛ nin kow kɛ, i ka o fɔ an ye. Jɔni ye o fanga di i ma?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Ne fana bɛ aw ɲininka ko kelen na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jɔni ye Yuhana ci ka batiseli kɛ, Ala wa, wala mɔgɔw?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la, u kumana ɲɔgɔn fɛ ko: «Ni an ko Ala y'a ci, a n'a fɔ ko mun y'a to an ma da a la?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni an ko mɔgɔw y'a ci, mɔgɔw bɛɛ na an bon ni kabakurunw ye ka an faga, katuguni u dalen b'a la kosɛbɛ ko Yuhana tun ye kira ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn u y'a jaabi ko u ma o dɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ayiwa, sebaaya min b'a to ne bɛ nin kow kɛ, ne fana tɛna o fɔ aw ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la, Yesu ye nin ntalen da mɔgɔw ye, a ko: «Cɛ dɔ ye rezɛn nakɔ bin k'a kalifa rezɛn sɛnɛkɛla dɔw ma, ka taa jamana wɛrɛ la ka mɛn yen.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Rezɛn mɔ tuma selen, a y'a ka baaraden dɔ ci o rezɛn sɛnɛkɛlaw ma ko olu ka rezɛn mɔ di a ma. Nka rezɛn sɛnɛkɛlaw ye a ka baaraden bugɔ, k'a bolo lankolon bila ka taa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dutigi ye baaraden dɔ wɛrɛ ci, nka u ye o fana bugɔ, k'a minɛ ko juguya kosɛbɛ, k'a bolo lankolon bila ka taa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye baaraden sabanan ci, u ye o fana jogin k'a gɛn ka taa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Rezɛn nakɔtigi y'a fɔ ko: ‘Ne na mun kɛ? Ne na ne denkɛ kanulen ci. A dɔrɔ u na o bonya.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka kabini rezɛn sɛnɛkɛlaw ɲɛ dara o kan, u y'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: ‘A ciyɛntala filɛ nin ye. A' ye na an k'a faga, walisa an k'a ciyɛn sɔrɔ.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye a denkɛ fili rezɛn nakɔ kɔfɛ k'a faga. «Ayiwa, rezɛn nakɔtigi na mun de kɛ u la sa?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A na na ka o rezɛn senɛkɛlaw faga, ka a ka rezɛn nakɔ kalifa mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ma.» Mɔgɔw ye o kuma mɛn minkɛ, u y'a fɔ ko: «Ala m'an kisira o ma!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ye u filɛ k'a fɔ ko: «Min sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘Sojɔlaw banna kabakurun min na, o kɛra so selekela kabakurun lakika ye, o kuma kɔrɔ ye mun ye?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ binna o kabakurun kan, o tigi na karikari. O kabakurun mana bin mɔgɔ min kan, a na o tigi ɲɔɲɔ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya karamɔgɔw ni sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ye Yesu minɛ cogo ɲini o waati yɛrɛ la, k'a masɔrɔ u y'a dɔn ko Yesu ye o ntalen da u yɛrɛw de kama, nka u siranna jama ɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la u ye Yesu kɔlɔsili daminɛ. U ye naafigi dɔw ci ko u ka u yɛrɛw kɛ mɔgɔ tilennenw ye, fo ka Yesu minɛ a yɛrɛ da la kuma la, walisa u k'a don fangatigiw ni gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ bolo.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɔgɔw y'a ɲininka ko: «Karamɔgɔ, an y'a dɔn ko i bɛ kuma ka mɔgɔw kalan ko minnu na, olu tilennen don, ko i tɛ mɔgɔ bɔ mɔgɔ la, nka i bɛ mɔgɔw kalan Ala sira la k'a jɛya.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A dagalen bɛ an ka nisɔngɔ sara Romɛ masakɛ ye wa, wala o dagalen tɛ?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ye u ka keguya dɔn, a y'a fɔ u ye ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye wari dɛɲɛ kelen jira ne la. Jɔni ja ni a ka sɛbɛnni bɛ nin kan?» U ko: «Romɛ masakɛ.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye masakɛ ta sara masakɛ ye, ka Ala ta di Ala ma.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ma se k'a minɛ a da la kumaw la mɔgɔw ɲɛ na, nka a ka jaabili ye u kabakoya, u ye u makun.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Saduseɛnw tun b'a fɔ ko su kununli tɛna kɛ. U dɔw taara Yesu sɛgɛrɛ k'a ɲininka ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Karamɔgɔ, Musa ye nin ci sɛbɛn k'a di an ma ko: ‘Ni cɛ dɔ sara k'a sɔrɔ a muso ma den sɔrɔ, a balimakɛ ka o muso furu ka bɔnsɔn sɔrɔ o cɛ salen ye.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa, balimakɛ wolonwula tun bɛ yen, fɔlɔ ye muso furu, o sara k'a sɔrɔ a ma den sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Filanan ye o muso furu,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] o kɔ, sabanan y'a furu. O cogo la, o cɛ wolonwula bɛɛ ye o muso furu, u bɛɛ denntan sara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, o muso fana sara.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Su kununli don na, o muso na kɛ u la jumɛn ta ye? K'a sɔrɔ u wolonwula bɛɛ y'a furu!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «Nin diɲɛ la, cɛw bɛ furu kɛ, musow bɛ di furu la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka cɛw ni musow minnu ka kan ni o diɲɛ nata sɔrɔli ani su kununli ye, o don na, cɛ tɛna muso furu, muso tɛna di cɛ ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tɛna sa tun, nka u bɛ kɛ i ko mɛlɛkɛw. U ye Ala denw ye, katuguni u ye su kununli denw ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Musa yɛrɛ y'a jira ko mɔgɔw suw na kunun, katuguni jirinin ko bɛ fɔ yɔrɔ min na, o yɔrɔ la a ye Matigi wele Ibrahima ka Ala ani Isaka ka Ala ani Yakuba ka Ala.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala tɛ suw ka Ala ye, mɔgɔ ɲɛnamaw ta don, k'a masɔrɔ Ala fɛ, bɛɛ ɲɛnama don.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya karamɔgɔ dɔw y'a jaabi ko: «Karamɔgɔ, i kumana ko ɲuman.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, u ma u ja gɛlɛya k'a ɲininka foyi la tun.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Mun kosɔn mɔgɔw b'a fɔ ko Krisita ye Dawuda Bɔnsɔn ye?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ Dawuda yɛrɛ y'a fɔ Zaburuw Kitabu la ko: Matigi y'a fɔ ne Matigi ye ko: ‘I sigi ne kinin fɛ,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] fo ne ka i juguw kɛ i senkɔrɔ dalan ye.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la, Dawuda bɛ Krisita wele Matigi, ale dun ye a bɔnsɔn ye cogo di?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye u bɛɛ ɲɛ na ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi sariya karamɔgɔw la. U bɛ dulɔki janw don ka yaala. A ka di u ye mɔgɔw ka u mɔgɔba fo fɛrɛkɛnɛw la. Alabatoso kɔnɔ ɲɛfɛ sigiyɔrɔw ni dumuniba la sigi yɔrɔ ɲumanw fana ka di u ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 20 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛ muso cɛ salenw bolofɛnw bɛɛ minɛ u la, o kɔ, ka taa mɛn Ala delili la walisa k'u yɛrɛw mɔgɔ sɛbɛ jira. U jalaki tɔɔrɔ na juguya.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a ɲɛ kɔrɔta ka nafolotigiw ye. Nilifɛnw tun bɛ bila kɛsu min kɔnɔ Alabatosoba kɔnɔ, u tun bɛ u ka nilifɛnw bila o kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye muso faantan cɛ salen dɔ ye, o ye wari misɛn fila bila o kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ko: «Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: Nin muso faantan cɛ salen ye wari min bila kɛsu kɔnɔ, o ka ca u tɔw bɛɛ ta ye,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni olu bɛɛ ye dɔ di ka bɔ u ka nafolow la, nka nin muso ni a ka faantanya bɛɛ, a ye a balofɛn bɛɛ di.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ dɔw tun bɛ kuma Alabatosoba ko la ko a masirilen bɛ ni kabakurun ɲumanw ye, ani fɛn sɔngɔ gɛlɛn minnu tun dira Ala ma. O tuma la Yesu ko:
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw ɲɛ bɛ nin fɛn minnu na, donw bɛ na, kabakurun si tɛna to ɲɔgɔn kan yan, u bɛɛ na bin.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a ɲininka ko: «Karamɔgɔ, o kow na kɛ tuma jumɛn? Ni o kow kɛ tuma sera, mun taamashyɛn na kɛ fɔlɔ?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye u jaabi ko: «A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi, aw kana lafili, katuguni mɔgɔ caman bɛna na ne tɔgɔ la k'a fɔ ko u yɛrɛw ye Krisita de ye, ko waati sera. Aw kana tugu u nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw ye kɛlɛw ni murutiliw kibaru mɛn tuma min na, aw kana siran. Wajibi don o kow ka kɛ fɔlɔ, nka a laban tɛna se o yɔrɔnin kelen.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Siya dɔ na wuli siya dɔ wɛrɛ kama. Masaya dɔ na wuli masaya dɔ wɛrɛ kama.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dugukolo yɛrɛyɛrɛbaw na kɛ yɔrɔ dɔw la, fiɲɛbanaw ni kɔngɔbaw na kɛ yɔrɔ caman na. Siran kobaw ni taamashyɛnbaw na ye ka bɔ sankolo la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Nka sani o kow bɛɛ ka se, u na aw minɛ ka aw tɔɔrɔ kosɛbɛ. U na aw don Alabatoso kuntigiw bolo ka aw bila kaso la. U na taa ni aw ye masakɛw ni gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛw ɲɛ kɔrɔ ne tɔgɔ kosɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O na cogo di aw ma ka seereya kɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni ka a latigɛ ko aw tɛna aw yɛrɛw lafasali kuma labɛn sani o tuma ka se,

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali aw bangebaaw ni aw fadenmaw ni aw balimaw ni aw teriw na aw don bolo la, u na aw dɔw faga.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka muɲuli de n'a to aw ka aw yɛrɛw niw sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni aw y'a ye ko kɛlɛbolow ye Jerusalɛm lamini tuma min na, a' y'a dɔn ko a ci tuma sera.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni o donw na kɛ hakɛ bɔ donw ye, walisa kuma sɛbɛnnenw bɛɛ ka dafa.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso kɔnɔmaw ani minnu bɛ sin di denw ma, olu na tɔɔrɔ o donw la kosɛbɛ, katuguni tɔɔrɔba na kɛ dugukolo kan, Ala ka diminya kow na bin nin siya mɔgɔw kan.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 21 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U na faga ni npan ye, u na minɛ jɔnya la ka jɛnsɛn siya wɛrɛw cɛma. Siya wɛrɛw na Jerusalɛm cɔngɔ u sen kɔrɔ, fo o siyaw ka waati ka dafa.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 68 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni ne bɛ aw ɲininka, aw tɛna ne jaabi.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 70 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U bɛɛ ko: «O tuma la i ye Ala Denkɛ ye wa?» A y'u jaabi ko: «Aw ye min fɔ, ne y'o ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 22 [VERSE_ID] 71 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ko: «An mago bɛ mun seereya la tun? An yɛrɛw y'a mɛn a da la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama bɛɛ wulila ka taa ni Yesu ye gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛ Pilate ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U binna a sendonni la ko: «An y'a sɔrɔ nin cɛ bɛ an ka siya lamuruti, ka u bali ko u kana nisɔngɔ sara Romɛ masakɛ ye, ko ale yɛrɛ ye Krisita ye, ko masakɛ don.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate y'a ɲininka ko: «I ye Yahutuw ka masakɛ ye wa?» A y'a jaabi ko: «Ne ye o ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate y'a fɔ sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni jama ye ko: «Ne ma jalaki yɔrɔ si ye nin cɛ la.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u tora a kan k'a fɔ ko: «A bɛ mɔgɔw kɔnɔnasu n'a ka kalan ye Jude jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la, k'a daminɛ Galile fo ka na se yan.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate ye Galile tɔgɔ mɛn minkɛ, a ye ɲininkali kɛ yala ni a ye Galileka ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a mɛn ko a bɛ Hɛrɔde ka mara la tuma min na, a ye mɔgɔw bila ka taa n'a ye Hɛrɔde yɔrɔ. O y'a sɔrɔ Hɛrɔde fana tun bɛ Jerusalɛm o donw la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde ye Yesu ye minkɛ, o diyara a ye kosɛbɛ. A tun y'a ko mɛn, a tun b'a fɛ k'a ye kabini tuma jan, katuguni a jigi tun b'a kan ko a na kabako dɔ kɛtɔ ye a fɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a sɛgɛsɛgɛ ni kuma caman ye, nka Yesu m'a jaabi foyi la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni sariya karamɔgɔw jɔlen tun bɛ yen k'a sendon ni kuma caman ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde ni a ka sɔrɔdasiw y'a dɔgɔya ka yɛlɛ bɔ a ma, ka fini ɲuman don a kan na, k'a kɔsegin ka taa Pilate yɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O don na, Hɛrɔde ni Pilate kɛra teriw ye, katuguni u tun ye ɲɔgɔn juguw ye fɔlɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate ye sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni fangatigiw ni mɔgɔw wele
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Aw nana ni nin cɛ ye ne yɔrɔ, ko a bɛ mɔgɔw lamuruti. O bɛɛ n'a ta, ne y'a sɛgɛsɛgɛ aw ɲɛ na. Aw y'a sendon ko jugu minnu na, ne ma o si sɔrɔ a la.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde fana ma fɛn sɔrɔ a la, katuguni a y'a kɔsegin an ma. Ko min ka kan ni saya ye, a ma o si kɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn ne n'a bugɔ k'a bila.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] [Pilate tun bɛ kasolamɔgɔ kelen bila Tɛmɛnkan seli la san o san.]
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u bɛɛ pɛrɛnna ɲɔgɔn fɛ ko: «Nin cɛ faga, ka Barabasi bila.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Barabasi tun bilara kaso la murutili dɔ kosɔn dugu kɔnɔ ani mɔgɔ fagali.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate tun b'a fɛ ka Yesu bila, a kumana jama fɛ ko kura.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u pɛrɛnna ko: «A gengen jiri la! A gengen jiri la!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Pilate kumana u fɛ a siɲɛ sabanan la k'a fɔ u ye ko: «A ye mun ko jugu kɛ? Ne ma fagali sababu si ye a la, o de kosɔn ne n'a bugɔ k'a bila.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u tora k'a fɔ ni kanba ye ko a ka gengen jiri la. U ka pɛrɛnkan ye Pilate sago kɛɲɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Pilate y'a latigɛ ko u bɛ min ɲini, o ka kɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min tun bilara kaso la murutili ni mɔgɔ fagali kosɔn, u ye o min ɲini, a y'o bila, ka Yesu kɛ u sago ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U taatɔ ni Yesu ye, Sirɛnɛka dɔ tun bɛ bɔ a ka foro la, o tɔgɔ ko Simɔn. U y'a minɛ ka Yesu gengenjiri da a kun, ko a ka taa n'a ye Yesu nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jamaba tugura a nɔfɛ, ani muso caman minnu tun bɛ ɲɛnasisi ka kasi a kosɔn.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'i yɛlɛma u fan fɛ k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Jerusalɛm musow, aw kana kasi ne kosɔn. A' ye kasi aw yɛrɛw ni aw denw kosɔn,
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni donw bɛ na, mɔgɔw n'a fɔ ko: ‘Muso minnu tɛ se ka bange kɛ, ani minnu ma denw bange fɔlɔ ani minnu ma sin di denw ma, olu ye dubadenw ye.’
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la mɔgɔw n'a daminɛ k'a fɔ kuluw ye ko: ‘A’ ye bin an kan!’ k'a fɔ tintinw ye ko: ‘A’ ye an datugu!’

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U taara ni kojugukɛla cɛ fila fana ye, olu ni Yesu ka faga ɲɔgɔn fɛ.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 23 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu ko: «Ne Fa, yafa u ma. U bɛ min kɛ, u ma o dɔn.» U ye kala da ka a ka finiw tilatila u cɛ ka kɛɲɛ n'o ye.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An dɔw taara kaburu la. U y'a sɔrɔ i ko musow tun y'a fɔ cogo min na, nka u ma a yɛrɛ ye.»

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ni u sigira dumuni la tuma min na, a ye nbuuru dɔ ta, ka barika da Ala ye, k'a karikari k'a di u ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la u ɲɛw yɛlɛla, u y'a dɔn, nka a tununna ka bɔ u ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a fɔ ɲɔgɔn ye ko: «A kumana an fɛ sira la ka Kitabuw kɔrɔw jira an na tuma min na, an dusukun ɲagalilenba tun tɛ wa?»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O yɔrɔnin kelen, u wulila ka kɔsegin Jerusalɛm ka ciden tan ni kelen ni u fɛ mɔgɔw lajɛlen sɔrɔ.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu ko: «Tiɲɛ la Matigi kununna! A y'i jira Simɔn na!»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min kɛra u la sira la, ani u ye Yesu dɔn nbuuru karikarili fɛ cogo min na, o mɔgɔ fila ye o lakali u ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka u to o kuma la, Yesu yɛrɛ y'i jɔ u cɛma k'a fɔ u ye ko: «Hɛrɛ ka kɛ aw ye.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u hakili ɲaamina, u sirannen tun bɛ miiri ko u ye ja dɔ ye.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Mun y'a to aw hakili ɲaamina? Mun y'a to filanfilan bɛ aw la?
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye ne bolow ni ne senw filɛ k'a dɔn ko ne yɛrɛ don. A' ye maga ne la k'a filɛ, k'a masɔrɔ sogo ni kolow tɛ ja la, i ko aw b'a ye ne la cogo min na.»
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O fɔlen kɔ, a y'a bolow ni a senw jira u la.

[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye jɛgɛ wusulen kunkurun dɔ di a ma.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a ta k'a dun u ɲɛ na.
[BOOK] LUK [CHAPTER] 24 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Ne ye kuma minnu fɔ aw ye ka ne to aw fɛ, olu filɛ ninnu ye ko: Ko minnu sɛbɛnna ne ko la Musa ka sariya ni kiraw ka kitabuw ni Zaburuw la, wajibi don olu bɛɛ ka dafa.»

[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Olu tun ye Ala kan bilabaaw ye fɔlɔ la, Ala tun bɛ makɔnɔli kɛ ni muɲuli ye Nuhun ka kurun dila waati la. Mɔgɔ dɔɔnin, o kɔrɔ, mɔgɔ segin ye ji cɛtigɛ ka kisi.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O ji kɛra batiseli bisigi ye, o min bɛ aw kisi sisan. O tɛ farisogo nɔgɔw koli ye, nka o ye Ala jaabili ye ka bɔ dusukun ɲuman la, Yesu Krisita kununli barika la ka bɔ suw cɛma.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale yɛlɛnna ka taa sankolo kɔnɔ, a sigilen bɛ Ala kinin fɛ. Mɛlɛkɛw ni kuntigiw ani sebaayaw kololen bɛ a ye.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Krisita tɔɔrɔla a farisogo la, o de kosɔn a' ye o miirili kɛ aw ka kɛlɛkɛ minɛn ye, k'a masɔrɔ min tɔɔrɔla farisogo la, o farala jurumu la.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de y'a to kabini sisan, aw kana aw ka diɲɛ latigɛ tɔ kɛ mɔgɔw negela kow la, nka aw ka o kɛ Ala sago la.

[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka ɲɔgɔn lajigin ni dajukɔrɔ kuma tɛ.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw bɛɛ kelen-kelen ye nilifɛn min sɔrɔ, aw ka ɲɔgɔn mago ɲɛ ni o ye, ka kɛ Ala ka nɛɛma nilifɛn sifa caman marabaa ɲumanw ye.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min bɛ waajuli kɛ, o k'a kɛ i ko Ala ka kuma fɔbaa. Min bɛ baara kɛ, o k'a kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni Ala ka barika dilen ye a ma, walisa nɔɔrɔ ka da Ala kan ko bɛɛ la Yesu Krisita barika la. Nɔɔrɔ ni sebaaya ye o de ta ye badaa-badaa! Amiina.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne balima kanulenw, kɔrɔbɔli gɛlɛnma min bɛ aw cɛma, i n'a fɔ aw bɛ tasuma cɛtigɛ, aw kana kabakoya o la, i n'a fɔ kabako fɛn ye aw sɔrɔ,
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] nka aw ka ɲagali k'a masɔrɔ aw ye niyɔrɔ sɔrɔ Krisita ka tɔɔrɔw la, walisa ni ale nɔɔrɔ fana y'i jira tuma min na, aw ka nisɔndiya ka ɲagali kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw nenina Krisita tɔgɔ kosɔn, aw ye dubadenw ye, katuguni nɔɔrɔ Ni min ye Ala Ni ye, o sigilen bɛ aw kan.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw si kana tɔɔrɔ k'a masɔrɔ aw ye mɔgɔfagala ye, wala nson, wala kojugukɛla, wala min bɛ a da don walikow la.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni mɔgɔ dɔ bɛ tɔɔrɔ k'a masɔrɔ a ye kretiɛn ye, a kana maloya o la, nka a ka Ala bonya ni o tɔgɔ ye.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kiri daminɛ waati sera Ala ka mɔgɔw ma. Ayiwa, ni anw fɔlɔ ka kiri bɛ tigɛ, Ala ka Kibaru Duman kan minɛbaliw laban na kɛ di?
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I ko Kitabu b'a fɔ ko: «Ni mɔgɔ tilennenw kisili ka gɛlɛn, Ala ɲɛsiranbaliw ni jurumukɛlaw ta na kɛ di?»
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn, minnu bɛ tɔɔrɔ ka kɛɲɛ ni Ala sago ye, olu ka u niw kalifa Dabaa Ala kantigi ma, ka to ko ɲuman kɛli la.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Egilisi cɛkɔrɔba minnu bɛ aw cɛma, ne bɛ ne kan lase olu ma sisan. Ne ye u bɔɲɔgɔnko cɛkɔrɔba ye, ani Krisita ka tɔɔrɔw seere. Nɔɔrɔ min bɛna jira, ne ye niyɔrɔ sɔrɔ o la fana. Ne bɛ olu jija ko:
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala ka sagakulu min kalifalen bɛ aw ma, a' ye aw janto o la. Aw kana o kɛ ni diyagoya ye, nka aw ka o kɛ ni diyaɲe ye ka kɛɲɛ ni Ala sago ye. Aw kana o kɛ tɔnɔ jugu kosɔn, nka aw ka o kɛ ni ɛaniya ɲuman ye.
[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu kalifara aw ma, aw kana fanga digi olu la, nka aw ka kɛ ɲɛjirabaaw ye sagakulu la.

[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo la kamalenw, aw ka kolo cɛkɔrɔbaw ye. Aw bɛɛ ka ɲɔgɔn mago ɲɛ ni yɛrɛmajiginlenya ye, katuguni Kitabu ko: «Ala bɛ kuncɛbaaw kɛlɛ, nka a bɛ nɛɛma di yɛrɛmajiginlenw ma.»

[BOOK] 1PE [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka a kɛlɛ ka aw sinsinnen to dannaya la, k'a dɔn ko aw balima minnu bɛ diɲɛ la, o bɔɲɔgɔnko tɔɔrɔw bɛ olu fana sɔrɔ.

[BOOK] ROM [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ma sɔn ka Ala dɔnniya to u kɔnɔ, o de kosɔn Ala ye u to u hakili fililenw bolo, walisa u ka ko bɛnbaliw kɛ.

[BOOK] ROM [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] hakilintanw, kanntanw, mɔgɔ gɛlɛnw, hinɛntanw don.
