[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Balimaw, an bɛ nin fɔ aw ye k'a gɛlɛya Matigi Yesu Krisita tɔgɔ la ko balima minnu bɛ taama pirikiparaka la, ni u tɛ taama ka kɛɲɛ ni an ka laadili ye, aw ka aw mabɔ olu la.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka kan ka an ladege cogo min na, aw yɛrɛw y'o dɔn, katuguni an ma taama pirikiparaka la aw cɛma.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ma dumuni kɛ mɔgɔ si ka so gansan, nka an tun bɛ baara kɛ ka an sɛgɛn su fara tile kan, walisa an kana kɛ aw si ka doni ye.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kun tɛ ko o jo tɛ an fɛ, nka an tun b'a fɛ ka cogo jira aw la walisa aw ka an ladege.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'an to aw fɛ yen, an ye nin fɔ aw ye k'a gɛlɛya ko: «Ni dɔ tɛ sɔn ka baara kɛ, o fana kana dumuni kɛ fewu.»
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An y'a mɛn ko dɔw bɛ aw cɛma minnu bɛ taama pirikiparaka la. U tɛ baara kɛ fewu, u bɛ u da don kow bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu bɛ o cogo la kɔni, an b'a fɔ olu ye k'a gɛlɛya u ma Matigi Yesu Krisita tɔgɔ kosɔn, ko u ka baara kɛ ko ɲuman ka u yɛrɛw balo.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni balimaw, aw kana sɛgɛn ko ɲuman kɛli la.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An bɛ kalan min di aw ma nin sɛbɛn na, ni mɔgɔ dɔ ma sɔn o ma, aw ka o kɔlɔsi, aw ni o tigi kana jɛ foyi la, walisa a ka maloya.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta aw kana a jate aw jugu ye, nka aw k'a laadi i ko balima dɔ.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɛtigi Ala yɛrɛ ka hɛrɛ kɛ aw ye tuma bɛɛ cogo bɛɛ la. Matigi ka to aw bɛɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne Paul yɛrɛ bolo ye aw foli kumaw sɛbɛn. Ne b'a sɛbɛn ten, o de ye taamashyɛn ye ne ka sɛbɛnw bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] 2TH [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An Matigi Yesu Krisita ka nɛɛma ka kɛ aw bɛɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nin ye Yesu Krisita buruju sɛbɛn ye. Yesu bɔra Dawuda bɔnsɔn na, Dawuda bɔra Ibrahima bɔnsɔn na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ibrahima ye Isaka bange. Isaka ye Yakuba bange. Yakuba ye Juda ni a balimakɛw bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Juda ye Farɛs ni Zara bange. Tamar tun ye olu ba ye. Farɛs ye Esrɔm bange. Esrɔm ye Aram bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aram ye Aminadab bange. Aminadab ye Nasɔn bange. Nasɔn ye Salmɔn bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Salmɔn ye Boaz bange. Rahab tun ye o ba ye. Boaz ye Obɛd bange. Ruti tun ye o ba ye. Obɛd ye Isayi bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Isayi ye masakɛ Dawuda bange. Masakɛ Dawuda ye Solomani bange. Ale ba tun ye Uri muso ye fɔlɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Solomani ye Roboam bange. Roboam ye Abiya bange. Abiya ye Asaf bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Asaf ye Josafat bange. Josafat ye Joram bange. Joram ye Oziyasi bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Oziyasi ye Joatam bange. Joatam ye Akaz bange. Akaz ye Ezekiyasi bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ezekiyasi ye Manase bange. Manase ye Amɔn bange. Amɔn ye Josiyasi bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Josiyasi ye Jekoniyasi ni a balimakɛw bange. O tuma la Israɛl mɔgɔw cɛra ka taa Babilonɛ jamana la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɔgɔ cɛli kɛlen kɔ ka taa Babilonɛ, Jekoniyasi ye Salatiɛl bange. Salatiɛl ye Zorobabɛl bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Zorobabɛl ye Abiudi bange. Abiudi ye Eliyakim bange. Eliyakim ye Azɔr bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Azɔr ye Sadɔk bange. Sadɔk ye Akim bange. Akim ye Eliudi bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Eliudi ye Eleazar bange. Eleazar ye Matan bange. Matan ye Yakuba bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yakuba ye Yusufu bange. Yusufu kɛra Mariyama cɛ ye. Yesu min bɛ wele Krisita, Mariyama ye o bange.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Bɔnsɔn yɛlɛma ko tan ni naani kɛra Ibrahima ni Dawuda cɛ. O kɔ, bɔnsɔn yɛlɛma ko tan ni naani kɛra Dawuda ni Israɛl mɔgɔw cɛli waati cɛ ka taa Babilonɛ. Bɔnsɔn yɛlɛma ko tan ni naani kɛra o tuma ni Krisita bange tuma cɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu Krisita bange cogo filɛ. A ba Mariyama maminɛlen tun bɛ Yusufu fɛ. Sani u ka jɛ, Mariyama y'a sɔrɔ ko a ye kɔnɔ ta Ni Senu ka sebaaya la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A cɛ Yusufu tun ye mɔgɔ tilennen ye, a tun t'a fɛ ka Mariyama tɔgɔ tiɲɛ. A y'a latigɛ a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ ko a na o furu ko dabila dogo la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yusufu to o miirili la, Matigi ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ y'i jira a la sugo la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Dawuda bɔnsɔn Yusufu, i kana siran ka Mariyama furu, k'a masɔrɔ a ye kɔnɔ ta Ni Senu ka sebaaya la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A na denkɛ bange, i na o tɔgɔ da Yesu, katuguni ale na a ka mɔgɔw kisi u ka jurumuw ma.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kow bɛɛ kɛra ten walisa Matigi tun ye min fɔ kira dɔ da la, o ka dafa, ko:
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A filɛ, npogotigi cɛ dɔnbali na kɔnɔ ta ka denkɛ bange, o tɔgɔ na da ko Emanuɛl,» o kɔrɔ ko Ala bɛ an cɛma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yusufu wulila ka bɔ sunɔgɔ la, a y'a kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni Matigi ka mɛlɛkɛ ka kuma fɔlen ye. A ye Mariyama furu siri,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 1 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] nka u ma jɛ sani Mariyama ka jigin a denkɛ fɔlɔ la. Yusufu ye den tɔgɔ da Yesu.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu bangera Jude jamana la Bɛtilɛhɛm, masakɛ Hɛrɔde tile la. A bangelen kɔ, dɔnbaa dɔw nana ka bɔ kɔrɔn fɛ ka se Jerusalɛm.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ye ɲininkali kɛ ko: «Yahutuw ka masakɛ min bangera sisan, o bɛ min? An ye a ka dolo ye k'an to kɔrɔn fɛ, an nana a bato.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Masakɛ Hɛrɔde y'o mɛn minkɛ, a ni Jerusalɛmkaw bɛɛ kɔnɔnafilila o kuma kosɔn.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde ye sarakalasebaaw kuntigiw ni a ka mɔgɔw ka sariya karamɔgɔw bɛɛ lajɛ ka u ɲininka ko: «Krisita ka kan ka bange min?»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U y'a jaabi ko: «Jude jamana Bɛtilɛhɛm katuguni a sɛbɛnnen bɛ kira dɔ fɛ ko:
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ‘E Bɛtilɛhɛm min bɛ Jude jamana la, i tɛ Jude faamaduguw bɛɛ la dɔgɔmannin ye dɛ, k'a masɔrɔ kuntigi dɔ na bɔ i la, o na ne ka siya Israɛl mara.’»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Hɛrɔde ye o dɔnbaaw wele dogo la ka u ɲininka kosɛbɛ o dolo ye waati ko la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen, a ye u ci ka taa Bɛtilɛhɛm. A ko: «A' ye taa o denyɛnin ɲini kosɛbɛ. Aw mana a ye, a' ye na o fɔ ne ye, walisa ne fana ka taa a bato.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔnbaaw ye masakɛ ka kuma mɛn minkɛ, u taara. U tun ye dolo min ye k'u to kɔrɔn fɛ, o filɛ, o taara u ɲɛ fo ka se denyɛnin yɔrɔ la, a y'i jɔ o yɔrɔ kun na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔnbaaw ye o dolo ye tuma min na, u ɲagalila kosɛbɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U donnen so kɔnɔ, u ye denyɛnin ni a ba Mariyama ye. U y'u bi duguma ka denyɛnin bato. U ye u ka minɛnw dayɛlɛ ka denyɛnin sɔn ni sanu ni suma diyalan mana ani fɛn suma duman dɔ ye, min tɔgɔ ko mirɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, dɔnbaaw lasɔminen Ala fɛ sugo la ko u kana kɔsegin Hɛrɔde yɔrɔ, u taara u ka jamana la sira wɛrɛ fɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Dɔnbaaw taalen kɔ, Matigi ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ y'i jira Yusufu la sugo la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Wuli ka boli ka taa ni den ni a ba ye Misira, ka to yen fo ne ka kuma i fɛ tuma min na, katuguni Hɛrɔde na den ɲini ko a b'a faga.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yusufu wulila o su yɛrɛ la ka boli ka taa ni den ni a ba ye Misira.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tora yen fo ka taa Hɛrɔde sa. O kow kɛra walisa min fɔra Matigi fɛ a ka kira dɔ da la, o ka dafa, ko: «Ne ye ne denkɛ wele ka bɔ Misira.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde y'a ye ko dɔnbaaw y'a janfa minkɛ, a diminna kosɛbɛ. A ye mɔgɔw ci ka taa Bɛtilɛhɛm ni a dafɛ duguw denmisɛn cɛmanw bɛɛ faga, minnu si ma tɛmɛn san fila kan, ka kɛɲɛ ni dɔnbaaw ka waati fɔlen ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kira Jeremi ye min fɔ, o dafara ten. A tun ko:
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔw ye kasikan mɛn ka bɔ Rama, kulo ni kasikanba. Rasɛl bɛ a ka denmisɛnw su kasi. A tɛ sɔn a dusu ka saalo, k'a sɔrɔ u sara ka ban.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hɛrɔde salen kɔ, Matigi ka mɛlɛkɛ dɔ y'i jira Yusufu la sugo la k'a to Misira.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɛlɛkɛ ko: «Wuli ka kɔsegin ni den ni a ba ye Israɛl jamana la, sabu minnu tun b'a fɛ ka den faga, olu sara.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yusufu wulila ka kɔsegin ni den ni a ba ye Israɛl jamana la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a mɛn minkɛ ko Arkɛlaus sigira a fa Hɛrɔde nɔ na ka kɛ Jude jamana masakɛ ye, Yusufu siranna, a ma sɔn ka taa yen. A lasɔminen Ala fɛ sugo la, a taara Galile jamana la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 2 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A sigira dugu dɔ la yen min tɔgɔ ko Nazarɛti, walisa kiraw tun ye min fɔ ko Yesu na wele Nazarɛtika, o ka dafa.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O donw na, Yuhana Batiselikɛla nana Jude kungokolon kɔnɔ ka waajuli daminɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A tun bɛ welewele da ko: «A' ye nimisa aw ka jurumuw la, katuguni sankolo masaya surunyara.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kira Esayi tun kumana mɔgɔ min ko la, Yuhana don. Esayi ko: «Pɛrɛnkan bɛ bɔ kungokolon kɔnɔ ko: ‘A' ye Matigi ka sira labɛn, ka a ka sira misɛnw latilen.’»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana ka fini tun dilara ni ɲaamɛ si ye, a ka cɛsirilan tun ye wolo ye. A ka dumuni tun ye ntɔn ni wo kɔnɔ di ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw tun bɛ taa Yuhana sɛgɛrɛ ka bɔ Jerusalɛm ni Jurdɛn ba da la ani Jude jamana bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun bɛ u jɔ u ka jurumuw la. Yuhana tun bɛ u batise Jurdɛn baji la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yuhana y'a ye tuma min na ko Farisiɛn caman ni Saduseɛn caman nana a fɛ ka batise, a y'a fɔ u ye ko: «Fɔnfɔnnindenw, jɔni ye aw lasɔmi ko aw ka boli Ala ka diminya nata ɲɛ?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kɛwale minnu b'a jira ko aw nimisara aw ka jurumuw la, a' ye olu kɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana a fɔ aw yɛrɛw kɔnɔ ko Ibrahima ye aw fa ye. Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko Ala bɛ se ka nin kabakurunw yɛlɛma ka u kɛ Ibrahima bɔnsɔnw ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Hali sisan, jele talen bɛ jiriw dili tigɛli kama ka ban. Jiri o jiri tɛ den ɲuman kɛ o bɛ tigɛ ka fili tasuma la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni bɛ aw batise ji la k'a jira ko aw nimisara aw ka jurumuw la, nka dɔ bɛ na ne kɔ, o fanga ka bon ni ne ta ye, hali ne man kan ni a ka sabara bɔli yɛrɛ ye a sen na, o na aw batise Ni Senu ni tasuma la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka ɲɔfyɛ minɛn bɛ a bolo. A na a ka ɲɔ gosilen fyɛ ka bɔ ɲaga la. A na a ka ɲɔkisɛ kɛ jiginɛ kɔnɔ ka a ŋɛɲɛ jeni tasuma sabali la.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O tuma la Yesu bɔra Galile jamana la ka taa Yuhana sɛgɛrɛ Jurdɛn ba da la ko Yuhana ka a batise.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ale tun b'a fɛ ka ban, a y'a fɔ Yesu ye ko: «Ne ka kan ka batise e fɛ, i bɛ na ne ma wa?»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «A to a ka kɛ sisan. A ka ɲi an ka Ala sago dafa ten.» Ayiwa Yuhana sɔnna.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu batiselen kɔ, a bɔra ji la. O yɔrɔnin kelen, sankolo dayɛlɛla. A ye Ala Ni jigintɔ ye i ko jɛnɛntuban, ka na sigi a kan.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 3 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kumakan dɔ bɔra sankolo la ko: «Nin ye ne Denkɛ kanulen ye, a ko ka di ne ye haali.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Ni Senu ye Yesu ɲɛminɛ ka taa kungokolon kɔnɔ walisa Sitanɛ k'a kɔrɔbɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye tile binaani ni su binaani kɛ sun na, a ma dumuni kɛ, o kɔ, kɔngɔ y'a minɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kɔrɔbɔlikɛla gɛrɛla a la k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ni i ye Ala Denkɛ ye, a fɔ ko nin kabakurunw ka yɛlɛma ka kɛ nbuurukunw ye.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a jaabi ko: «A sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘Dumunifɛn dama tɛ mɔgɔ balo, nka kuma minnu bɛɛ bɛ bɔ Ala da la, a bɛ balo olu de la.’»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Sitanɛ taara ni Yesu ye dugu senuma kɔnɔ k'a bila Alabatosoba kuncɛ ma,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ni i ye Ala Denkɛ ye, i cun duguma, katuguni a sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘Ala na i ko fɔ a ka mɛlɛkɛw ye, u na i minɛ u bolow la, walisa i sen kana na gosi kabakurun si la.’»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «A sɛbɛnnen bɛ fana ko: ‘I kana i Matigi Ala kɔrɔbɔ.’»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sitanɛ taara ni Yesu ye ko kura ka taa kulu jamanjan kan ka diɲɛ masayaw ni u bonya bɛɛ jira a la,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ni i b'i ɲɔngiri ne kɔrɔ ka ne bato, ne na ninnu bɛɛ di i ma.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Yesu ko: «Taa ka bɔ yan, Sitanɛ, katuguni a sɛbɛnnen bɛ ko: ‘I ka i Matigi Ala bato ka baara kɛ o kelenpe ye.’»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Sitanɛ taara. Mɛlɛkɛ dɔw nana Yesu mago ɲɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a mɛn tuma min na ko Yuhana bilara kaso la, a bɔra yen ka taa Galile jamana la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A bɔra Nazarɛti dugu la, a taara i sigi Kapɛrnaum, o tun ye Galile ba da la dugu dɔ ye, Zabulɔn ni Nefitali jamana la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛra walisa kira Esayi ye min fɔ, o ka dafa, a ko:
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Zabulɔn jamana ni Nefitali jamana, baji da la, Jurdɛn ba kɔfɛ, siya wɛrɛw ka Galile.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu sigilen tun bɛ dibi la, olu ye kɛnɛyeelenba ye. Minnu sigilen tun bɛ dibi la saya yɔrɔ la, kɛnɛyeelen bɔra olu ye.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kabini o tuma la Yesu ye waajuli daminɛ. A tun b'a fɔ ko: «A' ye nimisa aw ka jurumuw la katuguni sankolo masaya surunyara.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu taamatɔ Galile ba kɛrɛ fɛ, a ye balimakɛ fila ye minnu tun ye mɔnnikɛlaw ye, Simɔn min bɛ wele Piɛrɛ ani a balimakɛ Andre. U tun bɛ jɔ fili la baji la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a fɔ u ye ko: «A' ye tugu ne la, ne na aw kɛ mɔgɔ ɲininaw ye.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U sinna ka u ka jɔw to yen ka tugu Yesu la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A taara ɲɛfɛ tun ka balimakɛ fila wɛrɛ ye. Olu tun ye Zebede denkɛw Yakuba ni Yuhana ye. U ni u fa Zebede tun bɛ kurun kɔnɔ ka u ka jɔw kala. Yesu ye u wele.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U sinna ka kurun ni u fa to yen ka tugu Yesu la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tun bɛ yaala Galile jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la ka mɔgɔw kalan u ka Alabatosow kɔnɔ. A tun bɛ sankolo masaya Kibaru Duman fɔ. A tun bɛ bana sifa bɛɛ kɛnɛya ani mɔgɔw ka barikantanya bɛɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tɔgɔ tun bɛ fɔ Siri jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ la, o de la, mɔgɔw nana Yesu sɛgɛrɛ ni u ka banabaatɔw ye. Mɔgɔ minnu tɔɔrɔla bana sifa caman ni dimin caman fɛ, jinɛtɔw, kirikirimashyɛntɔw ani mɔgɔ fan fila salenw, u nana ni olu bɛɛ ye. Yesu ye u bɛɛ kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 4 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jamaba tugura a nɔfɛ ka bɔ Galile jamana ni Dekapole ni Jerusalɛm ni Jude jamana ani Jurdɛn ba kɔfɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye jama ye tuma min na, a yɛlɛnna kulu kan k'i sigi. A ka kalandenw gɛrɛla a la,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] a y'a daminɛ ka u kalan ko:
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Minnu y'a dɔn ko u ye faantanw ye Ala ta fan fɛ, olu ye dubadenw ye, katuguni sankolo masaya ye u ta ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Minnu dusu kasilen don, olu ye dubadenw ye, katuguni u dusuw na saalo.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Minnu sabalilen don, olu ye dubadenw ye, katuguni u na dugukolo sɔrɔ ciyɛn ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Tilennenya nege bɛ minnu na i n'a fɔ kɔngɔ ni minnɔgɔ, olu ye dubadenw ye, katuguni u na wasa.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Makarikɛlaw ye dubadenw ye, katuguni makari na kɛ u la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Minnu dusukunw jɛlen don, olu ye dubadenw ye, katuguni u na Ala ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Minnu b'a ɲini hɛrɛ ka to mɔgɔw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, olu ye dubadenw ye, katuguni u na wele Ala denw.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Minnu tɔɔrɔla tilennenya kosɔn, olu ye dubadenw ye, katuguni sankolo masaya ye u ta ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni mɔgɔw bɛ aw neni, ka tugu aw nɔfɛ ka aw tɔɔrɔ, ka ko jugu caman nkalon da aw la ne kosɔn, o tuma la aw ye dubadenw ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka ɲagali ka nisɔndiya kosɛbɛ haali, katuguni aw ka baraji ka bon sankolo la. Kira minnu tun bɛ aw ɲɛ, mɔgɔw ye olu fana tɔɔrɔ ten.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw ye kɔgɔ ye diɲɛ la, nka ni kɔgɔ timiya bɔra a la, mun na a timiya tun? A tɛ foyi ɲɛ tun fɔ ka fili kɛnɛma, mɔgɔw bɛ taama a kan.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw ye kɛnɛyeelen ye diɲɛ la. Dugu min sigilen bɛ kulu kan, o tɛ se ka dogo.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ tɛ lanpa mana ka minɛn dɔ biri a da la, nka a b'a sigi fɛn dɔ kan, walisa a ka yeelen bɔ so kɔnɔ mɔgɔw bɛɛ ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka yeelen ka bɔ mɔgɔw ɲɛ na o cogo la, walisa u ka aw ka kɛwale ɲumanw ye ka aw sankolola Fa bonya.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw kana miiri ko ne nana sariya ni kiraw ka kalan ban. Ne ma na u ban, ne nana olu de dafa.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko, ka sankolo ni dugukolo to yen, hali sariya sɛbɛnden ncinin wala a ko misɛnmannin, o si tɛna ban, fo ka se fɛn bɛɛ laban tuma ma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn, mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ nin sariyaw bɛɛ la dɔgɔmannin kelen tiɲɛ ka mɔgɔw kalan ten, o na kɛ sankolo masaya la mɔgɔw bɛɛ la dɔgɔmannin ye. Nka min bɛ nin sariyaw mara ka mɔgɔw kalan ten, o na kɛ sankolo masaya la mɔgɔba ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko ni aw ka tilennenya ma tɛmɛn sariya karamɔgɔw ni Farisiɛnw ta kan, aw tɛ se ka don sankolo masaya la fewu.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw y'a mɛn ko a fɔra aw bɛnbaw ye ko: ‘I kana mɔgɔ faga. Ko mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ a mɔgɔ ɲɔgɔn faga, o ka kan ni kiri ye.’
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne kɔni b'a fɔ aw ye ko mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ diminna a balima kɔrɔ, o ka kan ni kiri ye. Min bɛ a balima wele nalonma, kiritigɛ jamakulu ka kan ka kiri tigɛ o kan. Min b'a wele fatɔ, o ka kan ni jahanama tasuma ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I nalen saraka bɔ yɔrɔ la ka i ka saraka bɔ Ala ye, ni i hakili jiginna a la yen ko i ye i balima hakɛ ta,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ayiwa, i ka i ka saraka fɛn to saraka bɔ yɔrɔ la ka taa i ni i balima cɛ bɛn fɔlɔ. O kɔ, i ka kɔsegin ka i ka saraka bɔ Ala ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni mɔgɔ dɔ bɛ taa ni i ye kiri la, i k'i teliya ka i ni ale cɛ bɛn k'aw to sira kan, walisa i kiriɲɔgɔn kana na i don kiritigɛla bolo, o kana na i don garadikɛ bolo ka i bila kaso la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ i ye ko i tɛna bɔ yen sani i ka o juru bɛɛ sara, hali wari misɛn kelen tɛna to.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw y'a mɛn ko a fɔra ko: ‘I kana jatɔya kɛ.’
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne kɔni b'a fɔ aw ye ko mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ muso filɛ ka ɲɛbɔ a fɛ, o tigi ye jatɔya kɛ a fɛ a dusukun na ka ban.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ayiwa ni i kinin fɛ ɲɛ bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka jurumu lase i ma, a wɔgɔbɛ k'a fili. Ka bɔnɛ i farikolo yɔrɔ kelen na, o ka fisa i ma ni a bɛɛ fililen ye jahanama kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni i kininbolo bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka jurumu lase i ma, a tigɛ k'a fili. Ka bɔnɛ i farikolo yɔrɔ kelen na, o ka fisa i ma ni a bɛɛ fililen ye jahanama kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A fɔra fana ko: ‘Min bɛ a muso furu sa, o ka furu sa sɛbɛn di a ma.’
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne kɔni b'a fɔ aw ye ko mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ a muso furu sa ni jatɔya sababu tɛ, o bɛ a muso bila jatɔya la. Cɛ min bɛ muso furu salen furu, o fana bɛ jatɔya kɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw y'a mɛn fana ko a fɔra aw bɛnbaw ye ko: ‘I kana i kalikan tiɲɛ, nka i ye kalili fɛn o fɛn kɛ Matigi ɲɛ kɔrɔ, i ka o bɛɛ dafa.’
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ne kɔni b'a fɔ aw ye ko aw kana kalili kɛ fewu. Aw kana aw kali sankolo la, k'a masɔrɔ o ye Ala ka masasigilan ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana aw kali dugukolo la, k'a masɔrɔ o ye Ala senkɔrɔ dalan de ye. Aw kana aw kali Jerusalɛm la, k'a masɔrɔ masaba ka dugu don.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I kana i kali i yɛrɛ kunkolo fana la, k'a masɔrɔ i tɛ se ka i kunsigi kelen jɛya wala k'a fin.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka kuma ka kɛ ɔwɔ, ɔwɔ, wala ayi, ayi. Ni dɔ farala o kan, o bɛ bɔ Sitanɛ de la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw y'a mɛn ko a fɔra ko: ‘ɲɛ ye ɲɛ sara ye, ɲin ye ɲin sara ye.’
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 39 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni b'a fɔ aw ye ko aw kana aw yɛrɛw bila mɔgɔ jugu fɛ. Ni mɔgɔ dɔ ye tɛgɛ ci i kinin fɛ taman na, i ka fan dɔ jɔ a ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni mɔgɔ dɔ b'a fɛ ka i wele fanga la ka i ka dulɔki ta, i ka i ka dulɔkiba fana di a ma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 41 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni fangatigi dɔ ye i karaba ka a ka doni ta ka kilomɛtɛrɛ kelen ɲɔgɔn kɛ, i ka a ta ka kilomɛtɛrɛ fila kɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 42 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Min ye fɛn dɔ deli i fɛ, i ka o sɔn. Min bɛ juru ɲini i fɛ, i kana ban o ma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 43 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw y'a mɛn ko a fɔra ko: ‘I ka i ɲinw kanu ka i juguw koniya’.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 44 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne kɔni b'a fɔ aw ye ko aw ka aw juguw kanu. Minnu bɛ tugu aw nɔfɛ ka aw tɔɔrɔ, aw ka Ala deli olu ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 45 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka o kɛ walisa aw ka kɛ aw sankolola Fa denw ye. Ale bɛ a ka tile bɔ mɔgɔ juguw ni mɔgɔ ɲumanw bɛɛ ye. A bɛ sanji di mɔgɔ tilennenw ni mɔgɔ tilenbaliw bɛɛ ma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 46 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw bɛ aw kanubaaw dɔrɔn kanu, aw ka kan ni mun baraji ye? Hali faama wari minɛbaaw tɛ o kɛ wa?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 47 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw bɛ aw balimaw dɔrɔn fo, o ye koba ye wa? Ala dɔnbaliw fana tɛ o kɛ wa?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 5 [VERSE_ID] 48 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni ka kɛ mɔgɔ dafalenw ye i ko aw sankolola Fa dafalen bɛ cogo min na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi. Aw kana aw ka Ala sira taama kow kɛ ka aw yɛrɛw jira mɔgɔw la. Ni aw y'o kɛ, aw tɛna baraji sɔrɔ aw sankolola Fa fɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «N'i bɛ fɛn dɔ di faantanw ma, i kana buru fyɛ i ɲɛ walisa mɔgɔw k'i ye ka lasaa. Filankafow b'a kɛ ten Alabatosow kɔnɔ ani nbɛdaw la. U bɛ o kɛ walisa u ka tanuli sɔrɔ mɔgɔw fɛ. Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko u ye u ka bonya sɔrɔ ka ban.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni e bɛ fɛn dɔ di faantanw ma, i numanbolo kana i kininbolo ka kɛta dɔn,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] walisa o ka kɛ nili dogolen ye. N'i y'a kɛ ten, i Fa min bɛ ko dogolenw ye, o de na i baraji.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni aw bɛ Ala deli, aw kana kɛ filankafow bɔɲɔgɔnko ye. A ka di olu ye ka jɔ ka Ala deli Alabatosow kɔnɔ ani nbɛdaw la, walisa mɔgɔw bɛɛ ka u ye. Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko u ye u ka bonya sɔrɔ ka ban.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni i bɛ delili kɛ, don i ka bon kɔnɔ ka da tugu i da la. I Fa min bɛ yɔrɔ dogolen na, o deli yen. I Fa min bɛ ko dogolenw ye, o na i baraji.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni aw bɛ Ala deli tuma min na, aw kana segin kumaw kan ko caman fu, i ko Ala dɔnbaliw b'a kɛcogo min na. Olu b'a bisigi ko u ka kuma caman b'a to Ala ka u lamɛn.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana kɛ olu bɔɲɔgɔnkow ye, katuguni aw Fa bɛ aw mago fɛnw bɛɛ dɔn sani aw ka u deli a fɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw ka kan ka Ala deli tan ko: ‘An Fa min bɛ sankolo la, i tɔgɔ ka saniya.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I ka masaya ka na. I sago ka kɛ dugukolo kan i ko a bɛ kɛ sankolo la cogo min na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ka bi dumuni di an ma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] An ka hakɛw yafa an ma, i ko an fana bɛ yafa an hakɛ tabaaw ma cogo min na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] I kana an don kɔrɔbɔli la, nka an kisi Sitanɛ ma. [Katuguni masaya ni sebaaya ni nɔɔrɔ ye e de ta ye badaa-badaa. Amiina.]’
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni aw bɛ mɔgɔ tɔw ka hakɛw yafa u ma, aw sankolola Fa na yafa aw ma fana.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni aw tɛ mɔgɔ tɔw ka hakɛw yafa u ma, aw sankolola Fa tɛna aw ka hakɛw yafa aw ma fana.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Ni aw bɛ sun tuma min na, aw kana aw ɲɛ kumu i ko filankafow b'a kɛcogo min na. Olu bɛ u ɲɛda cogo yɛlɛma, walisa mɔgɔw k'a dɔn ko u sunnen don. Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko u ye u ka bonya sɔrɔ ka ban.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] E kɔni, n'i bɛ sun tuma min na, i ɲɛ ko ka tulu suma duman kɛ i kun na ka a saalo,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] walisa mɔgɔw kana a dɔn ko i sunnen don, fɔ i Fa min bɛ yɔrɔ dogolen na. I Fa min bɛ ko dogolenw ye, o na i baraji.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw kana nafolo lajɛ k'a mara aw yɛrɛw ye nin diɲɛ la yan, ntumuw ni nson bɛ tiɲɛni kɛ, sonyalikɛlaw fana bɛ daw kari ka tali kɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka a' ye nafolo lajɛ aw yɛrɛw ye sankolo la. Ntumuw ni nson tɛ se ka tiɲɛni kɛ yen, sonyalikɛlaw tɛ se ka daw kari ka tali kɛ yen fana.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ i ka nafolo bɛ yɔrɔ min na, i dusukun miirili fana bɛ yen.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ ɲɛw ye a farikolo lanpa ye. Ni i ɲɛkisɛw ka kɛnɛ, i farikolo bɛɛ bɛ yeelen na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni i ɲɛw man ɲi, i farikolo bɛɛ bɛ dibi la. Ayiwa ni i kɔnɔna yeelen kɛra dibi ye, o dibi ka bon dɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ si tɛ se ka baara kɛ kuntigi fila ye, katuguni a na dɔ koniya k'a tɔ kelen kanu, wala a na i nɔrɔ kelen na k'i mago bɔ dɔ la. Aw tɛ se ka baara kɛ Ala ye k'a kɛ nafolo fana ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O de kosɔn ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko: Aw kana hami aw balo ko la, ko aw na mun dun ka mun min? Aw kana hami aw fɛɛrɛbɔ ko la, ko aw na mun fini don? Ni man girin dumuni ma wa? Farikolo man girin fini ma wa?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye sanfɛ kɔnɔw filɛ, olu tɛ danni kɛ, u tɛ suman tigɛ, u tɛ suman lajɛ jiginɛ kɔnɔ, o bɛɛ n'a ta aw sankolola Fa bɛ u balo. Aw man fisa ni kɔnɔw ye kosɛbɛ wa?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw la mɔgɔ jumɛn bɛ se ka hali dɔɔnin fara a yɛrɛ si dama kan ni hami ye?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Sababu jumɛn b'a to aw bɛ hami aw fɛɛrɛbɔ ko la? A' ye miiri kungo kɔnɔ bagaw fɛɛrɛbɔ cogo la. U tɛ baara kɛ, u tɛ paratali kɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O bɛɛ n'a ta, ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko masa Solomani ni a ka faamaya bɛɛ, a ka finiw ma o baga feerew la kelen bɔ cɛɲɛ la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Bin min bɛ kungo kɔnɔ bi, k'a sɔrɔ tasuma na a jeni sini, ni Ala bɛ o fɛɛrɛ bɔ ten, a tɛna aw fɛɛrɛ bɔ ka tɛmɛn o kan kosɛbɛ wa? Aw ka dannaya ka dɔgɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn aw kana hami ko aw na mun dun ka mun min? Ko aw ka fɛɛrɛbɔ ko na kɛ di?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ala dɔnbaliw bɛ o fɛnw bɛɛ ɲini. Aw sankolola Fa kɔni b'a dɔn ko aw mago bɛ u bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye Ala ka masaya ni a ka tilennenya ɲini fɔlɔ. O mana kɛ, Ala na o fɛnw bɛɛ di aw ma ka fara olu kan.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 6 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana hami sini kow la, sini ni a ka hamina kow don. Degun min bɛ don kelen kɔnɔ, o bɛ labɔli kɛ o don na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw kana mɔgɔ tɔw jalaki, walisa aw kana jalaki.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] K'a masɔrɔ aw bɛ tɔw jalaki cogo min na, aw na jalaki o cogo yɛrɛ de la. Aw bɛ tɔw ta suma ni minɛn min ye, aw ta na suma ni o minɛn yɛrɛ de ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalanin min bɛ i balima ɲɛ kan, mun na i bɛ o filɛ? K'a sɔrɔ so cɛtigɛ jiri bɛ i yɛrɛ ɲɛ kan, i ma o ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] So cɛtigɛ jiri bɛ e min ɲɛ kan, i bɛ se k'a fɔ i balima ye cogo di ko: ‘Kalanin min bɛ i ɲɛ kan, a to ne ka o bɔ’?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Filankafo, so cɛtigɛ jiri bɔ i yɛrɛ ɲɛ kan fɔlɔ. Ni o kɛra, i na se ka yeli kɛ ko ɲuman ka kalanin bɔ i balima ɲɛ kan.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw kana fɛn senumaw fili wuluw kɔrɔ, u kana na yɛlɛma aw kama ka aw farafara. Aw kana aw ka kɔnɔnkisɛ sɔngɔ gɛlɛnw fili lɛw kɔrɔ, u kana na u cɔngɔ u senw kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye delili kɛ, aw na sɔrɔli kɛ. A' ye ɲinili kɛ, aw na yeli kɛ. A' ye da kɔnkɔn, da na yɛlɛ aw ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ delili kɛ, o bɛ sɔrɔli kɛ. Min bɛ ɲinili kɛ, o bɛ yeli kɛ. Min bɛ da kɔnkɔn, da na yɛlɛ o ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni aw fɛn o fɛn denkɛ bɛ nbuuru deli a fɛ, mɔgɔ bɛ aw la min bɛ sɔn ka kabakurun di a den ma nbuuru nɔ na wa?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Walima ni aw dɔ den ye jɛgɛ deli, o bɛ sɔn ka sa di a den ma jɛgɛ nɔ na wa?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw minnu ka jugu, ni aw bɛ fɛn ɲumanw di cogo dɔn aw denw ma, aw sankolola Fa tɛna fɛn ɲumanw di a delibaaw ma ka tɛmɛn aw ta di cogo kan kosɛbɛ wa?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw b'a fɛ mɔgɔw ka fɛn o fɛn kɛ aw ye, aw ka o ɲɔgɔn kɛ u ye, sabu o ye sariya ni kiraw ka kalan de ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye don da dɔgɔmannin fɛ, katuguni sira min bɛ taa halaki yɔrɔ la, o donda ni a kɔnɔ bɛɛ ka bon, a taabaaw ka ca.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sira min bɛ taa ɲɛnamaya la, o donda ni a kɔnɔ bɛɛ ka dɔgɔ, a sɔrɔbaaw man ca.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi kira nkalontigɛlaw la. U bɛ na aw ma i n'a fɔ sagaw, nka u kɔnɔna la u ye wara juguw de ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw na u dɔn u ka kɛwalew de fɛ. Rezɛn mɔ bɛ kari ŋɔni sunw la wa? Toro mɔ fana bɛ kari ɲaamɛ ŋɔni sunw la wa?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jiri ɲuman bɛ den ɲumanw kɛ, nka jiri jugu bɛ den juguw de kɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jiri ɲuman tɛ se ka den juguw kɛ, jiri jugu tɛ se ka den ɲumanw kɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jiri o jiri tɛ den ɲuman kɛ, o bɛ tigɛ ka fili tasuma la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cogo de la, aw na o kira nkalontigɛlaw dɔn u ka kɛwalew fɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ minnu b'a fɔ ne ma, ‘Matigi, Matigi,’ olu bɛɛ tɛna don sankolo masaya la, fɔ ne sankolola Fa sago kɛbaaw.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O don mana se, mɔgɔ caman n'a fɔ ne ye ko: ‘Matigi, Matigi, a fɔ, anw ma kiraya kɛ i tɔgɔ la, ka jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la, ka kabako caman kɛ i tɔgɔ la wa?’
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O la, ne n'a fɔ u ye ko: Ne ma aw dɔn fewu. A' ye bɔ ne kɔrɔ, aw kojugukɛlaw.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «O cogo la, mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ ne ka kuma ninnu lamɛn ka u kɛ, o tigi bɛ se ka kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔ hakilitigi dɔ ye, min ye a ka so jɔ farakolo kan.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sanjiba nana, baw karila, fiɲɛba cira, olu bɛɛ ye o so gosi, nka a ma bin, katuguni a ju sigira farakolo kan.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka ni mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ ne ka kuma ninnu lamɛn, ni a ma u kɛ, o bɛ se ka kɛɲɛ ni hakilintan dɔ ye min ye a ka so jɔ cɛncɛn kan.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sanjiba nana, baw karila, fiɲɛba cira, olu bɛɛ ye o so gosi. A binna, a tiɲɛ ko juguyara.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tilara nin mɔgɔ kalanni la tuma min na, jama kabakoyara a ka mɔgɔ kalan cogo la,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 7 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] k'a masɔrɔ ale tun tɛ u kalan i ko u ka sariya karamɔgɔw, nka a tun bɛ u kalan ni fanga ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu jiginnen ka bɔ kulu kan, jamaba tugura a nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kunatɔ dɔ gɛrɛla k'i ɲɔngiri Yesu ɲɛ kɔrɔ k'a fɔ ko: «Matigi, ni i bɛ sɔn, i bɛ se ka ne saniya.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a bolo mɔɔnɔbɔ ka maga o la k'a fɔ ko: «Ne sɔnna, i ka saniya.» O cɛ saniyara o yɔrɔnin kelen na, kuna banna.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu y'a fɔ a ye ko: «A filɛ, i kana o ko fɔ mɔgɔ si ye, nka taa i yɛrɛ jira sarakalasebaa la. Musa ye saraka ko min fɔ, i ka o bɔ, o na kɛ seereya ye i kɛnɛyali ko la.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu donna Kapɛrnaum minkɛ, jalasabatigi dɔ gɛrɛla a la k'a deli,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ko: «Matigi, ne ka baaraden dalen bɛ so kɔnɔ, a fanfilasalen don, a tɔɔrɔlen bɛ kosɛbɛ.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ko: «Ne bɛ taa a kɛnɛya.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka o jalasabatigi ko: «Matigi, e ka don ne ka so, ne man kan n'o ye. Nka kuma kelen fɔ dɔrɔn, o na ne ka baaraden kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kuntigi dɔw bɛ ne kun na, sɔrɔdasi dɔw fana bɛ ne bolo. Ne b'a fɔ u dɔ ye ko ‘Taa’, o bɛ taa. Ne b'a fɔ dɔ wɛrɛ ye ko ‘Na’, o bɛ na, k'a fɔ ne ka baaraden ye ko ‘Nin kɛ’, a bɛ o kɛ.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kuma mɛnnen Yesu fɛ, a kabakoyara. A y'a fɔ a nɔfɛ mɔgɔw ye ko: «Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko ne ma nin bɔɲɔgɔnko dannaya ye mɔgɔ si fɛ, hali Israɛl cɛma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko mɔgɔ caman bɛ na ka bɔ kɔrɔn ni tilebin fɛ, olu ni Ibrahima ni Isaka ani Yakuba na u sigi dumuni la sankolo masaya kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka sankolo masaya denw na fili kɛnɛma dibi la. Kasi ni ɲin ɲimi na kɛ yen.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɔ, Yesu y'a fɔ jalasabatigi ye ko: «Taa i ka so, a ka kɛ i ye ka kɛɲɛ ni i ka dannaya ye.» Jalasabatigi ka baaraden kɛnɛyara o waati yɛrɛ la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu taara Piɛrɛ ka so. A ye Piɛrɛ muso bange ba dalen sɔrɔ farigan bolo.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu magara o bolo la, farigan y'a bila, a wulila ka baara daminɛ ka Yesu mago ɲɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Wula da selen, mɔgɔw nana Yesu sɛgɛrɛ ni jinɛtɔ caman ye. Yesu ye o jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ u la a ka kuma fɛ, ka banabaatɔw bɛɛ kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye o kɛ walisa kira Esayi tun ye min fɔ, o ka dafa, ko: «A ye a kun don an ka barikantanyaw kɔrɔ, ka an ka banaw ta.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'a lamininen ye jama fɛ minkɛ, a y'a fɔ ko: «An ka taa ba kɔ.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Sariya karamɔgɔ dɔ y'i madon Yesu la k'a fɔ ko: «Karamɔgɔ, i taara yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ, ne na tugu i la.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'o jaabi ko: «Wow bɛ kungo wuluw fɛ, ɲaaw bɛ sanfɛ kɔnɔw fɛ, nka da yɔrɔ tɛ Mɔgɔ Denkɛ fɛ min ye a yɛrɛ ta ye.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka kalanden dɔ fana y'a fɔ a ye ko: «Matigi, a to ne ka taa ne fa su don fɔlɔ.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'o jaabi ko: «A to mɔgɔ salenw ka u ka mɔgɔw su don, e kɔni ka tugu ne la.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ni a ka kalandenw donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Fiɲɛba sinna ka wuli baji kan, fo jikuruw tun bɛ ɲini ka kurun datugu. Yesu tun bɛ sunɔgɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ka kalandenw gɛrɛla a la ka a lakunun ko: «Matigi, anw tɔ to filɛ ji la, an kisi!»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'u jaabi ko: «Mun na aw siranna? Aw ka dannaya ka dɔgɔ.» O kɔ, a wulila ka fiɲɛ ni ji kɔrɔfɔ, u madara.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O mɔgɔw kabakoyara k'a fɔ ko: «Mɔgɔ sifa jumɛn ye nin ye, fo fiɲɛ ni ji b'a kan minɛ?»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu selen ba kɔ Gadarakaw ka jamana la, cɛ jinɛtɔ fila bɔra kaburudo dɔ la ka na a kunbɛn. U tun ka farin kosɛbɛ, fo mɔgɔ si tun tɛ sɔn ka tɛmɛn o sira fɛ tun.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O jinɛtɔw y'a daminɛ ka pɛrɛn ko: «Ala Denkɛ, i bɛ mun ɲini anw fɛ? I nana ka an tɔɔrɔ sani a tuma latigɛlen ka se wa?»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Lɛkuluba dɔ tun bɛ dumuni ɲinili la fanan fɛ yen.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jinɛw ye Yesu deli ko: «Ni i bɛ an gɛn ka bɔ nin cɛw la, an bila ka taa don nin lɛkulu la.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ko: «A' ye taa.» U bɔra o cɛw la ka taa don lɛw la. A filɛ, o lɛkulu bɛɛ girinna ka jigin kulu jiginjigin jugu fɛ ka don baji la ka sa yen.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O lɛgɛnnaw bolila ka taa don dugu kɔnɔ ka o ko kɛlenw bɛɛ lakali, ani min kɛra jinɛtɔw la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 8 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen, dugu mɔgɔw bɛɛ bɔra ka taa Yesu kunbɛn. U y'a ye minkɛ, u y'a deli ko a ka taa ka bɔ u ka jamana la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu donna kurun dɔ kɔnɔ ka ba tigɛ ka segin a yɛrɛ ka dugu la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw nana a sɛgɛrɛ ni cɛ fanfilasalen dɔ ye dalan kan. Yesu ye o mɔgɔw ka dannaya ye minkɛ, a y'a fɔ o cɛ fanfilasalen ye ko: «Ne denkɛ, i ja gɛlɛya, i ka jurumuw yafara i ma.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de la, sariya karamɔgɔ dɔw y'a fɔ u yɛrɛw kɔnɔ ko: «Nin cɛ bɛ Ala tɔgɔ tiɲɛ dɛ.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun bɛ miiri min na, Yesu ye o dɔn, a ko: «Mun y'a to miirili juguw bɛ aw kɔnɔ?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nin kuma fila la, jumɛn fɔli ka nɔgɔn? K'a fɔ ko: ‘I ka jurumuw yafara i ma,’ wala k'a fɔ ko: ‘Wuli ka taama’?
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka walisa aw k'a dɔn ko fanga bɛ Mɔgɔ Denkɛ fɛ k'a to dugukolo kan ka jurumuw yafa,» –a y'a fɔ o cɛ fanfilasalen ye ko: «Wuli ka i ka dalan ta ka taa so.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O cɛ wulila ka a ka dalan ta ka taa so.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama y'o ye minkɛ, u siranna kosɛbɛ. U ye Ala bonya ko a ye o ɲɔgɔn fanga di mɔgɔw ma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu taara ka bɔ yen, a tɛmɛntɔ ye cɛ dɔ sigilen ye faama wari minɛ yɔrɔ la, o tɔgɔ ko Matiyu. A y'a fɔ o ye ko: «Tugu ne la.» Matiyu wulila ka tugu a nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu taara i sigi dumuni la so kɔnɔ minkɛ, faama wari minɛbaaw ni jurumutɔ caman donna ka u sigi a ni a ka kalandenw fɛ dumuni la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Farisiɛnw y'o ye minkɛ, u y'a fɔ Yesu ka kalandenw ye ko: «Mun y'a to aw karamɔgɔ ni faama wari minɛbaaw ni jurumutɔw bɛ dumuni kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ?»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye o kuma mɛn minkɛ, a ko: «Mɔgɔ minnu ka kɛnɛ, olu mago tɛ furakɛla la, banabaatɔw de mago b'a la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye taa aw miiri nin kuma kɔrɔ la ko: ‘Ne bɛ min fɛ, makari don, saraka tɛ.’ Katuguni ne ma na mɔgɔ tilennenw wele, fɔ jurumukɛlaw.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O la, Yuhana Batiselikɛla ka kalandenw y'u madon Yesu la k'a ɲininka ko: «Mun na anw ni Farisiɛnw bɛ sun ko caman, k'a sɔrɔ i ka kalandenw tɛ sun?»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'u jaabi ko: «Kɔɲɔcɛ tɔɲɔgɔnw bɛ se ka ɲɛnasisi ka u ni kɔɲɔcɛ to ɲɔgɔn fɛ wa? Nka waati bɛ na, kɔɲɔcɛ na bɔsi u la, o mana kɛ, u na sun.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ si tɛ fini kunkurun kura bari fini kɔrɔlen na. Ni o kɛra, kunkurun kura na fini yɔrɔ dɔ sama ka o fara, o fara ko bɛna juguya dɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Diwɛn kɛnɛ fana tɛ kɛ foroko kɔrɔw kɔnɔ. Ni o kɛra, forokow na fara, diwɛn na bɔn, forokow fana na tiɲɛ. Diwɛn kɛnɛ kɔni bɛ kɛ foroko kuraw de kɔnɔ, u bɛɛ bɛ mara ko ɲuman ten.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ka Yesu to o kuma la, Yahutuw ka kuntigi dɔ nana i ɲɔngiri a ɲɛ kɔrɔ k'a fɔ a ye ko: «Ne denmuso sara sisan-sisan, nka na i bolo da a kan, a na ɲɛnamaya tun.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ni a ka kalandenw wulila ka tugu o kuntigi nɔfɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Muso dɔ tɔɔrɔlen tun bɛ jolibɔbana fɛ kabini san tan ni fila. O gɛrɛla Yesu la a kɔfɛ ka maga a ka fini dawolo la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O muso tun b'a fɔ a yɛrɛ kɔnɔ ko: «Ni ne bɛ se ka maga a ka fini la dɔrɔn, ne na kɛnɛya.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu y'i yɛlɛma ka o muso ye k'a fɔ a ye ko: «I ja gɛlɛya, ne denmuso, i ka dannaya ye i kɛnɛya.» O yɔrɔnin kelen, muso kɛnɛyara.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu sera o kuntigi ka so ka buru fyɛlaw ye ka jama ye mankan na minkɛ,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] a ko: «A' ye bɔ yan, k'a masɔrɔ dennin ma sa, a bɛ sunɔgɔ.» U ye yɛlɛ bɔ a ma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Jama bɔlen kɔ, Yesu donna bon kɔnɔ, a ye dennin ta a bolo ma, dennin wulila.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kibaru jɛnsɛnna o jamana yɔrɔw bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu taara ka bɔ yen, a tɛmɛntɔ, fiyentɔ fila y'a nɔ minɛ ka pɛrɛn ko: «Dawuda Bɔnsɔn, makari anw na.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu selen so, o fiyentɔw gɛrɛla a la, a ye u ɲininka ko: «Aw dara a la ko ne bɛ se ka aw ɲɛw yɛlɛ wa?» U ko: «ɔwɔ, Matigi.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O kɛlen kɔ, Yesu magara u ɲɛw la k'a fɔ ko: «A ka kɛ aw ye ka kɛɲɛ ni aw ka dannaya ye.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U ɲɛw yɛlɛla. Yesu y'a gɛlɛya u ma ko: «A filɛ, aw kana a to mɔgɔ si ka nin dɔn.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 31 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka u taara ka kuma Yesu ko la o jamana yɔrɔw bɛɛ la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 32 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U tun bɛ taa tuma min na, mɔgɔw nana Yesu yɔrɔ ni cɛ jinɛtɔ bobo dɔ ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 33 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kabini Yesu ye o jinɛ gɛn, o cɛ y'a daminɛ ka kuma. Jama bɛɛ kabakoyara k'a fɔ ko: «Nin bɔɲɔgɔnko ma ye Israɛl la fɔlɔ dɛ.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 34 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Nka Farisiɛnw tun b'a fɔ ko: «A bɛ jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la jinɛw kuntigi de barika la.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 35 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu tun bɛ dugubaw ni dugu misɛnw bɛɛ yaala ka mɔgɔw kalan u ka Alabatosow kɔnɔ. A tun bɛ sankolo masaya Kibaru Duman waajuli kɛ, ka mɔgɔw ka banaw ni u ka barikantanya bɛɛ kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 36 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A ye jama ye minkɛ, u hinɛ donna a la, k'a masɔrɔ u sɛgɛnnen jigi tigɛlen tun bɛ, i ko gɛnbaa tɛ saga minnu la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 37 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A y'a fɔ a ka kalandenw ye ko: «Suman tigɛta ka ca, nka baarakɛlaw ka dɔgɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 9 [VERSE_ID] 38 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] O de kosɔn aw ka Sumantigi deli ko a ka baarakɛlaw ci ka taa a ka suman tigɛ.»
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 1 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye a ka kalanden tan ni fila wele ka fanga di u ma ka jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la ani ka banaw ni barikantanya bɛɛ kɛnɛya.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 2 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ka ciden tan ni fila tɔgɔw filɛ: Fɔlɔ, Simɔn, o bɛ wele Piɛrɛ, ani o balimakɛ Andre ani Zebede denkɛw Yakuba ni Yuhana,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 3 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Filipe ni Bartɛlɛmi, Tɔma ni Matiyu min tun ye faama wari minɛbaa ye fɔlɔ, Alifɛ denkɛ Yakuba ni Tade
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 4 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] ani Simɔn Zelote, ani Juda Isikariɔti, o de ye Yesu don bolo la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 5 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Yesu ye a fɛ taw fɔ a ka tan ni fila ye ka u ci, a ko: «Siya minnu tɛ Yahutuw ye, aw kana taa olu fan fɛ, aw kana don Samarikaw ka duguw si kɔnɔ fana.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 6 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye taa Israɛl mɔgɔw fan fɛ, olu minnu kɛra i ko saga tununnenw.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 7 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw taatɔ ka to ka waajuli kɛ ko sankolo masaya surunyara.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 8 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye banabaatɔw kɛnɛya ka suw lakunun. A' ye kunatɔw saniya ka jinɛw gɛn ka bɔ mɔgɔw la. Aw y'a sɔrɔ gansan, aw fana k'a di gansan.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana sanu wala warijɛ wala wari misɛn bila aw kun.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 10 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kana dugutaa minɛn ta fana, wala dulɔki fila wala sabara wala bere. Baarakɛla kɔni ka kan ni a ka dumuni ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 11 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw mana se dugu o dugu la, duguba wala dugu misɛn, aw ka mɔgɔ sɛbɛ ɲini ka jigin o fɛ fo aw taa tuma ka se.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw dontɔ o du kɔnɔ, aw ka foli kɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 13 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni o du kɔnɔ mɔgɔw ka kan ni o hɛrɛ ye, o ka to u fɛ, nka ni u man kan n'a ye, aw ka hɛrɛ ka kɔsegin aw ma.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 14 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni u ma sɔn ka aw ladon wala ka aw ka kuma lamɛn, du o du kɔnɔ, wala dugu dɔ kɔnɔ, aw bɔtɔ, a' ye aw senna buguri yuguyugu yen ka taa.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 15 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko Sodɔmɛ ni Gomɔrɛ jamana mɔgɔw ka tɔɔrɔ tɛna o dugu mɔgɔw ta bɔ kiritigɛ don na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 16 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «A filɛ, ne bɛ aw ci ka taa i n'a fɔ sagaw bɛ taa waraw cɛma. A' ye keguya i ko saw, ka kɛ mɔgɔ jɛlenw ye i ko jɛnɛntubanw.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 17 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] A' ye aw yɛrɛw kɔlɔsi mɔgɔw la dɛ, k'a masɔrɔ u na aw don kiritigɛ jamaw bolo ka aw gosi ni gɛɲɛw ye u ka Alabatosow kɔnɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 18 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] U na taa ni aw ye gɔfɛrɛnɛrɛw ni masakɛw ɲɛ kɔrɔ ne tɔgɔ kosɔn. O n'a to aw ka seereya kɛ olu ni siya tɔw ɲɛ kɔrɔ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 19 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni u bɛ aw don bolo la tuma min na, aw hakili kana ɲaami aw ka fɔta wala aw ka kuma cogo la. Aw na kuma minnu fɔ, olu na jigin aw hakili la o waati yɛrɛ de la,
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 20 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] katuguni aw yɛrɛw tɛna kɛ kumabaaw ye, nka aw Fa Ala Ni de na kuma aw da la.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 21 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Balima na a balima don bolo la, walisa a ka faga. Fa na o ɲɔgɔn kɛ a den na. Denw fana na wuli u bangebaaw kama walisa u ka faga.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 22 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Mɔgɔw bɛɛ na aw koniya ne tɔgɔ kosɔn, nka min bɛ muɲuli kɛ fo a laban na, o na kisi.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 23 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ni u ye aw tɔɔrɔ dugu dɔ la, a' ye boli ka taa dugu wɛrɛ la. Tiɲɛ la ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko aw tɛna tɛmɛn Israɛl duguw bɛɛ kɔnɔ sani Mɔgɔ Denkɛ ka na.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 24 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Kalanden man bon ni a karamɔgɔ ye. Baaraden man bon ni a ka baara kuntigi ye.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 25 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kalanden dan ye ka kɛ i ko a karamɔgɔ. Baaraden fana dan ye ka kɛ i ko a ka baara kuntigi. Ni gatigi welela Bɛlzebul, tɔgɔ min na fɔ a ka so mɔgɔw ma, o na juguya ni Bɛlzebul ye dɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 26 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Aw kana siran mɔgɔw ɲɛ, sabu foyi dogolen tɛ min tɛna bɔ kɛnɛ kan, gundo si tɛ ni a tɛna dɔn.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 27 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Ne bɛ min fɔ aw ye dibi la, a' ye o fɔ kɛnɛ kan. Aw bɛ dogodogonin kuma min mɛn, a' ye o welewele da so san fɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 28 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Minnu bɛ farikolo faga k'a sɔrɔ u tɛ se ka foyi kɛ ni la, aw kana siran olu ɲɛ. Min bɛ se ka farikolo ani ni halaki jahanama kɔnɔ, aw ka siran o de ɲɛ.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 29 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Cɔrɔnin fila tɛ feere wari misɛn kelen na wa? O bɛɛ n'a ta, hali u kelen tɛ bin duguma ni aw Fa Ala ma sɔn.
[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 30 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw kɔni, hali aw kunsigi bɛɛ dama dɔnnen don.

[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 10 [VERSE_ID] 40 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] «Mɔgɔ min bɛ aw ladon, o bɛ ne ladon. Mɔgɔ min bɛ ne ladon, o bɛ ne cibaa ladon.

[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 9 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Aw dun taara mun filɛ? Kira don wa? ɔwɔ, ne b'a fɔ aw ye ko a ka bon ni kira ye.

[BOOK] MAT [CHAPTER] 11 [VERSE_ID] 12 [LANG] BAMLSB [VERSE] Kabini Yuhana Batiselikɛla ka waajuli tuma fo sisan, sankolo masaya bɛ sɔrɔ ni jijali ye, mɔgɔ jijalenw de b'a sɔrɔ.
